name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml
description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. We’ll take a lifetime supply!
how_to_use: For daily usage and sun exposition. Shake before use. Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure. Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid Tinted SPF50+ 50ml La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid Tinted SPF50+ 50ml
description: If you’re looking for the best of the best, you’ve come to the right place. This is the ultimate skin protector for reactive skin to keep it safe from UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA rays. This clever tinted fluid feels weightless on the skin and, even better, won’t mess up your make up with weeping eyes! In case you needed more persuasion, this high protection fluid is non-sticky, non-greasy and ultra-resistant to sand, water and sweat. Ticking all our boxes and more, this is heading straight into our holiday haul *adds to bag*.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml
description: Reactive skins rejoice! For La Roche-Posay have specifically formulated this treatment toner to help regulate oil without disrupting your skins natural balance. Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.
how_to_use: Apply toner gently with a damp cotton wool pad to the face and neck, morning and evening.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Alcohol Denat,. Glycerin, Sodium Citrate, Propylene Glycol, Peg-60, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Disodium Edta, Capryloyl, Salicylic Acid, Citric Acid, Parfum/Fragrance.

name: Tan-Luxe The Gradual Illuminating Tanning Lotion 250ml Tan-Luxe The Gradual Illuminating Tanning Lotion 250ml
description: For a brilliantly believable and beautifully buildable bronzed glow at any time of year, this gradual tan lotion is the perfect antidote to pallid, sun-starved skin syndrome. Suitable for use on both face and body, the weightless, lotion-oil hybrid formulation glides on wherever it’s desired, smoothing, conditioning and toning skin while building up natural-looking sunkissed radiance. Steering well clear of tell-tale ‘tangoed’ territory, The Gradual by TAN-LUXE is a revolution in fake tan, giving all of the glow with none of the streaks, smell or stress.
how_to_use: Prep Exfoliate using a gentle scrub 24 hours before tanning. Lightly moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Apply Apply to skin as you would a normal body moisturiser, lightly covering hands elbows and feet. Thoroughly wash hands after use. Develops over 2-4 hours delivering a subtle, gradual glow that you can apply daily, or as desired to build a tailor-made depth of colour. Maintain Exfoliate and moisturise skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow. Caution We advise a patch test is done 24 hours prior to use. Do not apply on broken, irritated or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If a reaction occurs, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice. Does not contain sunscreen and will not protect against sun exposure. Product colour may vary due to natural ingredients.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream 240ml Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream 240ml
description: Brazilian 'bum bums' are famously brilliant, so whether it's a bottom, a butt or la derriére, your behind will reap the benefits of this tightening, moisturising miracle cream. Rich in South America's secret ingredients, a naturally nourishing, hyper-hydrating blend of cupuaçu butter, açaí and coconut oil provide the background to the star of the show: guaraná. A native Amazonian plant, this fruit contains one of the most potent forms of caffeine on the planet (with almost five times more caffeine than coffee), giving your bottom the ultimate boost and stimulating circulation to keep it super smooth and tantalisingly toned, while also minimising cellulite. With a light, silky texture the cream is great all over the body (bum bum and beyond), absorbing quickly without feeling greasy or oily. Blissfully scented with a sweet, nutty fragrance (believe us... this stuff smells incredible) and bestowing skin with a subtle shimmer, Sol de Janeiro's Brazilian Bum Bum Cream will transport you to the beaches of Rio and grant you all the confidence of a Carnival dancer.
how_to_use: Massage in a clockwise circular motion to create warmth for better absorption and circulation. Start with your bum bum, but you won't be able to resist moving on to your tummy, arms, legs and all your beautiful features.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dodecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Parfum (Fragrance), Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit (Açaí) Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuaçu) Seed Butter, Bertholletia Excelsa (Brazil Nut) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Paullinia Cupana (Guaraná) Seed Extract, Ilex Guayusa Leaf Extract, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Squalane, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene. name: Aesop Reverence Aromatique Hand Wash 500ml Aesop Reverence Aromatique Hand Wash 500ml
description: Aesop’s Reverence Hand Wash is exquisite, from the ingredients down to the chic brown bottle. With a clean, earthy perfume – a fresh, herbal blend of vetiver root, bergamot and petitgrain – this cleansing gel also boasts microscopic pumice grains to gently polish and replenish your hard-working hands. Aesop don’t believe in ‘anti’ – you won’t see any hyperbolic ‘anti-ageing’ or ‘anti-acne’ claims – instead, their products are developed to complement a balanced lifestyle, and help protect against the elements. This is ‘pro’ skin care for those who’re planning to grow older gracefully, proud of the skin that they live in.

name: OUAI St. Barts Body Crème 212g OUAI St. Barts Body Crème 212g
description: A moisturising godsend, this St. Barts Body Crème, inspired by the dream destination on everyone’s bucket list, whips dull and dry skin into softened shape. Boasting a luxuriously rich blend that features cupuaçu butter (a nourishing emollient that softens skin) and deeply moisturising coconut oil, while antioxidant-rich squalane conditions, hydrates and encourages moisture retention. Keeping your post-holiday blues at bay with a glow-giving formula and tropical scent celebrating notes of dragonfruit, orange blossom, tuberose and baltic amber, expect supple, baby-soft skin in no time.
how_to_use: Massage onto skin after bath, shower, or really whenever. Goes on buttery thick and melts into a velvety finish. Pair it with your favourite OUAI Body Cleanser if you’re into a lavish lifestyle or a healthy looking glow.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Phenyl Trimethicone, Cetyl Alcohol, Isododecane, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Glycerin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Butter, Lactobacillus Ferment, Squalane, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 60, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopherol, Sodium Phytate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Alcohol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Benzophenone-4, Phenoxyethanol, Yellow 5 (Ci 19140), Yellow 6 (Ci 15985), Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin.

name: ESPA Detoxifying Salt Scrub 700g ESPA Detoxifying Salt Scrub 700g
description: Buff your way to beautifully smooth skin with ESPA's gently exfoliating Detoxifying Salt Scrub: a refining formula made up of sea salts and nature's purest, most effective essential oils. Carefully crafted by ESPA's aromatherapists with uplifting and refreshing notes of grapefruit, cypress and eucalyptus, this cleansing scrub effectively smooths and clarifies your skin — making light work of dulling dead skin cells and rough patches. The naturally coarse sea salts are bathed in a blend of moisturising oils, such as sweet almond oil, to provide gentle exfoliation and an invigorating aromatherapeutic boost! The results? Your skin is left feeling intensely hydrated, silken and supple. Soon you won't want to have your soak without it...
how_to_use: FOR BEST RESULTS Once or twice a week, massage into dry skin in upward circular movements. Pay particular attention to any dry areas, then rinse thoroughly.

name: SUNDAE Orange Crush Whipped Shower Foam 260ml SUNDAE Orange Crush Whipped Shower Foam 260ml
description: No, your eyes are not deceiving you… the Whipped Shower Foam from Sundae Body comes housed in a whipped cream-esque can, delivering a dose of fun to your shower — alongside, of course, a gently cleansing foam formula packed with nourishing ingredients. Refreshing and luxe, these shower foams refresh skin and wash away the day while enriching skin with vitamin C-filled kakadu plum to brighten and smooth, and finger lime, a natural source of exfoliating AHAs. Choose from a smorgasbord of delectable scents: ‘Very Vanilla’, a mix of vanilla bean, tonka bean, coconut milk and sandalwood; ‘Orange Crush’, with orange, mandarin, jasmine and melon; ‘Pomegranate Fizz’, featuring a cocktail of pomegranate, peach blossom and blackcurrant; ‘Coconut Cream’, with coconut, vanilla and sandalwood; ‘Cool Mint’, an energising blend of spearmint, peppermint and menthol; and finally, ‘Honey Honey’, a sweet mix of toffee, honey and maple syrup.
how_to_use: Get wet! Give it a good shake, turn your bottle upside down and spray a dollop into the palm of your hand, lather up, wash & rinse.
ingredient: Water, Glycerin , Butane, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Decyl Glucoside, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Stearic Acid, Propane, Fragrance, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Microcitrus Australasica (Finger Lime) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Benzyl Salicylate.

name: Herlum Hand and Body Wash Sandalwood and Grapefruit 50ml Herlum Hand and Body Wash Sandalwood and Grapefruit 50ml
description: With a luxurious lather and a rich, nourishing formula, this Hand & Body Wash promises a true sensory journey as it gently cleanses skin of the day’s dirt, pollution and sweat. Made in England but featuring murumuru butter all the way from the Amazon, this sustainably-sourced wash leaves skin feeling soft, cleansed and with a gentle fragrance that lingers all day. There’s coconut-based soap and natural antibacterial extracts to refresh skin effectively, while murumuru butter, known for its lauric and oleic acid properties, maintains your skin’s moisture barrier and prevents that overly tight, stripped feeling. You’re certain to fall in love with the scent too: a rainforest-inspired aroma made from upcycled flowers, uniting woody and spicy notes of freshly sliced grapefruit and creamy sandalwood.
how_to_use: Dampen skin, lather up, cleanse and rinse. Best enjoyed when you mindfully massage into hands and deeply inhale the relaxing scent. After use, rinse the container before placing in the recycling bin.
ingredient: Aqua (Deionised Water), Decyl Glucoside (Coconut), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (Coconut), Lauryl Glucoside (Coconut), Caprylyl Capryl Glucoside (Coconut), Glycerin (Rapeseed Oil), Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol (Ecocert Natural Preservative), Salicylic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Xanthan Gum (Corn), Bisabolol (Candeia Tree), Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter (Murumuru), Citric Acid, Citral.

name: Fur Oil 2.5 fl.oz Fur Oil 2.5 fl.oz
description: Specifically designed for the pubic area, Fur Oil is laced with the finest and cleanest natural, non-toxic ingredients (there’s no phthalates, parabens, silicones, and artificial colours or fragrance plus, it’s gluten-free and vegan!) to help gently soften hair and clear pores for fewer ingrown and healthier skin. There’s grape seed oil which unites vitamins E,D and C to hydrate skin and absorb quickly without leaving any greasy residue. Jojoba oil mimics the body’s natural moisturising properties to soften hair and skin, anti-bacterial clary sage oil soothes redness and post-shaving irritation and finally, anti-microbial tea tree oil absorbs and balances excess sebum production to prevent ingrown and speed up the skin’s healing process. Housed in luxurious and shelfie-approved monochrome packaging, this is fur you.
how_to_use: For everywhere hair meets skin, including pubic area, underarms, chest, legs and face. Apply liberally on clean hair and skin. This oil is residue-free and the scent disappears in minutes. For best results use daily.
ingredient: Vitis vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Salvia sclarea (clary sage) oil, Citrus medica limonum (lemon) peel oil, Mentha piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Cinnamomum camphora (Camphor) Bark Oil, Cymbopogon schoenanthus (lemongrass) oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, lavender clary sage oil

name: AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion Orange Blossom 200ml AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion Orange Blossom 200ml
description: The same, bestselling formula with a fresh, 'zingy', summer-ready fragrance, AMELIORATE’s Transforming Body Lotion Orange Blossom works to soften and retexturise uneven and bumpy skin while invigorating and uplifting the senses. Technologically advanced, AMELIORATE’s {Transforming Body Lotion} formulas unite alpha-hydroxy therapy with a unique complex of natural ingredients to enhance skin condition and support its own exfoliation processes. Starring lactic acid – a member of the AHA family – this melts the ‘glue’ that binds dead, follicle-clogging cells to skin’s surface whilst attract moisture from the air to lock it into skin (lactic acid is a natural humectant). This resurfacing effect helps to create a smoother and more refined skin texture, while glycerin, milk protein complex and sodium lactate combine to deeply moisturise and improve elasticity – gradually eradicating lumps and bumps to leave skin peachy soft.
how_to_use: Apply twice daily to clean skin. Continued use is recommended to maintain beneficial effects.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Ammonium Lactate†, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Dimethicone, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Fragrance (Parfum), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Pentylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Lactic Acid, Serine, Sodium Lactate, Sorbitol, Urea, Sodium Chloride, Allantoin, Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Extract. †From Lactic Acid.

name: St. Tropez Self Tan Classic Mousse St. Tropez Self Tan Classic Mousse
description: St.Tropez's (and one of the worlds) most famous faux glow enhancer, the Self Tan Classic Bronzing Mousse is renowned for its natural-looking, sun-kissed bronze hue as well as the incredibly easy-to-use formula that is lightweight, guarantees your skin will be streak-free no matter how comfortable you are with a fake tan mitt, and is quick-drying, non-sticky and the beautiful scentless tan is long-lasting too meaning you can glow for up to 10 days without having to top-up or reapply while the fading is seamless, looking incredibly natural instead of patchy. An absolute classic, this vegan-friendly formula is a must-try whether you're a faux glow aficionado or new to the glow-giving abilities of fake tan.
how_to_use: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturise any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles and feet. Step 2: For best results, apply using our Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the Mitt over your hands and feet. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Allow 4-8 hours before showering to reveal your developed tan. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as desired.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Cera Alba (Beeswax), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera) Wax, Hy.

name: Mutha The Nudist Body Scrub 170g Mutha The Nudist Body Scrub 170g
description: Strip down and scrub up, this gentle yet effective body scrub from the trustworthy ranks of MUTHA contains 98% natural origin ingredients to leave your skin as soft as silk and wrapped in a heavenly scent. Taking on dry, flaky limbs and dull skin, MUTHA's decadent Nudist Body Scrub will leave your skin soft, supple and healthy. A blend of luxuriously rich oils and natural brown sugar gnetly buff away dulling, dead skin cells and rough patches, while pro and post biotics encourage a stronger, fortified skin barrier. Ensuring that moisture stays locked into your limbs are amino acids, which cleverly promote your skin's natural moisture factor production and prevent transepidermal water loss. The result? Skin that's smooth, soft and wrapped in a hug of a scent of burnt sugar crystal and warm vanilla. Think of this carefully curated scrub as skin care for your body.
how_to_use: Apply generously on wet skin. Gently rub in small, circular motions to exfoliate, focusing on dry or rough areas. Rinse with warm water. Use with your favorite MUTHA™ Body Products.

name: Supergoop! Glow Stick SPF 50 Supergoop! Glow Stick SPF 50
description: Because nobody wants to carry around a huge bottle of sunscreen with them – or worry about whether or not their SPF is all rubbed in (“Do I have something on my nose?”) – the Glow Stick SPF 50 offers powerful protection in a portable and easy-to-use dry oil stick. Made for the face, neck and shoulders (though suitable for use wherever else you fancy), this formula gives a dewy finish and won’t irritate dry skin. In fact, this stick is best used on dry and combo skin types – hydrating and protecting with zero mess and zero cast. The totally invisible formula protects and provides a natural glow, without ever making you look oily or sweaty. Reef-safe and cruelty-free, what’s not to love? *Buys one for each handbag*
how_to_use: Use after moisturiser to lock in hydration and throughout the day for ultimate protection. Reapply every two hours.

name: Thank You Farmer Sun Project Water Sun Cream SPF50+ Thank You Farmer Sun Project Water Sun Cream SPF50+
description: A beautiful moisturiser-meets-sunscreen, Thank You Farmer’s Sun Project Water Sun Cream SPF 50+ has an ultra-light texture that diffuses beautifully – infusing skin with precious water (thanks to high levels of hyaluronic acid), while deflecting DNA-damaging rays. Plumping and thirst-quenching, this grants a natural, dewy finish (with no chalky cast), while the inclusion of mistletoe extract helps stimulate cellular turnover – encouraging repair and renewal processes, to minimise the damage caused through everyday exposure to the sun and oxidative stress.
how_to_use: After basic skincare, take a proper amount of the product, then spread evenly on the area with will be exposed to sun. Use before exposure to the sun. Apply again to maintain protection, especially after sweating, swimming or wiping with a towel. Warning: Do not use on damaged or irritated skin, skin with wound, eczema and dermatitis. Do not use in case of allergy to any of the ingredients. For external use only. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or red spot, swelling, itching, stimulus have occurred and consult with dermatologist. Discontinue use if side effects as above have occurred on the area of application after exposure to direct sunlight. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Even when using sunscreen product, prolonged exposure to the sun is not recommended. Keep babies and children out of direct sunlight. Excessive exposure to the sun is a serious threat to health. Store in a cool and dry place, away from direct sunlight and heat, out of the reach of children.

name: Ultra Violette Supreme Screen Hydrating Facial Skinscreen SPF 50+ Ultra Violette Supreme Screen Hydrating Facial Skinscreen SPF 50+
description: A moisturiser, high-level SPF and primer all rolled into one, the Supreme Screen Hydrating Facial Skinscreen SPF 50+ is what streamlined routines dream of. It laughs in the face of white cast and offers an incredible SPF50+ level of protection, all while pumping skin with vitamin C (thanks, Kakadu plum) and the ‘dragosine plus’ peptide, which keeps skin feeling bouncy as it shields against infrared, visible and blue light. Super hydrating and ideal for all skin types (though especially great for normal to dry) this formula is the all-rounder and crowd pleaser of the SPF realm. Choose this if you’re overwhelmed with choice and don’t know what to go for. Trust us.
how_to_use: Apply every day, even when you’re staying indoors. Apply as the final step in your skincare routine, right after, or instead of your moisturiser and before your make up. We recommend at least five pumps to cover your face and ears.

name: Megababe Thigh Rescue (Various Sizes) Megababe Thigh Rescue (Various Sizes)
description: Don’t let chafing determine your summer wardrobe. Megababe’s Thigh Rescue is here to keep you comfortable from head to toe. Here to stop friction from irritating you to no end, this balm stick can be used on thighs, toes, shoulders, elbows and more to keep chafing under control. The winner of six awards — New Beauty’s ‘Best Chafe Stick’ in 2022, Allure Best of Beauty 2021, Allure Best of Beauty 2020, Into The Gloss’s ‘25 Best Products of the Decade’ in 2019, 2018 Cosmopolitan Beauty Award, 2017 New York Magazine Best All-Around Anti-Chafing Product — it’s safe to say that it’s a fan favourite. description: Just like the brands infamous and industry-adored {Unseen Sunscreen}, the Glowscreen SPF 30 primes and protects gripping onto make up while shielding you from UVA and UVB rays but with a dewy, radiant finish rather than Unseen Sunscreens matte and velvety one. Giving you a lit-from-within glow (that never looks oily or greasy) this SPF-cum-primer is suitable for all skin types working to flood skin with moisture via a unique blend of hyaluronic acid with B5 that leaves skin looking supple, plump and dewy (without the need for glitter!). Your soon-to-be glow-to, the formula uses niacinamide to soothe, soften and tighten pores, while sea lavender offers powerful antioxidant protection and cocoa peptides guard skin from the damaging effects of free radicals. Reef-safe and cruelty-free, this sheer, skin-perfecting formula creates a deliciously dewy layer for later make up application and wont leave a chalky cast.

name: Supergoop! Play Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract Supergoop! Play Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract
description: Supergoop!’s Play Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extracts is an all-over face and body formula that offers broad-spectrum protection without any chalky white cast or residual oiliness. Completely invisible, water and sweat-resistant, lightweight, fast-absorbing and deliciously scented (phewf!), there’s nothing not to love about this breakthrough see-through formula. Enriched with skin nourishing extracts to optimise health and resilience, this gel-textured lotion applies seamlessly to protect and replenish your skin, top-to-toe. Laced with sunflower, rosemary and rice antioxidants to shield against the impact of pollution, this also deflects the skin-damaging effects of UVA, UVB and IRA rays, and is coral reef-safe (so it’s good for your skin, and the ocean).

name: Supergoop! (Re)setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30 PA+++ - Translucent 4.25g Supergoop! (Re)setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30 PA+++ - Translucent 4.25g
description: If your biggest gripe with SPFs is that they leave your skin feeling greasy, the multitasking (Re)setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30 from Supergoop! will give your skin the protection you need without the unwanted shine. A generous swoop of this powder sets your makeup, mattifies your skin and offers broad-spectrum protection against UVA and UVB rays. This mineral sunscreen uses non-nano particles, which are unable to penetrate your skin. Instead, they create a physical block against UV rays, scattering and reflecting the sun's rays in the process. The best part? This innovative formula makes reapplying your SPF over make up through the day a breeze: simply tap, tap, tap in this setting powder and offer your skin effective protection without sacrificing your hard work.
how_to_use: Remove the cap and slide down the clear plastic sleeve. Remove and discard the plastic yellow pin at the centre of the brush. Twist the body of the brush from the CLOSED position to OPEN. Tilt and tap the brush gently against your wrist until you see the powder start to flow through the bristles. When your makeup is ready to go, brush the powder generously over your face to set the look and mattify your skin. Reapply throughout the day as needed. To close, twist the body of the brush from the OPEN position to CLOSED, pull up the clear plastic sleeve and snap the cap back on.

description: The perfect last step in your morning regime, Supergoop!s aptly named Unseen Sunscreen SPF 30 has been painstakingly formulated to protect from the harmful effects of the sun while improving the health of your skin. Now available in a jumbo size (73.9ml) you can rest easy knowing your SPF stash is well-stocked for the foreseeable future. With no greasy feel and no tell-tale white film, this universally flattering sunscreen is perfect for every complexion providing unparalleled UV deflection while being coral reef-friendly and without suffocating your skin or exacerbating congestion. Velvety textured and great for prolonging the wear of your make up, this broad-spectrum shield boasts the cleanest ingredients (you wont find any alcohol, parabens or artificial fragrance), and is also cruelty-free. Sweat and water-resistant for up to 40 minutes, it’s quicker to list what this shine-minimising creation can’t do, now there’s zero excuse not to follow Baz Luhrmanns advice to wear sunscreen.

Unseen Sunscreen SPF 30 protects against UVA rays, UVB rays, IRA, and blue-light, and is sweat- and water-resistant. It’s the same formula available in the US, with an SPF rating of 30 to follow the United Kingdoms regulatory guidelines.

description: An undisputed hero of the beautysphere, Weleda's Skin Food boasts a blend of replenishing, natural and organic ingredients to quickly repair and revitalise dry, rough or stressed, scaly skin. Creating a silky cocoon between skin and the drying effects of the elements, this rich – and we mean really rich – cream is a true 'desert island' essential; jam-packed with lanolin, beeswax and glycerin, alongside sweet almond and sunflower oils to help soften and fortify skin as they boost moisture levels, this supplements barrier function to ward against water loss. A godsend for gardeners, this quickly conditions the gnarliest palms, while the medley of antibacterial rosemary, conditioning calendula and calming chamomile protect and help to cherish elbows, knees, feet... even faces. A handbag hero – as well as a pocket-sized sidekick – keep this cute, grass green tube within reach at all times to replenish and reassure compromised skin in an instant.

name: Versed Press Restart Retinol Body Lotion 177ml Versed Press Restart Retinol Body Lotion 177ml
description: Tired of scaly skin? Powered by pure retinol, nourishing cocoa butter and hyper-hydrating squalane, Versed's Press Restart Retinol Body Lotion will do more than smooth over roughness – the supercharged formula will encourage firmer and brighter skin. Retinol is nothing new to skintellectuals – it's one of the most dermatologist-recommended ingredients – but it's relatively rare in the realm of body care. Versed is here to change that! Extending its youth-prolonging benefits to your limbs, encapsulated retinol works in tandem with squalane and cocoa butter to renew, quench and smooth your skin. Lavish it liberally over your chest, legs, elbows and more to refine crepiness and rough patches.

name: Sun Bum Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Spray Sun Bum Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Spray

A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream 75ml Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream 75ml

Rich in South America's secret ingredients, a naturally nourishing, hyper-hydrating blend of cupuaçu butter, açaí and coconut oil provide the background to the star of the show: guaraná. A native Amazonian plant, this fruit contains one of the most potent forms of caffeine on the planet (with almost five times more caffeine than coffee), giving your bottom the ultimate boost and stimulating circulation to keep it super smooth and tantalisingly toned, while also minimising cellulite. With a light, silky texture the cream is great all over the body (bum bum and beyond), absorbing quickly without feeling greasy or oily. name: Tweezerman Facial Razor Tweezerman Facial Razor
description: Providing superior performance, the sleek Facial Razor from Tweezerman ensures easy facial hair removal without damaging your precious skin. Incredibly sharp to ensure swift and close shaving, this razor simply glides along your complexion — gently exfoliating dulling, dead skin cells as it does so — to leave fuzz-free, glowing skin in its wake. Ergonomically designed for easy handling, the Facial Razor is easy to wield, clean, and store — with each blade (it comes with three spare) fitting into the provided safety cap. Utterly sanitary, the blades are forged with stainless steel, which you can simply rinse with warm water or swipe with an alcohol wipe after use.
how_to_use: Start with clean and moisturised skin OR use while washing your face, with your face wash still on the skin. After removing cap from tool, hold the razor at an angle and apply short, feathery strokes downward and with light pressure anywhere you need to remove excess hair. Once finished, rinse face and apply moisturiser or serum to avoid drying. Rinse razor with warm water or an alcohol wipe to clean. Once dry, replace cap and store. Tool care tips: Clean with alcohol to prevent infection and bacteria build-up before and after each use. Place the cap back on the razor after use and store in a dry place. Handle razor with care, blade is sharp. This item cannot be sanitised in barbicide or an autoclave. For optimal performance, replace razor blades every 2–3 months or as needed.

name: Supergoop! Unseen Sunscreen SPF 30 Supergoop! Unseen Sunscreen SPF 30
description: The perfect last step in your morning regime, Supergoop!s aptly named Unseen Sunscreen SPF 30 has been painstakingly formulated to protect from the harmful effects of the sun while improving the health of your skin. With no greasy feel and no tell-tale white film, this universally flattering sunscreen is perfect for every complexion providing unparalleled UV deflection while being coral reef-friendly and without suffocating your skin or exacerbating congestion. Velvety textured and great for prolonging the wear of your make up, this broad-spectrum shield boasts the cleanest ingredients (you wont find any alcohol, parabens or artificial fragrance), and is also cruelty-free. Sweat and water-resistant up to 40 minutes, its quicker to list what this shine-minimising creation cant do now theres zero excuse not to follow Baz Luhrmanns advice to wear sunscreen.
how_to_use: Apply generously and evenly as the last step in your skin care routine and before make up. Unseen Sunscreen SPF 30 protects against UVA rays, UVB rays, IRA, and blue-light, and is sweat- and water-resistant. Its the same formula available in the US, with an SPF rating of 30 to follow the United Kingdoms regulatory guidelines.

name: Mario Badescu AHA Botanical Body Soap Mario Badescu AHA Botanical Body Soap
description: One of the brand’s bestselling formulas, the AHA Botanical Body Soap brightens, smooths and rejuvenates skin. Harnessing the power of fresh fruit extracts and their enzymes, this grapefruit-infused cocktail softens skin while thoroughly cleaning your limbs from top to toe. Kicking ‘buttne’ and ‘bacne’ (AKA, blemishes on your bum and back) to the curb, this formula is a boon for spotty, bumpy, dull, dry or oily skin types. Endlessly refreshing and moisturising (thanks to an invigorating blend of ginseng and linden), the vegan and alcohol-free formula can be used before or after shaving without prompting irritation, and is even housed in recyclable packaging! Just try not to slip in the shower with your swooning…
how_to_use: Use daily as an all over body wash, avoiding face and eyes. Apply to wet skin with a soft cloth, loofah, or sponge. Rinse thoroughly. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Tilia Cordata Flower Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Panthenyl Hydroxypropyl Steardimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 15985 (Yellow 6), CI 16035 (Red 40)

name: Megababe Space Bar Detoxifying Charcoal Underarm Bar 99g Megababe Space Bar Detoxifying Charcoal Underarm Bar 99g
description: Don’t sweat the small stuff — or if you do, let Megababe’s Space Bar Underarm Soap freshen you up! This palm-free soap is designed to purify your pits in next to no time; don’t get it twisted, it may be powerful but it’s still gentle on your skin — hydrating avocado, sunflower and olive oils make sure of that. What makes it out of this world? It’s powered by activated charcoal, a natural powder that draws toxins, dirt, oil and microparticles to the surface of the skin, ready to be rinsed away. Glycolic acid (a.k.a. the alpha hydroxy acid equivalent of an ‘it girl’) help to refine the surface of your skin, sloughing away dead skin cells. Add clarifying tea tree oil, brightening vitamin C and bacteria-banishing sodium chloride into the mix and you’ve got a recipe for happy pits.
how_to_use: Use every time you shower for deeply cleansed pits that are perfectly prepped for deodorant! Lather up and massage into pits in a circular motion. Leave on 60 seconds before rinsing. Use anywhere stinky or where oily skin is a concern!
ingredient: Sodium Cocoate, Water, Glycerin, Coconut Acid, Sodium Citrate, Charcoal Powder, Glycolic Acid, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Chloride, Maltodextrin.

name: Kitsch Satin Sleep Scrunchies (Various Colours) Kitsch Satin Sleep Scrunchies (Various Colours)
description: Minimising damage while looking totally chic, these scrunchies are far more than a nod to the '90s Specially selected elasticated bands are covered with Kitschs Satin Sleep Scrunchies. Whether youre creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate do, this sumptuous silk ensures that you create no kinks or creases while being kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that theres no damage or breakage.
how_to_use: Use to style hair while sleeping.
ingredient: Dacron 96% Spandex 4%

name: Bondi Sands Sunscreen Lotion SPF50+ - Fragrance Free 150ml Bondi Sands Sunscreen Lotion SPF50+ - Fragrance Free 150ml
description: Ready for a sun-kissed glow? The first step starts with this sunscreen lotion that applies like a dream and offers a high level of protection. Shielding skin from UVA and UVB rays, this sunscreen is essential to keeping your skin looking youthful and slowing the clock down on the ageing process. Fragrance-free and lush in texture, every picture perfect beach day (think: Bondi!) starts here. It even has vitamin E for added skin-smoothing and hydrating benefits. What's more, you don't have to worry about it going to waste as soon as you enter the sea because this water-resistant lotion ensures that you're protected for up to four hours - by then we reckon you'll be back on the beach and reach for another top up of this fast-absorbing body lotion.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply liberally and evenly to all unprotected areas 15 to 20 minutes before exposure to the sun. You need at least one teaspoon per limb, one for the front of the body, one for the back and one for the head. Re-apply every 2 hours or more often when sweating and after swimming, exercise or towel drying. Use alongside a hat, protective clothing and sunglasses.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Homosalate, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Octocrylene, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Ceteareth-20, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Hydroxyacetophenone, Carbomer, Benzyl Alcohol, Saccharide Isomerate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Triethanolamine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride. Benzyl Alcohol.

name: Aesop Geranium Leaf Rinse-Free Hand Wash 50ml Aesop Geranium Leaf Rinse-Free Hand Wash 50ml
description: The holy grail of hand sanitisers, Aesop’s Geranium Leaf Rinse-Free Hand Wash boasts a non-drying, alcohol-based formulation, which leaves your hands clean without the need for water. Gentle and non-stripping, this formula cherishes skin as it banishes ‘bad guys’ and leaves your hands delicately scented. A world away from the cloying, synthetic scents so often associated with hand sanitisers, this fresh, zingy blend of geranium leaf, mandarin and bergamot rind has a grown-up, sophisticated fragrance that makes sterilising your extremities a pleasure (not a chore). Aesop is great when it comes to upgrading the mundane — everything from hand-washing to dog-washing feels fancy when it's done the 'Aesop way' — and this sanitiser is no exception. We recommend a mini for your pocket and a 'biggie' for your hallway.
how_to_use: Carry in your bag and use whenever your hands need refreshing or you've come into contact with germs.
ingredient: Alcohol Denat., Water (Aqua), Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Saccharide Isomerate, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Pelargonium Graveleons Extract, Aminomethyl Propanol, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol.

name: Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Sunscreen 50ml Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Sunscreen 50ml
description: Looking for a new fruit-filled skin care obsession? Cue: the Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Sunscreen SPF 50 that'll become your poolside pal and bathroom cabinet staple. What's a routine without an SPF that you can trust to protect you? Fused antioxidant-rich niacinamide, the number one hydrating hero that is hyaluronic acid and skin-soothing, vitamin-rich aloe, wave goodbye to dark spots and larger-than-life pores. Banishing dullness and dehydration with its chemical and mineral hybrid formula, restore your healthy-looking radiant complexion totally rid of fine lines and wrinkles. Ultra-lightweight, incredibly moisturising and housed in a chic shelfie-worthy bottle, this creamy dream unites ultimate sun protection with blendable benefits that your skin will no doubt thank you (and us) for. Pssst... did we mention that you'll never have to worry about a white cast, stickiness or greasy residue? Activate your dewy, glass-skin glow and basque in the sun...
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply liberally and evenly as the last step in your skincare routine (more than a normal moisturiser), and 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Let all your previous skin care steps fully sink in before SPF application. After applying SPF allow it to fully absorb into the skin before applying make up, to avoid pilling. Work in sections, blend in and pat - avoid rubbing. Tips for reapplying over makeup or facial hair: apply little dots and pat in gently with your fingertips or a sponge.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Zinc Oxide, Homosalate, Octocrylene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Propanediol, Glycerin, Cetearyl Olivate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Ethylhexyl Methoxycrylene, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Lauroyl Lysine, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone, Sorbitan Olivate, Inulin Lauryl Carbamate, Xanthan Gum, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyester-8, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Menthone Glycerin Acetal, Lactic Acid, Arachidyl Alcohol, Chlorphenesin, Citrullus Lanatus Fruit Extract, Niacinamide, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Coco-Glucoside, Behenyl Alcohol, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Silica, Arachidyl Glucoside, Sodium Citrate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Phenoxyethanol, Copper Gluconate. *100% Naturally Derived.

name: Hello Klean Nourishing Micronutrient Wash 400ml Hello Klean Nourishing Micronutrient Wash 400ml
description: Don’t let hard water dry out your limbs! Look to HELLO KLEAN’S Nourishing Micronutrient Wash to wash away to mineral deposits and feed your skin with antioxidant powerhouse ingredients. Created in the knowledge that soap isn’t always able to thoroughly rinse off with hard water — it mixes with the minerals to create soap scum that can settle on your skin and create that ‘tight’ feeling — this duo-concentrate body cleanser works to thoroughly melt away the hard water deposits. How? It consists of two phases: cream and water-based cleansers. They each have their own molecular density yet, when shaken, they merge into one and the smaller molecules lift away impurities while the larger molecules lock in nutrients, supporting your skin barrier. The top layer is a mixture of almond oil and a micronutrient blend containing niacinamide, vitamin E, and provitamin B5 to hydrate and nourish. The second layer contains a unique chelating complex infused with matcha green tea and microalgae to remove hard water residue while balancing the skin. Together, they promote soft, hydrated skin even after the wash is rinsed away.
how_to_use: Shake and dispense formula into palm. Massage onto the body for 30 seconds to activate the micronutrients. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Megababe Rosy Pits Daily Deodorant (Various Sizes) Megababe Rosy Pits Daily Deodorant (Various Sizes)
description: Powered by natural enzymes and extracts to break down odour and absorb wetness, Megagbabe’s Rosy Pits Daily Deodorant helps to keep you smelling fresh throughout the day without clogging your pores or using harsh chemicals like aluminium. This water-based formula glides effortlessly over skin with no tug and actually nourishes your skin as well as dealing with unwanted body odour. How? Saccharmyces ferment filtrate acts as a natural deodorizer, eliminating odour-causing bacteria while willow bark extract absorbs unwanted wetness and provides blemish control. Colloidal oatmeal hydrates and soothes distressed skin, anti-fungal coconut powerfully moisturises and vitamin E — a natural anti-inflammatory — quells razor burn and irritation. The final touch is a helping of corn starch to keep your pits feeling dry.
how_to_use: Apply daily as often as needed to clean, dry skin. Allow 2 weeks for pits to adjust from a traditional antiperspirant. The deodorant includes corn starch for moisture absorption, but as with any aluminium-free deodorant, some wetness is normal.
ingredient: Propylene Glycol, Water , Sodium Stearate, Saccharomyces Ferment, Propanediol, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Fragrance, Hydrated Silica, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Squalane, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Caffeine, Arginine (Amino Acid), Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Glycerin, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Silica Cetyl Silylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Water.

name: The INKEY List Polyglutamic Acid Dewy Sunscreen SPF30 50ml The INKEY List Polyglutamic Acid Dewy Sunscreen SPF30 50ml
description: Finding the perfect sunscreen for you can be a hard task but here to make lightwork of the skin care commandment you dare not skip, the Polyglutamic Acid Dewy Sunscreen SPF 30 sends waves of optimal hydration to parched pores and leaves an undetectable finish. Adored for their power to attract and lock in moisture for a smooth finish, polyglutamic acid, glycerin and squalane band together to form the ultimate 8% hydration, can-dew trio. A broad spectrum SPF 30 SPF sunscreen that provides UVA and UVB protection, this non-greasy and non-piling formula makes the perfect, universally flattering base for make up or bare skin days, for all skin types and tones.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Use as the last step in your AM skincare routine, after moisturising. On cleansed skin, apply liberally to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. We recommend applying the product to 3 fingers first to get the right amount (this equates to about 3/4 of a teaspoon). Reapply frequently, particularly if perspiring, swimming or towelling. Protect this product from excessive heat and direct sunlight.
ingredient: Water (Aqua / Eau), Octocrylene, Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Triheptanoin, Saccharomyces Ferment, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Tromethamine, Glyceryl Caprylate, Propanediol, C9-12 Alkane, Dilinoleic Acid/Butanediol Copolymer, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Dimethicone, Squalane, Hectorite, Lauroyl Lysine, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Dimethiconol, Polysorbate 60, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Oryza Sativa (Purple Rice) Hull Extract, Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Polyglutamic Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Camellia Sinensis (Purple Tea) Leaf Extract, Ipomoea Batatas (Purple Sweet Potato) Root Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Benzoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Saccharomyces Lysate.

name: Ultra Violette Lean Screen Mineral Mattifying Fragrance Free Skinscreen SPF 50+ Ultra Violette Lean Screen Mineral Mattifying Fragrance Free Skinscreen SPF 50+
description: Crafted in response to a wave of pleas from their community, Ultra Violette's Lean Screen Mineral Mattifying Fragrance Free Skinscreen SPF50 is a mineral-only SPF that will have re-thinking everything you know about mineral SPFs. For starters, it won't feel heavy, you won’t look like a cricketer and sensitive skin won’t throw a tantrum! Perfect for anyone with oily or reactive skin, or those who just prefer a physical sunscreen, this fragrance-free formula won't feel sticky or heavy; quite the contrary, it's designed to soothe sensitive skin and grant a subtle matte finish. Its protective prowess stems from zinc oxide - nothing more, nothing less - that protects your skin from UVA and UVB rays while working as a soothing anti-inflammatory to reactive, angry skin. Plant-derived pentavin then lends the blend a refreshing hit of hydration that reveals itself as a plump, juicy finish, plus antioxidant-rich kakadu plum guards your skin against free radicals and promotes a simply luminous finish!
how_to_use: Every damn day, even when you’re staying indoors (seriously we mean it)! Apply as the final step in your skin care routine, right after your moisturiser and before your make up. We recommend at least five pumps to cover your face and ears (don’t forget about those!).

name: Tan-Luxe THE FACE Light/Medium 10ml Tan-Luxe THE FACE Light/Medium 10ml
description: A super-cute travel size version of TAN-LUXE’s The Face, these luxurious drops will take lifeless, lacklustre complexions to the beach and back – imparting an effortless, natural-looking glow when added to your existing skin care regime. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and aloe vera, every droplet of this miracle formula bronzes, boosts and fortifies skin’s fabric. A million miles away from the tell-tale ‘tangoed’ look of so many traditional fake tans, The Face Travel Size comes in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – to guarantee a realistic, streak-free finish. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle, it delivers even, luminous colour that can easily be customised by adding extra drops to your chosen skin care product. No smell. No fuss. No drama. Just glow and go.
how_to_use: Prep Be sure to cleanse and wash your face before application. Apply Mix 1-4 drops to your usual moisturiser, serum or face oil in the palm of your hand and apply evenly over the face. Additional drops of the product will add depth of colour and glow to the final result. Wash hands thoroughly after application. Maintain Gently exfoliate skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Alcohol Denat (Alcohol), Glycerin, Erythrulose, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolysed Silk, Caramel, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 80, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Bu-Tylphenyl Methylpropional, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol. name: Marvis Classic Strong Mint Toothpaste 85ml Marvis Classic Strong Mint Toothpaste 85ml
description: Put aside your drugstore toothpaste – Marvis’ has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As you’d expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape. Unlike your bog-standard formula however, there are flavours such as ‘Cinnamon Mint’, ‘Ginger Mint’, ‘Jasmine Mint’ and ‘Liquorice Mint’, alongside classics like ‘Whitening Mint’, ‘Aquatic Mint’ and ‘Classic Strong Mint’ all encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf. Marvi-lous, or what?!
how_to_use: Use morning and evening to brush your teeth.

name: Limited Edition Sol de Janeiro Rio Radiance Body Cream 75ml Limited Edition Sol de Janeiro Rio Radiance Body Cream 75ml
description: Lacklustre, dull skin? We don’t know her! Sol de Janeiro’s Limited Edition Rio Radiance Body Cream has you covered from top-to-toe with its fast-absorbing formula. Instantly quenching the complexion in a moisture-kissed, glow-inducing veil, the body butter rids all signs of dryness to keep you feeling your best self, year-round. Introducing its new summer-inspired scent, the cream captures the warmth of the Rio sunshine, with luscious notes of leite de coco, sun-soaked sands and creamy vanilla. Featuring carrot seed oil, squalane and mica, the formula deeply nourishes, revealing a fresh-from-the-beach dew with a seriously supple finish. In Sol we trust to bring the vacay vibes to our lives, and this heavenly body butter stays true to the brand’s feel-good, ultra-sensorial ethos.
how_to_use: Massage in a circular motion to help promote optimal absorption and circulation. Use all over your body for the ultimate glow.

name: Spacemasks Spacemasks Spacemasks Spacemasks
description: A must-have for relaxing evenings, these luxe, self-heating eye masks promote relaxation thanks to an infusion of mind and body-calming jasmine and gentle air-activated warmth. Providing instant relief from headaches, tiredness, and eye strain, prepare to transport yourself to another dimension. Each box of Spacemasks comes with five individually, single-use wrapped foil masks with a luxe galaxy pattern. We suggest keeping these by your bed and slipping one over your ears and eyes when you need a bit of me time. Incredibly gentle of skin and eyes, these disposable and recyclable masks are perfect for flights, long journeys or whenever you need you’ll need a relaxing and helpful hand getting to sleep.
how_to_use: Unwrap each single-use mask just before use. Slip loops over ears and pull mask down over the eyes. Air-activated, within no time at all these will give off a relaxing scent and warmth that can be worn to bed and while you sleep.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Age Correct SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml La Roche-Posay Anthelios Age Correct SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml
description: Suncare with skin care efficacy is the name of the game in La Roche-Posay’s Anthelios Age Correct SPF 50+ Sun Cream.

name: OUAI St. Barts Body Cleanser 300ml OUAI St. Barts Body Cleanser 300ml
description: Bound to secure pride of place on your shower shelfie, this ultra-chic St. Barts Body Cleanser makes luxe work of your cleansing ritual as teleports your skin senses to a far a-OUAI landscape. Infused with jojoba seed oil to soothe and hydrate, along with a dash of ultra-moisturising rosehip oil to soften, this sensorial shower gel cares for your skin whilst elevating your body care rituals with holiday-inspired fragrance. Keeping your post-holiday blues at bay with a glow-giving formula and tropical scent celebrating notes of dragonfruit, orange blossom, tuberose and baltic amber, expect supple, baby-soft skin in no time.

description: Fulfilling your streamlined routine desires, Supreme Screen is a moisturiser, primer and high-level SPF rolled into one multi-tasking staple. This lightweight cream has you protected from the solar spectrum of UV rays, with a hydrating, satin finish that creates a smooth canvas for make up (although looks equally as good when worn alone). The formula is packed with Australian Kakadu plum (rich in skin-brightening antioxidant vitamin C) and pentavitin, a plant extract offering up to 72 hours of hydration. Great for dry, normal and combination skin types, Supreme Screen also shields against infrared, visible and blue light – all while leaving no white cast. After an SPF that does it all? Look no further.

name: Drunk Elephant Sweet Pitti Deodorant Cream Drunk Elephant Sweet Pitti Deodorant Cream
description: Pay respect to gentle underarms with Drunk Elephant's all-new Sweet Pitti Deodorant Cream infused with moisturising plant oils and shea butter, all while eliminating stinky bacteria. Introducing Drunk Elephant's all-new and utterly must-have hair and body range, created by the brand's CEO, Tiffany because "Skin is skin - and whether we call it the scalp or the eye area or the legs, it can only function at its healthiest when it’s treated with smart, nourishing, skin-compatible ingredients. All skin deserves to be respected with ingredients it can get along with." Using a powerful blend of mandelic acid and absorbent arrowroot, Sweet Pitti eliminates even stubborn odour-causing bacteria while absorbing excess moisture from skin. With its mix of calming barrier supportive ingredients and a replenishing mix of plant oils (marula, baobab and mongongo seed), as well as marula and shea butters, Sweet Pitti replenishes dry, dull and irritable skin, too. Sweet Pitti has a pH level of 4.0.
how_to_use: Sweet Pitti only needs to be applied once per day, and always to clean, dry skin. Tip: May be applied with fingertips if desired.

name: AMELIORATE Exfoliating Body Mitt AMELIORATE Exfoliating Body Mitt
description: Designed for people with very dry, dehydrated skin – but brilliant on all skin types – AMELIORATE’s Exfoliating Body Mitt will transform your skin from top to toe. Used on dry skin before bathing, this miraculous mitt is made from an innovative fabric weave that is gentler than a synthetic or natural loofah, yet effective enough to sweep away dead skin cells to reveal softer, smoother, healthier-looking skin. Perfect for kick-starting the exfoliation process, the mitt allows subsequent products to work more effectively and helps to unblock hair follicles to minimise pesky, uncomfortable ingrown hairs. It’s also brilliant for treating Keratosis Pilaris – a remarkably common condition which causes skin to appear rough, red and bumpy due to an excess production of keratin, which results in the development of little ‘plugs’ or goose bumps. Use it on dry skin and prepare to witness the transformation…
how_to_use: DIRECTIONS: Use on DRY skin before showering or bathing, using firm circular movements. For progressive improvement in skin texture and condition follow with AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion. PRODUCT CARE: Rinse regularly by hand or on a 30° cycle and dry naturally. Due to fabric wear we recommend replacing the mitt at least every 6 months for optimum efficiency. WARNINGS: Do not use on broken, infected, damaged or irritated skin. Not recommended for facial use. Not recommended for children.

name: Sol de Janeiro Beija Flor Biggie Elasti-Cream 500ml (Worth £96) Sol de Janeiro Beija Flor Biggie Elasti-Cream 500ml (Worth £96)
description: Need a body cream that does it all? The Beija Flor Elasti-Cream has got you — and your body — covered. This rich skin saviour is brimming with elasticity-boosting elements courtesy of cacay oil (a gentle retinol alternative) and plant-based collagen to perk up and hydrate skin. Worth £96, this supersize 500ml tub, the Beija Flor Biggie, is a must-have for Sol de Janeiro superfans. Lather this plant squalane-infused cream all over and reap the highly-moisturising benefits, especially in delicate areas like your neck and chest that are prone to moisture loss. Perfect for everyday use, notice as your skin transforms into a velvety-smooth version of itself as the aforementioned collagen and cacay oil get to work on boosting cell turnover — that’s right, you can add youth-boosting merits to its long list of accolades. Restorative, replenishing and a dream to apply, expect your skin to drink up this cocktail of good skin care stuff. Trust us, you won’t be able to keep your hands off yourself.

name: Megababe The Smoothie Deo Fruit Enzyme Daily Deodorant (Various Sizes) Megababe The Smoothie Deo Fruit Enzyme Daily Deodorant (Various Sizes)
description: You don’t need a blender to feed your underarms some of their five a day — The Smoothie Deo is Megababe’s fruit-packed formula that counters odour-causing microbes via bilberry, lemon and orange-derived acids. Made to bring balance to your skin’s pH and stop microbes from thriving, it's laced with lactobacillus ferment, a healthy probiotic, that signals your skin to produce and regulate good microbes for added odour protection. We’re about to get even more science-y up in here: zinc ricinoleate breaks down and absorbs odoru without interfering with skin's natural flora; magnesium hydroxide balances pH and fight odour-causing bacteria; arrowroot absorbs wetness; xylityl sesquicaprylate acts as a potent antimicrobial and deodoriser; triethyl citrate inhibits the sweat-producing bacteria enzyme; finally, coconut, vitamin E, jojoba and sunflower seed oils nourish, soothe and hydrate your skin for a comfortable finish.
how_to_use: Apply daily as often as needed to clean, dry pits. As with any aluminum-free deodorant, some wetness is normal.

description: Tired of rough and bumpy blemish-prone skin? This 2% BHA Body Smoothing Spot Exfoliant from PAULA'S CHOICE unites salicylic acid with a cocktail of antioxidant-rich ingredients as well as chamomile flower extract to not only slough away dead and dull skin cells to reveal brighten and smoother skin but to also protect skin from harmful free radicals and pollution. Salicylic acid not only helps shed dead skin from the surface but also within your pores, making it an efficacious treatment for breakouts and blackheads. Ticking all our boxes and more, this is heading straight into our holiday haul *adds to bag*.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml
description: Reactive skins rejoice! For La Roche-Posay have specifically formulated this treatment toner to help regulate oil without disrupting your skins natural balance. Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.

name: Megababe Bust Dust Anti-Boob Sweat Powder 85g Megababe Bust Dust Anti-Boob Sweat Powder 85g
description: Skin-soothing and talc-free, this is your secret weapon against the dreaded grey t-shirt marks that usually keep your arms firmly by your sides…you can finally wave your hands in the air like you just don’t care and without the fear of saturated clothing! Absorbing moisture in an instant, this body powder can be used from top-to-toe to keep sweat from saturating your shoes and seeping into your favourite item of clothing. Lightly scented with lavender and a skin-soothing infusion of aloe and chamomile you can shake away sweat stains and get back to enjoying your hot gal summer uninterrupted. Now available in a full size 170g and travel-friendly 48g offering, you can stay sweat-free no matter where you are.

name: Ultra Violette Extreme Screen Hydrating Body & Hand Skinscreen SPF50+ Ultra Violette Extreme Screen Hydrating Body & Hand Skinscreen SPF50+
description: When the sun’s perilous rays strike, make sure you’re protecting your limbs and hands via the Extreme Screen Hydrating Body & Hand SPF50. Enveloping skin in SPF50+ with a dash of (well, four hours of, to be precise) water and sweat resistance to boot, this versatile formula gives a shimmery sheen, smells delightful and is incredibly hydrating. Plant-derived pentavitin pumps skin with moisture (think: plump, juicy skin with a side of satisfied glee), aloe vera soothes and vitamin E nourishes while fighting against pesky free radicals—the the DNA-damaging environmental aggressors that attack cells, breaking down collagen and accelerating the skin-ageing process.
how_to_use: Every single day, even if you’re only kinda going out in the sun. Slather on a solid dollop after your shower for your daily dose of glow, hydration and sun protection, and remember – you want at least 5ml per limb, so don’t be stingy!

name: Bondi Sands Reusable Application Mitt Bondi Sands Reusable Application Mitt
description: The secret to a seamless tan, Bondi Sands' Application Mitt is the perfect pairing for any of their iconic self-tanning range. Both washable and reusable, the soft mitt effortlessly - not to mention, evenly - distributes your formula of choice to deliver a streak-free, flawless tan, all while keeping hands stain free. Unlike your hands that absorb the tan, this essential tool will help you nail the application without leaving your hands over-tanned. Plus, the rounded mitt is a much better shape from reaching the intricate contours of your body! Suitable for use with foams, lotions and mists, this a must-have in any faux-glow fanatics arsenal...
how_to_use: Apply Bondi Sands self-tanning products to the plain side of your self-tanning mitt. Rub onto the skin in a circular motion. After use rinse mitt with warm water. Hands will remain perfectly clean. Care: rinse your Mitt with warm water and allow to dry thoroughly after every use.

name: HUM Nutrition Flatter Me Healthy Digestion Supplement (60 Vegan Capsules, 30 Days) HUM Nutrition Flatter Me Healthy Digestion Supplement (60 Vegan Capsules, 30 Days)
description: Changes in our lifestyle, diet and stress levels can be detrimental to the normal function of our digestive system, prompting wellbeing bugbears like bloating and discomfort to arise; enter HUM Nutrition's Flatter Me. With a 30 day supply of vegan capsules, this carefully crafted formula is designed to supplement the enzyme levels within your body to improve digestion and breakdown foods, in turn, easing bloating and gas. The comprehensive proprietary blend is made up of 18 full-spectrum enzymes, as well as a herbal blend of ginger, fennel and peppermint, to support all major phases of digestion: optimising the digestion of protein, carbohydrates, fibre, lactose and fats and encouraging nutrient absorption. Our wellness routine has been waiting for this one!
how_to_use: Take one capsule twice daily before your main meals. Results should be immediate.
ingredient: Enzyme Blend (Protease I, Protease II, Protease III, Peptidase, Bromelain, Bacterial Protease, Papain, Lipase, Amylase, Glucomylase, Alpha-Galatosidase, Invertase, Diastase, Hemicellulase, Cellulase, Beta-Glucanase, Phytase, Lactase) 498mg, Capsule: Cellulose, Rice Bran, Ginger Root Powder (Zingiber Officinale) 40mg, Fennel Seed Powder (Foeniculum Vulgare) 30mg, Peppermint Leaf Powder (Mentha Piperita) 20mg. Herbal Blend: Ginger Powder (rhizome), Fennel Powder (seed), Peppermint Powder (leaf). Other vegetable capsule (cellulose & water) and rice bran. Contains NO: gluten, yeast, wheat, soy, milk, eggs, peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish and artificial colors or flavours.

name: Weleda Skin Food (30ml) Weleda Skin Food (30ml)
description: An undisputed hero of the beautysphere, Weleda’s Skin Food boasts a blend of replenishing, natural and organic ingredients to quickly repair and revitalise dry, rough or stressed, scaly skin. Creating a silky cocoon between skin and the drying effects of the elements, this rich – and we mean really rich – cream is a true ‘desert island’ essential; jam-packed with lanolin, beeswax and glycerin, alongside sweet almond and sunflower oils to help soften and fortify skin as they boost moisture levels, this supplements barrier function to ward against water loss. A godsend for gardeners, this quickly conditions the gnarliest palms, while the medley of antibacterial rosemary, conditioning calendula and calming chamomile protect and help to cherish elbows, knees, feet… even faces. A handbag hero – as well as a pocket-sized sidekick – keep this cute, grass green tube within reach at all times to replenish and reassure compromised skin in an instant.
how_to_use: Apply generously several times a day, wherever your skin needs extra help – especially on rough, dry areas like hands, feet and elbows.

name: Sun Bum Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion Sun Bum Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion
description: For everyday living, the Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion is a staple – protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while nourishing and delicately scenting skin. The OG formula that the sunseekers at Sun Bum actually use every single day, this is enriched with vitamin E. A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. Also water resistant for 80 minutes (that’s a heck of a lot of surf time), the Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion is brimming with the Sun Bum Original Scent, which – as word on the street has it – smells like summer, bottled.
how_to_use: Dispense in hand and apply to body. We recommend working from head to toe so you don't accidentally miss a limb. If you need help reaching your back, ask a friend— that's what they're there for. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure and allow it to absorb. Reapply at least every two hours. Apply more frequently after swimming/sweating, or after an aggressive towel dry. Always offer to share.

name: Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Cream 240ml Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Cream 240ml
description: It's not just SZA who sees good days in your future... Scented like paradise - no exaggeration - Sol de Janeiro's Bom Dia Bright Cream is here to help you indulge in a skin-smoothing self-care moment with its nourishing blend of cupuaçu butter and fruit AHAs. Designed to help you glow from head to toe, this decadently rich body cream will have your skin soft to the touch in no time at all. It's enriched with Amazon's answer to shea butter - cupuaçu butter - to lock in moisture and boost elasticity, as your skin quickly and easily absorbs it. A duo of alpha hydroxy acids derived from mango and banana fruits then gently exfoliate to smooth rough patches, leaving remarkably soft, radiant skin in its stead. As if that wasn't enough, vitamin C helps to support collagen production and visibly brightens, diminishing the look of dark spots. We've never been so ready for bare-leg weather...
how_to_use: Smooth on daily, morning or night, for moisturizing and retexturizing benefits all over. For speedier results, use 2 times a day on areas prone to ingrown hairs due to hair removal (underarms, bikini line, legs, etc.), as well as bumpy, rough spots (upper arms, thighs, and bum bum).

name: Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum Body Firmeza Oil 100ml Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum Body Firmeza Oil 100ml
description: Bringing a little Brazilian flair to your bathroom shelf, Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum Body Firmeza Oil transforms ashy skin with Rio-ready radiance — courtesy of a smoothing and tightening blend of Amazonian guarana, jaboticaba and muirapuama. With the same incredible sweet and nutty scent as the brand’s iconic Bum Bum Cream, this nourishing oil banishes puffiness to leave skin visibly tighter. Micro algae extract, guarana and muirapuama stimulate microcirculation to promote drainage, while jaboticaba and Brazilian olive oil deeply replenish to leave limbs soft and smooth. With a hydrating yet dry feel that sinks in fast, this luxurious oil leaves skin glowy, not greasy.

Depuffing belly massage technique: starting at your belly button, press firmly and sweep fingers upwards and outwards towards your rib cage. Complete this movement for 3-5 minutes. Starting at your belly button again, press firmly and sweep fingers downwards and outwards towards your bikini line.

name: Bondi Sands Everyday Gradual Tanning Milk 375ml Bondi Sands Everyday Gradual Tanning Milk 375ml
description: Whether you're new to tanning, want to achieve a gradual glow or you're hoping to maintain your tan with daily top-ups and hydration, Bondi Sands Everyday Gradual Tanning Milk is a must-try. Use milk daily as an everyday moisturiser to keep skin hydrated and golden. Wash hands after use.

name: The Ordinary Marine Hyaluronics 30ml The Ordinary Marine Hyaluronics 30ml
description: If you love the heroic hydrating power of hyaluronic acid but want a lightweight alternative, look no further than The Ordinary’s Marine Hyaluronics. Starring weightless marine-derived water reservoirs, the formula attracts and holds moisture just like hyaluronic acid – but feels lighter in texture when you apply it. Designed to be a lightweight alternative to The Ordinary’s {Hyaluronic Acid + B5}, this formula also contains extracts from skin-friendly marine bacteria, Hawaiian red algae, Glycoproteins from Antarctic marine sources, micro-filtered blue-green algae and several health-supporting amino acids, all of which work together to offer additional moisture and age-defying effects. Simply apply a few drops of this before creams or heavier formulas to supercharge your hydration weightlessly.

name: Biossance 100% Squalane Oil 100ml Biossance 100% Squalane Oil 100ml
description: Celebrating their core ingredient and bottling a bank of nourishing properties, the 100% Squalane Oil is a heaven-sent hydrating essential. This ultra-moisturising formula encourages the natural cell renewal processes within your skin while sealing in essential hydration for lasting softness. Designed to mimic squalene - a natural molecule present in our skin that diminishes over time – this moisturising ingredient comes from 100% plant-based, renewable sugarcane and enhances elasticity as well as protecting your skin. Spoiled for ways in which to work it into your routine, here's a few we love: smooth over face and body for instant (and featherweight!) hydration; as an intensive moisture mask for stressed-out lengths; layered over lips to battle dryness and prime before colour; to grant a healthy-looking glow any and everywhere; even as an ultra-soothing shave oil. What's more, in a clinical study, this incredible oil was seen to accelerate cell turnover five days faster than that of non-treated skin! We are obsessed...
how_to_use: For Face: Rub a small amount together between hands to warm. Pat gently onto face, neck and décolleté. For Body: Massage a few pumps onto skin immediately after showering, paying close attention to areas needing extra hydration like arms, legs, and knees. For Hair: Rub a small amount between hands and smooth through dry or wet hair to add shine and tame flyaways, split ends and frizz.
ingredient: Squalane Oil.

name: Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion 400ml Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion 400ml
description: Love your Lancaster golden tan? What if you could prolong it for an endless summer sensation? Lancaster's Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion is specially developed for those who want to prolong their beautiful holiday tan while soothing their sun-exposed skin. Formulated with a special repairing complex, Lancaster's Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion not only prolongs your tan up to one month but instantly calms sun-exposed skin too for a feeling of intense comfort. Made with natural-origin buriti oil, Lancaster's Tan Activator Complex intensifies melanin production for a golden, even and long-lasting tan. This refreshing after-sun lotion contains a repairing complex that instantly soothes your skin. It reduces the risk of peeling and leaves skin supple. This soothing lotion rehydrates and softens skin with an ultra-sensorial velvety finish. It instantly refreshes and scents your skin with Lancaster’s iconic fragrance, suitable for sensitive skin.
how_to_use: Apply generously to face and body after sun exposure and after your holidays.

name: Limited Edition Sol de Janeiro Rio Radiance Body Cream 240ml Limited Edition Sol de Janeiro Rio Radiance Body Cream 240ml
description: Lacklustre, dull skin? We don’t know her! Sol de Janeiro’s Limited Edition Rio Radiance Body Cream has you covered from top-to-toe with its fast-absorbing formula. Instantly quenching the complexion in a moisture-kissed, glow-inducing veil, the body butter rids all signs of dryness to keep you feeling your best self, year-round. Introducing its new summer-inspired scent, the cream captures the warmth of the Rio sunshine, with luscious notes of leite de coco, sun-soaked sands and creamy vanilla. Featuring carrot seed oil, squalane and mica, the formula deeply nourishes, revealing a fresh-from-the-beach dew with a seriously supple finish. In Sol we trust to bring the vacay vibes to our lives, and this heavenly body butter stays true to the brand’s feel-good, ultra-sensorial ethos.

name: Sun Bum Original Glow Lotion SPF 30+ 59ml Sun Bum Original Glow Lotion SPF 30+ 59ml
description: Perfect for daily use, the Original Glow SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Lotion is an everyday must-have and holiday staple - protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays as you take a dip in the sea and enjoy 80 minutes of water resistant defence. To simply call the Original Glow SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Lotion a sunscreen would be an understatement. Ticking the boxes of UVA and UVB protection, this sun saviour goes one step further as it infuses kakadu plum (which is packed with vitamin C) to bestow a healthy, dewy glow and fight off free radicals. Made with all skin tones in mind, look no further than this skin staple for a hydrated, protected and glowing complexion.

name: Megababe No More Chafe Duo Megababe No More Chafe Duo
description: Don’t let chafing determine your summer wardrobe. Megababe’s Thigh Rescue is here to keep you comfortable from head to toe. Here to stop friction from irritating you to no end, this balm stick can be used on thighs, toes, shoulders, elbows and more to keep chafing under control. The winner of six awards — New Beauty’s ‘Best Chafe Stick’ in 2022, Allure Best of Beauty 2021, Allure Best of Beauty 2020, Into The Gloss’s ‘25 Best Products of the Decade’ in 2019, 2018 Cosmopolitan Beauty Award, 2017 New York Magazine Best All-Around Anti-Chafing Product — it’s safe to say that it’s a fan favourite. It glides on smooth to create a friction-free barrier and feeds your skin with nourishing extracts: anti-inflammatory aloe soothes skin; pomegranate seed extract protects the outer layer of your skin and promotes healing; ginger root extract evens skin tone and boosts elasticity; finally, orange oil provides quick and effective relief from inflammation.
