name: EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF50 Kids EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF50 Kids
description: Easy to apply, rapidly absorbable and never sticky or greasy, the lightweight Sunscreen Mousse SPF50 Kids works with the epidermis to deliver both immediate and lasting protection against UVA and UVB rays for up to six hours. (That’s a lot of worry-free adventure time for your little ones!) Exceptionally water-resistant and free of parabens, nanoparticles and perfumes, this formula is ideal for sensitive and delicate young skin. With a quick drying-time and invisible, matte finish, this hydrating mousse actually forms an innovative protective barrier that mimics skin’s natural defences – providing extraordinary protection without clogging pores or sitting on the surface of your skin. Gentle, hypoallergenic, suitable for use from just six months old and totally smudge-proof (even when up against towel rub-downs post swim!) the Sunscreen Mousse SPF50 Kids lasts twice as long as cream formulas and helps to prevent future skin damage. Now you just need a holiday to go with it…
how_to_use: For children younger than 16 years, EVY Technology always recommends SPF 30 or higher. Even children with darker skin should be protected with high UVA protection, because children’s skin is thinner. Reapplication: Thanks to the patented skincare technology, EVY is absorbed into the entire epidermis, rather than sitting on the skin's surface. This results in a much longer-lasting protection. However, in line with regulations, EVY do advise you to reapply frequently, especially as it's easy to miss a spot during the first time around. Recycling: Simply break off the plastic top for plastic recycling and place the aluminium bottle in the metal recycling bin.

Applied beneath make up, it enhances the results of your careful artistry and prolongs its wear, with encapsulated sunscreen beads that release on contact with skin for luxurious broad-spectrum protection from the sun’s skin-damaging rays. With a subtle touch of refined pearlescence, the liquid immediately boosts radiance, while also improving skin over time thanks to soothing, anti-inflammatory Evodia Rutecarpa plant extract.

description: Struggle with tan build-up, little mistakes or want to ensure the best, most seamless tan application possible? St.Tropez’s brand new Tan Remover Mousse is your brand new trusty hero. Perfect for beginners or faux glow aficionados, this Tan Remover immediately corrects tanning mistakes, helps remove build-up and provides a clean, perfectly primed and even canvas for a flawless tan application. Infused with detoxifying cotton extract and probiotics to purify, prime and rebalance skin, this hard-working hero is also non-sticky, easy-to-use and is even suitable for sensitive skin. A light, white foam, this can be used with your {Tan Build Up Remover Mitt} for even more effective results.
how_to_use: To Prep & Prime the Perfect Sunless Tan: Pump the foam & apply generously all over clean, dry, tanned skin. Gently massage the foam into skin & leave on for 5 minutes. Rinse off in the shower with warm water. For best results and for stubborn areas, use with St.Tropez Tan Remover Mitt, buffing in gentle circular motions to remove all traces of tan. Once tan is removed, your skin will be prepped & primed, ready for your next flawless application of tan.

Scented with a hint of crisp mint, eucalyptus and cedarwood, this new odour-fighter is the latest in the line of skin care deodorants from Megababe that promise to care for your skin the way it deserves. Formulated with a reduced amount of baking soda compared to other deodorants, the Geo Deo is then blended with zinc oxide, kaolin clay and magnesium hydroxide which all work to fight odour, all the while ensuring your skin stays free from irritation. Even better, an optimised dose of plant oils and shea butter work to hydrate and replenish this delicate skin, after all, your pits need a little love too. For the sensitive skin sufferers out there, a soothing blend of colloidal oatmeal, seabuckthorn and chicory root work in harmony to keep your underarms healthy and skin barrier strong and resilient.

name: Sun Bum Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Stick Sun Bum Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Stick

Incredibly easy to use and bolstered by calming aloe, this seamless formula is even enriched with nourishing vitamin E. A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. Also water resistant for 80 minutes (that’s a heck of a lot of surf time), the Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Stick is brimming with the Sun Bum Original Scent, which – as word on the street has it – smells like summer, bottled.
how_to_use: Apply sunscreen stick to your face 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply sunscreen after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying and at least every 2 hours.
ingredient: ethylhexyl palmitate, parfum, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, chamomilla recutita flower extract, cucumis sativus fruit extract, glycerin, helianthus annuus seed oil, hydrolyzed elastin, propylene glycol, tocopheryl acetate, benzyl salicylate, butylphenyl methylpropional, geraniol, hexyl cinnamal, limonene, linalool

name: Ultra Violette Clean Screen Fragrance Free Sensitive Facial Skinscreen SPF 30 Ultra Violette Clean Screen Fragrance Free Sensitive Facial Skinscreen SPF 30
description: Developed, with fussy, easily-irritated and sensitive complexions in mind, the Clean Screen Fragrance Free Sensitive Facial Skinscreen SPF 30 is perfect for blemish prone and combination skin—protecting you from the sun’s perilous rays without any artificial fragrances or alcohol. Impressively lightweight and in a refreshing gel texture, this gentle sunscreen boasts SPF30 protection and a no-fuss, natural-looking finish that won’t mess with your make up (or skin!). Making short work of redness with its soothing capabilities, titanium dioxide is what gives this formula its broad-spectrum protection, while plant-derived pentavitin pumps the complexion with moisture. Think: plump, juicy skin with a side of satisfied glee. You’re welcome.
how_to_use: Apply every day, even when you’re staying indoors. Apply as the final step in your skincare routine, right after or instead of your moisturiser, before your make up. We recommend at least five pumps to cover your face and ears.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Titanium Dioxide, Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol, Silica, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Saccharide Isomerate, Decyl Glucoside, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).

name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder 20g The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder 20g
description: As most skin care buffs will know, vitamin C is an effective antioxidant that brightens skin, evens out tone and reduces signs of ageing. A suspension of very fine L-Ascorbic Acid powder, this formula provides the most direct exposure of extremely high concentrations of vitamin C topically. This extremely effective method visibly targets the appearance of uneven skin tone, dullness and other hallmarks of ageing. The powder can be mixed with other treatments (except those containing niacinamide or EUK 134) so it will slot in perfectly to any ritual. With this format, a very strong tingling but non-irritating sensation is to be expected during the first 1-2 weeks of use while your skin’s tolerance to vitamin C is elevated.
how_to_use: Mix a small amount with other treatments in the palm of your hand and apply to face in the AM or the PM. A tingling sensation can be expected after application. Do not mix with formulations containing Niacinamide or EUK 134. If topical Vitamin C is used as part of skin care, it should be applied at alternate times with EUK 134 or Niacinamide (ideally Vitamin C in the PM and EUK 134/Niacinamide in the AM). Otherwise, EUK 134/Niacinamide can affect the integrity of pure-form Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid).
ingredient: Ascorbic Acid

name: Drunk Elephant Sili Whipped Body Lotion 240ml Drunk Elephant Sili Whipped Body Lotion 240ml
description: A liberal libation when it comes to hydration, Drunk Elephant's Sili Whipped Body Lotion is here to intensely nourish dry and sensitised skin. Formulated with a skin-friendly pH of 5.2, the silken blend calls on fatty-acid-rich plant oils (think: chia, green tea, flax, and marula seed) to soften and restore your skin. Squalane, barrier-supportive sodium PCA and a 3-ceramide blend then work together to strengthen your skin barrier and promote balanced moisture levels. The final flourish is an infusion of centella asiatica extract and ashwagandha root to reduce the look of redness and calm stressed skin. Wondering if it works? Don't just take our word for it: in a 2-week consumer-perception study with 30 participants, 96% agreed skin felt immediately replenished, hydrated, softer and soothed.
how_to_use: Massage all over your body until fully absorbed.
ingredient: Coconut Alkanes, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Coco-Caprylate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Schinziophyton Rautanenii Kernel Oil, Pseudozyma Epicola/Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil/Camellia Japonica Seed Oil/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil/Sunflower Seed Oil/Sweet Almond Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate, Linoleic Acid,Linolenic Acid, Ximenia Americana Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Tocopherol.

name: St. Tropez Tan Remover Mitt St. Tropez Tan Remover Mitt
description: This specially designed mitt effectively removes tan build up and buffs away dry skin, leaving it ready to reapply a perfect sun-kissed tan base. An SOS treatment for even fully developed tans, this intelligent mitt helps to correct tanning mistakes as well as helping to ensure skin in super soft, silky and perfect for a flawless tan application. Simply wet skin and gently buff in circular motions on the targeted area to help erase mistakes and soften skin in rough areas.
how_to_use: Use on wet skin in gentle circular motions with your regular bath or shower products. Apply extra pressure to elbows, knees, ankles, feet and hands or where tan build up is obvious. To correct tanning mistakes, dampen skin then use your index finger inside the mitt and apply to the affected area.

name: Lancaster Sun Beauty Fast Tan Optimizer Satin Dry Oil SPF30 150ml Lancaster Sun Beauty Fast Tan Optimizer Satin Dry Oil SPF30 150ml
description: These days we all know how important sun protection is, but did you know that the sunlight is made up of four different types of sun rays: UVB, UVA, visible Light and infrared? Lancaster's Sun Beauty Fast Tan Optimiser Satin Dry Oil SPF30 protects against all four and now with blue light protection too, you’ll be safe in the sun with this sensorial oil. Experience broad spectrum sun protection with this luxurious oil that leaves a satin-soft finish, specially developed for those who are looking for a luminous, gorgeous and lasting tan while preserving their skin's beauty. The pleasure of tanning and optimal sun care, this delivers the benefits of an oil without the greasy feel, this dry-oil formula leaves your skin soft and heightens tan intensity, while offering the broadest protection from sun exposure. While no SPF can provide full protection against the sun’s rays, Lancaster’s optimising formula comes as close as you can get while leaving your skin wrapped in a beautifying shimmering veil. A unique ‘Sun Repair System’ helps to heal your skin post-exposure and strengthens your skin with pho-ageing resistance. Complete with their bespoke ‘Tan Activator Complex’ to stimulate the tanning process and melanin diffusion in the skin you can enjoy that golden tan!
how_to_use: Apply before sun exposure. Spray liberally over the body until fully covered. Shake well. Mist onto skin and spread evenly with your hands.

name: Sol de Janeiro Beija Flor Elasti-Cream 240ml Sol de Janeiro Beija Flor Elasti-Cream 240ml
description: Need a body cream that does it all? The Beija Flor Elasti-Cream has got you — and your body! — covered. Available in this supersize 240ml tub, this rich skin saviour is brimming with elasticity-boosting elements via cacay oil (a gentle retinol alternative) and plant-based collagen to perk up and hydrate skin. Lather this plant squalane-infused cream all over and reap the highly-moisturising benefits, especially in delicate areas like your neck and chest that are prone to moisture loss. Perfect for everyday use, notice as your skin transforms into a velvety-smooth version of itself as the aforementioned collagen and cacay oil get to work on boosting cell turnover — that’s right, you can add youth-boosting merits to its long list of accolades. Restorative, replenishing and a dream to apply, expect your skin to drink up this cocktail of good skin care stuff. Trust us, you won’t be able to keep your hands off yourself.
how_to_use: Apply daily, morning and night all over the body, using circular motions to allow this rich and deeply nourishing cream to sink in and to promote maximum absorption.

name: Paula's Choice Resist Anti-Ageing Skin Restoring Moisturizer SPF 50 Paula's Choice Resist Anti-Ageing Skin Restoring Moisturizer SPF 50
description: A must-have for the summer months, the brand's Resist Skin Restoring Moisturiser SPF50 is a multi-tasking moisturiser that features SPF 50 to protect skin from premature signs of ageing and sun damage, while shea butter leaves skin feeling incredibly soft and hydrated. The youth-preserving yet good-to-skin formula also contains tone-improving ingredients like niacinamide and liquorice root extract for more even-toned and younger-looking skin. What's not to love?
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup. Allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate)? Do not use this product as it contains salicylate derivatives (incl. Homosalate).

name: Tan-Luxe Super Gloss Illuminating Bronzing Drops Tan-Luxe Super Gloss Illuminating Bronzing Drops
description: Taking up a coveted spot on our most-wanted list, the exclusive Super Gloss SPF 30 is a lightweight illuminating and bronzing serum that effortlessly colour-corrects your tone, softens the look of imperfections, quenches your skin and reignites your glow. Blurring the lines between a serum, bronzer and sunscreen, the Super Gloss SPF 30 is a multi-tasking formula that melds hyaluronic acid and squalane to boost and retain skin-plumping moisture while softening the visibility of fine lines to promote a beautifully dewy, fresh-faced finish. Effective enough for everyday use – come rain or shine - this SPF 30 helps to shield your skin against damaging UVA/UVB rays, as well as blue light! Plus, the vegan & reef-safe formula blurs the look of imperfections (think: uneven tone) to bestow a luminous, bronzed glow.
how_to_use: Apply to bare skin for natural sun-kissed radiance. Drop into your moisturiser for a custom glow-boost. Highlight cheekbones/collarbones/shoulders for a glossy finish. Mix with The Face for an instant glow that develops over time.

name: Sun Bum Cool Down After Sun Lotion Sun Bum Cool Down After Sun Lotion
description: Like a crisp glass of icy cold rosé for hot summer skin, Sun Bum’s Cool Down After Sun Lotion is brimming with vitamin E to repair and replenish without leaving limbs feeling greasy. You know that holiday feeling? You’ve lounged by the pool for the last seven hours and now you’ve come in for a shower – you’re clean, smelling fuuuuhresh, your hair’s wrapped in a towel and you’re ready to change into one of the ten shoulder-baring ‘essentials’ you crammed in your suitcase? This after sun lotion is that in a bottle – a cooling, conditioning cocktail of aloe and comforting cocoa butter, to wrap you with summery scent as it soothes and replenishes tight, post-sun skin. Bursting with free radical-scavenging antioxidants, as well as being vegan, hypoallergenic and completely free from gluten, parabens and cruelty, this helps to reduce any redness and leave your limbs feeling cocooned in a nourishing, non-greasy veil.
how_to_use: Apply generously to all areas of the skin. Gently massage into any affected areas. For best results, apply right after sunburn occurs or before sun exposure. Reapply as frequently as you like.
ingredient: Water, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Stearic Acid, Cotton Seed Oil, Sorbitol, Theobroma Oil (Cocoa Butter), Simmondsia Chinensis Oil (Jojoba Oil), Aloe Barbadensis Gel (Aloe Vera), Cetyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Oleate, Triethanolamine (TEA), Diazolidinyl Urea, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Fragrance.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Hydrating Suncream Tinted SPF50 50ml La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Hydrating Suncream Tinted SPF50 50ml
description: Minimalist in formulation but giving far from minimal results, we introduce you to the ultra-comforting tinted SPF with maximum protection for sensitive complexions. This is the ultimate skin protector for reactive skin to keep it safe from UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA rays. Counteracting the usual white streaks left behind by traditional SPFs, this is formulated with a tinted pigment to keep your complexion perfected. Resistant to water, sweat and sand this non-greasy, comforting cream is ticking all our boxes and heading straight in our bags to keep our complexion protected and hydrated all year-round.
how_to_use: For daily usage and sun exposure. Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure. Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.

name: Paula's Choice Clear Ultra-Light Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF30+ Paula's Choice Clear Ultra-Light Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF30+
description: Formulated for oilier, blemish-prone skin types, this featherweight moisturiser keeps skin balanced, healthy and calm – not to mention protected from harmful and ageing UV rays with broad-spectrum SPF30. With a non-greasy fluid consistency, the clever formula mattifies excess shine and minimises the appearance of pores to lend a smooth canvas perfectly primed for make up application or for wearing in its bare, beautiful glory. A blend of vitamin-dense plant extracts – think: green tea, pomegranate and goji among others – add their antioxidant properties to the mix, soothing any upsets, fading red marks and defending against environmental stressors. Perfect for wearing the daytime, this multi-tasking hero comes in both full (60ml) and travel (15ml) sizes – perfect for on-the-go or trialling before investing in the full size.
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup. Allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate)? Do not use this product as it contains salicylate derivatives (incl. Homosalate).

name: Weleda Skin Food Lotion - Light 30ml Weleda Skin Food Lotion - Light 30ml
description: A lighter – but no less hydrating – iteration of the best-loved Skin Food, Skin Food Light brings immediate comfort to dry, thirsty skin that’s in need of a cooling, replenishing drink. Intensive care that sinks in easily, Skin Food Light boasts a medley of softening, strengthening, smoothing and barrier-boosting botanicals – including sunflower seed oil, shea and cocoa seed butters, rosemary extracts and chamomile – to supplement skin’s own defences while ‘locking in’ moisture to maximise ‘spring’ and resilience. Silky, non-greasy and swiftly absorbed, this tube is a true handbag hero – as well as a pocket-sized sidekick – to care for chapped, compromised hands, scaly elbows or anywhere needing attention.
how_to_use: Smooth onto dry skin areas on the body or face and massage in gently. Allow to soak in.

name: RecycleMe Recycling Bag RecycleMe Recycling Bag
description: Amassing a mountain of empties you want to recycle but don't know how to? Our Recycle Me initiative aims to offset the impact of beauty obsession by processing typically tough-to-recycle materials. Whenever you're ready, sort through your empties and give them a clean to remove any residue. Fill your FREEPOST Recycle Me bag with your empties and pop them in the post. We'll sort through and pass the hard to recycle products onto our partner for them to be repurposed - rather than ending up in landfill.
how_to_use: Shop it Once your basket is filled to the brim add a Recycle Me bag to your order (you'll incur a small fee). Clean it Whenever you're ready, sort through your empties and give them a clean to remove any residue. Post it Fill your FREEPOST Recycle Me bag with your empties and pop them in the post. Recycle it. We'll sort through and pass the hard to recycle products onto our partner for them to be repurposed - rather than ending up in landfill.

name: Sol de Janeiro Samba 2-Step Foot Fetish Care 90ml Sol de Janeiro Samba 2-Step Foot Fetish Care 90ml
description: Put the samba spring back into your step with Sol de Janeiro's smoothing and nourishing duo. Featuring the Foot Smoothing Board and slip-free Foot Fetish Cream rough soles will soon be a thing of the past. Enter: feet that are ready to dance the night away. Tired-out feet will soon be ready to hop, skip and jump their way through your day thanks to the Samba 2-Step Foot Fetish Care set. First up, the Foot Smoothing Board smooths away rough, hard skin to reveal baby-soft soles. Followed up by the Foot Fetish Cream that's brimming with cupuaçu butter - full of fatty acids, phytosterols and polyphenols - to keep moisture locked in and restore elasticity, and antioxidant-rich açaí oil. The resulting silky soft skin of previously worn-out feet will be enough to have you reaching for your dancing shoes...
how_to_use: Use the Foot Smoothing Board on dry feet to soften rough, calloused areas. Massage the Samba Foot Fetish Cream onto feet.

name: MALIN + GOETZ Best Sellers Travel Kit MALIN + GOETZ Best Sellers Travel Kit
description: This convenient kit contains minis of six of MALIN + GOETZ’s most loved hair, body and face products, each enclosed within the brand’s signature chic, sustainable packaging. At 30ml each, these travel-friendly tubes can be thrown into your hand luggage for on-the-go top ups of your skincare favourites. To soothe stressed post-flight skin, the kit includes the gentle amino acid-infused Grapefruit Cleanser and the calming Vitamin E Face Moisturizer. For hair, look to the energising Peppermint Shampoo (great for when the jet lag kicks in) and smoothing Cilantro Hair Conditioner loaded with hydrating shea butter. Finally, for body you can’t go wrong with the kit’s cleansing-not-stripping Bergamot Hand + Body Wash followed by the Vitamin B5 Body Moisturiser, which deeply nourishes thanks to provitamin b5 and skin-essential fatty acids.
how_to_use: Face: Lather a small amount of cleanser in hands and gently massage onto wet skin. Rinse clean with water. Apply a small amount of moisturizer to cleansed, dry skin. Body: Apply body wash to wet skin, gently work into a lather and rinse clean. Apply moisturiser to cleansed, dry skin. Hair: Massage a small amount of shampoo onto wet hair and scalp to create a gentle lather. Rinse clean. Apply a small amount of conditioner to clean, wet hair, especially the ends. Leave on for three minutes, then rinse clean.

name: Aesop Resurrection Hand Wash 500ml Aesop Resurrection Hand Wash 500ml
description: A beautiful hand washing gel that cleanses without drying, Aesop’s Resurrection Hand Wash actually softens your hands. The antibacterial properties of mandarin and rosemary extracts help to cleanse, while lavender assists skin in feeling soothed and hydrated. It's brilliant for people who like to wash their hands a lot or who have sensitive skins. As you wash your hands, it makes your bathroom or kitchen smell divine. Aesop don’t believe in ‘anti’ – you won’t see any hyperbolic ‘anti-ageing’ or ‘anti-acne’ claims – instead, their products are developed to complement a balanced lifestyle, and help protect against the elements. This is ‘pro’ skin care for those who’re planning to grow older gracefully, proud of the skin that they live in.

name: Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30
description: Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 is one of the products that made Elemis' name when still a baby brand. With no advertising at all this quickly became a sell-out cult worldwide just through words of mouth, the 'Old Girl's' network went into overdrive because the results are so good. Since its launch in 2003, Pro-Collagen Marine Cream has been globally recognised for its gel-cream texture, skin-loving formula and clinically proven results. The addition of SPF 30 has taken this bestselling anti-ageing day cream to a whole new level by delivering the sun protection you need, the wrinkle-smoothing results you want in a texture you'll love. This super moisturising, yet ultra-light gel cream quenches thirsty skin and increases hydration by up to 253% in 1 hour. Formulated with powerful marine and plant actives including padina pavonica, chlorella and ginkgo biloba, the advanced formula is clinically proven to reduce the look of look of fine lines and wrinkles in 2 weeks. It also helps to improve the look of firmness and elasticity for skin that looks smooth and rejuvenated.
how_to_use: Gently massage into cleansed face and neck daily, working upwards and outwards.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream Refill 240ml Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream Refill 240ml
description: Brazilian 'bum bums' are famously brilliant, so whether it's a bottom, a butt or la derriére, your behind will reap the benefits of this tightening, moisturising miracle cream. This refill is designed to slip easily into your empty Brazilian Bum Bum Cream jar. Rich in South America's secret ingredients, a naturally nourishing, hyper-hydrating blend of cupuaçu butter, açaí and coconut oil provide the background to the star of the show: guaraná. A native Amazonian plant, this fruit contains one of the most potent forms of caffeine on the planet (with almost five times more caffeine than coffee), giving your bottom the ultimate boost and stimulating circulation to keep it super smooth and tantalisingly toned. With a light, silky texture, the cream is great all over the body (bum bum and beyond), absorbing quickly without feeling greasy or oily. Blissfully scented with a sweet, nutty fragrance (believe us... this stuff smells incredible) and bestowing skin with a subtle shimmer, Sol de Janeiro's Brazilian Bum Bum Cream will transport you to the beaches of Rio and grant you all the confidence of a Carnival dancer.
how_to_use: Massage in a circular motion to create warmth. Start with your bum bum, but you won’t be able to resist moving on to your tummy, arms, legs and all your beautiful features. To insert the refill, wash, rinse and thoroughly dry your original jar and lid (it’s dishwasher safe). Drop the pod into the jar, then peel off the pod's seal. Screw on your original lid.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Ultra-Light Invisible Fluid SPF30 50ml La Roche-Posay Anthelios Ultra-Light Invisible Fluid SPF30 50ml
description: You name it, the Anthelios Ultra-Light Invisible Fluid SPF 30+ does it. This is your next-gen photostable, broad spectrum protector that resists water, sweat and sand and all without leaving behind greasy white marks. We told you it was good! (In)-famously utilised in the Anthelios range is star ingredient ‘Mexoplex’, the patented filtering system that reinforces your skin against ageing UVA rays. Combined with ‘Thermal Spring Water’ this is the powerhouse lightweight SPF that will be sitting proudly in our beach bag all summer long. A hypo-allergenic formula that has been tested, re-tested and tested yet again for its mildness on sensitive and reactive skin it’s no wonder that nine out of ten dermatologists recommend this Cult favourite range from our favourite French pharmacy brand.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply 30 minutes before exposure and reapply frequently and generously every two hours to maintain protection especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling.

name: Kosas Kosasport Chemistry AHA Serum Deodorant 68ml Kosas Kosasport Chemistry AHA Serum Deodorant 68ml
description: You + this skin-brightening Chemistry AHA Serum Deodorant = happier underarms! Clearly in a league of its own, this odour-fighting treatment works its underarm magic in serum form to gently soothe, brighten and tend to those pesky ingrown hairs. Totally clear of aluminium, alcohol and baking soda, this one-of-a-kind deodorant is powered by a unique blend of AHAs (think: glycolic, lactic and mandelic acids) to not only dispel unwanted odours with natural notes of jasmine, sandalwood and vanilla, but to also ward off discolouration without compromising your skin. Featuring shikimic acid, a natural deodoriser, this B.O. banisher is sure to be your everyday essential.
how_to_use: Use daily. Just shake, roll, and go. Gently squeeze for more serum.

name: BeYou Monthly Period Patches (5 Pack) BeYou Monthly Period Patches (5 Pack)
description: An incredibly intelligent plaster to help ease your period pain and cramps, these BeYou Monthly Patches are 100% natural and made from steam-distilled eucalyptus and peppermint-derived menthol that create a 'cooling tingle' on application. Long-lasting and slow-releasing, each patch slowly delivers a cramp-numbing sensation to skin over 12 hours. The menthol and eucalyptus scent also provides a light, invigorating aroma that will help uplift you. Simply apply to the area of concern, day or night, you can apply them to your back, abdomen and even to your legs (it can take up to 30 minutes for them to start working) and then get dressed and carry on with your day. Incredibly discreet, easy to apply and remove (they don't hurt like normal plasters!), you'll wonder how you ever went without these before - watch out trusty hot water bottle, BeYou Patches are coming for your title. Finally, they're also vegan, cruelty-free and biodegradable too! What's not to love?
how_to_use: Step 1: Peel off the protective liner from the cuts in the middle. If you can, try not to touch the sticky back of the patch as it may reduce how effectively it sticks to your skin. Step 2: Place the patch uniformly over the area you want the cooling effect. You can apply your patch wherever makes you feel comfortable. Pro Tip: It can take 20-30mins before you start feeling the cooling sensation. Step 3: After using, peel the patch off slowly and throw in the bin! If you're worried about hair, just use some warm water to help! We always advise taking the patch off in the shower, once it has been wet and the adhesive has loosened up a little.
ingredient: Mentha x piperata (Menthol Oil), Eucalyptus globulus (Eucalyptus Oil), Tracaganth Gum Rosin Ester, Guar Gum Rosin Ester, Mineral Oil

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Duo+ SPF30 with Niacinamide 40ml La Roche-Posay Effaclar Duo+ SPF30 with Niacinamide 40ml
description: The Effaclar Duo+ SPF 30 takes the stress out of environmental exposure so it’s time to make this daily gel moisturiser your year-round hydrator, protector and anti-blemish treatment. Advanced protection is yours thanks to ‘Active Shield XL Protect’ guarding your skin against harmful UVA and UVB rays, Infrared light protection and a strong defence from the effects of pollution thanks to antioxidant carnosine. Not forgetting about those stubborn breakouts, clearer skin is on the horizon in as little as just four weeks thanks to a complex of LHA and our favourite skin-gredient niacinamide. These powerhouse actives work to gently exfoliate and unclog pores, reducing scarring left behind by blemishes and taking down inflammation to alleviate discomfort in sensitive, oily and problematic skin. It’s time to sit back, relax and let La Roche-Posay look after your complexion with this dual-action SPF treatment moisturiser.
how_to_use: Apply to the whole face and neck in circular motions. Avoid eye contour.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Octocrylene, Glycerin, Homosalate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Alcohol, Denat., Niacinamide, Butyl, Methoxydi B E Nzoylmethane, Dimethicone, Sorbitan Stearate, Silica, Isopropyllauroyl, Sarcosinate, Styrene/Acrylates.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Multi-Miracle Glow Charlotte Tilbury Multi-Miracle Glow
description: This Multi Miracle Glow balm is the ultimate does-everything skin care essential. Enriched with nourishing, organic ingredients, it makes a sensuous (effortless) cleansing balm, unctuous hydrating treatment and intensive, overnight mask to replenish moisture and recover skin's glow. With circulatory-boosting sea buckthorn seed oil, alongside cranberry seed, rosehip and camellia oils, this fortifies fragile skin and promotes 'stretch' to boost resilience, deflect free radicals and soothe any areas of irritation. The addition of vitamin E and frangipani extracts then combine to condition and calm inflammation.
how_to_use: Apply to a dry face, all over. Massage in and wash off. As an overnight regenerating facial mask: Fully cleanse as above, then apply a thin layer all over face, avoiding the eye contour. Massage in and leave on for 10 minutes, or overnight for best results, then wash off any excess. As a balm: Apply directly onto targeted area and massage in.

name: Lanolips The Original 101 Ointment Lanolips The Original 101 Ointment
description: A must-have for anyone with dry skin, chapped lips or for those wanting to defy dreaded ‘winter skin’, The Original 101 Ointment is the Lanolips’ original cult classic and the best place to start when discovering the brand. It’s enriched with pure lanolin, which has a unique molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture. Intensely hydrating, nourishing and 100% natural, this rescue ointment has 101 uses, providing immediate relief from everything from dry spots to sore cuticles and nasal passages. Dermatologically tested, this multitasking hero is vegetarian and baby friendly, cruelty-free and is free from ‘nasties’, making it an absolute no brainer. Want it to go further? Why not mix it in with your favourite daily hydrator to supercharge its skin-replenishing effects?
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25˚C.
ingredient: Original: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin Minty: Lanolin*, Aroma (Nat)*, Tocopheryl acetate (Vit E)*, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil*, Limonene* *naturally derived

name: Marvis Creamy Matcha Tea Toothpaste 75ml Marvis Creamy Matcha Tea Toothpaste 75ml
description: How do you like your tea? Some like theirs sweet, some like theirs hot and others like theirs green but have you thought about having yours… toothpaste’d? It’s time to open wide and embark on a whole new experience filled with excitement that your tastebuds will thank you (and us) for later. Marvis’ Tea Collection comes in 3 deliciously refreshing flavours that go above and beyond your regular drugstore toothpaste to leave you wanting more. Yes, of course it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape as you would expect from any toothpaste, but it doesn’t just stop there… Choose from ‘Blossom’, ‘Earl Grey’ and ‘Matcha’ tea flavours to kick-start your day with a delightful blend of Black Tea and flowers which create a fusion of fresh cheerfulness each time you brush your teeth! Housed in their luxuriously distinctive silver tube, elevate an otherwise menial task into a Marvi-lous one…
how_to_use: Squeeze a pea-size amount onto your toothbrush, add water, brush and rinse.

name: Megababe Le Tush Clarifying Butt Mask 200ml Megababe Le Tush Clarifying Butt Mask 200ml
description: Give body acne the boot-y with Megababe Le Tush Butt Mask. A facial-worthy blend of alpha hydroxy acids, plastic-free microbeads and clarifying clay, this targeted mask leaves bums baby smooth and spot-free. Slather onto cheeks (or anywhere else on your body that needs a little TLC) to smooth away bumps and roughness with a blend of exfoliating glycolic, malic and azelaic acids. Planet-friendly exfoliating beads join in on the resurfacing action, while kaolin clay and willow bark extract help to soothe and clear breakouts. Squalane and kelp extracts add a moisturising boost to leave your posterior feeling peachy soft.

Your skin is left feeling touchably soft and smooth, instantly invigorated and, thanks to the addition of soft rubber nodules, firmed with continued use.

name: Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion 250ml Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion 250ml
description: Love your Lancaster golden tan? What if you could prolong it for an endless summer sensation? Lancaster's Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion is specially developed for those who want to prolong their beautiful holiday tan while soothing their sun-exposed skin. Made with natural-origin buriti oil, Lancaster's Tan Activator Complex intensifies melanin production for a golden, even and long-lasting tan. Ticking all our boxes and more, this is heading straight into our holiday haul *adds to bag*.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml
description: Reactive skins rejoice! For La Roche-Posay have specifically formulated this treatment toner to help regulate oil without disrupting your skins natural balance. Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.
how_to_use: Apply toner gently with a damp cotton wool pad to the face and neck, morning and evening.

name: NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 50ml NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 50ml
description: A best-smelling must-have, Nuxe's Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil for Face, Body and Hair is a buffet of goodness for compromised skin - cherishing dry, scaly patches (and strengthening over-styled lengths!) with a medley of plant-derived oils. Completely non-greasy and quickly absorbed, this leaves a light lustre and works to replenish and comfort the scaliest limbs... A holiday hero (slather this all over post-sun skin), the blend of camellia, hazelnut, sweet almond, St. John's wort, macadamia and borage has impressive healing properties - working to elasticise and fortify while boosting moisture levels to promote a healthy glow. Rake through the ends of your hair to create a chic 'piecey-ness', smooth over shoulders or streak down the length of your shins to bestow an au naturel highlight. A multi-tasking wonder, there's a reason no routine should be without it.
how_to_use: Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® in the palm of your hand and add a drop of your usual moisturiser. Mix and apply to your skin using smoothing movements. Your face will be perfectly moisturised, and your skin softer and more supple. Apply to your shoulders, neckline, hands, or other areas that need attention. There is nothing quite like the unique quality of Huile Prodigieuse® to enhance the skin's texture in a single step. · In the palm of your hand, mix a drop of Huile Prodigieuse® with your foundation before applying: it will glide smoothly over your skin. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® on a natural bristle hairbrush for naturally controlled and radiantly shiny hair. Exposure to the sun leaves your skin feeling dehydrated and in need of special care and attention. There is nothing better than Huile Prodigieuse® to nourish and repair it. Ideal as a massage oil, Huile Prodigieuse® glides smoothly over your skin, infusing it with its divine fragrance. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® directly on your hair (from a distance of around 20 cm) and massage into your hair and scalp. Then wrap your head in a warm towel and leave for 15 to 20 minutes to allow Huile Prodigieuse® to penetrate before shampooing. Add a few drops of Huile Prodigieuse® to your bath water and drift away on its joyful and fragrant waves. A daily massage with Huile Prodigieuse® is ideal for alleviating stretch marks.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian 4-Play Shower Cream Gel (Various Sizes) Sol de Janeiro Brazilian 4-Play Shower Cream Gel (Various Sizes)

name: Pacifica Coconut Cream Clean Deodorant Pacifica Coconut Cream Clean Deodorant
description: Don’t sweat it. Arm your underarms with pure confidence, courtesy of the Coconut Cream Clean Deodorant. This aluminium-free formula glides on clear, never sticky, and it'll outlast your longest days while leaving you smelling like fresh coconut milk with a hint of vanilla. Using odour-fighting fermented enzymes as well as baking soda — an alkaline ingredient that battles the bacteria-loving acids found in sweat — Pacifica’s Coconut Cream Clean Deodorant will you keep you feeling comfortable, with added arrowroot powder to absorb sweat and keep you dry. Ideal for all skin types (sensitive underarms rejoice!), this sweet, sweat-deflecting formula will finetune your bodily functions without irritation.
how_to_use: Apply to underarms. Do not apply to broken skin. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. This pretty underarm deodorant comes with a #5 recyclable cap. When you’re done, make sure to clean out the remaining deodorant from the tube, and put both cap and tube in your mixed recyclables curb-side bin.

name: Tan-Luxe THE FACE Medium/Dark 10ml Tan-Luxe THE FACE Medium/Dark 10ml
description: A super-cute travel size version of TAN-LUXE’s The Face, these luxurious drops will take lifeless, lacklustre complexions to the beach and back – imparting an effortless, natural-looking glow when added to your existing skin care regime. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and aloe vera, every droplet of this miracle formula bronzes, boosts and fortifies skin’s fabric. A million miles away from the tell-tale ‘tangoed’ look of so many traditional fake tans, The Face Travel Size comes in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – to guarantee a realistic, streak-free finish. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle, it delivers even, luminous colour that can easily be customised by adding extra drops to your chosen skin care product. No smell. No fuss. No drama. Just glow and go.

Additional drops of the product will add depth of colour and glow to the final result. Wash hands thoroughly after application. Maintain Gently exfoliate skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow.

name: Paula's Choice Resist Super-Light Daily Wrinkle Defense SPF30 (60ml) Paula's Choice Resist Super-Light Daily Wrinkle Defense SPF30 (60ml)
description: A youth-boosting moisturiser suitable for oily, combination and blemish-prone skin, this lightweight formula is bound to become a firm favourite in your evening routine. Absorbing excess oil, it grants a soft matte finish with a sheer light tint – perfect for priming skin for make up. Also in the mix are a hardworking blend of antioxidants which combine to calm irritation, promote a more youthful complexion and protect against the harmful, ageing effects of free radicals. The formula also protects against the sun’s UVA and UVB rays, using mineral sunscreen zinc oxide – a gentle alternative to chemical sunscreens that’s suitable for easily upset, sensitive complexions. What’s not to love?

name: Bondi Sands Technocolor Application Mitt Bondi Sands Technocolor Application Mitt
description: Designed to pair with the innovative Bondi Sands Technocolour tanning range, the Bondi Sands Technocolour Application Mitt makes tell-tale orange palms and knuckles a thing of the past. This premium, double-sided mitt is made from a luxe velvety material to keep hands stain-free while ensuring a flawless tan. Featuring a thumb-grip for easy buffing and blending, sweep the mitt along limbs in long strokes and use in a circular motion over tricky-to-blend areas for a streak-free finish every time. Washable and reusable, simply rinse well and hang from the handy loop after each use.
how_to_use: For an even streak free tan, ensure your skin is clean, exfoliated and free of any moisturisers. Apply a desired amount of Bondi Sands product to the Application Mitt. Use a long, sweeping motion to apply product to legs, arms and body. Use remaining residue on mitt for face, elbows and knees. Rinse mitt with warm water and allow to dry thoroughly after every use.

name: SUNDAE Coconut Cream Whipped Shower Foam 260ml SUNDAE Coconut Cream Whipped Shower Foam 260ml
description: No, your eyes are not deceiving you… the Whipped Shower Foam from Sundae Body comes housed in a whipped cream-esque can, delivering a dose of fun to your shower — alongside, of course, a gently cleansing foam formula packed with nourishing ingredients. Refreshing and luxe, these shower foams refresh skin and wash away the day while enriching skin with vitamin C-filled kakadu plum to brighten and smooth, and finger lime, a natural source of exfoliating AHAs. Choose from a smorgasbord of delectable scents: ‘Very Vanilla’, a mix of vanilla bean, tonka bean, coconut milk and sandalwood; ‘Orange Crush’, with orange, mandarin, jasmine and melon; ‘Pomegranate Fizz’, featuring a cocktail of pomegranate, peach blossom and blackcurrant; ‘Coconut Cream’, with coconut, vanilla and sandalwood; ‘Cool Mint’, an energising blend of spearmint, peppermint and menthol; and finally, ‘Honey Honey’, a sweet mix of toffee, honey and maple syrup.

name: Gallinée Prebiotic Cleansing Bar Perfume Free Gallinée Prebiotic Cleansing Bar Perfume Free
description: Microbiome is more than a ‘skin thing’ – it’s everywhere – and when it comes to vaginas, they have a unique ecosystem that’s easily knocked out of kilter. Which is why Gallinée have created their Cleansing Bar Perfume-Free, For Intimate Hygiene – a gentle, biotic-laced cleanser that helps to respect the vaginal environment. Highly acidic (its pH is around ~3.5) and with little bacterial diversity, the vaginal microbiome – located on the vulva and the vagina – provides crucial defence from infection, which is why it’s important to keep it in sync. To maintain harmony you must ‘feed’ the lactobacillus lactic acid, which is why Gallinée have updated their bestselling cleansing bar to make it even more gentle and perfect for keeping your vaginal environs happy and balanced. Gynaecologist tested and soap-free, this is brimming with pre- and postbiotics to support the microbiome, alongside lactic acid to encourage ‘good’ bacteria to flourish. What’s more, it’s made with 90% nature-derived ingredients and without any fragrance, colourings, parabens, mineral oil, silicones or phenoxyethanol, it is equally perfect for babies or compromised skin that’s especially sensitive.
how_to_use: For external use only. Massage into damp skin and rinse.
ingredient: Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Maltodextrin, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Aqua (Water), Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Inulin, Lactic Acid, Arginine, Citric Acid, Titanium Dioxide.

name: PoshPeel PediCure Duo PoshPeel PediCure Duo
description: Combining two pairs of the PoshPeel PediCure booties into one set, this duo promises you baby-soft feet for even longer (no salon trip necessary!). Perfect for a pamper session, patchology’s PoshPeel PediCure features a potent AHA and BHA botanical blend of glycolic, salicylic, lactic and citric acids as well as botanical extracts, to not only brighten but exfoliate rough patches and dissolve dead skin cells to slowly reveal incredibly soft and happy feet. Simply pour this potent cocktail of ingredients into the sock, sit back for 60 – 90 minutes and let patchology’s ‘Activating Essence’ do all the hard work. Over three to seven days your feet will progressively peel to reveal baby-soft feet, free of rough patches and calluses.
how_to_use: Step 1: Pour the desired amount of Activating Essence into one of the Foot Masque Socks and evenly distribute along the inside of the cotton lining. Step 2: Place your foot inside the sock and seal with attached closure. Repeat for the other foot. Step 3: Wear for 60 minutes (or up to 90 minutes if greater exfoliation is desired). Step 4: Remove socks. Thoroughly rinse and dry feet. Progressive peeling action will take place over 3-7 days.

name: Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm - Coconutter 10g Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm - Coconutter 10g
description: A delicious reinvention of {The Original 101 Ointment}, Lanolips 101 Ointment Fruities are available in four ‘flavours’, each boasting its own good-to-skin benefits. There’s ‘Green Apple’, a vitamin and antioxidant-rich formula that naturally deflects harmful environmental elements and pollutants, ‘Strawberry’, which helps to slough away dead skin cells and reveal healthy, new skin thanks to the key addition of alpha-hydroxy acids; ‘Peach’, which helps to revive skin with its combination of vitamins and polyunsaturated fatty acids, ‘Coconutter’, which is boosted with vitamin E and is rich in antioxidants to make it ultra-hydrating and, finally, 'Watermelon', which is boosted with vitamin E and watermelon fruit extract to intensely hydrate. Each one is formulated with Ultra Medical Grade lanolin, which resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture unlike anything else and holds 200% of its weight in moisture. name: MALIN + GOETZ Eucalyptus Deodorant MALIN + GOETZ Eucalyptus Deodorant

Absorbs without residue, staining or irritation.

name: L'Occitane Almond Supple Skin Oil 100ml L'Occitane Almond Supple Skin Oil 100ml
description: Teeming with almond oil, this lightweight, but deeply nourishing, body oil helps to improve the appearance of your treasured skin while leaving it softer and smoother. A match made in oil heaven, L'Occitane's Almond Supple Skin Oil does exactly what it says on the bottle. Almond oil and camelina oil unite in this nourishing bottle of goodness to deliver a comforting dose of omegas 3 and 6 for a nourishing, replenishing dose of hydration. Ideal for tight, dry and lacklustre limbs, this melts into your skin to leave a satin-soft finish and all while letting its delectable almond scent wash over your senses.

name: Drunk Elephant T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion 240ml Drunk Elephant T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion 240ml
description: Supercharged with a 10% AHA blend of glycolic, tartaric, lactic and citric acids (the latter three give the blend its name!), the T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion effectively exfoliates dull, dry skin. A staple for scaly skin, this resurfacing treatment promotes smooth, luminous results. Replenishing as it resurfaces, this clever formula is loaded with a mix of antioxidant-rich, non-fragrant plant oils and butters — think green tea seed, passionfruit, apricot, marula, and shea— to soothe and deeply moisturise dry, irritated skin. A helping of squalane, vitamin F, sodium hyaluronate and niacinamide then helps to encourage a stronger, healthier acid mantle, leaving your skin more equipped to defend against environmental stressors. A must for compromised skin, the lotion even boosts the production of vital natural moisturising factors — like ceramides and cholesterol — that keep skin soft and supple.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin once per day. Those new to AHA exfoliation may want to start slowly, using T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion every other day for the first week of application. Note: Slight tingling may be experienced, particularly for the first few days of application. This typically dissipates as your skin becomes adjusted. May be mixed with Sili™ Body Lotion for a milder exfoliation experience. WARNING: Use only as directed. Avoid eye contact. Discontinue use immediately if irritation occurs and consult a physician. Use a sunscreen daily while using this product and for a week after ceasing use. Product’s contact with skin must be of limited frequency or duration. Do not use on broken skin. Drunk Elephant don’t recommend using T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion the same day as shaving. Consider sticking to one form of exfoliation — physical or chemical — per day (or as often as you find works for you). Try alternating T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion with Sugared Koffie Scrub. Great for smoothing rough, bumpy areas on the body, from your décolleté to your derrière.

name: Le Labo Deodorant Le Labo Deodorant
description: A lightweight, long-lasting roll-on, Le Labo’s Deodorant helps to keep underarms fresh, dry and pleasantly scented. Made with plant-derived glycerin to comfort skin and minimise the risk of irritation after shaving, this soothing and balancing blend is abundant with nourishing vitamin E, antioxidants and mineral salts to absorb any odour-causing bacteria. Free from aluminium and delicately scented with a clean, invigorating blend of bergamot, lavender, violet and tonka bean, this is perfect for discerning gentlemen and gentlewomen.

description: Experience a sun-kissed Australian tan every time with Bondi Sands Self Tanning Foam. Perfect for those with light to medium complexions – or first time tanners! – this versatile self tanner can be left on for a minimum of one hour, all the way up to six hours to help you customise your perfect faux glow. A Bondi Sands cult classic, the brand's Self Tanning Foam is a must-have for new and veteran tanners alike. Thanks to the customisable formula, you can leave this natural-looking formula on skin from one to six hours to achieve your perfect finish. Enriched with aloe vera and laced with a sumptuous coconut aroma, this lightweight self-tanning foam will leave your skin glowing like you've spent the day (or week!) on Bondi Beach itself.

name: Kopari Beauty Body Bumps Be Gone 250ml Kopari Beauty Body Bumps Be Gone 250ml
description: If you’ve ever experienced keratosis pilaris you’ll know it’s a normal if annoying skin condition that manifests as bumps across your body. The brains behind Kopari Beauty know all too well how frustrating they can be, that’s why they’ve introduced Body Bumps Be Gone: a body scrub that’s powered by alpha hydroxy acids to refine the texture of your limbs. The gentle-yet-effective vegan body scrub is designed to help reduce the appearance of dry, rough patches and tiny bumps, known as keratosis pilaris (KP). How? It’s powered by a 10% AHA cocktail of glycolic (5.5%) and lactic (4.5%) acids which works to loosen dead skin cells and refine the surface of your skin, promoting a smooth-to-the-touch finish. That’s not all, volcanic sand, fine coconut shells and pumice also gently exfoliate and purify your pores while antioxidant-packed green tea extract soothes and jojoba seed oil hydrates skin.
how_to_use: Apply onto wet skin and gently massage with fingertips onto problem areas. Rinse and pat dry. Use 2 times a week for optimal results. Not intended for facial use. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Anyone can use this product. A patch test is recommended for those with sensitive skin. Sunburn Alert: This product contains Glycolic and Lactic Acids that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

name: HELLO KLEAN Shower Filter HELLO KLEAN Shower Filter
description: It only takes having a shower in a different part of the country to notice just how much of an effect water has on your skin and strands. That's why the minds behind HELLO KLEAN created their fan-favourite Shower Filter... Though hard water is just freshwater infused with minerals that offer health benefits, those same minerals - like calcium, magnesium, iron, nickel and copper - can prevent the surfactants in your shampoo from lathering, and contribute to buildup. Effectively capturing those minerals that can dry your skin and give way to soap scum, as well as filtering bacteria, impurities and chlorine, this screw-on filter (don't be deterred, it's super easy to fit) effectively improves the quality of the water flowing over you so you can enjoy smoother, softer skin and hair. How does it work? The sleek tool has stainless mesh to capture sand and other sediments; calcium sulfite to remove chlorine; KDF 55 to target minerals and residual chlorine; granular activated carbon to remove bacteria, mould and odours; finally, ceramic beads help to balance your shower water's pH level. We've never been more ready to dive in the shower...
how_to_use: No plumber or tools needed. Installation in just two minutes... Remove the white and blue caps, then unscrew your shower hose from the tap. Attach the filter to the bottom of your shower tap. Then re-attach your shower hose. Tighten both sides to prevent leakage. Run your shower water for 1 minute and that's it.
ingredient: Ingredients: Calcium Sulfite, KDF 55, Granular Activated Carbon, Ceramic Beads (Zeolite, Tourmaline, FIR) Filter Case Material: Aluminum Capsule Case Material: ABS Recyclable Plastic Filter Dimensions: 65.5mm X 180mm Capsule Dimensions: 50mm X 115mm Product Weight: 450 grams Entry and Exit Valve: 1/2" thread Flow Rate: 8 liters per minute

name: Alpha-H Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment with Glycolic Acid 100ml Alpha-H Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment with Glycolic Acid 100ml
description: Starring 5% nature-derived glycolic acid (it comes from sugar cane), the Liquid Gold with 5% Glycolic Acid harnesses the cell-stimulating and exfoliating properties of alpha hydroxy acids, which melt the 'glue' that binds dulling dead cells to skin's surface, revealing the healthy 'new' skin cells beneath. What's more, by lowering skin's pH (from 5.5 to around 3), this overnight treatment stimulates cellular activity — accelerating the repair and renewal processes, as skin works hard to re-establish equilibrium. It bolsters synthesis of elastin and collagen (the 'scaffolding' that keeps skin firm), while penetrating deep within pores to eradicate spot-causing bacteria, all while the resurfacing action helps to diminish visibility of post-blemish scars, dark spots and brown patches, so your complexion quickly looks more even-toned and luminous. It's a must-have for anyone concerned with premature skin ageing, sun damage or problem skin conditions — just build up skin's tolerance gradually (to minimise redness). Apply with a dampened cotton pad, once a week for 2–3 weeks while skin acclimatises, then build up to 3 'neat' applications a week for maximum skin-brightening benefit.
how_to_use: Apply to cleansed skin every other night. Moisten the cotton pad with solution and apply evenly over the face, neck and decollete, avoiding your eye and lip area. For an intensive treatment leave on overnight without applying a night cream over the top. Always use a daily sunscreen with an SPF of at least factor 15 when using resurfacing products.
ingredient: Aqua, Alcohol Denat, Glycolic Acid (5%), Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Silk, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Extract.

There’s hyaluronic acid and glycerin, both of which are effective humectants; that means they slurp up water from the air and hold it within your skin, flooding it with hydration in the process. description: A multipurpose stick that provides SPF protection and convenience all in one, Hello Sunday’s The Take-Out One - Invisible Sun Stick SPF30 is perfect for top-ups on-the-go – seamlessly fitting into pockets and bags, and cleverly encouraging you to stay safe, no matter where you are or what you’re doing. A delightfully refreshing scent of lime, geranium and mint make this a feast for the olfactory senses as well as your skin, with a completely invisible finish (white casts are so passé) that glides over your body with zero residue. Ideal for applying and reapplying even over make up, this stick is equipped with broad spectrum SPF 30 – offering protection against both UVA and UVB rays. But a simple SPF this is not – fortified with hyaluronic acid and a medley of nourishing oils, this formula ensures skin is always moisturised and glowy too.
how_to_use: Swipe over skin for swift sun protection. Reapply every two hours.

name: Kopari Beauty Tahitian Vanilla Hydrating Body Wash 266ml Kopari Beauty Tahitian Vanilla Hydrating Body Wash 266ml
description: Step aside supermarket shower gel because this vegan body wash employs the hardest-working, hydrating ingredients, making it the ideal shower staple for skin in need of a big gulp of water. Powered by coconut, this gel-based formula is teeming with electrolytes and amino acids to replenish hydration levels to their maximum level. As it lathers to a rich foam, sea kelp delivers antioxidants and vitamins A, B, C and E to bolster hydration and protect your skin from free radicals, respectively. Plus, this concoction infuses aloe vera juice to smooth and calm skin. The conclusion? This tropical trio is just the thing you need to cleanse away the day without stripping your skin. Once you step out of the shower, expect to continue stealing the show as the luxurious scent of warm Tahitian vanilla — think: buttery cream goodness — follows your (now ultra-clean) footsteps.

name: St. Tropez Dual Sided Luxe Tanning Applicator Mitt St. Tropez Dual Sided Luxe Tanning Applicator Mitt
description: This soft, sponge mitt with a water-resistant barrier ensures your favourite St.Tropez faux glow formula glides across seamlessly for a streak-free and even finish you’ll absolutely adore. Perfect for using with mousse, lotion or spray, this easy-to-use mitt evenly distributes products across skin without absorbing product. Featuring a handy water-resistant barrier, this mitt also ensures no product soaks through and stains your hands too. Simply spritz or pump your chosen faux glow onto the mitt and work into the skin in circular motions.

name: Megababe The Cream Deo Daily Deodorant with Odor-Blocking AHAs 88ml Megababe The Cream Deo Daily Deodorant with Odor-Blocking AHAs 88ml
description: Offering a natural defence against odour, ingrown hairs and uneven skin tone, Megababe’s The Cream Deo is an unusual cream-texture deodorant that’s about to earn a spot in your morning essentials line up. What makes this deodorant so special? It all comes down to 5% AHAs (a mix of mandelic and lactic acids). These work to create a slightly acidic pH level on your pits, helping to block odour-causing bacteria while also declogging pores to gently prevent and treat ingrown hairs and pimples. And to help keep that sensitive skin smooth and soft, there’s also a blend of niacinamide, squalane and vitamin E. Finish that all off with a light scent of mint and tea tree for long-lasting freshness — all without aluminium, parabens, phthalates or sulfates.
how_to_use: Squeeze a thin layer directly onto clean, dry pits. Apply daily as often as needed. As with any aluminum-free deodorant, some wetness is normal. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun & particularly the possibility of sunburn. When outdoors, use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing & limit sun exposure.

name: Pacifica Coconut & Charcoal Underarm Detox Scrub Pacifica Coconut & Charcoal Underarm Detox Scrub
description: When transitioning to a natural deodorant, your underarms can often ‘purge’. By purge, we mean sweat more, which is why Pacifica has created the Coconut & Charcoal Underarm Detox Scrub; to help you glide through the awkward detox stage by swiftly unclogging skin. When you begin to use a natural deodorant for the first time, your body releases built-up toxins before stabilising. This process can make you feel sweaty and uncomfortable, which is why this scrub uses gently exfoliating charcoal, antioxidant-rich green tea and soothing coconut to help unclog your pores and bring skin back into balance.
how_to_use: Massage onto your underarm area in a circular motion. Rinse well. Follow with natural deodorant. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. This pretty container is made from PCR (Post Consumer Recycled) plastic. Recycle it again by dropping it in your nearest recycling bin.

name: Supergoop! Sheerscreen + (RE)Setting Powder : Mineral SPF Lover Duo (Worth £62.00) Supergoop! Sheerscreen + (RE)Setting Powder : Mineral SPF Lover Duo (Worth £62.00)
description: Meet the mineral sunscreens that are changing the name of the SPF game... Supergoop!’s perfectly partnered mineral formulas will keep your skin shielded from sun damage without a hint of greasy residue or an unpleasant chalky finish. Introducing the Mineral Sheerscreen SPF 30, a super sheer, reef-friendly and non-chalky formula that can be worn alone or under make up to keep your skin protected no matter what your day holds. While ‘sheer doesn’t mean completely ‘clear’, this has been innovatively formulated with a web-like structure that suspends non-nano zinc oxide into a matrix. But what does that mean you might well ask? This results in a formula that can stretch and adapt leaving it ultra-lightweight in finish and feel. Protecting your skin from blue-light induced damage is blush clover extract, harvested in South Korea and revered for its medicinal properties this keeps skin safe from oxidative stress. To ensure your complexion stays protected all day long, look no further than the (Re)Setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30. Your simple, easy-to-use solution for on-the-go SPF touch ups - while also offering all the skin-blurring, perfecting and mattifying power of a finishing powder. This SPF hero will lock your make up in place without a hint of cakiness and all while keeping your skin protected. All of our mineral SPF dreams have just come true...
how_to_use: Mineral Sheerscreen SPF 30: Apply generously and evenly as the last step in your skincare routine, before makeup and 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply frequently to maintain protection, especially after perspiring, swimming, or towelling. (Re)Setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30: Remove the cap and slide down the clear plastic sleeve. Remove and discard the plastic yellow pin at the centre of the brush. Twist the body of the brush from the CLOSED position to OPEN. Tilt and tap the brush gently against your wrist until you see the powder start to flow through the bristles. When your makeup is ready to go, brush the powder generously over your face to set the look and mattify your skin. Reapply throughout the day as needed. To close, twist the body of the brush from the OPEN position to CLOSED, pull up the clear plastic sleeve and snap the cap back on.
ingredient: Mineral Sheerscreen SPF 30: Active ingredients: Zinc Oxide 17.5%. Inactive ingredients: Water, Isododecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Propanediol, Glycerin, Squalane, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Polyglycerin-3, Polyglyceryl-3 Lactate/Laurate, Polysilicone-11, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Butylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Isostearic Acid, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Citric Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Lespedeza Capitata Leaf/Stem Extract, Maltodextrin, Sodium Hyaluronate. description: It’s time to scrub up your body care rituals! Naturally scented with uplifting aromatherapeutic essential oils, Biossance’s Squalane + Enzyme Sugar Body Scrub is here to smooth, soften and hydrate your limbs without stripping your skin. It relies on both physical and enzymatic exfoliation to ensure baby-soft results: sugar crystals gently buff and polish dead cells from your skin’s outermost layer while pomegranate enzymes break down the bonds between dead skin cells. In a 14-day consumer study of 37 women, aged 18-50, 100% agreed the product reduced the appearance of bumpy skin, uneven texture, and flakiness after two weeks and 100% agreed that skin appeared brighter after two weeks.
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply to damp skin and gently massage using circular motions. Adjust level of exfoliation by using less water for a stronger scrub or more water for milder exfoliation.

description: No, your eyes are not deceiving you… the Whipped Shower Foam from Sundae Body comes housed in a whipped cream-esque can, delivering a dose of fun to your shower — alongside, of course, a gently cleansing foam formula packed with nourishing ingredients. Refreshing and luxe, these shower foams refresh skin and wash away the day while enriching skin with vitamin C-filled kakadu plum to brighten and smooth, and finger lime, a natural source of exfoliating AHAs. Choose from a smorgasbord of delectable scents: ‘Very Vanilla’, a mix of vanilla bean, tonka bean, coconut milk and sandalwood; ‘Orange Crush’, with orange, mandarin, jasmine and melon; ‘Pomegranate Fizz’, featuring a cocktail of pomegranate, peach blossom and blackcurrant; ‘Coconut Cream’, with coconut, vanilla and sandalwood; ‘Cool Mint’, an energising blend of spearmint, peppermint and menthol; and finally, ‘Honey Honey’, a sweet mix of toffee, honey and maple syrup.

name: Frank Body Cacao Coffee Scrub 200g Frank Body Cacao Coffee Scrub 200g
description: As if we needed another reason to love chocolate, frank bodys Cacao Coffee Scrub comes along and sweeps us off our (very soft, smooth and hydrated) feet. A concoction of natural, vegan and cruelty-free ingredients, it not only smells delish, it treats dry, dull and scarred skin too. Roasted coffee grinds make up the exfoliating base, gently removing dead skin cells while improving blood flow and stimulating collagen production. The irresistible chocolatey scent comes from organic cacao extract, which is packed with antioxidants to nourish, protect and grant a radiant glow. Specially formulated to hydrate skin as well as exfoliate, the scrub contains cold pressed macadamia and sweet almond oils to replenish moisture and gently fade scarring or marks. To say were obsessed is an understatement!

description: Wishing a bom dia to your skin from head to toe, the Bom Dia Body Scrub delivers facial-like results but to your body. Powered by 10% AHA and BHA ingredients, this sweet-smelling remedy for rough, textured skin (strawberry skin, we’re talking to you) unlocks all-over suppleness. A blend of vitamin-dense plant extracts – think: green tea, pomegranate and goji among others – add their antioxidant properties to the mix, soothing any upsets, fading red marks and defending against environmental stressors. Perfect for wearing the daytime, this multi-tasking hero comes in both full (60ml) and travel (15ml) sizes – perfect for on-the-go or trialling before investing in the full size.

Then you need to meet Davines’ Energizing Shampoo, formulated with caffeine phytoceuticals, this hard-working formula stimulates circulation and improves elasticity, preventing further or future hair loss with continued use. name: St. Tropez Express Bronzing Mousse 200ml St. Tropez Express Bronzing Mousse 200ml
description: Calling all glow-getters! Got a last-minute event, constantly on-the-glow or if the sun has suddenly surprised you and you want a tan to match, this is the answer to your glowy prayers. St.Tropez’s Self Tan Express Advanced Bronzing Mousse is a fast-acting mousse that develops into a sun-kissed glow after just one hour, a medium glow tan in just two hours or a deep, dark bronze after three! Allowing you to control the depth and time spent waiting for a gorgeously glowy tan, this intelligent formula is a must-have for faux glow aficionados and learners alike. Like all St.Tropez products, this Self Tan Express Advanced Bronzing Mousse is incredibly easy-to-use and guarantees and flawless and streak-free application that is long-lasting, scentless and is also vegan-friendly.
how_to_use: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturise any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles and feet. Step 2: For best results, apply using our Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the Mitt over your hands and feet. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Allow 1, 2 or 3 hours depending on your desired shade, before showering to reveal your developed tan. Your tan will then continue to develop for up to 8 hours. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as desired.

name: SUMMER FRIDAYS Pool Time Glowing Body Oil SUMMER FRIDAYS Pool Time Glowing Body Oil
description: Lightweight yet luxurious in texture, indulge in this shimmering body oil to nourish skin and bestow a lit-from-within glow. Thanks to macadamia, jojoba, apricot kernel and sunflower oils, this body delivers the heavy-hitters of long-lasting hydration to keep your skin soft and supple as you dip in and out of the pool. Speaking of water, you know that glistening effect that happens when the sun is hitting the beads of H20 left on your skin? Well, this body oil mimics exactly that with its ultra-fine minerals that reveal a light, sun-kissed glow. It also contains antioxidant-rich vitamin E to combat skin-damaging free radicals. name: Summer Fridays Babymoon Belly Balm 150ml Summer Fridays Babymoon Belly Balm 150ml
description: This body balm is one to smooth on generously to indulge in all that is rich, soft and intensely moisturising. If you’ve got a little one on the way, your rounded belly is about to get a whole lot more supple and soft. Don’t be shy when using the Babymoon Belly Balm, this luxurious cream is intended to melt into skin whenever and wherever its crying out for more hydration. With a vegan formula that’s filled with nourishing sunflower, avocado and olive oils, these highly-loved healthy ingredients are just as vital in your caesar salad as they are in your moisturising regime. Just a simple swatch of this balm gets to work on increasing elasticity, making it a great fit for overstretched skin and lending a little TLC to your proud tiger stripe stretch marks.

name: Megababe Body Dust Top-to-Toe Powder 170g Megababe Body Dust Top-to-Toe Powder 170g
description: Skin-soothing and talc-free, this is your secret weapon against the dreaded grey t-shirt marks that usually keep your arms firmly by your sides…you can finally wave your hands in the air like you just don’t care and without the fear of saturated clothing! Absorbing moisture in an instant, this body powder can be used from top-to-toe to keep sweat from saturating your shoes and seeping into your favourite item of clothing. Lightly scented with lavender and a skin-soothing infusion of aloe and chamomile you can shake away sweat stains and get back to enjoying your hot gal summer uninterrupted.

name: The Nue Co. Magnesium Ease 60ml The Nue Co. Magnesium Ease 60ml
description: Relieve muscle tension and feel your stress melt away with The Nue Co.’s sublime Magnesium Ease, a lavender and arnica-infused magnesium body spray. Alkalising the body, magnesium helps to restore the body’s natural pH balance, reducing lactic acid, which is partly responsible for Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness (aka, post-exercise pain!) A necessary electrolyte for proper hydration, magnesium also helps to hydrate the body, minimising tightness and cramping. Used medicinally for centuries, arnica oil is great for treating the pain and swelling associated with bruises, aches, pains and sprains, while lavender oil imparts a blissful, tension-relieving scent. Three sprays will deliver 40 mg of magnesium absorbed through the skin, best sprayed directly onto areas of tension such as wrists, soles of feet, backs of knees of for general relaxation. Great at your desk, before bed, or when you’re stuck on a plane.
how_to_use: Apply 1-3 sprays to dry skin and massage in
ingredient: Water, Magnesium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate/Sebacate*, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate/Caprate*, Lavender Oil, Arnica Oil, Dehydroacetic acid, Benzyl alcohol * Sound scary, but they're actually naturally derived solubilisers which help the oils blend with the water

name: Weleda Sea Buckthorn Creamy Body Wash 200ml Weleda Sea Buckthorn Creamy Body Wash 200ml
description: Infused with an invigorating, zesty scent, Weleda's Seabuckthorn Creamy Body Wash works into a light, luxurious lather to gently refresh your skin. Celebrating a swathe of sun-soaked ingredients - from oranges and mandarins to grapefruits - this refreshing wash disperses notes of summer from within your shower. It's made with ultra-mild, sugar-based surfactants - one of which is derived from nourishing coconut oil - to create a refreshing, light foam that lifts away dirt and grime without stripping your skin. The vegan-friendly formula is also infused with vitamin-rich sea buckthorn seed oil to deeply pamper your skin. What's not to love?

name: AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion
description: Designed to exfoliate and condition the skin, the Transforming Body Lotion from AMELIORATE is enriched with lactic acid to help gently remove dead cells and refine the appearance of pores. Featuring a unique blend of the brand’s LaH6 skin hydration complex, alpha hydroxy therapy and sweet almond oil, the potent formula delivers smoothness and suppleness. 87% agreed that the appearance of their skin had improved and felt softer and smoother*. Formulated with a lightweight, fast-absorbing texture, the everyday body lotion seeks to promote a smoother-looking and more radiant complexion. *Tested on 77 people with rough, dry, bumpy ‘chicken skin’ in a 4-week independent consumer trial.
