name: Kitsch Satin Pillowcase (Various Colours) Kitsch Satin Pillowcase (Various Colours)
description: The ultimate multitasking hero, this Satin Pillowcase is far from your usual bedtime headrest. The satin material allows you to wake up with hair thats *almost* as sleek-looking as the pillowcase itself, plus, this magical maverick is both hydrating and anti-aging for your precious skin. So good it doesnt sound real: the Satin Pillowcase wont tug or damage your strands as you sleep, keeping your hair frizz-free and looking silky smooth with envious shine. But thats not all the material has also been designed to both hydrate and age-defy for a well-rested, youthful appearance. This night time necessity comes in neutral colours black, silver, blush and jazzier options like leopard print ivory, white terrazzo and champagne butterfly so you can match your pillowcase to your bed sheets every time.
how_to_use: Switch out your regular pillowcase with your chosen Kitsch pillowcase.
ingredient: Silver, Blush and Leopard Printed: 100% polyester. Ivory, Black, White Terrazzo, Champagne Butterfly: 100% polyester satin.

name: SUNDAE Body Green Tea Exfoliating Whipped Shower Foam with Kakadu Plum and Finger Lime 260ml SUNDAE Body Green Tea Exfoliating Whipped Shower Foam with Kakadu Plum and Finger Lime 260ml
description: No, your eyes are not deceiving you... the Whipped Shower Foam from Sundae Body comes housed in a whipped cream-esque can, delivering a dose of fun to your shower - alongside, of course, a gently cleansing foam formula packed with nourishing ingredients. Refreshing and luxe, these shower foams refresh skin and wash away the day while enriching skin with vitamin C-filled kakadu plum to brighten and smooth, and finger lime, a natural source of exfoliating AHAs. Choose from a smorgasbord of delectable scents: 'Very Vanilla', a mix of vanilla bean, tonka bean, coconut milk and sandalwood; 'Orange Crush', with orange, mandarin, jasmine and melon; 'Pomegranate Fizz', featuring a cocktail of pomegranate, peach blossom and blackcurrant; 'Coconut Cream', with coconut, vanilla and sandalwood; 'Cool Mint', an energising blend of spearmint, peppermint and menthol; 'Green Tea', a glycolic acid-infused exfoliating formula to clear out clogged pores, and finally, 'Honey Honey', a sweet mix of toffee, honey and maple syrup.

Choose from a smorgasbord of delectable scents: 'Very Vanilla', a mix of vanilla bean, tonka bean, coconut milk and sandalwood; 'Orange Crush', with orange, mandarin, jasmine and melon; 'Pomegranate Fizz', featuring a cocktail of pomegranate, peach blossom and blackcurrant; 'Coconut Cream', with coconut, vanilla and sandalwood; 'Cool Mint', an energising blend of spearmint, peppermint and menthol; and finally, 'Honey Honey', a sweet mix of toffee, honey and maple syrup.

name: Murad City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF50 PA ++++ 50ml Murad City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF50 PA ++++ 50ml
description: Your first line of defence between skin and the adverse effects of the plagues-of-the-age, Murad’s City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 works to deflect the five primary causes of damage. Doing daily battle against UV rays, pollution and even blue light from our screens, skin had a lot to contend with – which is why Murad have developed a featherlight ‘force field’ to shield from the everyday onslaught. This advanced, fragrance free, 100% mineral sunscreen provides high factor, SPF 50 protection from the ageing effects of UVA and UVA rays – one of the primary contributing factors to fine lines and dark spots – while a polymer matrix forms a breathable ‘second skin’ that inhibits adhesion (and hence, penetration) of toxins. name: NUXE Sun Tanning Oil Face and Body SPF 30 (150ml) NUXE Sun Tanning Oil Face and Body SPF 30 (150ml)
description: Designed for face and body, this fast-absorbing product delivers low protection to enhance your natural tan, while leaving your skin with the most beautiful satin finish. Formulated with Nuxe's patented filtering complex - this SPF30 contains three sunscreens and two esters, which have been rigorously selected for their proven effectiveness on all UV rays (think: short UVB + UVA + long UVA.) A botanical blend of rice and rosemary extracts is also used to offer cellular protection and ensure your skin maintains a more youthful-looking appearance. This clean formula has been tested on algae and corals to ensure its non-toxic for marine life, and has a non-greasy texture that absorbs instantly and leaves a satin finish that enhances your tan. As for the scent? Nuxe has bottled the dreamy spirit of summer with tantalising notes of sweet orange, tiare flower and vanilla.
how_to_use: Apply product generously before sun exposure. Spray the product into your hands before applying to your face, avoiding the eye area. On the body, you can spray it directly before spreading it carefully. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying your skin. Note: Applying an insufficient amount of product will significantly reduce the level of sun protection. Excessive exposure to the sun is dangerous and sun care products do not provide 100% protection. Avoid exposure to the sun in the middle of the day.

name: HELLO KLEAN Shower Filter Refill Capsule HELLO KLEAN Shower Filter Refill Capsule
description: Keep your {Shower Filter} on top form by replacing the inner capsule ever 3-4 months with one of these handy Shower Filter Refills. Just as you stock up on shampoo and body wash when they run low, you can tell when you need a replacement filter if you notice a significant reduction in water flow - a key sign of accumulated sediment. While each capsule's lifecycle can fluctuate depending on the level of free chlorine, the hardness or pH balance of your water and how often your shower, as a general rule of thumb HELLO KLEAN suggest switching them up every 3-4 months or after 13,000 litres of water, whichever comes first! Designed to improve the quality of your water so you can enjoy smoother, softer skin and hair, this filter has stainless mesh to capture sand and other sediments; calcium sulfite to remove chlorine; KDF 55 to target minerals and residual chlorine; granular activated carbon to remove bacteria, mould and odours; finally, ceramic beads help to balance your shower water's pH level. We've never been more ready to dive in the shower...
how_to_use: Detach your filter from your shower hose and unscrew the lid before replacing the existing capsule with your new one.
ingredient: Calcium Sulfite, KDF 55, Granular Activated Carbon, Ceramic Beads (Zeolite, Tourmaline, FIR)

name: Kosas Good Body Skin AHA + Enzyme Exfoliating Body Wash 270ml Kosas Good Body Skin AHA + Enzyme Exfoliating Body Wash 270ml
description: Why let your face have all the fun? The Good Body Skin AHA + Enzyme Exfoliating Wash brings active skin care to your body with exfoliating alpha hydroxy acids and fruit enzymes. Doing way more than just cleaning your skin, this supercharged body wash uses an exfoliating blend of glycolic, lactic and mandelic acids, plus papaya and pineapple enzymes to swiftly unclog pores, smooth texture and fight body blemishes. Suitable for daily use, this vegan elixir doesn’t irritate skin — instead, it moisturises and conditions limbs with soothing allantoin. Taking skin from dull, flaky and bumpy to smooth and soft, it supports total skin health with an ideal pH of 5.0. This ensures your barrier is never stripped of moisture, and makes it ideal for even sensitive skin types. Plus, a natural cocktail of jasmine, orange flower, vanilla and vetiver will turn your shower into a well-deserved vacay…
how_to_use: Get naked and apply all over the body. Massage for rich lather and rinse well.

A treat for your senses, this revitalising shower gel combines this coveted scent with refreshing orange, geranium and lemon tree essential oils to transform your mood and melt away life's stresses. name: Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm Green Apple 10g Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm Green Apple 10g
description: A delicious reinvention of {The Original 101 Ointment}, Lanolips 101 Ointment Fruities are available in four ‘flavours’, each boasting its own good-to-skin benefits. name: Dizziak Body Conditioner 200ml Dizziak Body Conditioner 200ml
description: So much more than your average body lotion, DIZZIAK’s Body Conditioner nourishes skin while adding sumptuous sheen. Ultra-rich and luxurious, the formula cocktails a bunch of hydration powerhouses — think: shea butter, inca inchi and glycerin — while treating skin to soothing allantoin and aloe vera, plus antioxidant-rich vitamin E to protect you from the elements. name: Lancaster Sun Beauty Body Milk SPF30 175ml Lancaster Sun Beauty Body Milk SPF30 175ml
description: Enriched with antioxidant-rich oils, Lancaster's Body Milk SPF30 (175ml) encourages a faster, deeper tan while defending against UVA/UVB rays and infrared to keep you safe in the sun. Experience broad spectrum sun protection with Lancaster's Body Milk SPF30, the Monaco-based brand, fortifies its innovative sun care with Full Light Technology, which protects skin against UVA/UVB rays and infrared so you can enjoy the weather without any fear. Lightweight and quick-absorbing, this lusciously formulated milk also features the brand's breakthrough Tan Activator Complex (T.A.C.) combining orange, coffee and antioxidant-rich buriti oil to encourage a faster, deeper tan, whilst promoting firmness and elasticity. name: EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF 50 100ml EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF 50 100ml
description: Easy to apply, rapidly absorbable and never sticky or greasy, the lightweight Sunscreen Mousse SPF 50 works with the epidermis to deliver both immediate and lasting protection against UVA and UVB rays for up to six hours! Exceptionally water-resistant and without any parabens, nanoparticles or perfumes, this formula is ideal for sensitive and delicate skin. Sitting pretty under make up with its quick drying-time and invisible, matte finish, this hydrating mousse protects against premature ageing and dehydration via a medley of vitamins C and E. Added collagen and silk extracts also ward against and repair skin damage, which - since your skin is kept hydrated and protected against sunburn - allows the melanin in your skin to develop into a rich tan that lasts. A boon for heliophiles and those with active lifestyles, it actually forms an innovative protective barrier that mimics your skin's natural defences - providing extraordinary protection without clogging pores or sitting on the surface of your skin. Budge-proof (even when rubbing skin with a towel!) and lasting twice as long as cream formulas, this marvel can also be used on scalps if you have thin hair - or even on parched hair itself to protect it from dehydrating.

A high concentration of active ingredients delivers a darker, natural olive toned tan in just one layer, and with built-in colour guide technology you can forget about tanning mishaps. Using circular motions, apply mousse directly to your body, blending as you go to ensure even coverage. Allow sixty seconds before dressing. Avoid perspiration or water while the tan develops. Finally shower off after two hours to reveal a gorgeous, natural tan. For best results apply to clean, dry and exfoliated skin.

description: A best-smelling must-have, Nuxe's Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil for Face, Body and Hair is a buffet of goodness for compromised skin - cherishing dry, scaly patches (and strengthening over-styled lengths!) with a medley of plant-derived oils. A holiday hero (slather this all over post-sun skin), the blend of camellia, hazelnut, sweet almond, St. John's wort, macadamia and borage has impressive healing properties - working to elasticise and fortify while boosting moisture levels to promote a healthy glow. Your face will be perfectly moisturised, and your skin softer and more supple. Apply to your shoulders, neckline, hands, or other areas that need attention. There is nothing quite like the unique quality of Huile Prodigieuse® to enhance the skin's texture in a single step. · In the palm of your hand, mix a drop of Huile Prodigieuse® with your foundation before applying: it will glide smoothly over your skin. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® on a natural bristle hairbrush for naturally controlled and radiantly shiny hair. Exposure to the sun leaves your skin feeling dehydrated and in need of special care and attention. There is nothing better than Huile Prodigieuse® to nourish and repair it. Ideal as a massage oil, Huile Prodigieuse® glides smoothly over your skin, infusing it with its divine fragrance. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® directly on your hair (from a distance of around 20 cm) and massage into your hair and scalp. Then wrap your head in a warm towel and leave for 15 to 20 minutes to allow Huile Prodigieuse® to penetrate before shampooing. Add a few drops of Huile Prodigieuse® to your bath water and drift away on its joyful and fragrant waves. A daily massage with Huile Prodigieuse® is ideal for alleviating stretch marks.

name: The Ordinary Ethylated Ascorbic Acid 15% Solution The Ordinary Ethylated Ascorbic Acid 15% Solution
description: Vitamin C derivatives are renowned for their skin-brightening, tone-evening abilities – but they’re notoriously difficult to keep stable. This exceptionally stable solution is water-free and features an ‘ethylated’ (a science-y term for a compound in which the hydrogen of an alcohol is replaced by a metallic atom, usually sodium or potassium) form of ascorbic acid, which acts directly like vitamin C, allowing for faster, more visible results and a much better stability profile than any known direct-acting form of vitamin C. Boosting skin’s radiance and appearance of healthy, The Ordinary’s Ethylated Ascorbic Acid 15% Solution will brighten your skin and even out its tone, minimising the appearance of dark spots and pigmentation. The Ordinary offers a host of vitamin C-based products to brighten skin – opt for this one if you’re looking for a ‘high’ potency option and a ‘light oil’ texture.

ingredient: Propanediol, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid

name: Lanolips Rose Gold 101 Ointment For Lips + Cheeks 9g Lanolips Rose Gold 101 Ointment For Lips + Cheeks 9g
description: A juicy reinvention of the original {101 Ointment}, this must-have is for anyone with dry skin, chapped lips or who's craving a naturally flushed look. The 101 Ointment Lip + Cheek Tint is enriched with pure lanolin, which has a unique molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils to deliver unparalleled levels of moisture. However, this formula also comes laced with a natural, pinched-your-cheeks tint for a flattering, dewy-skinned flush that looks just like your face made it. Intensely hydrating, nourishing and 100% natural, this rescue ointment is a handbag hero, providing immediate relief while lending lips and cheeks a sweet, just-bitten hint of pink. Dermatologically tested, vegetarian and baby friendly, cruelty-free and free from ‘nasties’, this treatment is an absolute no-brainer. Choose from 'Rose Gold', 'Baby Rose Gold' or 'Bronze Gold'.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Body Brush Soft Dr. Barbara Sturm Body Brush Soft
description: Also available in {Medium}, these luxe and easy-to-store Body Brushes from Dr. Barbara Sturm are bound to encourage a healthy body - regardless of your personal needs or preferences. If your skin is sensitive to pressure, the Body Brush Soft is a gentle, delicate option with a softer density to the Body Brush Medium. Perfect for dry brushing on dry skin, simply work in a clockwise direction - lightly brushing up and towards your heart to improve skin texture, tone and tightness as well as aiding blood circulation and metabolism while diminishing the look of cellulite and dispelling toxins. This can be used everywhere from your feet, legs and arms to your bum and stomach. It’s important to brush from the extremities - ie. your hands and feet - up towards the heart. On the stomach, work from the bottom right side of the abdomen/hip up to the ribs, horizontally across to the left and then down to the left hip and horizontally across to the right rib. Trust us, after experiencing this mindful task alongside its inevitable glow-giving results, you'll wonder why you didn't start sooner...
how_to_use: Basically, you start at the extremities (furthest away from the heart) and massage towards the body centre (to the heart). Brush lightly with slow and even strokes towards the heart. Start with the front and back of the right foot and work your way towards the lower thigh. Brush from the lower leg to the thigh and then brush on to the right buttock. Then swipe the left side (from the foot to the lower leg and to thigh and buttock) in the same way. Copy this approach for the arms: brush starting with the right hand to the forearm, then from the lower to the upper arm. Then stroke from the left hand up to the left upper arm. When it comes to the stomach, it is important to follow the course of the colon to rule out any blockage. For this, you start on the bottom right side of the abdomen and brush upwards in small strokes until you approach the ribs. From there, brush horizontally to the left and continue down from there. It is important to brush clockwise.

name: Paula's Choice Advanced Sun Protection SPF 50 Daily Moisturiser 60ml Paula's Choice Advanced Sun Protection SPF 50 Daily Moisturiser 60ml
description: While plenty of sun creams offer reliable protection, few do so with the smooth and supple finish of this advanced formula. Boosted with a supported blend of antioxidants, this non-greasy formula is crafted with a synthetic-only UV shield, which consists of five state-of-the-art filters that deflect and scatter the sun’s harmful rays. In other words — advanced protection from premature signs of ageing. Suitable for all skin types, it’s a dream to apply and leaves a sheer, velvety-smooth finish that gives the perfect ‘just-back-from-holiday’ glow, all year round.
how_to_use: Use the Advanced Sun Protection Daily Moisturiser as the last step in your morning skin care routine. Apply liberally at least fifteen minutes before stepping into sun exposure. Reapply every two hours once the skin has been exposed to direct sunlight. If the skin sweats or has contact with water, we recommend applying water-resistant sun protection.

name: Bondi Sands Technocolor 1 Hour Express Self Tanning Foam - Emerald 200ml Bondi Sands Technocolor 1 Hour Express Self Tanning Foam - Emerald 200ml
description: Discover self-tan tailored to your skin tone with Bondi Sands Technocolour 1 Hour Express Self Tanning Foam. Infused with unique jewel-inspired colour guides — specially designed to counteract tell-tale orange tones — simply sweep on for a believable bronze in just 60 minutes. Carefully curated through cutting-edge research and laser skin analysis technology, Technocolour shades are infused with colourful undertones from green to purple. It might sound a little odd (and intimidating!), but this colour cleverness ensures a tan that’s perfectly tailored to your skin tone. And, to make sure your tan goes on evenly and just where you want it, this hi-tech formula also includes electrolyte hydration and a silky, spreadable foam texture.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!

description: Working even on wet skin, the Sun Protective Water SPF30 keeps you protected from the sun without feeling heavy or greasy. In fact, this formula encourages a nearly-naked feel without compromising on protection at all – keeping you safe against UVA, UVB, visible light and infrared rays. The perfect pool-side companion, this lightweight and refreshing ‘water’ leaves skin feeling intensely moisturised and smooth (never greasy or oily!) with glycerol, while the brand’s Tan Activator Complex harnesses buriti oil to safely boost natural melanin production in preparation for a faster, longer-lasting tan. If you’re after a golden, even and natural looking colour with zero fuss or fake tan, this protective, reef-safe formula could be just what you’ve been waiting for.

Made for when you need a little grit in your lather, Drunk Elephant's Scrubbi Bamboes Body Cleanser harnesses biodegradable bamboo beads and ultra-mild surfactants to leave skin clean and silky smooth. Coconut oil, jojoba seed oil and sunflower seed oil work to strengthen the skin's natural moisture barrier over time. In turn, this helps prevent future inflammation, sensitivity and dryness. name: Bondi Sands Pure Self Tan Foaming Water - Dark 200ml Bondi Sands Pure Self Tan Foaming Water - Dark 200ml
description: Available in two tone variations ('Dark' and 'Light/Medium'), Bondi Sands' Pure Self Tan Foaming Water fuses their iconic golden tanning technology with a cocktail of hyaluronic acid, vitamin C and vitamin E to nourish and illuminate your skin. As part of the Pure range, this conscientious blend is bottled with ethically sourced, 100% recyclable plastic to limit the impact on our environment, plus every ingredient has a purpose and they've omitted fragrance, dye and sulphates from the formula. Gentle enough for sensitive skin, this quick-drying formula is also colourless, meaning that it won't transfer after application. Like most of the Pure range, it develops over six hours and will continue to do so for 24 hours since it's powered by dual tanning actives to build your glow. Simply tip the product upside down, squeeze it directly onto your skin and blend with your Application Mitt. Just remember not to shake it before use; it's designed to create a foam when the product is squeezed out of the bottle, so if it's shaken, the product pre-foams in the bottle and liquefies upon squeezing onto the skin. If shaken, wait 5-10 minutes for the formula to settle before trying again!
how_to_use: For best results, do not shake the product prior to use. Empty space in the bottle is required to create the foam. Step 1: for an even, streak free tan, ensure your skin is clean, exfoliated and free of any moisturisers. Step 2: squeeze Bondi Sands Pure Self Tan Foaming Water directly onto skin. Use your Bondi Sands Application Mitt in long sweeping motions to blend into legs, arms and body. Use remaining residue on mitt for elbows and knees. Step 3: wait until touch dry before dressing. Conveniently requires no wash off. For best results, leave foaming water on skin for at least six hours. For the deepest tan, re-apply 30 minutes after initial application. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

Blurring texture thanks to tapioca starch, this sophisticated serum-powered staple forms a protective layer over compromised moisture barriers, rescuing skin from the brink of you-know-what. Encouraging new cell turnover, healthy-looking radiance and available in a host of gourmand scented variations, this intensely hydrating cream excites your senses with everything from fresh floral notes of tangerine and tiger orchid in 'Ambre Vanille' to sensual citrus accords found in 'Nèroli du Sud'. name: Weleda Stretch Mark Massage Oil 100ml Weleda Stretch Mark Massage Oil 100ml

name: Fur Ingrown Eliminator Serum 32ml Fur Ingrown Eliminator Serum 32ml
description: There’s nothing worse than taking the time to shave only to be rudely met with ingrown hairs in the days that follow. It’s a good thing that the Ingrown Eliminator Serum is here to soothe irritation and eradicate bumps. Three cheers for fur’s post-shave saviour! Suitable for your underarms, legs, pubic area, brows, lip and chin, this targeted serum helps to promote clear and comforted skin. It’s powered by willow bark extract, a natural form of salicylic acid, to penetrate your pores and shift any build-up, in turn preventing inflammation. Lactic acid breaks the bonds between dead skin cells to promote a brighter, more even tone, while antibacterial lavender oil soothes irritated skin and promotes healing. The final touch is an infusion antimicrobial cold-pressed aloe juice that hydrates and restores suppleness to your skin. In a study led by the brand, 100% agreed product brightens skin, 100% agreed their skin felt toned after use and 95% agreed the product minimized the appearance of ingrown hairs.

name: Tan-Luxe THE BODY Light/Medium 15ml Tan-Luxe THE BODY Light/Medium 15ml
description: Transform your body moisturiser into a bespoke bronzing hero product that’s perfectly portable with The Body - Travel Size by TAN-LUXE. A revolutionary approach to self-tanning (hitherto fraught with streaky, biscuit-scented tango tonics), you simply add drops of this glow-giving elixir to your body oil, cream or lotion to add natural-looking, sun-kissed radiance to even the most dull, lacklustre skin. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and TAN-LUXE’s ‘Cellutone Complex’, every droplet will boost, smooth, tone, tighten and, of course, tan tired-looking skin. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle (without any of the skin-damaging rays), The Body is available in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – delivering an even, luminous colour. No smell. No streaks. No drama.
how_to_use: Prep Exfoliate using a gentle scrub 24 hours before tanning. Lightly moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Apply Mix 2-6 drops per body part with your usual body moisturiser, oil or cream in the palm of your hand. More drops will add depth of colour. Apply to dry skin in large circular motions from head to toe lightly covering hands elbows and feet. Thoroughly wash hands after use. Maintain Gently exfoliate and moisturise skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow. Caution We advise a patch test is done 24 hours prior to use. Do not apply on broken, irritated or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If a reaction occurs, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice. Does not contain sunscreen and will not protect against sun exposure. Product colour may vary due to natural ingredients.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Alcohol Denat. (Alcohol), Glycerin, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Polysorbate 80, Erythrulose, Caramel, Xanthan Gum, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Lecithin, Caffeine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Palmitoyl Carnitine, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzoic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroacetic Acid

name: Spotlight Whitening Teeth Whitening Pen Spotlight Whitening Teeth Whitening Pen
description: A targeted treatment to minimise staining, Spotlight Oral Cares Pen for Whitening Teeth is ideal for dissolving residual traces of tea, coffee or red wine (among other things), so that you can indulge without compromise. With whitening hydrogen peroxide to actually brighten the stains rather than covering them up like many other whitening products this quick and convenient pen coats your teeth with a tiny amount of tooth-brightening gel. With a brush for targeted application (great for stubborn discolouration), this sets straight to work to fade yellowing, and leave your smile visibly brighter in under five minutes *ting*!

Backed by years of microbiome science that understands the structure of our skin which comes in all textures and types, this balmy miracle is the true definition of where science meets skin care. Fusing together nourishing shea butter, mannose, glycerin and skin-smoothing niacinamide, every pump is filled with barrier-boosting benefits that’ll provide an instant soothing sensation. name: Lanolips Lano Golden Dry Skin Salve 25g Lanolips Lano Golden Dry Skin Salve 25g
description: A miracle moisturiser, Lanolips Golden Dry Skin Salve instantly hydrates, smooths and soothes dry patches. It can be used as an intensive moisture mask or an inflight cream, as well as on babies and as a skin guardian in cold, windy weather. The luscious formula is enriched with soothing Manuka honey, protective vitamin E and the brand’s hero ingredient, lanolin. Resembling and mimicking your own skin oils and holding 200% of its weight in moisture, this special ingredient restores hydration unlike anything else. Cruelty-free and free from ‘nasties’ such as artificial fragrances, parabens, petrolatum, PEGs, mineral oil and sulphates, you can gift this to even the most sensitive-skinned friend or stressed-out mummy without a worry.

name: Sun Bum Browning Lotion SPF 15+ 250ml Sun Bum Browning Lotion SPF 15+ 250ml
description: Made for those who want protection without having to forgo their summer glow, Sun Bum's SPF 15 Browning Lotion facilitates the best of both - creating a reef-friendly shield between skin and the ageing effects of the sun while allowing your skin to develop a long-lasting tan. Great for those who tan easily, this silky lotion offers broad-spectrum SPF 15 protection, while the hypoallergenic blend of kona coffee extract, organic coconut oil and aloe vera replenishes moisture and helps to enhance elasticity - leaving your limbs feeling wonderfully soft with a glorious ‘spring'. Healthy, hydrated and golden, it's great for sun-lovers who love nothing more than the feeling of being authentically bronzed (this is that summer holiday vibe in a bottle). And, as with everything Sun Bum, you won't find any oxybenzone or octinoxate - making it ideal for water babies (and marine life).

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Drops - Medium 30ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Drops - Medium 30ml
description: Control your glow or easily top-up your tan with Isle of Paradise’s custom Self-Tanning Drops. Simply add 1 to 12 drops to your face or body lotion and watch that beautiful sun-kissed glow radiate from your skin. Free from tell-tale tango pigment, biscuit scent or eye-catching streaks, this foolproof formula is a must-have and is perfectly sized for on-the-go so you can keep that faux glow all year round. Anything but ordinary, all Isle of Paradise products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Drops will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Add 1-12 drops to your favourite moisturiser, mix together & apply to skin. More drops = deeper tan. Wash hands after application.

name: BYREDO Body Cream Mojave Ghost 200ml BYREDO Body Cream Mojave Ghost 200ml

description: The staple on every shelfie and Holy Grail of coconut oil, Kopari’s signature Organic Coconut Melt has had a luxuriously sweet Tahitian Vanilla makeover. Instantly soften and soothed thanks to the natural components of the pure virgin, organic coconut oil utilised by Kopari. Think proteins, essential fatty acids and vitamin E for moisturised skin that radiates health, happiness and hydration. Fast-absorbing but never ever greasy you can use this in nearly every which way you can think of; from body moisturiser to hair mask, lip balm to dry shave oil and even massage oil… the possibilities are endless.

Here are all the ways you can Melt: Hair Mask: Coat dry, unwashed hair with Coconut Melt from root to tip. Toss in a bun for 40 minutes or sleep on it overnight. Afterward, shampoo twice and whoa, holy hair hydration. Dry Shave Oil: Say so long to synthetic shaving creams and gels. Bath Boost: Scoop out a generous glob of Coconut Melt and drop it into a hot bath. Belly Balm: Rub Coconut Melt all over that beautiful pregnant belly to relieve itching and ward off stretch marks.

description: DeoDoc’s Intimate Wash is a non-stripping body cleanser designed to remove all traces of daily impurities – made specifically to keep your intimate area happy and healthy. Unlike standard shop-bought shower gels and body washes, the sensitive skin-friendly formula features an optimal pH of 5 – the same pH as the vulvar skin – meaning there’s no down-there disruption or discomfort in sight. Free from allergens, parabens and other nasties we don’t want near our bits, the sweet-smelling gel-to-foam wash gently nourishes as it cleans, leaving the skin satin-soft, super-smooth and subtly scented with an ultra-fresh feel for longer.
how_to_use: For external use only – for the vulva. Pour into the hand and lather. Rinse thoroughly.

name: OUAI Body Cleanser Melrose Place 300ml OUAI Body Cleanser Melrose Place 300ml
description: Take a one-OUAI ticket to L.A. with this super rich Melrose Body Cleanser. Lathering with foamy skin-loving goodies that are totally rid of sulfates and parabens, this all-nourishing cleanser gently removes the dirt and debris that your skin could happily do without. Full to the brim with natural antioxidants, vitamins A and C, jojoba and rosehip oil, this moisture-filled cleanser feeds your skin with long-lasting hydration that you never knew you needed! With skin so soft and supple, it’s no wonder why this has grown to be a cult fave that’s flying into everyone’s shopping basket…

name: Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Oil 150ml Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Oil 150ml
description: Love your Lancaster golden tan? What if you could prolong it for an endless summer sensation? Lancaster's Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Oil is specially developed for those who want to prolong their beautiful holiday tan while soothing their sun-exposed skin. Helping you to cling on to your summer tan, Lancaster's innovative Tan Activator Complex intensifies melanin production for a golden, even and long-lasting tan. This sublimating after-sun oil contains soothing and hydrating complexes to help your skin's natural recovery process after sun exposure. It reduces the risk of peeling and leaves skin satiny-smooth. Enriched with six natural-origin oils, this luxurious beautifying oil instantly melts into your skin, leaving it supple and hydrated. Its shimmering texture reveals a glowing, golden tan and scents your skin with Lancaster's iconic fragrance, suitable for sensitive skin.
how_to_use: Shake before use. Apply generously to body after sun exposure and after your holidays.

name: CeraVe Soothing and Repairing Hand Cream 50ml CeraVe Soothing and Repairing Hand Cream 50ml
description: Our hands have never been under so much stress; what with over-washing and alcohol-heavy sanitisers disprupting their natural moisture balance, they’re much more prone to dryness. That’s where CeraVe’s Reparative Hand Cream comes in! As with all CeraVe superheroes, at the core of this hand cream is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (lipids that are essentially the ‘glue’ of your skin barrier). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels and keep irritation, sensitivity and eczema at bay. CeraVe’s unique ‘MVE Technology’ means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they’re gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. It’s perfect for rough and dry paws!
how_to_use: Apply liberally to your hands, as often as needed.

name: BYREDO Gypsy Water Body Wash BYREDO Gypsy Water Body Wash
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your body while simultaneously cleansing and caring for skin, you need to discover the brand's decadent range of body care, beginning with the Gypsy Water Body Wash. Housed in the brand's instantly recognisable (and incredibly lust-have) chic and simple – yet quintessentially luxe – monochrome bottles, BYREDO's Gypsy Water Body Wash enables you to upgrade your scenting experience while leaving skin feeling soft, silky and subtly perfumed throughout the day. Created as an ode to Romani culture, prepare to fall for the scent's spellbinding blend of woody pine needle and sandalwood alongside intense amber and refreshing citrus (think: lemon and bergamot) to evoke the fever and spirit of nights spent in the forest.
how_to_use: Use all over your body on wet skin, rinse thoroughly and bask in the swoon-worthy scent.

name: Kopari Beauty Coconut Latte Body Wash Kopari Beauty Coconut Latte Body Wash
description: Crafted from coffee, soothing macadamia seed oil and replenishing coconut water, Kopari Beauty's Coconut Latte Body Wash is an energising gel-to-cream wash that gently refreshes and softens skin - all while leaving a delicious, hypoallergenic scent of coffee and coconuts on your skin even after the suds wash away. Named for the frothy lather that it works into, this conditioning cream wash will leave your skin touchably soft and never stripped. Here's why... Nutrient-dense organic coconut water charges the formula with hydrating, anti-inflammatory and anti-microbial properties (plus vitamins, electrolytes and essential amino acids!), for skin thats youthful, restored and hydrated but not overly oily.A shot of caffeine then awakens and energises your skin, while macadamia seed oil floods your skin with moisturising fatty acids to help soothe dryness and promote a supple, smooth finish.
how_to_use: Apply all over your body, then slowly massage the gel onto your skin for a rich lather. Rinse with warm water. Tips: Cleanse body first with Coconut Latte Body Wash then exfoliate body with Kopari's Coconut Crush Scrub. To add physical exfoliation, apply the gel onto a loofah then scrub your skin.

name: DARLING After Sun Lotion DARLING After Sun Lotion
description: Guaranteed to kickstart an addiction, DARLING’s beautifully packaged After Sun Lotion stars a host of good-to-skin ingredients to help calm skin after a day under the sun. Perfect for soothing sunburn, rehydrating parched skin as well as elongating your precious tan, this hard-working formula will quickly become a firm favourite. Infused with refreshing apricot oil, soothing aloe vera as well as hard-working vitamin E to keep skin in the best condition possible. What’s more, DARLING’s quintessential and intoxicating Monoi de Tahiti perfume, produced in Polynesia following ancient tradition where coconut oil is produced from the pulp of dried coconuts under the sun and macerated Tiaré flowers, will instantly make your routine even more heavenly than you could have imagined – gone are the days of uncomfortable and agonising SPF application!
how_to_use: Apply evenly as needed on face and body after exposure to the sun. Also recommended as a moisturising cream for daily use.

name: Kopari Beauty Tahitian Vanilla Hydrating Body Milk 236ml Kopari Beauty Tahitian Vanilla Hydrating Body Milk 236ml
description: Transporting you to sunnier shores, Kopari Beauty’s Tahitian Vanilla Hydrating Body Milk has taken coconut oil and made it milky in this ultra-hydrating lotion. Quickly absorbed without a hint of residue left behind to tarnish your perfectly picked clothes, this body milk is packed with chamomile, shea butter and (of course) coconut oil in a featherlight formula to keep skin silky soft. Taking a Tahitian twist on the original… this hypoallergenic hydrator now offers a cloak of vanilla, gourmand, butter and cream to warm the senses while soothing and conditioning your skin. Our new summer body hero that comes in 100% recyclable packaging for holiday-ready skin all year-round.

name: AMELIORATE Transforming Clarity Body Spray 145ml AMELIORATE Transforming Clarity Body Spray 145ml
description: Carefully formulated to tackle blemishes and impurities on the body, this clarifying spray works all over (except your face!) to tackle congestion, dirt and bacteria and put the shine back into dull-looking skin. Brimming with potent ingredients, Ameliorate’s LaB6 Skin Clearing Complex is the star of the show here. Incorporating lactic acid, white willow bark (a blend of BHAs that support cell renewal), noni cell culture (an extract that reduces the appearance of pores) and a marine complex, this powerful formula works to decongest and tighten pores, while balancing excess oil and tackling redness. Plus, it has hyalruonic acid to keep skin feeling plump with hydration. Simply spray this mist in the areas you need, massage in and over time enjoy clearer, hydrated and well-balanced skin.

name: L'Occitane Almond Milk Concentrate 200ml L'Occitane Almond Milk Concentrate 200ml
description: Harnessing the skin-tightening powers of almonds, L'Occitane's famous best-selling body cream has arrived at Cult Beauty to care for your limbs in all its beautifully-scented glory. Hydrating, firming and vegan friendly, the Almond Milk Concentrate holds the power to infuse your skin with a cacophony of skin-loving essentials. Enriched with a targeted complex - made up of walnut seed and almond extract - this quick-to-absorb body cream works hard to protect your skin's elasticity while boosting cellular renewal. Caring for your limbs and set to take your body confidence through the roof, the Almond Milk Concentrate grants a satin-like sheen after a little one-on-one time with its nourishing formula. It gets even better, too, once you've come to the end of your cherished tub, you can top it up with the Eco-Refill!

name: Tan-Luxe Express Mousse 200ml Tan-Luxe Express Mousse 200ml
description: Clean, clear and completely customisable. Meet Express Mousse, the latest innovation from experts in tan, TAN-LUXE. Using skincare-inspired ingredients and a luxurious whipped texture for speedy, even coverage, it delivers flawless bronzing in as little as 30 minutes. Forget tanning mousses that leave skin feeling dry and tight. Express Mousse is supercharged with brightening vitamin C plus hyaluronic acid and beta glucan to lend lasting hydration and create the perfect base for your tan. You're in control with customisable colour: leave on for 30 minutes for a sunkissed glow or three hours for a deeper bronze. Formulated without a guide colour for zero transfer (don't panic - the whipped formula makes even application a breeze) and no biscuit-y smell, Express Mousse is made for last minute tanning.
how_to_use: Moisturise any areas prone to dryness. Using a tanning mitt, apply the mousse in sweeping motions from head to toe. Wait at least 30 minutes before showering for a light sunkissed glow. Leave on for up to 3 hours for a deeper tan. Your tan will continue to develop over 4-6 hours. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

name: Isle of Paradise Blending Brush Isle of Paradise Blending Brush
description: The perfect companion to your favourite self-tanning formulas, the Shape and Glow Big Blending Brush boasts super-soft, vegan and cruelty-free fibres (real animal hair is so passé) that allow for even, streak-free application. Perfectly palm-sized to give you complete glow-control, this kabuki brush feels like a cloud on skin – working to smooth dry and dull textures for faultlessly even application. Coming in a cleverly contoured shape, the silky hairs mould to both face and body – making blending oh-so easy. Use this to effortlessly apply, buff and contour your fave formulas, and don’t worry about cleaning – it’s never been simpler! Just gently wash with some soapy water and leave to dry.
how_to_use: Apply your favourite paradise product for an even skin finish. Use to blend out tricky areas like hands, feet, elbows and knees. Also use to shape and contour to add definition to both face and body. Care instructions:﻿ Wash gently with warm soapy water and leave to dry before next use.
ingredient: Synthetic bristles.

name: OUAI Chill Pills Bath Bombs 6 x 42.5g OUAI Chill Pills Bath Bombs 6 x 42.5g
description: A soon-to-be staple in your self-care ritual, these Chill Pills are Ouai’s answer to hectic days and frazzled minds. Nothing short of a soak saviour, these ultra-moisturising tablets melt into warm water, dispersing a silky blend of oils to soften and smooth your skin. Plus, the beautiful ‘Jasmine Rose’ scent carries a delicately floral profile that lingers lightly even after your bath. Featuring jojoba seed oil (to supply and lock in lasting moisture), hemp seed oil (for its soothing and hydrating properties and to smooth texture) and safflower seed oil (to enhance your natural radiance and cleanse your skin), expect a velvety, never greasy, softening effect. The grown up - by this we mean there’s no garish colour or glitter stains - bath bomb you never knew you needed, take one (or half) with a tub of hot water for deeply relaxing, skin-conditioning results.

name: L'Occitane Verbena Body Milk (250ml) L'Occitane Verbena Body Milk (250ml)
description: Cocoon your limbs in the sun-drenched scent of Provence with L'Occitane's Verbena Fresh Body Milk, a fresh, lightweight hydrator that's sure to transport your senses to sunnier climes. If fresh and fruity notes make your senses sing with delight, then this citrus-scented body milk should be heading straight into your next beauty haul. Refreshing yet uplifting, your limbs will thank you for the sparkling, fruity scent left behind once this lightweight blend melts into your skin. Combining an extract of organic verbena from Provence, with lemon and essential oils and a hint of Italian grapefruit extract, this might just be what pure bliss smells like, but we'll let you decide...

name: Frank Body Peppermint Scrub 200g Frank Body Peppermint Scrub 200g
description: Wake up and smell the coffee scrub. frank bodys Peppermint Coffee Scrub uses natural, vegan and cruelty-free ingredients to leave your skin smoother, softer and brighter, not to mention more energised (thank you, coffee). Turns out coffees awakening powers arent confined to your morning latte; the scrub utilises roasted coffee grinds to give your skin a workout, boosting blood flow, promoting collagen production and gently exfoliating away dead skin cells. For an added energy boost, peppermint oil grants a cooling sensation thats sure to get your cogs whirring. The formulas talents extend to battling breakouts, calming redness and soothing irritation, courtesy of aloe vera and its anti-bacterial properties. It contains hydrators too we know, what an overachiever including olive and sweet almond oils, which are packed with fatty acids and vitamins to moisturise, fade scarring and stretch marks, and brighten dull complexions. Shower time never felt (or smelt) so good
how_to_use: In the shower, massage the scrub in circular motions over wet skin for a few minutes, focusing on dry areas, scars, stretch marks, breakouts or cellulite. Rinse off and pat dry.

name: MUTHA Body Butter 160ml MUTHA Body Butter 160ml
description: Equal parts indulgent and nurturing (no dry, thirsty skin here, thank you very much), MUTHA's Body Butter is an essential part in any nourishing skin care routine - and your secret weapon for achieving soft, supple skin. Each pot of goodness (subtly scented with fresh notes of citrus) contains a multitude of almost-miracle-working ingredients your skin will slurp up. There's shea butter, whipped into a rich cream that feels incredibly luxurious to apply, packed with fatty acids that soften the skin while strengthening your moisture barrier, keeping your limbs enviably smooth and silky for even longer. Alongside this, there's cocoa butter, filled with protective, antioxidant-rich vitamin E, and mango butter, which contains vitamin A to gently stimulate your skin's natural renewal process (smoothing the appearance of stretch marks in the process).

name: MALIN + GOETZ Lime Bar Soap MALIN + GOETZ Lime Bar Soap
description: Bar soap is very much back on the radar as mindful consumers are drawn to its minimal waste, not to mention its tactile appeal and its power to upgrade your #sinkie (it’s tipped to become the next #shelfie). Generating a light, frothy (non-stripping) lather that cherishes skin, top to toe, this gentle and citrus-y slab is infused with MALIN + GOETZ stunning, Citron Vert Eau de Toilette to uplift and invigorate skin and your senses. A great morning option to help you dive in to the day, this zing-bringing soap helps to balance and purify skin – even sensitive types – with its gentle (yet abundant!) foam, that leaves your hands spotless and works as a full body wash if you’re trying to cut back on plastic and ‘clean up’ your act. Plus, the Lime Bar Soap is totally vegan and cruelty-free.

name: Caudalie Shower Gel Soleil des Vignes 200ml Caudalie Shower Gel Soleil des Vignes 200ml
description: Elevate your bathing rituals with Caudalie’s indulgent Shower Gel Soleil des Vignes. Suitable for all skin types, this soap-free wash is made from a 100% plant-based formula that’s as effective as it is gentle on your skin. The luxurious shower gel is enriched with soothing coconut milk to comfort and moisturise your limbs as you massage the silky gel over your skin. The best bit? It boasts a delectable scent that will make you wish you never had to rinse off the suds; delicate notes of orange blossom, watermelon and white jasmine create a pleasingly bright and sunny aroma.

name: Coco & Eve Applicator Mitt Coco & Eve Applicator Mitt
description: A match made in heaven for the glow-giving {Sunny Honey Bali Bronzing Foam}, this Applicator Mitt makes for seamlessly blended, streak-free self-tanning. Developed with a hypoallergenic, soft velvet mitt that glides smoothly over your skin, this applicator plays well with foam, mousse, lotion or spray formulas. It's perfect for evenly distributing your favourite faux glow without absorbing (read: wasting!) the precious formula. Keeping the tan from gathering on the dry areas of your body, this plush mitt is a must for super easy application.
how_to_use: Use to apply tanning formulas to tricky-to-reach areas for seamless, streak-free coverage.

name: Kora Organics Noni Glow Face Oil 10ml Kora Organics Noni Glow Face Oil 10ml
description: Kiss goodbye to your skin care bugbears with the KORA Organics Noni Glow Face Oil – a luxurious (but light!) treatment oil for face and neck that calms and brightens your skin while keeping it happily nourished, too. KORA Organics Noni Glow Face Oil houses a potent powerful blend of antioxidants (like noni fruit extract, which is great for replenishing the skin’s texture) and fatty acids (thank you, rosehip and sea buckthorn oil) that work together to soothe, hydrate and brighten dull complexions for a healthy, radiant glow. The “#1 favourite product and secret travel companion” of CEO Miranda Kerr herself, this multi-tasker can be used alone or mixed with your favourite moisturiser or concealer for an extra boost of hydration and for a gorgeously natural, healthy-looking sheen.

name: Tan-Luxe The Body Illuminating Self-Tan Drops 50ml - Light/Medium Tan-Luxe The Body Illuminating Self-Tan Drops 50ml - Light/Medium
description: Transform your body moisturiser into a bespoke bronzing hero product with The Body by TAN-LUXE. A revolutionary approach to self-tanning (hitherto fraught with streaky, biscuit-scented tango tonics), you simply add drops of this glow-giving elixir to your body oil, cream or lotion to add natural-looking, sunkissed radiance to even the most dull, lacklustre skin. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and TAN-LUXE’s ‘Cellutone Complex’, every droplet will boost, smooth, tone, tighten and, of course, tan tired-looking skin. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle (without any of the skin-damaging rays), The Body is available in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – delivering an even, luminous colour that’s a million miles from the typically orange faux glow. No smell. No streaks. No drama.

Apply Mix 2-6 drops per body part with your usual body moisturiser, oil or cream in the palm of your hand. More drops will add depth of colour. Apply to dry skin in large circular motions from head to toe lightly covering hands elbows and feet. Thoroughly wash hands after use. Maintain Gently exfoliate and moisturise skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow. Caution We advise a patch test is done 24 hours prior to use. Do not apply on broken, irritated or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If a reaction occurs, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice. Does not contain sunscreen and will not protect against sun exposure. Product colour may vary due to natural ingredients.

These issues led Dr. Barbara Sturm to develop the gynaecologically tested V line: formulas that care for the delicate, intimate area with pre- and probiotics. Designed to refresh without removing stripping natural oils or essential moisture, the V-Wash is suitable for daily cleansing and sensitive skin. It's infused with pre- and probiotics that help to support your skin's microbiome and maintain its optimal natural pH value, thereby preventing 'bad' bacteria and yeast from proliferating. As far as irritation goes, this silky wash is laced with panthenol, glycerin and hyaluronic acid to deliver soothing hydration. Finally, it wouldn't be a Dr. Barbara Sturm formula without purslane extract - the key 'super plant' active used across the range - helping to calm inflammation and protect sensitive cell membranes against free radical attack.

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Drops - Light 30ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Drops - Light 30ml

Simply add 1 to 12 drops to your face or body lotion and watch that beautiful sun-kissed glow radiate from your skin. Free from tell-tale tango pigment, biscuit scent or eye-catching streaks, this foolproof formula is a must-have and is perfectly sized for on-the-go so you can keep that faux glow all year round. Anything but ordinary, all Isle of Paradise products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Drops will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.

name: Huda Beauty KAYALI Vanilla Hand Cream Huda Beauty KAYALI Vanilla Hand Cream
description: Can’t get enough of Huda Beauty’s bestselling vanilla fragrance? Take your obsession to the next level with the Kayali Vanilla Hand Cream: a luxuriously silky formula laced with the signature scent and enriched with nourishing ingredients. The warm and spicy aroma plays with notes of jasmine, Madagascan vanilla orchid, Brazilian tonka, musk, amber, patchouli and brown sugar. Hydrating your hands without feeling greasy or heavy, the cream is infused with safflower and sunflower oils (natural humectants that promise a silky finish), as well as ginseng and rosemary leaf extracts — both of which are celebrated for their soothing and calming qualities. Lavish it liberally over dry, overworked hands when you want a surge of moisture (and a whiff of the sumptuous scent!).
how_to_use: Apply a generous amount and gently massage into the skin. Use as many times as you wish and layer it with your favorite KAYALI fragrance.

name: SUNDAE Cool Mint Whipped Shower Foam 260ml SUNDAE Cool Mint Whipped Shower Foam 260ml
description: No, your eyes are not deceiving you… the Whipped Shower Foam from Sundae Body comes housed in a whipped cream-esque can, delivering a dose of fun to your shower — alongside, of course, a gently cleansing foam formula packed with nourishing ingredients. Refreshing and luxe, these shower foams refresh skin and wash away the day while enriching skin with vitamin C-filled kakadu plum to brighten and smooth, and finger lime, a natural source of exfoliating AHAs. Choose from a smorgasbord of delectable scents: ‘Very Vanilla’, a mix of vanilla bean, tonka bean, coconut milk and sandalwood; ‘Orange Crush’, with orange, mandarin, jasmine and melon; ‘Pomegranate Fizz’, featuring a cocktail of pomegranate, peach blossom and blackcurrant; ‘Coconut Cream’, with coconut, vanilla and sandalwood; ‘Cool Mint’, an energising blend of spearmint, peppermint and menthol; and finally, ‘Honey Honey’, a sweet mix of toffee, honey and maple syrup.
how_to_use: Get wet! Give it a good shake, turn your bottle upside down and spray a dollop into the palm of your hand, lather up, wash & rinse.

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Drops - Dark 30ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Drops - Dark 30ml
description: Control your glow or easily top-up your tan with Isle of Paradise’s custom Self-Tanning Drops. Simply add 1 to 12 drops to your face or body lotion and watch that beautiful sun-kissed glow radiate from your skin. Free from tell-tale tango pigment, biscuit scent or eye-catching streaks, this foolproof formula is a must-have and is perfectly sized for on-the-go so you can keep that faux glow all year round. Anything but ordinary, all Isle of Paradise products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Drops will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.

name: MALIN + GOETZ Rum Body Lotion MALIN + GOETZ Rum Body Lotion
description: First thing’s first: MALIN + GOETZ’ Rum Body Lotion smells is a must-have for the fragrance alone – and that’s before considering the lightweight hydrators and nourishing fatty acids. Sure to knock you head over heels, the lotion is enriched with the brand’s cult-favourite Dark Rum scent which lends its deep and sensual aromatic appeal without feeling to heavy or overpowering. Intensely moisturising yet simultaneously lightweight in texture, it’s crammed with skin-essential fatty acids, provitamin b5 and grapeseed oil to grant a long-lasting moisture boost and leave your body soft and supple.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of lotion to body.

name: DARLING Tan Activator DARLING Tan Activator
description: Jam-packed with youth-preserving vitamin E and ultra-hydrating and soothing aloe vera and calendula, DARLING’s Tan Activator ensures your skin remains happy, healthy and plump even after an intense day in the sun. This intelligent product not only protects skin’s moisture levels it also helps you achieve a gorgeous uniform tan with intense colour – a must-have for those who struggle to tan. What’s more, DARLING’s quintessential and intoxicating Monoi de Tahiti perfume, produced in Polynesia following ancient tradition where coconut oil is produced from the pulp of dried coconuts under the sun and macerated Tiaré flowers, will instantly make your routine even more heavenly than you could have imagined – gone are the days of uncomfortable and agonising SPF application!
how_to_use: Apply evenly as needed on face and body before sun exposure. During exposure it is recommended to use this product in combination with an adequate sun protection factor. For a more intense action it is suggested to start using the product ten days before sun exposure.

name: NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Neroli Oil - 100 ml NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Neroli Oil - 100 ml
description: Bestowing a satin sheen to your skin and strands, Nuxe's Huile Prodigieuse Neroli Multi-Purpose Dry Oil for Face, Body and Hair is laced with a buffet of skin-loving oils that cherish dry, scaly patches and strengthen over-styled lengths. Completely non-greasy and quickly absorbed, this dry oil leaves a light lustre and works to replenish and comfort the scaliest limbs... A thing of nourishing alchemy, it's infused with precious organic oils, including ente plum and sesame, to boost moisture levels and reveal a radiant glow. Designed to act as an antioxidant, protect against pollution and reduce the visibility of stretch marks, this multi-tasking wonder would make a wonderful addition to any routine. Simply rake through the ends of your hair to create a chic 'piecey-ness', smooth over shoulders or streak down the length of your shins to bestow an au naturel highlight - all while luxuriating in the soothing notes of neroli!
how_to_use: Use all year round on your face, body and hair. Before applying, warm the oil in your hands and then cup your hands over your nose and breathe in the uplifting scent.

name: Lancaster Sun Beauty Body Milk SPF15 250ml Lancaster Sun Beauty Body Milk SPF15 250ml
description: Enriched with antioxidant-rich oils, Lancaster's Body Milk SPF15 (250ml) encourages a faster, deeper tan while defending against UVA/UVB rays and infrared to keep you safe in the sun. Experience broad spectrum sun protection with Lancaster's Body Milk SPF15, the Monaco-based brand, fortifies its innovative sun care with Full Light Technology, which protects skin against UVA/UVB rays and infrared so you can enjoy the weather without any fear. Lightweight and quick-absorbing, this lusciously formulated milk also features the brand's breakthrough Tan Activator Complex (T.A.C.) combining orange, coffee and antioxidant-rich buriti oil to encourage a faster, deeper tan, whilst promoting firmness and elasticity. Non-greasy or sticky, this is also cast-free so it can be used my all skin tones and types.
how_to_use: Apply Body Milk SPF15 generously all over your body before sun exposure.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Diisopropyl Adipate, Glycerin, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-6 Stearate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Poly C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate, Isoamyl P-Methoxycinnamate, Acetic Acid, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Benzyl Benzoate, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Caprylyloxyphenylamino Dimethyltetrahydro Benzothiazine Carboxylic Acid, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Citronellol, Dimethylmethoxy Chromanol, Disodium Edta, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Hydrolyzed Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Fruit Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydroxycitronellal, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Lactic Acid, Linalool, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Mica, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-6 Behenate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum/Fragrance, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).

name: Kate Somerville ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment 60ml Kate Somerville ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment 60ml
description: Known as ‘The Hollywood 2-minute facial’, ExfoliKate is Kate Somerville’s bestselling, dual-action exfoliator, which delivers incredible results in as little as one use. The secret to a glowing, ‘fresh from the skin clinic’ complexion lies in the advanced ingredients used in this formula. Papaya, pineapple and pumpkin enzymes (Kate’s ‘three Ps for perfect skin’) as well as natural alpha hydroxy acid, lactic acid, work to counteract dullness, dryness and uneven skin tone and texture by loosening and sloughing away dead, dulling cells to reveal the beautifully balanced, even radiance beneath – without drying. Alongside this enzymatic exfoliation, gently scrubbing silica provides physical exfoliation, while soothing aloe vera, antibacterial honey and antioxidant vitamin E soften skin and calm any potential irritation. Finally, rosewood and cinnamon extracts combine to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Massaged in for 30 seconds and left on for up to two minutes, you’ll get gorgeously glowing in no time.
how_to_use: Use once or twice a week, AM or PM. Apply a thin, even layer to a clean, wet face, massaging in a circular motion for 30 seconds. Leave on for up to two minutes. Rinse and gently pat dry. Precautions: This product may cause the skin to tingle and flush slightly for a short time. For sensitive skin, leave on for less than one minute or mix it into your favourite cleanser for a gentler exfoliation. Please be mindful that Kate Somerville is a clinical brand who pride themselves on real results. While they infuse active ingredients with vitamins and botanicals for minimal downtime, if you haven’t used a particular ingredient at a clinically proven level before, we recommend you always patch test first. (Apply to a small area of the skin).
ingredient: Water, Lactic Acid, Silica, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Pectin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit, Ceteareth-20, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Salicylic Acid, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Ferment Extract, Alcohol Denat., Sorbic Acid, Cinnamal, Honey/Mel/Miel, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Eugenol, Potassium Sorbate, Limonene, Linalool, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Beta-Carotene, Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Bromelain, Papain, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cinnamomum Cassia Leaf Oil, Acetic Acid, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Geranium Maculatum Oil, Aniba Rosaeodora (Rosewood) Wood Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil

name: L'Occitane Cherry Blossom Shower Gel (Various Sizes) L'Occitane Cherry Blossom Shower Gel (Various Sizes)
description: The perfect partner to your bathing rituals, the Cherry Blossom Bath & Shower Gel gently cleanses your skin while dispersing its delicate cherry blossom aroma to transport your senses and uplift your mood. Created to celebrate the poetic beauty of the Provençal landscape and the cherry trees that are synonymous with it, the Cherry Blossom Collection from L’Occitane is an ode to the delicate first bloom of this enticing flower. Whether you prefer to run a calming bath or rinse away your stresses in a spa-like shower, this intoxicating formulation can be used for whichever takes your fancy. Doubling up as a satisfyingly abundant mousse in your bath and a non-drying cleanser in the shower, this perfectly perfumed gel encapsulates the intoxicating scent of the cherry blossom from the Luberon region of southern France. Boasting a vegan formula, you can refill your treasured bath and shower gel time and time again with the sustainable refill pouch (500ml).
how_to_use: Apply to wet skin, work into a lather, and rinse.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml
description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. We’ll take a lifetime supply!

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml
description: Reactive skins rejoice! For La Roche-Posay have specifically formulated this treatment toner to help regulate oil without disrupting your skins natural balance. Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.
how_to_use: Apply toner gently with a damp cotton wool pad to the face and neck, morning and evening.

name: COOLA Classic Face Mist SPF 50+ 100ml COOLA Classic Face Mist SPF 50+ 100ml
description: Introducing COOLA's super easy-to-use Classic Face Mist SPF50 100ml that applies like a face mist for non-greasy, antioxidant-rich and SPF protection throughout the day. This easy to use, easier to love organic Classic Face Mist SPF50 from COOLA applies like a breeze! A couple shakes, multiple mists, and you’re on your way. Featuring the brand's Plant Protection complex, with naturally effective antioxidant-rich ingredients like buriti Oil and prickly pear extract, this non-greasy organic sunscreen mist helps fight free radicals without slowing you down. Simply apply as the lsat step in your skin care routine, over make up, on-the-go, or anytime you desire to refresh and protect your precious skin!

description: Ever felt that tight, squeaky-clean feeling after using certain shower gels or body washes? name: Elemis Limited Edition Supersize Pro-Collagen Marine Cream Spf 30 100ml Elemis Limited Edition Supersize Pro-Collagen Marine Cream Spf 30 100ml
description: Did you know the Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 was one of the products that made Elemis' name when it was still a baby brand? It's only natural then that the brand is celebrating twenty years since its first release. To celebrate the exciting milestone, the label debuts this supersized limited-edition moisturiser, which is presented in a reusable keepsake box created in collaboration with Sanderson Design Group and inspired by a pattern from the William Morris archive. Since its launch in 2003, the Pro-Collagen Marine Cream has been globally recognised for its gel-cream texture, skin-loving formula and clinically proven results. The addition of SPF 30 has taken this bestselling day cream to a whole new level by delivering the all-important sun protection you need. It quenches thirsty skin and increases hydration by up to 253% in one hour. Formulated with powerful marine and plant actives including padina pavonica, chlorella and ginkgo biloba, the advanced formula is clinically proven to reduce the look of look of fine lines and wrinkles in two weeks as well as improving the look of firmness and elasticity for skin.

name: Loving Tan Deluxe Bronzing Mousse 120ml (Various Shades) Loving Tan Deluxe Bronzing Mousse 120ml (Various Shades)
description: Made in Australia - safe to say, they know their glow - Loving Tan's Deluxe Bronzing Mousse is here to help you activate your seamless sun-kissed radiance and love your tan like never before. Made by tan lovers tor tan lovers, this professional-level formula provides you with an immediate colour that develops into a richer tan. All of their mousses call on high concentrations of active ingredients to deliver a darker tan in just one layer; their high-quality ingredients ensure you achieve a natural-looking glow no matter your skin tone. Simply choose the shade that suits you best - 'Medium', 'Dark' or 'Ultra Dark' - and wait for your glow to be realised. You won't be hanging around for long, their mousses dry in as little as 60 seconds!

Using circular motions, apply mousse directly to your body, blending as you go to ensure even coverage. Allow sixty seconds before dressing. Avoid perspiration or water for six hours while the tan develops. Finally, rinse off in shower after eight hours to reveal a gorgeous, natural tan. For best results apply to clean, dry and exfoliated skin.

description: Delivering soft-focus, sheer coverage and a delicious demi-matte finish that looks just like real skin, the Tinted Moisturiser Oil Free Natural Skin Perfector gives hardcore shine control for a perfected and believable, no make up make up look. Balancing oils but never drying skin, this multitasking formula combines skin care with make up to provide sheer coverage for normal and oily skin types. Infused with oil-absorbing powders, liquorice root extract, vitamin E and broad spectrum SPF 20, its proven to soothe irritation, nourish, hydrate and protect against the likes of environmental aggressors and sunny rays. Never settling into fine lines or looking cakey, the Tinted Moisturiser Oil Free Natural Skin Perfector also stays true to colour throughout the day. Plus, you dont have to worry if youve never tried a skin perfector before the buildable formula spreads and blends easily for mistake-proof application!

Laura recommends starting at the outer portion of the face and working inwards toward the nose. Avoid excess application around the contours of the face. name: BYREDO Rose Hand Wash BYREDO Rose Hand Wash
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your hardworking hands while simultaneously cleansing and caring for skin, you need to discover the brand's decadent range of hand care, beginning with the Rose Hand Wash. Housed in the brand's instantly recognisable (and incredibly lust-have) chic and simple – yet quintessentially luxe – monochrome packaging, BYREDO's Rose Hand Wash enables you to upgrade your scenting experience while leaving skin feeling nourished (never stripped!) and subtly perfumed throughout the day. Combining pleasure with function, prepare to fall for the scent's spellbinding blend of pink pepper and radiant raspberry alongside white musk and patchouli.

name: St. Tropez Express Starter Kit St. Tropez Express Starter Kit
description: Short on time and sun? Taking some of the stress out of last-minute plans, St. Tropez’s Express Mini Kit holds the key to gorgeously sun-kissed skin in just one hour. The mini Self Tan Express Bronzing Mousse (30ml) is a fast-acting mousse that develops into a radiant glow after just one hour, a medium tan in two hours or a deep bronze after three! Allowing you to control the depth and time spent on your skin, the intelligent formula is a staple in the collection faux glow aficionados and learners alike. The streak-free, easy-to-use formula is accompanied by the luxe Velvet Applicator Mitt for effortlessly even distribution that won’t leave tell-tale stains on your hands.
how_to_use: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturise any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles and feet. Step 2: For best results, apply using our Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the Mitt over your hands and feet. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Allow 1, 2 or 3 hours depending on your desired shade, before showering to reveal your developed tan. Your tan will then continue to develop for up to 8 hours. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as desired.

name: Weleda Replenishing Hand Cream - Sea Buckthorn 50ml Weleda Replenishing Hand Cream - Sea Buckthorn 50ml
description: Lightweight and easily absorbed, Weleda’s Sea Buckthorn Hand Cream is imbued with a host of nourishing ingredients to relieve rough and dry hands. Characterised by its high level of unsaturated fatty acids and vitamin E, sea buckthorn oil has regenerating, antioxidant and conditioning properties that make it an intensely nourishing ingredient – perfect for caring for your hands! It’s formulated with light organic sesame oil – a naturally derived emollient - that works to soothe and hydrate skin as it forms a protective barrier that locks in moisture for a smooth, soft finish. Plus, it’s infused with a fresh, zesty fragrance – thanks to grapefruit, mandarin and sandalwood essential oils – that lingers lightly after you massage it over your skin. This way to smooth and supple hands!
