name: Molton Brown Orange and Bergamot Fine Liquid Hand Wash Refill 400ml Molton Brown Orange and Bergamot Fine Liquid Hand Wash Refill 400ml
description: By royal appointment (no mean feat!), Molton Brown's silky Orange & Bergamot Fine Liquid Hand Wash Refill cleans the hands of the finest hotels' clientele. With the most heavenly scents - and now more eco-friendly refill pouches to top up your existing bottles - this rich formula allows you to turn hand-washing into an art form. Delectably fragranced and free from the usual suspects (no parabens, gluten or cruelty!), each of these opulent washes creates a soft, luxury lather that gently eliminates dirt and residual grime to leave paws feeling perfectly pampered. Transporting you straight to the heart of Seville with its lush citrus groves, dappled sunshine and azure blue skies, Orange & Bergamot lets you pretend you're in Spain (when it's pouring with rain). The citrusy 'zing' of Sevillian orange, bergamot and mandarin hover above a warm heart of neroli, cardamom and galmbanum which thrums above the base of musk, ylang-ylang and cedarwood. There's no flight required - this cleanser brings Spain to your living space.

name: Hello Sunday The One That Makes You Glow SPF 40 30ml Hello Sunday The One That Makes You Glow SPF 40 30ml
description: We all know the key to a healthy, radiant complexion is using SPF consistently, every single day of the year… but what about pre-existing damage? Hello Sunday’s The One That Makes You Glow SPF 40 brings you the power to protect your complexion against harmful UVA and UVB rays while treating hyperpigmentation at the same time. Drop your way to protected, glowing skin with this concentrated hybrid ampoule treatment. Combining antioxidant vitamins and hexylresorcinol to help correct and improve the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation, this advanced SPF induces a more even skin tone over time. Boasting a fragrance-free formula for the sensitive skins out there, and a light touch, fast-absorbing oil texture, this keeps your skin shielded against UVA, UVB, pollution and blue light. What more could we ask for?

name: Bondi Sands Sunny Daze SPF 50 Moisturiser 50g Bondi Sands Sunny Daze SPF 50 Moisturiser 50g
description: Whether you choose to bathe in the sun or stay indoors, the Sunny Daze SPF 50 Moisturiser will keep you protected against harmful UVA and UVB rays. Much more than just sunscreen, the Sunny Daze SPF 50 Moisturiser not only protects your skin against the perils of sun exposure, but it feeds your complexion with nourishing vitamin E, zinc oxide (an anti-inflammatory mineral) and hibiscus sabdariffa fruit extract, which is an alpha hydroxy acid that removes dead skin cells to make way for new ones. Suitable for even sensitive skin and made to work without coating your complexion in a ghostly cast, this formula won’t clog pores and provides up to 72 hours of hydration — all without any artificial fragrance!

name: Versed Guard's Up Daily Mineral Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF35 50ml Versed Guard's Up Daily Mineral Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF35 50ml
description: Shielding you from much more than just the sun, the Guard's Up Daily Mineral Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 35 protects you on all fronts – from environmental pollution, electronic pollution (because TikTok is a time-stealing vortex) and the sun. Offering its services without a trace of chalkiness or white cast, this creamy and lightweight formula delivers a natural finish that looks neither too dewy nor too matte. Oil free and powered by 15.2% non-nano zinc oxide, (which is the safest SPF active available as it won’t penetrate the epidermis or harm marine wildlife), this formula works on the skin’s surface to physically prevent rays from penetrating. Broad-spectrum protection (that’s protection against UVA and UVB rays, FYI) joins an array of antioxidants in safeguarding you from blue light, and amino acid-rich sea fennel extract boosts your elastin levels to firm and add bounce. Plus, moringa seed extract boasts vitamin C and encourages the production of collagen, and aloe leaf extract attracts and retains moisture while soothing skin.
how_to_use: HOW: Gently smooth an even, generous layer (about the size of a coin) onto skin. Because mineral SPF acts as a barrier, sitting on the surface of the skin, do smooth it on—don’t rub it in the way you would a moisturizer. Use a light touch with this and any products you apply after to avoid makeup pilling. WHERE: Face and neck. Bonus points for hands—after your eyes, hands are the number two spot that gives away age. WHEN: AM (every AM), after your moisturizer has fully absorbed into your skin. If wearing makeup, allow 2-3 minutes for the sunscreen to sink in before applying primer or other cosmetics. Reapply every 2 hours when in direct sunlight or getting wet. GOOD TO KNOW: Even though mineral sunscreen goes to work right away, we recommend following the FDA guidelines to wait 15 minutes before sun exposure. And remember: No sunscreen is a replacement for staying out of the sun. Use before the expiration date printed on the crimp on the tube.

Another tasty fruit makes an appearance in this impressive ingredients list: nutrient-rich mango butter — leaving skin super soft and supple via omega 6 and 9, fatty acids and vitamins A, C and E. As if that wasn’t enough, blemish-prone skin types will be pleased to know that the prickly pear flower extract is packed with more antioxidants, amino acids, and vitamin K, which is known to replenish skin. Your favourite hydrating hero, hyaluronic acid, also stars; and vitamin B5 rounds off the formula with a dose of anti-inflammatory properties. All of that in a lighter-than-air texture that seamlessly blends into dry, cracked or creped skin. Ultra-hydrated skin that smells like a tropical beach? We’ll take it.

name: DARLING Fluid Face Screen SPF 50+ 40ml DARLING Fluid Face Screen SPF 50+ 40ml
description: Primed for daily use – whether as a face cream or moisturising make up base is up to you – the Fluid Face Screen SPF 50+ is a sun protection saviour that we recommend you don’t forgo. The first crucial point to know? This innovative ultra-light face cream is fragrance and oil-free (read: it's suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive). Enriched with hydrating hyaluronic acid, soothing niacinamide and nasturtium extract, which promotes the skin's oxygenation process and helps to counteract skin stress caused by blue light, these active ingredients act on different levels of melanin formation to improve irregular skin pigmentations and uniform the complexion of the face. It’s safe to say it’s got our vote!

name: Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Exfoliating Body Treatment 91g Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Exfoliating Body Treatment 91g
description: Like the industry-adored, loved-by-celebs and bestselling (read: borderline magical) Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peels, the Alpha Beta Exfoliating Body Treatment comes in a set of either eight or two pads that you simply swipe over the body to reveal smooth, refined skin. Tailored to the needs of your body (rather than your face!) these pads combine the usual awe-inspiring effects of AHAs and BHAs, but on a stronger level. As Dr. Dennis Gross himself has explained, your body boasts thicker skin, so it calls for an intense formula. And it has fewer pores and oil-producing glands, which means it is more likely to become dehydrated! Therefore, this body treatment comes equipped with the likes of glycolic, lactic and salicylic acid, as well as bakuchiol (a plant-derived alternative to vitamin A via retinol), enzymes and a physical exfoliant in the form of its luxuriously textured pad. The resulting, multi-layered exfoliating formula encourages cell turnover and collagen production for perfected, polished skin. Oh, and did we mention that squalane (plus jasmine, lavender, and grapefruit extracts) makes an appearance to sooth and hydrate, too? We think you have a bit of drool on your chin there…

description: Take your Le Labo addiction one step further and master the art of scent layering by investing in a luxurious Shower Gel. Brimming with good-for-skin ingredients, such as vitamin E, olive leaf extract, aloe vera and flaxseed extract, these do as good as they smell. The formulas available in six beguiling scents that linger longingly on your skin, so all you need to do is pick from: AnOther 13 a hypnotising and scent-shifting scent that is unique to you and your pheromones; Bergamote 22 a zesty citrus scent with complex warming notes; Lys 41 an intoxicating white floral; Rose 31 a reinvention of the classic rose, Santal 33 a bewitching heady spiced leather or Thac Noir 29 an ode to black tea mingled with fresh, fruity notes of fig and bay. This also makes the perfect gift for a Le Labo devotee dying to expand their collection.

name: DeoDoc After Shave Balm Fresh Coconut 30ml DeoDoc After Shave Balm Fresh Coconut 30ml
description: Whether you choose to go au naturel or prefer a super-groomed intimate area, having the right tools is essential as shaving can be harsh on your skin. It’s a good thing DeoDoc’s Intimate After Shave Balm is on hand to assist in the task. Designed to be the final step in your grooming routine, this hypoallergenic anti-inflammatory balm uses panthenyl triacetate to soothe and calm the skin after shaving, alongside chelidonine, a natural plant-derived molecule that slows hair regrowth over time. By moisturising and nourishing the skin straight after hair removal, you’ll be able to prevent razor bumps, ingrown hairs and irritation.
how_to_use: Apply 1-2 pumps on clean dry skin directly after shaving. For best results, apply twice a day; morning and night or when itching occurs.

name: SUSANNE KAUFMANN St John's Wort Bath 50g SUSANNE KAUFMANN St John's Wort Bath 50g
description: Enriched with St. John’s wort extract – a flower/leaf extract used for centuries to treat mental health illnesses – Susanne Kaufmann’s St. John’s Wort Bath works to deeply moisturise and hydrate skin, and strengthen your skin barrier. Brimming with cocoa butter and milk protein to envelop skin in a rich blend of vitamins, minerals and amino acids, this relaxing bath soak helps to boost hydration levels and moisturise dry skin. A pampering end-of-day indulgence, the crystals dissolve with ease and pepper skin with a velvety sensation that softens skin and relaxes senses. Just a few tablespoons swirled through your bath water will strengthen skin, promote resilience and help to relieve stress and tension – so you can unwind as you feel all your woes wash away with the water.
how_to_use: Gently dispense five to seven teaspoons of the powder under warm running water for a relaxing bath soak. Relax in the warm water for up to 30 minutes.

name: Tan-Luxe The Butter Illuminating Gradual Tan Butter 200ml Tan-Luxe The Butter Illuminating Gradual Tan Butter 200ml
description: Melting into the skin like super-soft butter, this quick-drying gradual tanning moisturiser is your ticket to effortless bronzing. Featuring a complex of vitamin E and raspberry seed, oat and coconut oils, plus cocoa and shea butters, The Butter by TAN-LUXE has all the heroic hydrating action of your favourite moisturiser plus the tanning talents of a masterful faker – without that tell-tale fake tan scent. Also enriched with a ‘Cellutone Complex’ (a combination of caffeine and palmitoyl) this brilliant butter reduces the appearance of cellulite, intensely nourishing skin as it gradually builds into a natural-looking, sun-kissed tan.
how_to_use: Smooth onto your skin in circular motions. Wash hands after use.

name: St. Tropez Luxe Whipped Crème Mousse 200ml St. Tropez Luxe Whipped Crème Mousse 200ml
description: Achieve a golden glow with the St. Tropez Tan Luxe Luxe Crème Mousse, a universally flattering tan that delivers streak-free, long-lasting results. The sell-out Luxe Whipped Crème Mousse is back by popular demand, this time equipped with supercharged skincare ingredients for a soft and hydrated finish. Powered by hyaluronic acid and vitamin E, the self-tan goes beyond delivering a bronzed appearance and seeks to offer hydration that lasts up to 24 hours. The formula is supported by niacinamide and echinacea, to help boost radiance and encourage a more even tone. Boasting a quick dry-down, the non-sticky tanning mousse is instantly wearable, with a powder-soft finish. Leave on the skin for eight hours for full development.
how_to_use: Exfoliate and moisturise dry areas before application for a seamless tan. Shake the can well before use and glide on with a tanning mitt. Wear for eight hours before showering to allow the colour to fully develop. For the deepest tan, re-apply after 24 hours and moisturise regularly.

name: Shiseido Urban Environment Oil-Free Suncare Emulsion - SPF 30 30ml Shiseido Urban Environment Oil-Free Suncare Emulsion - SPF 30 30ml
description: The perfect travel size to throw in your bag and go, this oil-free SPF 30 sunscreen protects skin from UVA, UVB and pollution, leaving skin aglow with hydrating skin care ingredients. This sunscreen is an extension of your morning skin care routine with its beautifully lightweight emulsion texture that makes for seamless application. Enriched with spirulina energy essence, this blue-green algae is brimming with antioxidants that help with calming inflamed skin — the addition of black tea extract also doubles up on antioxidation and anti-inflammatory effects. Not only that, thanks to its photosynthetic qualities, this unique formulation actually absorbs UV rays and turns them into beneficial light that slows down the ageing process — now that’s what we call multitasking. With the beloved hydrating ingredient hyalronic acid in the mix, you can count on a finish that is glowing and hydrated while an anti-sebum complex combats pollution and excess sebum (great news for oily skin types!).
how_to_use: Shake until you hear the ball inside, then shake again thoroughly before use. As the last step of your morning routine, apply liberally onto your face. Remove with cleanser or make up remover. Beauty tips: Can be used as a primer. Note: Avoid direct contact with eyes. Flammable. If formula transfers to clothing, wash immediately using detergent.

name: Kopari Beauty Kp Body Bumps Be Gone Clarifying Body Pads 50ml Kopari Beauty Kp Body Bumps Be Gone Clarifying Body Pads 50ml
description: Before you hit the lotions and potions, take up these leave-on exfoliating pads to smooth skin, eliminate dead skin cell build up and reveal brighter skin that is more than ready to soak up the rest of your skin-loving routine. With 50 biodegradable pads to sift through, there’s plenty to go around. Powered by a blend of exfoliating acids, this potent formula tackles a multitude of skin bugbears. 4.4% AHAs (glycolic acid, lactic acid and fruit mix extract) are just the thing to smooth out rough texture and lighten dark spots; BHAs derived from willow bark extract and aloe are powerhouses in unclogging pores – a must for acne – and deliver a wealth of nutrients, vitamins and minerals. Would this be a Kopari creation if it didn’t include their most-loved ingredient? Of course not. The dependable coconut oil is brimming with vitamin E and fatty acids to deliver a dose of moisture to balance out the exfoliating effect. Whether you’re looking to add radiance back to your body or clear away keratosis pilaris, this powerful blend of ingredients makes way for that silky skin that is irresistible to touch.
how_to_use: Spread it all over your body for smooth, glowy hydration. Use daily to replenish dry skin. Founder’s Tip: use on damp, post-shower skin to lock in that hydration even more.

You’ll also find moisturising shea butter that soothes dryness and improves skin elasticity; acai extract to protect your skin from environmental stressors; and coffee extract to boost radiance.

name: Tan-Luxe The Body Illuminating Self-Tan Drops 50ml - Medium/Dark Tan-Luxe The Body Illuminating Self-Tan Drops 50ml - Medium/Dark
description: Transform your body moisturiser into a bespoke bronzing hero product with The Body by TAN-LUXE. A revolutionary approach to self-tanning (hitherto fraught with streaky, biscuit-scented tango tonics), you simply add drops of this glow-giving elixir to your body oil, cream or lotion to add natural-looking, sunkissed radiance to even the most dull, lacklustre skin. how_to_use: Prep Exfoliate using a gentle scrub 24 hours before tanning. Lightly moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Maintain Gently exfoliate and moisturise skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow. Caution We advise a patch test is done 24 hours prior to use. Do not apply on broken, irritated or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If a reaction occurs, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice. Does not contain sunscreen and will not protect against sun exposure. Product colour may vary due to natural ingredients.

name: Augustinus Bader The Body Cream 100ml Augustinus Bader The Body Cream 100ml
description: Building on the success (read: avid obsession) of his revolutionary face cream, Professor Augustinus Bader has created yet another iconic product. Intensely hydrating while visibly improving tone and texture, The Body Cream promotes the appearance of firmer, toned, more even skin as well as supporting a healthy barrier function and your softest and smoothest skin yet. Now available in the original (200ml) and a smaller (100ml) portion, you take this youth-prolonging cream with you wherever you go. Formulated for all skin types, The Body Cream is the perfect complement to The Cream and The Rich Cream for a head-to-toe hydrating and rejuvenating experience. Based on the knowledge that your body has an innate ‘code’ for tissue repair, The Cream contains the patented 'Trigger Factor Complex' (TFC8) which ‘unlocks’ this code. All sounding a bit scientific? The main thing you need to know is that by stimulating your skin’s natural renewal process, these potions help to visibly reduce the signs of ageing, leaving your skin looking and feeling restored, regenerated and renewed. Prepare for firmer, toned and more even skin that feels incredibly soft and smooth.

description: White films? Greasiness? We don't know her. The Avène Mineral Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream delivers high-level defence from the sun's rays, without leaving behind that dreaded shiny cast. The formula utilises photostable filters to help protect against UVA and UVB rays while provitamin E, a powerful antioxidant, shields the skin from environmental aggressors that can contribute to premature skin ageing. The lightweight, fragrance-free composition features Thermal Spring Water for that soothing, ultra-nourishing sensation your skin is yearning for, perfect for those prone to sensitivity.

Powered by coconut, this gel-based formula is teeming with electrolytes and amino acids to replenish hydration levels to their maximum level. As it lathers to a rich foam, sea kelp delivers antioxidants and vitamins A, B, C and E to bolster hydration and protect your skin from free radicals, respectively. Plus, this concoction infuses aloe vera juice to smooth and calm skin. The conclusion? This tropical concoction is just the thing you need to cleanse away the day without stripping your skin. Once you step out of the shower, expect to continue stealing the show as the luxurious scent of the juicy guava fruit.

That's largely down to the hyaluronic acid-infused fibres, which will help to lock in moisture to your skin for even longer as you apply your tan. That means a more radiant, long-lasting finish. And no need to worry about a build up of unwanted bacteria: this clever mitt has been crafted with innovative antimicrobial fibres that will help repel it. Ah-mazing!

description: Introducing the Self Tan Drops – Light/Medium, a must-have for those looking for a customisable, natural bronzed glow without the faff... or sun damage! Created to help you customise your tan, simply increase the number of drops to deepen you glow. So, whether you want to look like you just spent the weekend in the South of France, or as though just got back from a two-week holiday in Bali; these drops will do it all. name: Medik8 Advanced Day Total Protect SPF30 50ml Medik8 Advanced Day Total Protect SPF30 50ml
description: A 360Ëš cream to protect and replenish, Medik8s Advanced Day Total Protect deflects the harmful impact of the sun and daily stressors to delay the common signs of passing time. With broad spectrum SPF 30, alongside a pollution shield, anti-blue light and anti-A.G.E. technologies, this cream creates a barrier between skin and the perils of modern existence. A.G.E.s an acronym for advanced glycation end-products are the product of sugar that binds with the proteins (elastin and collagen) that keep the skin supple and lead to lines, sagging and lost elasticity. Carnosine helps to prevent the skin-ageing effects of these sugars, while cocoa seed extract protects from free radicals and moringa extract a next-generation antioxidant creates a parasol that works to ward against the elemental onslaught. Great under make up, consider this your ultimate skinsurance policy.

description: Say goodbye to synthetic pads of yesteryear and hello to DeoDoc's 100% Organic Cotton Day Pads. The star of this gel-cream formula is MALIN + GOETZ’s innovative, cold processed ‘MicroSperse® Technology’, which helps the SPF to glide on easily, spreading across your skin without pilling up or leaving an unwanted residue. To nourish your skin, the formula is also brimming with brightening, oil-balancing niacinamide, antioxidant-packed, conditioning vitamin E and non-nano zinc oxide — that’s what protects your complexion against UV rays without penetrating your skin.

description: Safeguard your hardworking hands and give them the care and attention they deserve with The Hand Treatment from Augustinus Bader, a uniquely restorative hand cream formulated to care for over-washed skin and keep it in perfect condition. It’s supple, soft skin from here on out… this intensely rich, shea butter-infused cream is the ultimate treat for your hands. Hand hygiene, an essential part of everyday life, but with constant washing and one on one time with your trusty hand sanitiser, your extremities are often left a little worse for wear. Ready to care for your hands is The Hand Treatment, brimming with Augustinus Bader’s famous technology — TFC8 — a complex of amino acids, vitamins and synthesised molecules that mimic those found naturally in the skin, this creates an optimal environment for your own repair and renewal processes. A blend of white peony extract and vitamin E delivers a powerful dose of antioxidants to vulnerable skin to safeguard it against the harsh effects of pollution. Known for its soothing and softening properties, this reparative treatment is teeming with naturally antiseptic honey to deliver a much-needed shot of moisture to dehydrated skin. We’ll be needing one for our bedside table and one for our bag so our hands are never without this skin saviour.

name: Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Exfoliating Body Treatment 2 x 10ml Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Exfoliating Body Treatment 2 x 10ml
description: Like the industry-adored, loved-by-celebs and bestselling (read: borderline magical) Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peels, the Alpha Beta Exfoliating Body Treatment comes in a set of either eight or two pads that you simply swipe over the body to reveal smooth, refined skin. Tailored to the needs of your body (rather than your face!) these pads combine the usual awe-inspiring effects of AHAs and BHAs, but on a stronger level. As Dr. Dennis Gross himself has explained, your body boasts thicker skin, so it calls for an intense formula. And it has fewer pores and oil-producing glands, which means it is more likely to become dehydrated! Therefore, this body treatment comes equipped with the likes of glycolic, lactic and salicylic acid, as well as bakuchiol (a plant-derived alternative to vitamin A via retinol), enzymes and a physical exfoliant in the form of its luxuriously textured pad. The resulting, multi-layered exfoliating formula encourages cell turnover and collagen production for perfected, polished skin. Oh, and did we mention that squalane (plus jasmine, lavender, and grapefruit extracts) makes an appearance to sooth and hydrate, too? We think you have a bit of drool on your chin there…
how_to_use: Simply swipe over skin in one easy step. Use an upward circular motion to make the best use of the physical exfoliation.

Working to restore balance and connection, skin is enveloped in a softening, hydrating shroud of calming and fragrant ylang ylang, sandalwood and vetiver, with a harmonising addition of skin-loving elements like sweet basil (an antioxidant that balances and protects against pollution and environmental stress), maca root (an energising ingredient that works to improve skin elasticity) and saw palmetto (a gently soothing, nourishing hero). A potent, skin-strengthening and soul-soothing blend of oils, this exquisite soak helps to alleviate tension and replenish precious moisture, so that skin is left feeling velvety-textured and your mind is left feeling at ease. name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Mousse - Light 200ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Mousse - Light 200ml
description: Anything but ordinary, Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Mousse is 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Mousse will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Exfoliate 24 hrs before tanning. Moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Pump product onto mitt and apply in sweeping motions. Leave hands and feet until last, sweeping lightly over. Your tan will develop in 4-6 hours, so in the meantime eat some ice cream, watch a movie, call a girlfriend, just don’t get the tan wet while it develops. Easy.

name: Bed of Nails Acupressure Mat Bed of Nails Acupressure Mat
description: Far from being a scary instrument of torture, this Bed of Nails can have a rapid impact on those nagging aches and pains and help you get a heavenly night's sleep. The makers have cleverly combined Eastern wisdom with Scandinavian modernity to create a funky-looking acupressure mat that alleviates tension, stress and stubborn twinges - helping you to unwind, clear your mind and to feel more nimble. More than 8,800 non-toxic plastic spikes are arranged on the mat and work in a similar way to acupuncture needles, helping release endorphins (the body's own 'happiness' drug) and oyxtocin, to help you stay calm and relaxed.
how_to_use: Lay the Bed of Nails on the floor or on a mattress and slowly lower yourself onto it. Beginners should wear a light T-shirt or lay a sheet over the mat until your body and skin get used to the spikes. Initially lie on the Bed of Nails for 10 - 15 mins, and as you get used to the pressure you can build up to 20 - 30 mins. Use as often as you need - preferably daily. Don't be alarmed if your skin stings a bit or feels warm and tingly, and it's perfectly safe to fall asleep for a while on the mat. Leaning against it (rather than laying on top of the mat and pillow) is a lighter way to use Bed of Nails while you acclimatise (you put less weight on the spikes when you do). Place the mat/pillow at the back of your sofa, bed or armchair to experience the benefits while building up your tolerance.
ingredient: The nails are made of 100% recycled non-toxic ABS plastic, the textile is cotton. The Bed of Nails should not be used in case of skin disease, haemophilia or the intake of anticoagulants.

name: Skingredients Skin Shield Moisturizing + Priming SPF 50 PA+++ Skingredients Skin Shield Moisturizing + Priming SPF 50 PA+++
description: Skin Shield SPF 50 PA+++ is your moisturising and priming SPF-rich day cream that protects your skin from sunlight, screen light, pollution and infrared light, leaving your skin with a peachy tint and deliciously dewy finish. Featuring niacinamide (also known as vitamin B3) and vitamin E for antioxidant protection, Skin Shield is your invisible mineral parasol. But it's not just a daily broad-spectrum SPF, it’s also a primer, with a peachy tint and dewy finish that dispels all worries about the dreaded, chalky white cast or photo flashback that’s become so synonymous with SPFs of the past. It is non-comedogenic, oil-free, water-resistant and non-greasy too, and it’s now even available in a refill, so that you can top up your original Skin Shield SPF 50 PA+++ without using as much packaging.

Please note: the slot-in refill features inner tube that clicks into the original, primary packaging. You must buy the original, refillable Skin Shield SPF 50 PA+++ first to use your refill.

Based on the knowledge that your body has an innate ‘code’ for tissue repair, The Cream contains the patented 'Trigger Factor Complex' (TFC8) which ‘unlocks’ this code. All sounding a bit scientific? The main thing you need to know is that by stimulating your skin’s natural renewal process, these potions help to visibly reduce the signs of ageing, leaving your skin looking and feeling restored, regenerated and renewed. Prepare for firmer, toned and more even skin that feels incredibly soft and smooth.

name: St. Tropez Watermelon Kit St. Tropez Watermelon Kit
description: Infused with vitamin E and watermelon extracts to replenish as it grants a seamless, realistic glow, St. Tropez’s Watermelon Tanning Kit unites the Self Tan Watermelon Infusion Bronzing Mousse with a colourful, Velvet Luxe Applicator Mitt for an effortless, streak-free finish. Ultra-long-lasting (up to ten days!), this non-sticky mousse has a tinted guide colour for instant bronzing, and develops over the course of four to eight hours (depending on the depth of tan you want) to lend a seamless, olive-toned tan with a fresh, melon scent (and no risk of transference). Vegan-friendly and formulated with 100% natural tanning actives, this versatile option fades evenly (and believably), making it perfect for bronzing beginners or ‘faux glow’ pros.
how_to_use: Golden Rules for the Perfect Sunless Tan: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Moisturise dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles, feet and any light hair. Step 2: For best results, apply using the accompanying tan applicator mitt in upward circular motions to the skin, ensuring all areas are covered and lightly glide excess tan over the hands and feet. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Allow 4-8 hours before getting wet to allow your tan to fully develop. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as required.

description: Packaged in cute candy-striped boxes, DeoDoc's discreet Intimate Deowipes are perfect for stashing in your handbag for quick and easy use when you're on the go. (who-knows-where-the-night-may-lead?), each box contains ten individually wrapped wipes — you can choose between the heavenly ‘Violet Cotton’, 'Fresh Coconut' or 'Jasmine Pear' scents. Create a spa-experience in your own home with this delicately, sweet-scented body butter and leave your skin in the best condition possible.

description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your body while simultaneously cleansing and caring for skin, you need to discover the brand's decadent range of body care, beginning with the Bal d'Afrique Body Wash. name: Tan-Luxe THE BODY Medium/Dark 15ml Tan-Luxe THE BODY Medium/Dark 15ml
description: Transform your body moisturiser into a bespoke bronzing hero product that’s perfectly portable with The Body - Travel Size by TAN-LUXE. A revolutionary approach to self-tanning (hitherto fraught with streaky, biscuit-scented tango tonics), you simply add drops of this glow-giving elixir to your body oil, cream or lotion to add natural-looking, sun-kissed radiance to even the most dull, lacklustre skin. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and TAN-LUXE’s ‘Cellutone Complex’, every droplet will boost, smooth, tone, tighten and, of course, tan tired-looking skin. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle (without any of the skin-damaging rays), The Body is available in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – delivering an even, luminous colour. No smell. No streaks. No drama.
how_to_use: Prep Exfoliate using a gentle scrub 24 hours before tanning. Lightly moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Apply Mix 2-6 drops per body part with your usual body moisturiser, oil or cream in the palm of your hand. More drops will add depth of colour. Apply to dry skin in large circular motions from head to toe lightly covering hands elbows and feet. Thoroughly wash hands after use. Maintain Gently exfoliate and moisturise skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow. Caution We advise a patch test is done 24 hours prior to use. Do not apply on broken, irritated or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If a reaction occurs, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice. Does not contain sunscreen and will not protect against sun exposure. Product colour may vary due to natural ingredients.

name: Tweezerman Animal Print Slant Tweezer - Leopard Tweezerman Animal Print Slant Tweezer - Leopard
description: Just as ingenious as you’d expect from the beauty tool experts Tweezerman, the Slant Tweezer has been (deservedly) lauded with praise and beauty awards for years. Painstakingly crafted and famous for their precision, these tweezers feature hand-filed tips at a 25-degree slant, allowing you to pluck more precisely than ever before, even if hairs are fine or short. Perfectly aligned to ensure they close evenly and firmly, they offer the cleanest, smoothest, strongest pulling power out there. Made from stainless steel, they’re durable and easy to clean, plus they come in multiple striking shade options – including the chic ‘Leopard’, vibrant ‘Pretty In Pink’ and black ‘Midnight Sky’ – to suit your aesthetic.
how_to_use: To ease tweezing, take a hot shower or use a warm washcloth to open pores. Tweeze in the direction of hair growth to avoid breakage. To close pores post tweezing, use cold water or astringent.

name: NUXE Sun Melting Spray for Face and Body SPF 50 NUXE Sun Melting Spray for Face and Body SPF 50
description: Looking for a lightweight SPF that also respects the environment, while deeply moisturising and highlighting your natural tan? You've found it: meet Nuxe's Delicious Sun Spray. Formulated with Nuxe's patented filtering complex - this SPF50 contains three sunscreens and two esters, which have been rigorously selected for their proven effectiveness on all UV rays (think: short UVB + UVA + long UVA.) A botanical blend of rice and rosemary extracts is also used to offer cellular protection and ensure your complexion maintains a more youthful-looking appearance. This clean formula has been tested on algae and corals to ensure its non-toxic for marine life, and has a non-greasy texture that absorbs instantly leaving no streaks - just a beautiful bare-skin feeling that also beautifies your natural tan. As for the scent? Nuxe has bottled the dreamy spirit of summer with tantalising notes of sweet orange, tiare flower and vanilla.
how_to_use: Apply product generously before sun exposure. Spray the product into your hands before applying to your face, avoiding the eye area. On the body, you can spray it directly before spreading it carefully. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying your skin. Note: Applying an insufficient amount of product will significantly reduce the level of sun protection. Excessive exposure to the sun is dangerous and sun care products do not provide 100% protection. Avoid exposure to the sun in the middle of the day.

name: Kopari Performance Plus Deodorant Kopari Performance Plus Deodorant

Powered by a patented natural odour-fighting system, this gentle deodorant is suitable for all skin types and promises unparalleled freshness. It's made with a combination of plant-based enzymes that help to provide odour protection while simultaneously helping to break down odor causing bacteria. Vegetable-derived starch then absorbs sweat and minimises moisture, while aloe vera and allantoin soothe and hydrate your skin.

name: Evereden Baby Moisturising Lotion Fragrance Free 251ml Evereden Baby Moisturising Lotion Fragrance Free 251ml
description: A lightweight lotion that provides long lasting hydration without irritating sensitive skin… now that’s a challenge. Luckily, Evereden’s Baby Moisturizing Lotion is up to the task. With a clever mix of avocado, coconut, grape and sunflower seed oils, this gentle formula locks in moisture, while 2% colloidal oatmeal soothes inflammation. Moisture barrier protection is an important part of looking after your baby’s skin, and finding a lotion that strengthens and nourishes when your little one is as young as just three weeks old can reduce the risk of developing eczema and skin allergies by up to 50%. This fragrance-free formula proves a safe option if you’re looking to avoid essential oils and harsh ingredients.

description: Looking for instant glow-ification? Perhaps surprisingly — don’t let its name dissuade you — St. Tropez’s Gradual Tan Tinted Body Lotion grants a bronzed finish from the get-glow and then continues to develop for long-lasting radiance. As for method behind the faux glow, the formula calls on a 100% natural tanning active that develops over 4-8 hours to reveal a streak-free, medium-tan finish. The non-sticky, quick-drying formula will leave skin looking naturally tanned and feeling soft and supple. Best for anyone who needs to see results stat, pair this fast-acting formula with your favourite mitt for seamless blending and mess-free application.

name: Pacifica Coconut Cream Body Wash Pacifica Coconut Cream Body Wash
description: Packed with hydrating ingredients to gently cleanse your skin (without ever leaving it feeling dry or tight), this body wash is infused with a relaxing blend of fresh coconut and vanilla — set to send you to a tropical paradise with every use. Allantoin rounds out the formula, working hard to soothe your limbs and protect against irritation. Just heavenly.

name: Evereden Soothing Baby Massage Oil 118ml Evereden Soothing Baby Massage Oil 118ml
description: There are plenty of benefits of massaging your baby, from improving their sleep to improving your mental wellbeing. Evereden's ultra-gentle, fragrance-free massage oil is the perfect companion for building the ritual into your week. With a super simple formula - we're talking just five natural and organic ingredients carefully chosen to nourish skin without risking irritation - this massage oil is gentle enough to be used whenever you want to bond and relax with your baby. Even babies need a little bit of spa-worthy zen now and again, after all. If your little one suffers from rashes or dryness and you're keen to avoid harsher ingredients like steroids, this massage oil offers a gentle alternative. Prepare to fall in love with the effective combination of sunflower seed oil (a natural anti-inflammatory ingredient) and coconut oil, all-in-one lightweight formula.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Body Wash 500ml Dr. Barbara Sturm Body Wash 500ml
description: Showering shouldn’t leave your skin feeling tight and dry. That’s why Dr. Barbara Sturm has developed her Body Wash: a fragrance and colour-free formula that calls on skin-friendly, natural biomolecules which provide a light foaming action that cleanses without drying out the skin. Chosen for their ability to cleanse gently without removing natural oils or moisture from the skin, the plant-based biomolecules (read: tensides and glycolipids to be exact) are used in place of common surfactants. The wash is also laced with hyaluronic acid, prickly pear extract, sweet almond extract and almond oil to provide intensive moisture and soothe your skin. Finally, it wouldn’t be a Dr. Barbara Sturm formula without purslane extract — the key ‘super plant’ active used across the range — helping to calm inflammation and protect sensitive cell membranes against free radicals.
how_to_use: Apply one or two pumps of the gel to your hands and massage into wet skin. Rinse off thoroughly and towel-dry before applying Dr. Barbara Sturm‘s Anti-Aging Body Cream.

You’re certain to fall in love with the scent too: a rainforest-inspired aroma made from upcycled flowers, uniting woody and spicy notes of freshly sliced grapefruit and creamy sandalwood.

description: Soothing and calming itchy, irritated and eczema or dermatitis-prone skin, de Mamiel's Skin Recovery Blend is an all-enveloping balm-to-oil that targets dry, irritated and inflamed skin. name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water Refill Pouch Light 200ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water Refill Pouch Light 200ml
description: Now available in an eco-friendly refillable pouch, Isle of Paradise's Self-Tanning Water Refill Pouch means no more unnecessary wastage but more sunless, sunkissed glow! Made with 81% less packaging than buying a brand new bottle, this earth-friendly design is a no-brainer! Incredibly effective and easy-to-use, this removes any possibility of fake tan faux pas. Simply spritz the entire body and face with your chosen shade of water until skin is saturated in product and within 4 – 6 hours your skin will radiate a dewy, sun-kissed glow. Anything but ordinary, all Isle of Paradise products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each pouch is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Water will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Unscrew the lid of your {Self Tanning Water} and then unscrew the lid of your Refill Pouch and pour delicately into the empty bottle. Screw the lids tightly.

name: Dermalogica Dynamic Skin Recovery SPF50 50ml Dermalogica Dynamic Skin Recovery SPF50 50ml
description: Combat signs of skin ageing and keep dryness at bay with the Dynamic Skin Recovery SPF 50 Moisturiser — an emollient daily hydrator that improves the appearance of skin and keeps it perfectly nourished. No routine is complete without a daily SPF, and dry and dehydrated skin should look no further… this mid-weight moisturiser offers long-lasting hydration with broad-spectrum protection. A unique polypeptide improves the appearance of skin that shows signs of sun damage while polyphenol-rich antioxidant white tea provides protection against environmental stressors that contribute to premature signs of ageing. Blending smoothly into your complexion for a silky-soft and non-sticky finish, this is the sunscreen that you want to wear.
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply a generous amount to face and neck, preferably 30 minutes prior to sun exposure.

name: Frank Body Smoothing AHA Body Lotion 140ml Frank Body Smoothing AHA Body Lotion 140ml
description: Struggling with back-ne, arm-ne or even chest-ne? Don’t pop ‘em, frank body ‘em! It’s high time we take a more sensitive approach to the way we care for the skin on our bodies, so what better way to start than with this Smoothing AHA Body Lotion? Indulge your skin in some much needed TLC with the help of lactic and glycolic acids that work harmoniously together to promote clearer and softer skin. Also fused with oh-so-nourishing mango seed butter (that’s great inside your body as well as on it), super hydrating and non-greasy macadamia seed oil and kakadu plum for an effective exfoliation, consider this multi-tasking lotion to be your knight in pink packaging! You’d think all of these skin-loving goodies in one bottle could overwhelm your skin, right? Wrong! It’s superrr lightweight and moisturising. Don’t just take our word for it, add to your basket and find out for yourself…
how_to_use: Start with clean, dry skin. Squeeze into your hands, then rub all over. Or, use as a spot treatment on rough spots like elbows, knees, toes or arms. Use on days when you’re not scrubbing.

name: ESPA Modern Alchemy The Nourishing Balm 180ml ESPA Modern Alchemy The Nourishing Balm 180ml
description: A decadent addition to your bath and body rituals, the Modern Alchemy Nourishing Balm takes its inspiration from the soothing, ancient rituals of ayurvedic healing, Chinese medicine and shamanic practices. Sending you on a sensual, holistic journey of self-care, the formula rejuvenates the skin, body, mind and soul with a rich, delicately scented, balm-to-oil texture that nurtures, firms and enriches skin. Working to restore balance and connection, skin is enveloped in a softening, hydrating shroud of calming and fragrant ylang ylang, sandalwood and vetiver, with a harmonising addition of softening, glow-bestowing ingredients like patchouli plant-derived oils that calm and relax for balanced, healthy skin; nurturing fireweed that deeply moisturises, deflects dryness and protects against oxidative stress; and amla – a powerful antioxidant that boasts high levels of replenishing oleic acid with soothing curcumin.
how_to_use: Begin your ritual after bathing. Warm the balm between your palms, bringing them to your face and slowly inhaling three times – allowing the nurturing aromatic oils to ground you – before smoothing your hands in long sweeping strokes over damp skin to preserve precious moisture. This product can be used morning or evening before you shower or bath as a balancing massage ritual and can also be applied after cleansing to seal in moisture.

description: You’ve heard of sheet masks for your face — but what about for your growing pregnancy belly? The Soothing Belly Mask is here to pamper you and your bairn — just sit back, relax, and enjoy this spa-like treatment... Drenched in six organic superfood oils as well as skin care superhero collagen, placing this refreshing and comforting sheet mask over your belly for 10 to 15 minutes will hydrate and soothe skin. It will also help to prevent stretch marks, as collagen strengthens skin and helps to reduce scarring. In an innovative one-size-fits-all edition, this mask will fit perfectly — no matter where you are in your pregnancy journey.

name: Le Labo Shower Oil Le Labo Shower Oil
description: An indulgent in-shower experience, Le Labo’s Shower Oil boasts a skin-nourishing cocktail of coconut, argan and sunflower oils (without any parabens, phthalates or artificial colouring!) to gently but thoroughly cleanse and condition. A great way to streamline your wake-up regime, this stunning concoction both cleans and infuses your skin with its blend of protective, hydrating and softening extracts. Perfect for putting a ‘spring’ in your skin, this helps to boost bounce and enhance elasticity, keeping your limbs feeling smooth, soft and supple (with next-to-no effort). Transforming from oil to an opulent milk, this also inspires a positive outlook with sparkling, citrus-y top notes of mandarin layered with fresh, floral notes of geranium – inhale the decadent, mood-boosting fragrance and get set to carpe the diem!
how_to_use: Massage over damp skin before rinsing thoroughly. Follow with your favourite Le Labo body moisturiser.

name: PATRICK TA Major Glow Body Oil - 30ml PATRICK TA Major Glow Body Oil - 30ml
description: The perfect introduction for any seeking a full-body glow-over or those who can't bear to be without their Major Glow Body Oil, this teeny take (a respectable 30ml) on the iconic oil will look endlessly chic in your handbag. Absolutely glow-rious, it illuminates skin with a dewy, pearlescent veil whether you apply it to your daccolletac, arms, legs or all-over for a captivating glow. Enriched with nourishing olive oil and squalane, the formula delivers a hefty moisture boost with a non-greasy reflective finish. Stabilised vitamin C works on a deeper level to boost radiance, stimulate collagen production and protect against environmental aggressors. Adding to the allure is the divine signature scent a fragrance swirled with jasmine, saffron and ambergris. There are three shades to choose between, all of which have a transparent base but with different coloured pearl reflects: A Dream has champagne reflects, warm rose A Vision has pink pearls, and deep bronze A Moment has gold pearls.

name: DARLING High Protection SPF 30-50 DARLING High Protection SPF 30-50
description: You don't need us to tell you: it's so important to lather up with sun cream, especially when the temperature rises, and the High Protection SPF 50 offers high broad-spectrum protection for all skin types. With a silky, lightweight texture that turns invisible on any skin tone, this deeply moisturising formula is based around vitamin E – a key ingredient used to reduce skin stress and sun spots thanks to its antioxidant properties. It's also infused with apricot oil (used to reduce inflammation) and jojoba oil to nourish the skin and help maintain elasticity and prevent any damages caused by atmospheric agents. So, if moisturised, protected and naturally luminous skin is what you're after, you know what to do…

description: Adding the perfect touch of warmth to skin, the Hyaluronic Self-Tan Drops, Calendula and DHA bestows complexions with a sunkissed-glow, while blending seamlessly into skin for a streak-free finish. Brimming with DHA and calendula extract, these self-tan drops dispense just the right amount of customisable colour along with conditioning benefits to deliver and lock-in hydration. And speaking of the H-word, this brightening must-have infuses a trio of hydration heroes: hyaluronic acid, aloe vera and glycerin to give your skin a healthy-looking appearance, and enhance your inner radiance. Thanks to its dropper form, play with the amount as you please! Whether you want a smidge of sun to beat the winter blues or to dial up the tan in the summer, your skin will thank you for this tall drink of hydration.

description: Reactive skins rejoice! For La Roche-Posay have specifically formulated this treatment toner to help regulate oil without disrupting your skins natural balance. Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. name: Jordan Samuel Skin Olio per il Corpo Body Oil Jordan Samuel Skin Olio per il Corpo Body Oil
description: Somewhere in Sicily, 2019, Jordan Samuel Pacitti had the notion to bottle the spirit of the sun-drenched isle in an endlessly replenishing body oil. Enter Jordan Samuel Skin's Olio per il Corpo Body Oil. With a crisp, citrus scent - the very same as the beloved {After Show Treatment Cleanser} - that acts as an ode to the Sicilian countryside and a vintage apothecary design that's finished with an old-world Italian label, this decadent release will transport you to warmer climes. The nourishing formula is infused with lightweight, antioxidant-rich grape seed oil that replenishes moisture levels without feeling greasy, as well as anti-inflammatory broccoli seed oil and tomato extract (another source of antioxidants!) and refreshing citrus extracts. For skin that glows, this vegan blend should be your go-to...

name: Laura Mercier Ambre Vanille Bath and Body Oil 100ml Laura Mercier Ambre Vanille Bath and Body Oil 100ml
description: Enveloping your skin with a lightweight blend of deeply nourishing oils, a few drops of the multi-use Bath & Body Oil is all you need to revive your all-over radiance. Inviting spa-like indulgence into your bath-time routine, this antioxidant-powered oil glides over your limbs, seeping into your skin with a nourishing feel. Rich in baobab seed, jojoba seed and French plum seed oils, this moisture-locking cocktail delivers a surge of hydration that lasts up to 48 hours! Available in three luxuriating scents that are perfect for layering, this sensori-oil essential is sure to become a permanent fixture in your body care arsenal.

Loving Tan Deluxe Face Tan 50ml (Various Shades) Loving Tan Deluxe Face Tan 50ml (Various Shades)

name: Drunk Elephant Juju Bar 120g Drunk Elephant Juju Bar 120g
description: Far from traditional soap, this ultra-mild, 3-in-1 bar deeply cleanses, subtly exfoliates and detoxifies - all without drying or stripping the skin of its protective barrier. Enriched with thermal mud, bamboo powder and marula oil, this brilliant bar is a gift from the skin care gods. Designed to effectively cleanse while gently removing dead skin cells from the surface of your skin, this bar stars thermal mud and bamboo powder, which create a creamy lather that dissolves unwanted oil, rinsing away pore-clogging surface debris and impurities. Virgin marula oil - rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 - helps to hydrate, nourish and rejuvenate, while superfruit extract açai and goji berry (both potent antioxidants known to neutralise free radicals) help to protect your skin from premature ageing while conditioning, moisturising and balancing your skin. Totally soap and fragrance-free, the Juju Bar will not strip or dry the skin as some traditional bar cleansers do; instead, it has a pH level of 6.34, which ensures sufficient cleansing without drying, preserving your skin's essential moisture barrier and leaving it soft and smooth as well as clean.
how_to_use: Wet the Juju Bar and with your hands, apply lather to the skin in a gentle, circular motion. Massage over face, neck and chest. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry. The Juju Bar may be used day or night, up to 3 times per week. Do not apply bar directly to skin. Store your Juju Bar in a dish where it is slightly elevated and excess water can drain off and air dry.

description: Resurrection Rinse-Free Hand Wash is the aristocracy of hand sanitisers. Boasting a non-drying, alcohol-based formulation, it cleanses your skin without requiring a sink, so it's perfect for travelling and looking after adventure-prone little ones. The packaging is so much chicer than most hand sanitisers and regular use won't dry your hands, instead, moisturising agents make for soft and re-hydrated skin. It comes in a lightweight plastic bottle and the gel smells divinely of mandarin rind, rosemary leaf and cedar wood atlas: making this a real pleasure to use – as well as a bacteria-busting powerhouse.

Good thing DeoDoc’s Shaving Intimate Foam is on hand to assist with the task in your choice of the sweet yet tropical blend of creamy coconut in ‘Fresh Coconut’ or the fragrance-free formula for the truly delicate-skinned amongst us. Formulated specifically to nourish and protect even the most sensitive skin, the gentle formula lathers up to help your razor glide more easily against the skin. That means no painful nicks, cuts or razor burn; it also helps you to achieve a more precise and quick shave, should you choose to groom. The foam is infused with beta vulgaris (beet) root extract, which imparts powerful antioxidants that your skin will lap up to leave it feeling nourished and smooth.

name: Mama Mio Pregnancy Boob Tube 125ml Mama Mio Pregnancy Boob Tube 125ml
description: For the growing busts during the nine-month stretch, Mama Mio’s Pregnancy Boob Tube is here to maintain your skin’s elasticity with an omega-rich creamy dream for stretchmarks that dare to peek-a-boo. Brimming with a unique blend of avocado, inchi and argan oils which restore suppleness to your precious skin; moisture-magnetic squalane; all-natural aloe vera to soothe any irritation with a cooling sensation; cabbage leaf extract that has been helping all mamas with sore breasts for centuries and shea butter to lock in all the kind-to-skin nutrients, this cream is prompts baby-soft skin even after you’ve given birth. Exciting your senses with an incredibly sweet and 100% natural blend of orange, bergamot, may chang, mandarin and lime, we’d understand if you became as obsessed with this hydrating cream as much as we are. Housed a recyclable tube using sustainably sourced materials, we’re caring for all mothers alike — including our dear and delicate Mother Nature. Sound like a goo-goo, ga-ga…dd to basket?

Its fast-absorbing texture melts into the skin without leaving a sticky or greasy residue, while it works to hydrate and nourish for up to eight hours to grant a soft and soothed finish. Suitable for babies from six months old, the sunscreen is a reliable all-rounder for helping to keep the family safe in the sun.

name: Frédéric Malle Portrait of a Lady Body Butter Frédéric Malle Portrait of a Lady Body Butter
description: The perfect way to subtly intensify your favourite fragrance, Frédéric Malle's Portrait of a Lady Body Butter feeds your skin with precious moisture while enveloping you top-to-toe with scent. Evoking elegance and poise, Frédéric Malle’s Portrait of a Lady has the timeless grace of icons through the ages – from Henry James’ protagonist to Princess Grace of Monaco – think: stylish silhouettes and an innate sophistication with an underlying spirit of rebellion. Striving to capture the essence of the wearer – from her bearing to her gaze, her cool serenity and confidence – Portrait of a Lady redefines what ‘lady’ means. There’s nothing reserved or aloof about this heady medley of Turkish rose (400 flowers per 100ml bottle), patchouli, sandalwood and frankincense – instead, this daring blend is full of character and derring-do: a perfume for a modern muse, whether she’s in jeans or swathed in taffeta. Bound by a beautifully balanced accord of crisp blackcurrant, warm clove and raspberry, this fragrance is brimming with character, charm and a whisper of sex appeal… this is rosy but not as you know it.

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water - Medium 200ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water - Medium 200ml
description: Picky when it comes to your faux glow application? If you’re anti-mousse and aren’t keen on drops then you need to try Isle of Paradise’s Self-Tanning Water. Incredibly effective and easy-to-use, this removes an possibility of fake tan faux pas. Simply spritz the entire body and face with your chosen shade of water until skin is saturated in product and within 4 – 6 hours your skin will radiate a dewy, sun-kissed glow. Anything but ordinary, all Isle of Paradise products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Water will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Exfoliate 24 hrs before tanning. Moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Mist until skin is totally saturated, covering face, leaving hands and feet until last before blending with a tanning mitt using sweeping motions. Thoroughly wash palms after use. Your tan will develop in 4-6 hours, so in the meantime eat some ice cream, watch a movie, call a girlfriend, just don’t get the tan wet while it develops. Easy.

Meanwhile, purslane extract brightens and marshmallow root extract soothes, locking in moisture and leaving the skin cleansed, refreshed and restored. The luxe scent of Pharaoh’s Love adds notes of white lily, rose, heliotrope, white musk and vanilla.

name: Patchology PoshPeel PediCure 4 Pack Bundle Patchology PoshPeel PediCure 4 Pack Bundle
description: Featuring four of their fan-favourite pedicure treatments, this bundle offers a 37% saving and allows you a much-needed self care moment. Patchology’s foot peel treatment is infused with a powerful blend of AHAs and BHAs (think glycolic, lactic, salicylic and citric acid) to slough away dead skin cells and reveal smoother, supple skin. Often overlooked but arguably key to embracing full-on relaxation mode is treating yourself to a minimal-effort pedicure. So, while this slip-on sock works its brightening magic in just 60 minutes, sit back, relax and let this luxurious treatment do all the hard work to rejuvenating skin. How’s that for self-care?!
how_to_use: Step 1: Prepare for your PoshPeel Pedi Cure treatment by soaking feet in still water for 5-10 minutes. Next, open the Foot Masque Socks by separating the outer layer from the inner cotton layer. Step 2: Pour the Activating Essence into one of the Foot Masque Socks and evenly distribute along the inside of the cotton lining. Step 3: Place your foot inside the sock and seal with attached closure. Repeat for the other foot. Step 4: Wear for 60 minutes (or up to 90 minutes if greater exfoliation is desired). Step 5: Remove socks and discard. Thoroughly rinse and dry feet. Progressive peeling action will commence in approximately 35 days. Use PoshPeel Pedi Cure once every 60-90 days, or as needed.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Skin Super Anti-Aging 60 capsules Dr. Barbara Sturm Skin Super Anti-Aging 60 capsules
description: Want to support and nourish your skin from the inside out? Dr. Barbara Sturm has formulated the answer: Skin Super Anti-Aging supplement. This incredibly effective supplement is the product of expert medical research, combining leading-edge science with natural, skin-loving compounds to boost your complexion. The standout ingredient is purslane, an elusive ‘super plant’ with powerful skin benefits, including anti-inflammatory, antioxidative and nutritive properties. It also activates the ‘fountain of youth’ enzyme telomerase (which stimulates cell renewal) and contributes to refreshed, clear skin. It’s also laced with zinc and selenium to contribute to the maintenance of skin health and shield against the damaging effects of oxidative stress. Finally, a cocktail of astaxanthin, Coenzyme Q10, glutathione and bamboo extract promotes a smooth, radiant and younger-looking complexion.

BARBARA STURM INSIDE supplements can be taken all together or individually. If you are pregnant, planning to conceive, breastfeeding or taking any other medication, please consult with your doctor beforehand.

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Face Mist - Night 100ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Face Mist - Night 100ml
description: Lie back, relax and tan as you slumber! Tan smarter not harder with Isle of Paradise’s Night Glow Face Mist: a nourishing gradual tanner, complete with calming aromatics such as ylang ylang, jasmine and lavender, that develops as you sleep to reveal a radiant glow by the time the birds start chirping. Your evening wind-down ritual is about to get all-the-more glowy… This nighttime facial mist not only features a trio of botanicals known for their calming qualities – we’re talking jasmine, lavender and ylang ylang – but it’s also infused with impressive skin-loving ingredients; it’s powered by the likes of hyaluronic acid and glycerin to pack a punch of hydration that will leave your skin looking dewy and pillowy soft come morning. As for the glow, this mist is made with the perfect level of gradual tanner so that you’ll wake to the radiant complexion of your dreams with no nightmarish pillow marks!
how_to_use: Shake well before use to activate. Close eyes and mist 2-3 spritzes to your face. Use nightly as the last step in your routine to hydrate, refresh and revive your glow.

name: Laura Mercier Ambre Vanille Exfoliating Body Wash 200ml Laura Mercier Ambre Vanille Exfoliating Body Wash 200ml
description: Renewing your all-over radiance with a nourishing, oil-rich blend, the Exfoliating Body Wash engulfs both your skin and senses with spa-like luxury. Buffing away dead skin cells with a non-drying feel, this hydrating formula seals in skin-softening benefits and keeps impurities out. Supercharged with castor seed oil, glycerin and sucrose (just to name a few heroes), this firming formula is like a sweet treat but for your skin. Infused with strawberry seeds to aim physical exfoliation, this scrub transforms into a nourishing lather that revitalises skin and boosts circulation. Whether you're an in-shower vocalist harmonising to your favourite song or the type to luxuriate in the bath with a candle, this sensorial scrub turns your bathroom into the ultimate sanctuary. What's more - choose from three delightful fragrances from 'Néroli du Sud' to 'Almond Coconut' to match your mood.

description: Adding the perfect touch of warmth to skin, the Hyaluronic Self-Tan Drops, Calendula and DHA bestows complexions with a sunkissed-glow, while blending seamlessly into skin for a streak-free finish. Brimming with DHA and calendula extract, these self-tan drops dispense just the right amount of customisable colour along with conditioning benefits to deliver and lock-in hydration. And speaking of the H-word, this brightening must-have infuses a trio of hydration heroes: hyaluronic acid, aloe vera and glycerin to give your skin a healthy-looking appearance, and enhance your inner radiance. Thanks to its dropper form, play with the amount as you please! Whether you want a smidge of sun to beat the winter blues or to dial up the tan in the summer, your skin will thank you for this tall drink of hydration.
how_to_use: Mix 2-10 drops with your serum or moisturiser and smooth all over your face, taking care to blend all over your jaw line. Customise your glow by adjusting the number of drops you use. 2-4 for gentle radiance. 4-10 for enhanced glow. Use as often as required to achieve your ideal shade. Wash hands thoroughly after application.

name: FUR KP Body Scrub 180ml FUR KP Body Scrub 180ml
description: Forget being bothered by KP, the Fur KP Body Scrub is just the thing to save your skin from rough patches, bumps and flaky skin as it buffs away keratin build up, the main culprit of keratosis pilaris. Infused with 14% AHAs (lactic acid, in this case) that refine skin tone and texture, fur combines chemical exfoliation with the physical nature of this perlite-infused scrub (a mineral derived from volcanic rock) for dual-action, micro-dermabrasion benefits (read: your skin will be smoooooth). And don’t worry about your skin feeling dry or tight, the KP Body Scrub’s non-stripping formula uses sunflower seed oil, which is vitamin-rich to deeply hydrate and protect skin — in a clinical trial, 95% of people even agreed that their skin felt hydrated, and we can’t argue with that number. It also soothes any redness, irritation and puffiness by way of licorice root extract, and its bonus effect is it brightens skin discolouration, too! Use this skin saviour all-over, from the back of your arms to legs to wherever you’ve got a bump in the road, and smooth, soft skin is all yours.
how_to_use: In the shower, apply KP Body Scrub in a gentle, circular motion on damp skin where keratosis pilaris, bumps, or rough patches occur, such as the back of arms and legs. Rinse and pat dry. Use 2-3 times a week to combat existing skin concerns and to maintain smoother skin over time. For best results, follow with your favorite Fur moisturizer. Because of the high percentage of powerful AHAs, it could be irritating on more delicate facial or pubic skin—for a gentler exfoliation that targets ingrowns and can be used by more sensitive skin types, try Fur’s Silk Scrub.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Perlite, Sodium Gluconate, Lactic Acid, Sunflower (Helianthus Annuus) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Lauryl Glucoside, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Licorice (Glycyrrhiza Glabra) Root Extract, Willow Bark Extract, Althaea Officinalis (marshmallow) Root Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Coumarin, D-Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool.

name: Murad Pore Reform Skin Smoothing Polish 100ml Murad Pore Reform Skin Smoothing Polish 100ml
description: A superior skin scrub for oily-prone skin, Murad's Blemish Control Skin Smoothing Polish polishes, softens, and purifies to leave skin smooth to the touch. Formulated with witch hazel and cinnamon extract, this visibly tighten pores and help control shine while gentle, physical exfoliants polish away dry skin to smooth and soften skin.

description: A skin care routine is nothing without a hardworking serum you can trust, so why not reap its benefits all over? name: Isle of Paradise Glow Clear Self-Tanning Mousse - Dark 200ml Isle of Paradise Glow Clear Self-Tanning Mousse - Dark 200ml
description: Anything but ordinary, Isle of Paradise Glow Clear Self-Tanning Mousse is 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, this clear formula promises zero transfer and has zero guide colour meaning you can sweep this on, let it dry and go about your day without any tell-tale signs of faux glow development. Each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Mousse will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Pump mousse directly onto mitt 3x. Apply to skin in sweeping motion. Recommend half a pump for the face. Wash palms after use and re-moisturise hands. Tan will develop in 4-6hrs – don’t get your skin wet during this time! PRO TIP: If going clear makes you nervous – try mixing your favourite highlighter on the mitt for a subtle guide colour.

name: COOLA Refreshing Water Cream SPF 50+ 44ml COOLA Refreshing Water Cream SPF 50+ 44ml
description: Dive into this Refreshing Water Cream infused with hydration hero hyaluronic acid, dew-delivering coconut water and plant-derived super protective SPF 50. Powered by COOLA's BlueScreen™ Digital De-Stress™ technology, this cutting-edge cream provides the ultimate protection against daily aggressors thanks to its ability to mitigate the effects of High Energy Visible Light (think blue light from your digital devices and infrared light), while also protecting against pollution and free radicals. Not only does this day cream shield your skin, but with key SPF ingredient homosalate (an organic derivative of salicylic acid) as well as other UVA/UVB blockers, it provides unparalleled protection from the powerful SPF 50. With a lightweight dewy finish, expect serious hydration steeped in skin protecting ingredients.

name: BeYou CBD Bath Bomb - Chamomile and Jasmine 150g BeYou CBD Bath Bomb - Chamomile and Jasmine 150g
description: Take your bathing ritual up a notch with BeYou’s CBD Bath Bomb, free from THC (so no psychoactive effects) and teeming with 100% natural ingredients these are a must for any bath lovers in need of some serious de-stressing. Handmade in the UK with only 100% natural ingredients you can bathe easy knowing you’re indulging your body in the best of the best.

name: AMELIORATE Clarifying Clay Body Wash 200ml AMELIORATE Clarifying Clay Body Wash 200ml
description: AMELIORATE's Clarifying Clay Body Wash works to deeply cleanse the skin, removing sweat, oil and dead skin build-up that cause blemishes to appear, while helping to lock in moisture. The formula clarifies and purifies to help minimise the risk of future breakouts. Complete with an uplifting and energising fragrance, the body wash leaves skin feeling hydrated and deeply cleansed. 89% agreed skin looked mattified & less oily 88% agreed pores felt deeply cleansed 87% agreed product reduced appearance of blemishes and blocked pores *Independently tested on a panel of 120 men and women in a 6 week user trial.

description: Feeling dryness travel all over your body? Open up the floodgates of moisture with the Hyaluron Body Gel for the ultimate surge of head-to-toe hydration. Blending together a host of skin-smoothing agents from botanical hyaluronic acid designed to bind moisture and increase elasticity; barrier-boosting balloon vine extract that works to protect against redness; gentle aloe vera that leaves your skin feeling aaah-mazing and menthol for the ultimate cooling sensation, this gel-like must-have restores firmness to every crease and crevice on your body. name: OSKIA Adaptive Tan Drops OSKIA Adaptive Tan Drops
description: Ultra-luxe and characteristically innovative, Oskia’s Adaptive Tan Drops provide a new way to grant your skin a gorgeous golden glow: 100% natural self-tanning. Formulated by a crack team of doctors, nutritionists and cosmetic scientists, the drops contain Oskia’s own naturally encapsulated DHA (the tanning agent responsible for making you look like you’ve just returned from two weeks in the sun) along with amino acids and a natural melanin complex, which boost your natural colour. Providing a healthy glow within hours (3-4, to be precise) the colour gently deepens over time, while health-boosting, antioxidant benefits are granted from MSM, pea peptides, monk’s pepper, white tea and vitamins A, C, E and provitamin B5, nourishing skin beautifully while imparting flattering, sun-kissed colour. And the best part of all? These versatile drops can be slotted into your skin care routine wherever you see fit, creating a bespoke tan that you can control with the number of drops you add – they go especially well with moisturiser, serum, oil or even foundation. Who needs sunshine!
how_to_use: Mix 1-4 drops with your usual moisturiser, serum, oil or even foundation. (There's a convenient button at the bottom of the container to dispense one drop at a time!) Massage over entire face, neck and other areas as desired until absorbed, avoiding hairline and eyebrows. Thoroughly wash hands. Tan will start to develop within 3-4 hours and deepen over two days. Replace cap after use and screw on tightly. If product builds up on the nozzle tip, wipe away with a clean tissue. Keep product upright. Suitable for all skin types. Avoid contact with eyes. If this occurs, rinse immediately.

This product is recommended by The London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine as the most effective to use, especially for babies and children.

name: St. Tropez Self Tan Express Bronzing Gel 200ml St. Tropez Self Tan Express Bronzing Gel 200ml
description: A rapid-flash tan that bestows a believable glow in an hour, St. Tropez’s Express Gel is great for achieving a quick, customisable colour – whether you want to look subtly sunkissed or totally tanned (leave the gel for three hours for maximum impact). Harnessing advanced technology, this puts you in control of the finished result – just apply with a mitt for a smooth, streak-free finish, then rinse after one, two or three hours to determine the best depth of colour. Long-lasting (up to ten days) with even fade, this formula boasts a 100% natural DHA blend, a hint of guide colour to make sure you don’t miss a strip and the signature, St. Tropez scent to disguise any give-away smell. Plus, it’s laced with dew-boosting (and line-smoothing) hyaluronic acid to keep your skin plump, soft and supple.

Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Rinse after 1, 2 or 3 hours - tan will continue to develop for up to 8 hours. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as required.

description: A new breed of body moisturiser, REN CLEAN SKINCARE’s AHA Smart Renewal Body Serum utilises alpha hydroxy acids to boost your skin’s natural exfoliating process and leave skin gorgeously glowing. As well as this, alpha hydroxy acids dissolve the bonds that bind dead, dulling cells to your skin’s surface, sloughing away this unnecessary layer to reveal the bright, even skin beneath. The sumptuous serum also improves your skin’s moisture barrier, deeply hydrating to leave everything looking healthy, plump and luminous.
