Avoid contact with eyes, and if eye contact occurs rinse well with warm water. Do not use with any other exfoliator (body scrub, exfoliating gloves and sponges, etc.). Do not sunbath while using an AHA product. Discontinue the application at least 2 weeks before sunbathing. name: Aesop Herbal Deodorant Roll-On 50ml Aesop Herbal Deodorant Roll-On 50ml
description: Humans do not produce BO, it's the bacteria that live in our armpits that generate that characteristically horrid smell and the Zinc Ricinoleate in this natural deodorant kills them. The alcohol-free, roll-on Deodorant contains zinc, wasabi extract and a beautiful blend of essential oils to reduce and mask unpleasant odour the natural way. The ‘Original’ formulation also features vetiver root plus lavender, clove, tea tree and coriander oils, whereas the ‘Herbal’ edition contains lavender, rosemary, sage and orange oils, as well as refreshing ginger extract. With no aluminium and fresh, unisex scents, these wondrous roll-ons work for both men and women.
how_to_use: Roll generously under each arm after bathing and allow to dry before dressing.

name: Jo Loves A Body Lotion Jo Loves A Body Lotion
description: Bringing chic to your daily regime, Jo Loves A Body Lotion allows you to layer your signature scent and envelop your senses with mood-elevating (and long-wearing) fragrance while pampering skin, top to toe. A featherlight lotion thats quickly absorbed to smooth, soften and fortify skin while bestowing a subtle and lingering perfume, this elevates caring for too-often-overlooked limbs from a chore to a daily delight. With four classic perfumes to um-and-ah over, the difficult bit is deciding which scent you love most; Choose from Pomelo (a medley of citrus and spice with the zing of crisp grapefruit on top of a vetiver base), White Rose & Lemon Leaves (an elegant blend of white roses with tart lemon peel above honey and amber), Green Orange & Coriander (a smooth, multi-faceted medley of bitter notes blended with spicy black pepper and oak moss), 'Pink Vetiver' (inspired by spice markets in Grasse, with the kick of pink peppercorn balanced by cumin and warm, earthy vetiver) or Jo by Jo Loves (her most personal perfume; a sparkling chorus of grapefruit and lime which evolves via spearmint to lingering base notes of hedione, cedar and warm guaiac wood).
how_to_use: Pump into the palm of your hand and massage into your skin until fully absorbed, leaving the fragrance to settle and stay with you.

name: St. Tropez Self Tan Purity Vitamins Mist 200ml St. Tropez Self Tan Purity Vitamins Mist 200ml
description: Brimming with skin-nourishing vitamins, St. Tropez’s Purity Vitamins Bronzing Water Mist marries good-for-skin ingredients with a kiss of believable, just-back-from-holiday colour. Developing over 4-8 hours, this plumping and replenishing spritz is laced with line-smoothing hyaluronic acid, vitamin C and D boosters to brighten and shield from external aggressors and the brand’s proprietary ‘Sunshine Complex’ – a blend of 100% natural tanning active with 93% natural skin care ingredients – to lend a soft, olive-toned glow. With a featherweight texture and no tell-tale smell, this sophisticated formula quickly bestows a phenomenal (streak-free!) bronzed glow, top-to-toe. Just mist, blend and go!
how_to_use: Prep: Exfoliate and moisturise dry areas, hands, feet, ankles and wrists Apply: Spritz all over body, using a Mitt to blend and ensure no missed patches You tan will develop over 4-8 hours into a medium golden tan. Top up as desired to maintain tan, layer for a deeper shade
ingredient: Aqua (Water/ Eau), Dihydroxyacetone, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Polysorbate 20, Glycerin, Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Fruit Extract, Sodium Metabisul_te, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Fructooligosaccharides, Linalool, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/ Dicaprate, Potassium Lactate, Limonene, Citronellol, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Seed Oil, Hexyl Cinnamal, Lactic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Sodium Benzoate.

name: Tweezerman G.E.A.R. Essential Grooming Kit Tweezerman G.E.A.R. Essential Grooming Kit
description: This chic leather wallet plays host to four must-haves to clip, trim, tweeze and pluck for tidy hands and no rogue hairs. Uniting four indispensable tools, including the precision ‘Tweezerette’ which boasts pointed tips to eliminate unwanted brow hairs, ‘ingrowers’ or splinters, alongside Facial Hair Scissors, a Fingernail Clipper and multi-use Nail Tool (for cuticle pushing and cleaning the nails), this convenient travel case makes a convenient, on-the-go asset for men who take pride in appearing immaculate.
how_to_use: Tweezerette with precision pointed tips removes unwanted brow hairs as well as ingrowns and splinters Facial Hair Scissors to cut hair on the face and in and around the nose and ears, curved tips ensure safety Fingernail Clipper for precisely cutting nails Nail Tool can be used as a Cuticle Pusher and an under the nail cleaner
ingredient: Disinfect tool tips with alcohol or peroxide after each use.

name: Molton Brown Rose Dunes Bath and Shower Gel 300ml Molton Brown Rose Dunes Bath and Shower Gel 300ml
description: Effortlessly chic and quintessentially British, the Molton Brown Bath & Shower Gels are bursting with exquisite fragrance and good-to-skin ingredients to leave your limbs soft, supple and heaven-scented. Prepare to fall in love with the Rose Dunes Bath & Shower Gel, a mystical floral fragrance encapsulated in a decadent bottle, this is sure to satisfy your most self-indulgent need. Featuring top notes of saffron, cassis, violet leaf and pepper, this travels down through a rose and cinnamon heart to an earthy base of patchouli and moss. Think: shimmering hazes, floral swirls and a mirage of dusty-pink sand dunes… you’re sure to fall under the spell of this warming aroma.
how_to_use: Add generously to running bath water or massage into your body when showering; the scent to reach for when you feel like you most deserve a self-indulgent, truly decadent experience.

name: Shiseido Expert Sun Protector Face Cream SPF50+ Shiseido Expert Sun Protector Face Cream SPF50+
description: Incredible protection meets traceless texture in Expert Sun Protector Cream SPF 50+. Leaving zero visible white-cast, this moisturising cream sinks in quickly to shield skin from burning and sun-induced premature ageing, dark spots and wrinkles. SuperVeil-UV 360 creates tight-knit protection to let even fewer UVA and UVB rays through, while SynchoShield Technology reacts with water, sweat and heat to create even stronger protection as the day wears on. Water-resistant but non-greasy, this innovative sunscreen is just as at home under your everyday make up as it is by the pool.
how_to_use: Use as the last step of your skin care routine or instead of your moisturiser. Apply a generous amount of cream evenly to the face and neck before stepping out into the sun.

name: Tan-Luxe The Crème 65ml Tan-Luxe The Crème 65ml
description: Equal parts thirst-quenching and glow-bestowing, TAN-LUXE's The Crème is an intensely hydrating self-tanning moisturiser that supports your skin barrier as it develops into a sunkissed radiance. Why settle for anything less? Powered by more than a handful of skin care heavy hitters, the ingredients are no joke: the brand's proprietary 'Penta-Cell Complex' is composed of amino acids, antioxidants and skin-identical lipids to strenghten and fortify your skin, protecting against the effects of pollution; glycine, leucine, and L-phenylalanine help to enhance the elasticity of your skin and diminish the look of dark spots and fine lines; finally, a tag team of squalane, birch bark and rice bran helps to replenish depleted skin, promoting a plump and supple finish. Crafted with just the right amount of gradual self-tanner for daily use (4.5%), it's sure to become a staple in your routine.
how_to_use: In upward sweeping motions, smooth The Crème over the face, neck and décolleté. Apply evenly to dry, cleansed skin daily. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

name: BYREDO Gypsy Water Body Lotion BYREDO Gypsy Water Body Lotion
description: Take your BYREDO addiction one step further by investing in the brand’s luxurious Gypsy Water scent – and master the art of scent layering. The formula is laced with shea butter as well as the instantly recognisable X scent. Housed in the brand's chic monochrome bottles, BYREDO's Gypsy Water Body Lotion is a must-add to your growing collection. Lacked with shea butter as well as the brand's hypnotic scent of pine needle, sandalwood and refreshing citrus it's bound to become a firm favourite and result in a flurry of compliments. Caution: leave this in your guest bathroom at your own peril.
how_to_use: Apply generously morning and night, head-to-toe. Use anywhere your skin feels dry, or needs extra comfort.

name: Tan-Luxe The Water Hydrating Self-Tan Water 200ml - Light Tan-Luxe The Water Hydrating Self-Tan Water 200ml - Light
description: This self-tanning elixir spritzes on as delicately as water, drying in moments to deliver an even, natural-looking tan. A unique blend of purified water, vitamins B, C, E, raspberry seed oil and natural tanning actives, The Water by TAN-LUXE hydrates as it illuminates, developing into a sunkissed, radiant glow within four hours. To use, you simply spray on liberally and blend lightly – it dries so quickly that there’s no speedier way to fake a sun-drenched holiday, skipping all of the skin-damaging rays in the process. Available in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – it delivers even, luminous colour that’s a million miles from the give-away orange faux glow. No smell. No streaks. No drama. Just brilliant bronzing in a flash.
how_to_use: Prep Exfoliate using a gentle scrub 24 hours before tanning. Moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Apply Spray liberally onto dry skin, saturating the skin. Blend lightly with a tanning mitt using large circular motions from head to toe, lightly covering hands, elbows and feet last. Thoroughly wash hands after use. Maintain Exfoliate and moisturise skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow. Caution We advise a patch test is done 24 hours prior to use. Do not apply on broken, irritated or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If a reaction occurs, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice. Does not contain sunscreen and will not protect against sun exposure.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Ethoxydiglycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ascorbic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lecithin, Caffeine, Palmitoyl Carnitine, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycereth-26, Panthenol, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Tetrasodium EDTA, Benzoic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroacetic Acid

name: Weleda Nipple Balm 25g Weleda Nipple Balm 25g
description: A source of relief for chafed and cracked skin, Weleda's Nipple Balm was developed with midwives and pharmacists to provide unparalleled care and protection for delicate, sore nipples. This vegetarian-friendly formula is carefully crafted to be safe for both you and your little one - it's suitable for frequent use and doesn't need to be rinsed away before breastfeeding, all thanks to its wonderfully natural ingredients! Speaking of which... Organic calendula extract supports the regeneration of your skin; moisture-imparting lanolin forms a protective veil; olive fruit oil delivers a soft, smooth finish and sunflower seed oil soothes and hydrates.
how_to_use: Breastfeeding: Apply as needed and after each feed, gently pat the skin dry and/or allow the breast to air. Apply a small amount of balm to the nipple and areola to moisturise and protect the area. No need to remove Weleda Nipple Balm before breastfeeding. Athletes: Apply to the affected areas, prone to chafing, before sporting activity.
ingredient: Lanolin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Lanolin Alcohol, Tocopherol*. *Ingredient of raw material Lanolin.

name: Mini Mio Comfort & Calm Bum Balm 50ml Mini Mio Comfort & Calm Bum Balm 50ml
description: Designed to comfort your little one from head to toe (not just their teeny tush!), Mama Mio's Comfort & Calm Bum Balm is brimming with nourishing natural oil that replenish their delicate skin and act as a moisture-locking shield. The soothing multi-purpose balm can be massaged over anywhere on the face and body that requires a little comfort. It's laced with the brand's 'Skin Nurturing Omega Complex': a unique blend of shea, avocado and coconut oils which is rich in omegas to nourish and moisturise your little ones' delicate skin. It's also packed with plant-based actives like cocoa butter and sunflower wax to soften and dry skin looks calm.
how_to_use: Rub in gentle circular motions all on baby's skin. Apply where required. Mama Mio's products are specially designed and recommended for age 3 months and over.

name: Marvis Orange Blossom Bloom Toothpaste 75ml Marvis Orange Blossom Bloom Toothpaste 75ml
description: Put aside your drugstore toothpaste – Marvis’ has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As you’d expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape. Unlike your bog-standard formula however, ‘Orange Blossom Bloom’ is a delicately floral and fruity flavour, all encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf.
how_to_use: Use AM and PM to brush your teeth.

name: Laura Mercier Almond Coconut Hand Cream 50ml Laura Mercier Almond Coconut Hand Cream 50ml
description: Delivering superior moisture while soothing and protecting your skin, this luxe hand cream will quickly become a staple in your... (deep breath) handbag(s), on your bedside tables, by the front door, in your bathroom shelf, by your kitchen sink and everywhere else you might need a touch of luxury...  Formulated with French olive oil, French plum seed oil and glycerin this hand wonder quickly helps to restores skin elasticity. Moreover, with the addition of the Tapioca starch it eliminates dry, parched skin while also having a blurring and skin-evening effect. The result? Picture perfect hands. Infused with a blend of moisturising butters, this hand cream soothes the skin, helps support your moisture barrier and delivers 24 hours of hydration. Seductive, warm and comforting, the ‘Almond Coconut’ scent is a succulent combination of notes of coconut, almond and vanilla, mixed with heliotrope and musk for a rich, sensual and alluring experience.
how_to_use: Warm a generous amount of cream between the hands, then gently massage into the palms, back of the hands, nails, and cuticles. As an intensive mask, twice weekly, apply a thick layer to the hands and leave on for 10 minutes to nurture the skin.

description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml
description: Reactive skins rejoice! For La Roche-Posay have specifically formulated this treatment toner to help regulate oil without disrupting your skins natural balance. Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water - Light 200ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water - Light 200ml
description: Picky when it comes to your faux glow application? If you’re anti-mousse and aren’t keen on drops then you need to try Isle of Paradise’s Self-Tanning Water. Incredibly effective and easy-to-use, this removes an possibility of fake tan faux pas. Simply spritz the entire body and face with your chosen shade of water until skin is saturated in product and within 4 – 6 hours your skin will radiate a dewy, sun-kissed glow. Anything but ordinary, all Isle of Paradise products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Water will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Exfoliate 24 hrs before tanning. Moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Mist until skin is totally saturated, covering face, leaving hands and feet until last before blending with a tanning mitt using sweeping motions. Thoroughly wash palms after use. Your tan will develop in 4-6 hours, so in the meantime eat some ice cream, watch a movie, call a girlfriend, just don’t get the tan wet while it develops. Easy.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Propylene Glycol, Dihydroxyacetone, Glycerin, Ethoxydiglycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Erythrulose, Glycereth-26, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Extract*, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil*, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil*, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil*, Panthenol, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Tris (Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propanediol, Methoxyphenyl t-Butylphenyl Propanediol, Ascorbic Acid, Agastache Mexicana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Metabisulfite, Phenoxyethanol, Triethylene Glycol, CI 16035 (FD&C Red No.40), CI 19140 (FD&C Yellow No.5)

name: Isle of Paradise Medium Glow Clear Mousse 100ml Isle of Paradise Medium Glow Clear Mousse 100ml
description: Anything but ordinary, Isle of Paradise Glow Clear Self-Tanning Mousse is 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, this clear formula promises zero transfer and has zero guide colour meaning you can sweep this on, let it dry and go about your day without any tell-tale signs of faux glow development. Each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Mousse will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Pump mousse directly onto mitt 3x. Apply to skin in sweeping motion. Recommend half a pump for the face. Wash palms after use and re-moisturise hands. Tan will develop in 4-6hrs – don’t get your skin wet during this time! PRO TIP: If going clear makes you nervous – try mixing your favourite highlighter on the mitt for a subtle guide colour.

name: Bondi Sands Pure Self Tanning Sleep Mask 75ml Bondi Sands Pure Self Tanning Sleep Mask 75ml
description: For a sun-kissed look (sans any actual sun), the Pure Self Tanning Sleep Mask delivers a fuss-free approach to easy, streak-free tanning. Combining the iconic golden glow that Bondi Sans is famous for with a swathe of skin-loving ingredients, this mask goes above and beyond the call of duty. Hyaluronic acid intensely hydrates, pulling moisture into your skin to ensure a glowy, crease-free finish; vitamin C brightens skin and protects against environmental onslaught; and vitamin E nourishes and repairs for smooth, healthy-looking skin. All you have to do is sit back, relax, and wake up to moisturised, golden skin. Completely colourless (goodbye, orange sheets), fragrance-free and housed in completely recyclable packaging, this hero formula is ideal for those who are new to tanning, self-professed tanning connoisseurs or even sensitive-skinned.
how_to_use: Ensure face is clean, dry and free of product. Massage Bondi Sands Pure Self Tanning Sleep Mask evenly over face and neck, avoiding eyes. Wash hands thoroughly after use. Do not apply any other skincare products until colour has developed. For best results, leave on skin overnight. Re-apply as desired.

name: BYREDO Gypsy Water Hand Cream BYREDO Gypsy Water Hand Cream
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your hardworking hands while simultaneously moisturising and caring for skin, you need to discover the brand's decadent range of hand care, beginning with the Gypsy Water Hand Cream. Housed in the brand's instantly recognisable (and incredibly lust-have) chic and simple – yet quintessentially luxe – monochrome packaging, BYREDO's Gypsy Water Hand Cream enables you to upgrade your scenting experience while leaving skin feeling nourished and subtly perfumed throughout the day. Anti-inflammatory shea butter works to soften, soothe and heal, and the silky formula is fast-absorbing, never sticky. Created as an ode to Romani culture, prepare to fall for the scent's spellbinding blend of woody pine needle and sandalwood alongside intense amber and refreshing citrus (think: lemon and bergamot) to evoke the fever and spirit of nights spent in the forest.
how_to_use: Use this hand cream whenever your hands feel dry or just after washing them to keep them looking and feeling in tip top condition.
ingredient: Aqua (water), butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, parfum (fragrance), glyceryl stearate, peg-100 stearate, alcohol, butylene glycol, glycerin, cetearyl alcohol, polyacrylamide, ceteareth-22, c13-14 isoparaffin, dimethicone, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, xanthan gum, limonene, laureth-7, disodium edta, linalool, bht, sodium hydroxide, citral.

name: Kitsch XL Exfoliating Body Washcloth - Blush Kitsch XL Exfoliating Body Washcloth - Blush
description: Your eco-friendly alternative to traditional loofahs, this recycled nylon body washcloth works for all skin types to wash away dirt and gently exfoliate skin. Goodbye dead skin cells, hello brighter skin! Designed with a nifty pocket to slot your favourite body bar into, this washcloth does away with the faff of getting that perfect soap to water ratio. Just like your favourite face exfoliator, this washcloth helps to stimulate blood circulation to promote healthy (and radiant) skin — all of that before you’ve even left the shower! Unlike traditional loofahs that tend to keep in all the gunk, this mesh material is easier to clean and dry. If you, like us, still struggle to reach the middle of your back (even with all that yoga) then this is just the thing with its XL size that reaches those unloved areas so you don’t have to.
how_to_use: Rinse out with warm water before first use. Insert your favourite body wash bar into the pocket. Wet the body scrubber. Lather body wash bar in the mesh pocket and scrub over body. Stretch fabric to cleanse your back with ease. Rinse & air dry.
ingredient: 100% rPET.

name: Chantecaille SeaScreen 30 Mineral Broad-Spectrum Sunscreen Mist SPF30 Chantecaille SeaScreen 30 Mineral Broad-Spectrum Sunscreen Mist SPF30
description: Infused with non-nano minerals (with ‘non-nano’ meaning they can’t enter your body by penetrating the skin), the SeaScreen SPF30 protects against the sun’s scorching rays while soothing and hydrating skin. Working to calm, clear and protect against environmental aggressors, this formula is brimming with organic plant extracts – from the likes of wild moss rose through to ashwaganda root extract, organic aloe vera, and everything in between. In a convenient and easy-to-apply mist (ideal for spritzing atop make up without ruining your look!), this SPF is 70% organic and 95% natural, with a vegan, fast-absorbing and water-resistant formula. Free of oxybenzone and octinoxate (the chemicals that are linked to coral bleaching), this formula is also reef-friendly, never putting the seascape at risk. Plus, 5% of each sale will support WildAid Marine’s mission to protect Tanzania's Pemba Channel, so you can look after your skin and the environment in one fell swoop.
how_to_use: Hold container 4-6 inches away from the skin to apply. Spray liberally and spread evenly by hand 15 minutes before sun exposure. Do not spray directly into face, spray on hands and then apply to face. Do not apply in windy conditions. Use in a well-ventilated area. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating and immediately after towel-drying.
ingredient: Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Water*, Water/Aqua/Eau, Zinc Oxide, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*,Butyloctyl Salicylate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Methyl Dihydroabietate, Glycerin*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coco-Glucoside, Bentonite, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract*, Fructose, Bisabolol*, Ethyl Ferulate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Gluconate, Citric Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil. *Organic ingredients

name: Tan-Luxe Hydra Mousse Hydrating Self-Tan Mousse 200ml - Medium Tan-Luxe Hydra Mousse Hydrating Self-Tan Mousse 200ml - Medium
description: An innovation in fake tan, TAN-LUXE’s Hydra-Mousse is the speediest way to fake a sun-drenched holiday – and skip all of the skin-damaging rays. The clear-as-crystal water pumps out as luxurious foam, which has been scientifically formulated for super-fast absorption. Blending seamlessly into skin, it develops into a sun-kissed, radiant glow within 4-6 hours and is available in two skin-flattering shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’. Enriched with skin care grade vitamins B5, C and E plus raspberry seed oil, this fabulous foam hydrates as it illuminates, so that skin is left perfectly conditioned as well as gorgeously golden.
how_to_use: Exfoliate using a gentle scrub 24 hours before tanning. Apply: Using a tanning mitt, apply to the skin in a circular motion from head to toe. Use sparingly on hands and feet. Your tan will start to develop within 4 -6 hours. Do not shower for at least 4 hours post application. During development time do not participate in any activity which may cause excessive perspiration. Thoroughly wash hands after use. Maintain: Gently exfoliate and moisturise skin daily to maintain an even, luminous glow.

name: Mama Mio Keep Calm Nipple Balm 30ml Mama Mio Keep Calm Nipple Balm 30ml
description: 1, 2, 3 — exhale! Whipped into a buttery creamy dream that unites incredibly gentle and all-vegan ingredients to offer instant relief to your sensitive nipples, this Keep Calm Nipple Balm is the mama must-have you never knew you needed. Brimming with a powerhouse of essential oils deriving from shea butter, coconut oil and vitamin E, this h’oily grail balm locks in moisture as it soothes irritated skin around your delicate nipples. Nurturing you even after pregancy, this nourishing oil and butter mixture is suitable to use whilst breastfeeding your little one. Want to know the best part? All of this fragrance-free goodness is housed a recyclable tube using sustainably sourced materials, so we’re caring for all mothers alike — including our dear Mother Nature.
how_to_use: Apply to your nipple and surrounding area as required, there's no need to remove this calming balm before breastfeeding. If irritation occurs stop using immediately. Not for facial use. Safe to use when breastfeeding.

name: Perricone MD Cold Plasma Plus Neck and Chest 30ml Perricone MD Cold Plasma Plus Neck and Chest 30ml
description: Utilising a patented delivery system for unrivalled results, the Cold Plasma Plus+ Sub-D/Neck delivers firming and tightening actives deep into the vulnerable skin on your neck and décolleté. ‘Tech neck’, be gone! Treat the often-forgotten areas of your complexion to a supercharged dose of Perricone MD’s fortifying moisturiser. Double up on your morning caffeine hit with a firming, tightening and energising infusion of this antioxidant-rich stimulant — encapsulated for maximum results. Wrinkles, fine lines and sagging skin around the neck and chest are often hard to target, but thankfully this cream is brimming with fortifying peptides that work to improve the density and thickness of this thin skin. Protecting from drying environmental aggressors is DMAE, offering an instant ‘firming and lifting’ effect while defending against the unseen enemies that ravage vulnerable complexions.
how_to_use: Apply generously to cleansed neck and jawline area. Begin by massaging along the bottom of the neck area in gentle, circular motions, moving up the front and back of the neck, under the chin and around the jawline. Use morning and evening. Frequency: 2 x's a day Duration: 8 Weeks Apply a quarter-sized amount to the contours of the chin, jawline, neck, and décolleté. Massage in circular motions, moving up the front and back of the neck, under the chin and around the jawline. Use morning and evening. Why is Massaging Important? Helps relax facial muscles, which decreases the changes of seeing stress wrinkles. Helps with lymphatic drainage & circulation - which ultimately brings a natural flush to the skin and can visibly firm skin temporarily.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isononyl Isononanoate, Glycerin, Propanediol, Acetyl Carnitine HCL, Dimethyl MEA, Cetearyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, Jojoba Esters, Hydrogenated Vegetable Glycerides, Dimethicone, Glycolic Acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Phosphatidylcholine, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Xanthan Gum, Echium Plantagineum Seed Oil, Acetyl Tyrosine, Squalane, Phytic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Zinc Gluconate, Magnesium Aspartate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Caffeine, Tetradecyl Aminobutyroylvalylaminobutyric Urea Trifluoroacetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Palmitoyl Carnitine, Copper Gluconate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Carrageenan, Disodium EDTA, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sclerotium Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance/Parfum, Silica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene.

name: DeoDoc Organic Cotton Night Pads DeoDoc Organic Cotton Night Pads
description: Say goodbye to synthetic pads of yesteryear and hello to DeoDoc's 100% Organic Cotton Night Pads. Made with vulvas in mind, these gynaecologist-approved pads are kind to skin and will help prevent humidity, irritation and odour casued by conventional pads. Developed by gynaecologists, DeoDoc's Organic Cotton Night Pads are 100% vegan, biodegradable and made from 100% organic cotton while also being hypoallergenic, non-irritative, clinically-tested and unscented. The soft, non-bleached cotton fibres - which are free from viscose and rayon - are gentle on sensitive skin while also having superior absorbency and freshness in comparison to synthetic pads. Each pad is individually wrapped and is made ultra thin to give a comfortable feel throughout the day.
how_to_use: Stick the pad in your underwear using the sticky strip on the back. Change your pad every few hours, or when it's soaked with blood.
ingredient: Top sheet + core is 100 % organic cotton. Biofilm layer, wrap and adhesive; compostable and biodegradable

name: Laura Mercier Almond Coconut Hand Cream 50ml Laura Mercier Almond Coconut Hand Cream 50ml
description: Delivering superior moisture while soothing and protecting your skin, this luxe hand cream will quickly become a staple in your... (deep breath) handbag(s), on your bedside tables, by the front door, in your bathroom shelf, by your kitchen sink and everywhere else you might need a touch of luxury...  Formulated with French olive oil, French plum seed oil and glycerin this hand wonder quickly helps to restores skin elasticity. Moreover, with the addition of the Tapioca starch it eliminates dry, parched skin while also having a blurring and skin-evening effect. The result? Picture perfect hands. Infused with a blend of moisturising butters, this hand cream soothes the skin, helps support your moisture barrier and delivers 24 hours of hydration. Seductive, warm and comforting, the ‘Almond Coconut’ scent is a succulent combination of notes of coconut, almond and vanilla, mixed with heliotrope and musk for a rich, sensual and alluring experience.
how_to_use: Warm a generous amount of cream between the hands, then gently massage into the palms, back of the hands, nails, and cuticles. As an intensive mask, twice weekly, apply a thick layer to the hands and leave on for 10 minutes to nurture the skin.

name: Bed of Nails Acupressure Pillow Bed of Nails Acupressure Pillow
description: The Bed of Nails Acupressure Pillow is covered with over 2,100 non-toxic plastic 'nails' that help release endorphins (the body's natural 'happy hormone') and oxytocin, to alleviate tension and leave you feeling calm and relaxed yet energised (you can be both at the same time)! The perfect way to lessen stubborn aches and pains, especially if you suffer from a stiff neck or knotted shoulders, this is also excellent for those who have trouble sleeping, easing you into a deep and restorative slumber.
how_to_use: Lay the Bed of Nails pillow on the floor or a mattress and slowly lower yourself onto it. Lay a sheet over the pillow until your skin gets used to the spikes. Initially lie on the Bed of Nails pillow for 10 - 15 mins, then build up to 20 - 30mins. Use as often as you need - preferably daily. Don't be alarmed if your skin feels warm and tingly, and it's perfectly safe to fall asleep for a while. If you are uncertain, always consult your doctor. Keep away from children 5 years of age and younger Leaning against it (rather than laying on top of the mat and pillow) is a lighter way to use Bed of Nails while you acclimatise (you put less weight on the spikes when you do). Place the mat/pillow at the back of your sofa, bed or armchair to experience the benefits while building up your tolerance.
ingredient: The nails are made of 100% recycled non-toxic ABS plastic, the textile is cotton. The Bed of Nails should not be used in case of skin disease, haemophilia or the intake of anticoagulants.

name: St. Tropez Self Tan Express Mist 200ml St. Tropez Self Tan Express Mist 200ml
description: Want to take the fuss out of self-tanning? St.Tropez’s Self Tan Express Bronzing Mist allows you to reach every single inch of skin with it’s convenient mist. Better yet, you can also control the depth of your tan depending on how long you leave it on. After one hour you’ll see a light, sun-kissed glow, after two hours you’ll achieve a medium golden tan and after three hours you’ll reach a deep, dark bronze. Like the entire St.Tropez range, this Self Tan Express Bronzing Mist uses a vegan-friendly formula and 100% natural tanning actives.
how_to_use: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturise any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles and feet. Step 2: For best results, hold the nozzle about 6" away from your skin and spray all over, then blend with our Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the Mitt over your hands and feet. Step 3: Wait 1, 2 or 3 hours depending on your desired shade, then rinse off the tinted guide colour with warm water. Your tan will then continue to develop for up to 8 hours. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as desired.
ingredient: Dimethyl Ether, Aqua (Water/Eau), Alcohol Denat., Dihydroxyacetone, Glycerin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Propylene Glycol, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Caprylyl Glycol, Decylene Glycol, Citronellol, Limonene, Geraniol, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal, Anise Alcohol, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 14700 (Red 4), CI 42090 (Blue 1). This product has been reformulated and does not contain Butylphenyl Methylpropional.

name: Weleda Baby Calendula Nappy Change Cream 75ml Weleda Baby Calendula Nappy Change Cream 75ml
description: Treat your little one to a protected, softened and nourished behind with the Baby Calendula Nappy Change Cream. Boosted with baby-friendly lanolin and zinc oxide to form a protective barrier against excessive, rash-causing moisture, the nappy area is kept smooth, supple and happy. Thanks to its namesake - organic calendula extract - being mightily mixed with almond oil and chamomile, the delicate nappy area is maintained, allowing your little one’s skin to feel calm and ultra-soft. Combining these ingredients with the addition of beeswax, the hard-working (yet delightfully simple) formula helps to create a shield that protects and hydrates, all while tackling skin issues like dryness, thanks to natural antibacterial agents. Use the Baby Calendula Nappy Change Cream to give your baby a simply bee-rilliant bum!
how_to_use: Apply on the whole nappy area after careful cleaning and drying. Dermatologically proven to be very skin-friendly, even on sensitive skin.

name: Isle of Paradise Body Drops 75ml - Light Isle of Paradise Body Drops 75ml - Light
description: Control your glow or easily top-up your tan with Isle of Paradise's custom Self-Tanning Body Drops that's here to activate your holiday radiance from the comfort of your bathroom! Free from tell-tale tango pigment but instead is available in three sun-soaked shades, this dew-it-all poolside essential enhances your body care routine and develops a tan that lasts up to five days within just four to six hours! Infused with a protective blend of hydrolyzed rice protein, caffeine extract and antioxidant-rich kukui nut oil, this nourishing formula goes above and beyond to shield against free radical damage and seal in moisture for hours on end. Choose from three vacay-ready shades: 'Hello Golden Glow', 'Hello Sun Kissed' and 'Hello Bronzed Glow'...

name: Molton Brown Milk Musk Body Lotion 300ml Molton Brown Milk Musk Body Lotion 300ml
description: Curating an olfactory offering that is at once comforting and enticing, Molton Brown’s Milk Musk Body Lotion has a serene scent profile of pear, musk and cedarwood. Housed in Molton Brown's understated yet effortlessly chic bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of Body Lotion is jam-packed with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous good-to-skin ingredients that leave limbs soft, supple and hydrated while each of the quintessentially Molton Brown fragrances lingers on skin all day long. Yet to discover your firm favourite? Prepare to fall head over heels for the Milk Musk Body Lotion. This cossetting blend has fresh top notes of pear and peach that sink into a heart of soft musk, ambroxan, vanilla and milk. As for the base notes, the earthy white cedarwood melds with tonka bean for a warming scent.
how_to_use: Massage sparingly or lavishly across skin to create an immersive ritual; intensely hydrating and enveloping skin in exhilarating fragrance.

name: Philip Kingsley No Scent No Colour Gentle Shampoo 250ml Philip Kingsley No Scent No Colour Gentle Shampoo 250ml
description: Sweeping away daily dirt and impurities to reveal smooth, shiny tresses, Philip Kingsley's No Scent No Colour Gentle Shampoo has a hydrating, hypoallergenic formula that quells sensitivity and improves manageability. Originally inspired by Philip’s wife’s battle with breast cancer, this carefully crafted formula was designed to be gentle enough for her when she was undergoing chemotherapy. From there it's been welcomed with open arms by the growing number of people with allergic and reactive skin types that decide to forgo fragrance and strong surfactants. Ideal for sensitive, delicate or easily irritated scalps and an array of textures - from coarse and fine to medium and naturally coiled curls - this gentle formula is suitable even for daily use. The vegan-friendly formula is made without colour, parabens or fragrance, instead, it harnesses glycerides to grant impressive moisture for shiny, soft strands.
how_to_use: Apply the No Scent No Colour Gentle Shampoo to wet hair and lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp for 60 seconds. Rinse and repeat, if necessary. Follow up with the No Scent No Colour Gentle Conditioner and the appropriate Philip Kingsley Scalp Toner - both not included.

description: Everything you want a defending day cream to be, Avène’s Hydrating Emulsion SPF 30 offers softening, soothing and sun-safe wear. Boasting multi-purpose protection, this moisturising fluid formula leaves the skin hydrated for up to 24 hours with a refreshed, radiant result. Shielding the skin from UVA and UVB rays, alongside blue light and environmental pollutants, the suitable-for-all emulsion encourages a stronger-looking skin barrier, while working to minimise visible fine lines and dullness over time. A union of the brand’s Thermal Spring Water and patented Cohederm active ensures your complexion is left nourished, brightened and balanced. The emulsion’s texture melts effortlessly into the skin for comfortable all-day wear.
how_to_use: Spread a small amount of emulsion onto your fingertips, dab onto the face and neck and smooth in.

name: Herlum Hand and Body Lotion Sandalwood and Grapefruit 50ml Herlum Hand and Body Lotion Sandalwood and Grapefruit 50ml
description: With a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula, this Hand & Body Lotion delivers deep and long-lasting hydration without leaving skin sticky or greasy. In fact, you’ll be glowing from head to toe… The impressive hydration is down to a few key, sustainably sourced ingredients. First, there’s a mix of nourishing and strengthening vitamin E, sweet almond and cacao oils. Then, there’s murumuru butter, known for its lauric and oleic acid properties and ability to lock in moisture. There’s also a delicious rainforest-inspired scent, stemming from upcycled flowers and uniting woody and spicy notes of freshly sliced grapefruit and creamy sandalwood. Let it gently fragrance your skin with an aroma that lingers all day long.

description: Elevate your bathing rituals with Caudalie’s indulgent Fleur de Vigne Shower Gel. Suitable for all skin types, this soap-free wash is made from a 100% plant-based formula that’s as effective as it is gentle on your skin. The Shea Shower Cream works into a luxurious lather as it's swept over parched limbs. An infusion of soy proteins work to strengthen and care for the skin and cocoon it in a cloud of moisture. Finished with a delicate and refreshing fragrance this will soon whisk away the stresses of the day...

We'll be the first to admit that our hands often fall towards the lower end of our self-care checklist and for that, we're making amends... What better way than with this Super Anti-Aging Hand Cream? From over-exposure, continuous hand-washing, cold weather and general neglect (again, we're working on it!), our hands are quick to betray us if we don't treat them right. That's where this intensely nourishing treatment comes in. It's a richly textured cream that thoroughly nourishes the hands and treats visible signs of ageing, all while absorbing quickly and preventing your skin from drying out. The results? Soft, smooth and potently hydrated hands!

(deep breath) handbag(s), on your bedside tables, by the front door, in your bathroom shelf, by your kitchen sink and everywhere else you might need a touch of luxury... name: Isle of Paradise Glow Clear Self-Tanning Mousse - Medium 200ml Isle of Paradise Glow Clear Self-Tanning Mousse - Medium 200ml
description: Anything but ordinary, Isle of Paradise Glow Clear Self-Tanning Mousse is 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, this clear formula promises zero transfer and has zero guide colour meaning you can sweep this on, let it dry and go about your day without any tell-tale signs of faux glow development. Each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Mousse will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Pump mousse directly onto mitt 3x. Apply to skin in sweeping motion. Recommend half a pump for the face. Wash palms after use and re-moisturise hands. Tan will develop in 4-6hrs – don’t get your skin wet during this time! PRO TIP: If going clear makes you nervous – try mixing your favourite highlighter on the mitt for a subtle guide colour.

All the hydration — which is why this formula (complete with an easy to apply, ultra-fine mister) is packed out with three hydrating heroes: hyaluronic acid, glycerin, squalane plus a vitamin-rich sea kelp base. name: NUXE Sun Emulsion SPF 30 (50ml) NUXE Sun Emulsion SPF 30 (50ml)
description: Nuxe's Melting Face Cream SPF 50 helps to protect your face from the sun's rays and premature photo-ageing of the skin to prevent the appearance of dark spots. Perfect for holidays and sunnier days, the melt-away texture of Nuxe's Melting Face Cream SPF 50 cloaks your face in an evanescent finish that protects as it illuminates. Offering UVA and UVB protection, this formula is rich in botanical oils (think: nourishing macadamia and sunflower) that glide delectably over your skin and leave a beautiful, sensual satin finish. The addition of vitamin E as well as rice, hyacinth, kau de pe flower and rosemary extracts sooth, nourish and offer antioxidant protection - perfect for SPF! Finally, its evocative holiday scent with notes of sweet orange, tiare and vanilla produce an irresistible invitation to savour that summer feeling.
how_to_use: Before going out in the sun, apply your care product liberally over your entire face, avoid contact in eyes Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying Applying an insufficient amount of product will significantly reduce the level of sun protection. Warning: excessive exposure to the sun is dangerous. A sun care product does not provide 100% protection. Avoid exposure to the sun in the middle of the day.

name: COOLA Mineral Matte Cucumber SPF30 50ml COOLA Mineral Matte Cucumber SPF30 50ml
description: Protect and boost your skin’s defences with COOLA’s invisible SPF 30 sunscreen for the face. Suitable for all skin types – even sensitive – this lightweight, skin-refreshing formula creates an invisible shield between complexion and the elements, while the inclusion of a potent, rehabilitative cocktail of organic plant extracts works to increase your skin’s resilience and ‘undo’ signs of damage. Super-natural and sustainably sourced, this is the ‘cleanest’ sunscreen on the market; starring evening primrose and linseed to soothe, tone and hydrate, alongside safflower oleosomes, plankton extract (a known phyto-protector) and omega-rich acai oil to strengthen and rejuvenate sun-speckled skin.
how_to_use: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply: Immediately after swimming or sweating. Immediately after towel drying. At least every 2 hours.

name: DeoDoc Organic Cotton Tampons DeoDoc Organic Cotton Tampons
description: First they tackled age-old myths about using medically-backed vagina-friendly products to clean around your vulva, now they're tackling synthetic rayon fibre tampons - made from wood cellulose which is a cheaper and more easily mass-produced alternative to natural fibre, such as cotton. Let us introduce you to theirvagina-friendly, Organic Cotton Tampons. Did you know that the majority of tampons are made out of synthetic materials and fibres which can cause vaginal discomfort? On top of that, these fibres can shed inside of the vagina and cause additional irritation.Studies also show that 15% of womens OB/GYN visits are due to irritation caused by menstruation care products, as most conventional tampons on the market are made from synthetic rayon fibres.DeoDocs 100% Organic Cotton Tampons are made without viscose/rayon and non-chlorine bleached cotton, are unscented, FDA-approved and clinically tested to be non-irritating and hypoallergenic. They've even added a special outer layer (also 100% cotton) to prevent shedding and fibre residues from remaining inside of the body once the tampon is removed.But it doesn't stop there, they're also made from 100% biodegradable materials (with a card board applicator) and are 100% vegan.
how_to_use: Each box contains 16 tampons with cardboard applicators. Wash your hands and get into a comfortable position. You can squat, put one leg up, or sit on the toilet with your knees apart. Push the tampon into your vagina using the applicator or your finger. Inserting a tampon in your vagina is more comfortable if youre relaxed. Throw the wrapper and applicator in the bin dont flush them. Its best to change your tampon every 4-8 hours. Dont leave your tampon in for more than 8 hours. You can wear a tampon overnight, but put it in right before bed and change it as soon as you get up in the morning. You take the tampon out by gently pulling the string. Wrap used tampons in toilet paper and throw them away in the bin dont flush them.
ingredient: 100 % organic cotton

Marvi-lous, or what?!

name: bareMinerals Original SPF 15 Foundation (Various Shades) bareMinerals Original SPF 15 Foundation (Various Shades)
description: One of the brands OG formulas, the Original Loose Powder Foundation SPF 15 already boasts hordes of loyal fans and with its buildable, naturally luminous coverage its easy to see why. Another of bareMinerals award-winning formulas, this loose powder foundation boasts 30 versatile shades that offer sheer-to-full coverage without ever looking cakey or thick. In fact, its perfect for a no-make up make up look made with just five mineral ingredients to encourage clearer, healthy-looking skin over time. Each rich shade gets its colour and luminosity from iron oxides and pearls, while mica provides a silky-smooth finish. Lasting for up to eight hours and great for sensitive complexions, this formula also boasts mineral-based, physical SPF protection as it gets to work on diminishing the look of imperfections. Never drying and incredibly pure, you can expect a radiant finish that wont break you out even if you fall asleep in it! (Not that that matters, because youre always removing your make up before bed right?).

name: Dr Dennis DRx SpectraLite BodyWare Pro Dr Dennis DRx SpectraLite BodyWare Pro
description: A next-generation, moudable model, this innovative light therapy device sits comfortably over various areas of your body – targeting your chosen area with a total of 148 red LED lights and 68 blue LED lights – to help treat fine lines, blemishes and body aches. Ideal for combination, dry, normal, oily and sensitive skin types (no discrimination here!), this tool has three treatment options to choose from – red light therapy, blue light therapy or red and blue light therapy! Red LED light works to stimulate collagen production deep within the skin, (which reduces the look of fine lines, sun damage and redness) and provides anti-inflammatory support to relieve muscle and joint pain. Blue LED light then destroys blemish-causing bacteria to prevent future breakouts and give you visible results. With this, you can expect to see a reduction in blemishes and fine lines in a matter of mere weeks…
how_to_use: On clean, dry skin, place device directly onto desired treatment site. Mould device for a snug fit (arms, shoulders, legs, knees) or lay flat (upper/lower back, chest). For ageing and/or blemish treatment(s), press and hold the button for two seconds to turn on device. Press again to select light setting (red, blue, red+blue) and use for the programmed treatment time of three minutes (per treatment site). Device will shut off automatically when treatment is complete. For pain relief treatment, press and hold the button for two seconds to turn on device and use for the programmed treatment time of 14 minutes (per treatment site). Device will shut off automatically when treatment is complete. Remove device. For optimal results, use device once daily per treatment site and follow with {Alpha Beta Exfoliating Body Treatment} 2-3x times weekly.
ingredient: 1x DRx SpectraLite ™BodyWare Pro 1x Universal USB charging cord 1x Storage bag 1x User Manual 1x Quick Start Guide

name: Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Head Replacements - Graphite Grey Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Head Replacements - Graphite Grey

The oral health geniuses behind Spotlight Oral Care advise that you replace your brush head every three months, and if you've just realised how long overdue you are to do that then join the club... name: Laura Mercier Ambre Vanille Hand Cream 50ml Laura Mercier Ambre Vanille Hand Cream 50ml
description: Delivering superior moisture while soothing and protecting your skin, this luxe hand cream will quickly become a staple in your... (deep breath) handbag(s), on your bedside tables, by the front door, in your bathroom shelf, by your kitchen sink and everywhere else you might need a touch of luxury... name: NAYDAYA Crowning Glory Oil NAYDAYA Crowning Glory Oil
description: Struggling with the effects hormonal changes - during pregnancy, post-pregnancy and throughout menopause - are having on your hair? The Crowning Glory Oil may just be the solution you're looking for. By hydrating and enriching your scalp, while gently exfoliating product build up in the hair follicles, this pre-wash treatment helps to boost hair growth for an all-round stronger and longer mane. The exfoliation comes from crinipan, a naturally derived active ingredient that sloughs away dead skin cells and makes way for thicker strands. Alongside this is a whole host of hydrating heroes including cucumber seed, argan and jojoba oil to nourish a dry scalp and repair damaged locks. With refreshing eucalyptus and woody notes of pine and yarrow, it soothes aching muscles, making it the perfect post-workout treat for tired limbs. name: BeYou CBD Muscle Balm BeYou CBD Muscle Balm
description: Did you know that our bodies have native receptors to cannabinoids (the anti-inflammatory (non-psychoactive) component of cannabis plants)? And that it's this reported receptivity that's led to many trusting it to help relieve a list of common twinges? If your period brings the familiar dull, thudding 'ugh' that can make you feel sickly (at best) and bedridden (at worst), BeYou’s CBD Muscle Balm can go some way towards making the cramps feel a little more bearable. 100% natural – not to mention discreet – this cocktail of plant-derived extracts can help you dispense with a hot water bottle on days when it seems like your uterus has a vendetta… but it isn’t just for period pain. You can also apply this to help soothe the tension in post-workout muscles and ease achy joints.
how_to_use: Apply a thin layer and massage gently into desired areas of the skin. For external use only. Every individual’s CBD requirement is different, therefore we suggest at least a couple of weeks usage. Do not leave in direct sunlight, store at room temperature.
ingredient: Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Beeswax, Organic Argon Oil, Organic Rosehip Oil, Organic Geranium Oil, Eucalyptus Essential Oil, Lavender Essential Oil and Cannabinoid Rich Hemp Extract with 300mg CBD

name: NUXE 24H Sensitive Skin Deodorant Balm 50g NUXE 24H Sensitive Skin Deodorant Balm 50g
description: Specially designed for sensitive skin, fend against unflattering odours with Nuxe's 24HR Sensitive Skin Deodorant Balm: a gentle solid balm that cloaks the contours of your underarms to deliver long-lasting odour protection. The quick-absorbing deodorant not only purifies and softens your skin but also respects its natural balance — all without leaving a sticky residue or white marks. The solid deodorant fuses 24-hour odour protection with skin-loving ingredients to nurture your underarms. It's crafted with highly absorbent, organic corn starch powder to effectively capture moisture, leaving armpits soft with a dry-touch feel. An infusion of almond oil then helps to soften and soothe your skin while the aromatic orange blossom scent promotes a sense of freshness. As if that wasn't impressive enough, the formula is proudly vegan, waterless and held in 100% recyclable materials.

name: Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Hand Balm 500ml Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Hand Balm 500ml
description: This classic Aesop hand lotion not only sinks in quickly without making your hands greasy and unusable (anyone with a slightly difficult bathroom door knob knows the potential hand cream dangers). It smells beautifully of Mandarin oil, Rosemary Leaf and Cedarwood and works well with the Resurrection hand wash. This moisturiser softens rough skin, cuticles and nails and can be used all over the body, especially for a foot massage... anyone? Aesop don’t believe in ‘anti’ – you won’t see any hyperbolic ‘anti-ageing’ or ‘anti-acne’ claims – instead, their products are developed to complement a balanced lifestyle, and help protect against the elements. This is ‘pro’ skin care for those who’re planning to grow older gracefully, proud of the skin that they live in.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Baby & Kids Essentials Dr. Barbara Sturm Baby & Kids Essentials
description: Directing her endless expertise towards the realm of sensitive-skinned little ones, Dr. Barbara Sturm's Baby & Kids collection is honed around protecting and nourishing delicate skin. Complete with an adorable Steiff Cuddle Bunny Hoppie, the Baby & Kids Body Set unites bath and body formulas that swaddle delicate skin with richly soothing ingredients. Crafted with the finest natural ingredients and true to the brand’s ethos of innovation without the use of aggressive ingredients, this skin-comforting duo is nurturing, healing and safe for delicate skin. A soak to soothe skin and replenish moisture to maintain your baby’s natural softness, the Baby & Kids Bathing Milk melds beautifully with warm water to comfort irritated skin – the perfect bath time treat! A soothing and nourishing step in any nappy change, the Baby & Kids Baby Bum Cream is perfect for resisting dampness and rashes that threaten your little one’s delicate skin. The ointment shields vulnerable skin with a moisturising, protective layer, calling on marigold extract to boost the natural skin barrier and calm nap-disturbing irritation.
how_to_use: Baby & Kids Bathing Milk: generously apply the cream in the nappy area and the folds of the skin after each nappy change. Baby & Kids Baby Bum Cream: add the Bathing Milk to a bath with a water temperature of 36 degrees Celsius. It will rise to the surface of the water in flakes. Use the flakes to gently wash and hydrate your baby’s skin for 5-10 mins.

Newly reformulated to bring you the same indulgent benefits but with the addition of intelligent new ingredient complexes from the Alpine region, this is now even more sustainable and efficacious. A potent, skin-strengthening and soul-soothing blend of oils, this exquisite soak helps to alleviate tension and replenish precious moisture, so that skin is left feeling velvety-textured and your mind is left feeling at ease. name: Mini Bloom Toot Toot Balm Diaper Rash Relief Cream Mini Bloom Toot Toot Balm Diaper Rash Relief Cream
description: Comfort your little one's tush with Mini Bloom's Toot Toot Balm Diaper Rash Relief Cream: a skin-swaddling formula that forms a protective and preventative barrier to provide relief and soothe diaper rash. A godsend for delicate skin, this ultra-rich formula instantly calms irritated skin and provides a thick barrier of protection against diaper rash. At the heart of the blend is zinc oxide (it forms a physical barrier between the skin and the diaper) as well as jojoba, sunflower and coconut oils; these nourishing plant oils not only tame chaffing and chapping but also reduce the redness caused by drying to promote calm and comfortable skin. Sore bottoms don't stand a chance against this ultra-comforting cream!
how_to_use: Apply daily as a base for your baby’s bum to provide a protective barrier to avoid diaper rash from starting. Mini Bloom's tip: apply a thick layer to the entire diaper area upon each change to protect the skin's barrier and prevent a rash from forming. This is your daily toot toot balm salve!

name: MUTHA Body Oil 100ml MUTHA Body Oil 100ml
description: Made for men and women at all stages of life (from pregnant through to menopausal!) the Body Oil nurtures even sensitive skin via a soothing blend of 100% botanical seed oils. Brimming with skin-restoring vitamins, this formula acts like an IV drip of moisture for the body — powerfully feeding parched skin with hydration without so much as a greasy streak in sight. Its silky texture works quickly and absorbs easily, leaving you with nothing but a healthy glow and soft, enviable skin. With fatty acid-rich rosehip oil fuelling cells with vitamins C and A, this elixir even improves skin elasticity and firmness while protecting the skin barrier and diminishing the look of fine lines and stretchmarks. Made with uplifting (but subtle) notes of citrus, this is a delightful addition to anyone’s body care routine — adding an element of luxury to the mundane.
how_to_use: Use twice daily all over your body, minus your sweet face. For extra hydration, use with MUTHA Body Butter or Contour Serum. Pregnancy Tip: Continue the hydration routine above but make it a habit to apply every time you go into your bathroom. The more your skin is hydrated, the less it is prone to stretch marks.

For a deeper tan, simply use it alone and even then, you can expect a finish that is natural, glowy perfection. Forget any tan stains on carpets and messy mitts, this handy dropper lets you control your dose, and it’s also packed with antioxidant vitamin C to add a radiant finish to your self-tanning routine.

name: Isle of Paradise Dark Self-Tanning Oil Mist 200ml Isle of Paradise Dark Self-Tanning Oil Mist 200ml

The secret to a flawless tan? All the hydration — which is why this formula (complete with an easy to apply, ultra-fine mister) is packed out with three hydrating heroes: hyaluronic acid, glycerin, squalane plus a vitamin-rich sea kelp base. And for an adding boost of moisture, there’s a nourishing mix of oils including argan, grape seed and avocado, clinically proven to lock in moisture for up to 24 hours.

name: Odacité Mood Cleansing Ayurvedic Bath Soak Odacité Mood Cleansing Ayurvedic Bath Soak
description: The ultimate SOS if you’re in need of a full-body mood transformation, this Mood Cleansing Ayurvedic Bath Soak helps lift away heaviness and stress, replacing it with peace and tranquillity. Formulated with detoxifying Himalayan crystal salt and moisturising oils infused with invigorating grapefruit and lemongrass to uplift the mind, body, and spirit, this Mood Cleansing Ayurvedic Bath Soak from Odacité is the ultimate a mood transformer. Himalayan crystal salt works to detoxify your body and energy field with over 84 essential minerals to melt away the stress from the day. Meanwhile, almond oil and jojoba oil effortlessly moisturise devitalised skin. Finally, grapefruit and lemongrass uplift and invigorate your mood and spirit with their aromatherapy benefits. The characteristic blue hue of Odacité's Bath Soak comes from macerated turmeric, Holy basil, neem, grapefruit, and aloe vera that when combined can help eliminate pollutants and impurities that degrade both mood and skin.

name: COOLA Sunless Tan Dry Oil Mist 100ml COOLA Sunless Tan Dry Oil Mist 100ml
description: Effortlessly easy to use, simply spritz on Coola’s streak-free, fast-drying Sunless Tan Dry Oil Mist to achieve a brilliantly bronzed glow – without exposing your skin to damaging UV rays. With 70%+ organic ingredients, not only does this dry oil mist impart an enviable tan, it also nourishes skin with natural botanicals. An antioxidant-rich blend of argan oil, vitamin C, hibiscus and chamomile extract protect and soothe skin, while an irresistible piña colada and coconut scent take away any whiff of the dreaded tell-tale tan aroma. Beautifully buildable, the formula is streak- and transfer-free so, even if you’re totally tan-phobic, you can rest assured that you’ll achieve a great result.

name: Verden Bath Oil 100ml (Various Options) Verden Bath Oil 100ml (Various Options)
description: Breathe fresh air into your self care routine and reconnect with your body with the three nature-inspired scents of VERDEN’s Bath Oil. Created with 100% natural fragrances to help you boost your wellbeing and remind you to breathe and de-stress, we don’t think we can choose just one relaxing oil to add to our wind-down bathing ritual. VERDEN’s rich and indulgent Bath Oil has quickly become a self care staple of every bath-obsessive, the carefully curated scents are the perfect reminder to spend a little time reconnecting with your body and become at one with nature. Every 100% recyclable bottle is teeming with passion fruit seed oil and grape seed oil to care for every inch of your skin, while the carefully selected fragrances look after your body and mind. The emotional soul might reach for the intense blend of ‘Arborealist’ — a blend of smoky greens and moody woods with top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood journeying down to a rich myrrh base. ‘Herbanum’ wraps you in a purifying, botanical essence of fresh herbs and wild grasses, conjuring up notes of rosemary, verbena and cedarwood, with an uplifting hint of peppermint. D’Orangerie transports you to a haven of abundent orange groves, an uplifting citrus and orange blossom aroma cocoons your limbs in petitgrain, ho wood and fresh top notes of bergamot and mandarin. We’ll be keeping these on rotation in our bathing routine… there’s no way we can choose just one!

name: Fur Silk Scrub 6 fl. oz Fur Silk Scrub 6 fl. oz
description: A triple-action polish to eliminate dead cells and leave skin ultra-soft and silky, fur’s Silk Scrub is sufficiently gentle for sensitive areas, as well as sufficiently potent for effortless top-to-toe polishing. Laced with physical, enzymatic and chemical exfoliants – including jojoba beads (an environmentally friendly alternative to micro beads), papaya and pineapple enzymes and both glycolic and lactic acids – this formula unclogs your follicles, loosens dead cells and reveals silky soft, glowing skin. Great as an über quick in-shower buffer, as well as a mask to revitalise skin that’s a little lacklustre, this makes a brilliant treatment for ‘chicken skin’, ‘strawberry legs’ and persistent ingrowers, as well as a great way to ward against lumps, bumps and rashes. Dermatologically and gynaecologically tested (it’s perfect for the delicate bikini region), this scrub is also free from any phthalates, parabens, silicones and artificial colours.
how_to_use: Silk Scrub is gentle enough to use on sensitive areas, like pubic or facial skin, but powerful enough to be used all over body for a radiant resurfacing effect. In the shower, massage Silk Scrub onto your skin—or, for extra exfoliation, leave it on as a mask for up to ten minutes. For best results, we recommend using Silk Scrub 2-3 times per week.

name: Mini Bloom Hallelujah Nipple Balm Mini Bloom Hallelujah Nipple Balm
description: Rooted in nature, backed by science, this dermatologically tested Hallelujah Nipple Balm is loaded with certified organic, nourishing ingredients to comfort dry, cracked and sore nipples. Made without lanolin, synthetic fragrance or dye, this supremely nurturing formula comes to the aid of over-suckled nipples. This safe-to-eat, SOS treatment harnesses an array of plant-based ingredients to soothe your skin. Sunflower seed oil is packed with vitamin E and omega-9 fatty acids to lock in hydration and protect your skin; aloe leaf juice eases the sensation of irritation; olive fruit oil contributes an abundance of essential amino acids, antioxidants and vitamins to deeply repair, condition and strengthen your skin; finally, calendula flower extract soothes and calms inflammation to comfort your skin.

Mini Bloom's tip: great to use as a soothing lip treatment or to treat dry, cracked cuticles.

Turning back the hands of time on your palms, this nourishing remedy for dry and dehydrated textures softens rough skin, cuticles and nails to reverse visible signs of ageing. name: Bondi Sands Pure Self Tan Foaming Water - Light/Medium 200ml Bondi Sands Pure Self Tan Foaming Water - Light/Medium 200ml
description: Available in two tone variations ('Dark' and 'Light/Medium'), Bondi Sands' Pure Self Tan Foaming Water fuses their iconic golden tanning technology with a cocktail of hyaluronic acid, vitamin C and vitamin E to nourish and illuminate your skin. As part of the Pure range, this conscientious blend is bottled with ethically sourced, 100% recyclable plastic to limit the impact on our environment, plus every ingredient has a purpose and they've omitted fragrance, dye and sulphates from the formula. Gentle enough for sensitive skin, this quick-drying formula is also colourless, meaning that it won't transfer after application. Like most of the Pure range, it develops over six hours and will continue to do so for 24 hours since it's powered by dual tanning actives to build your glow. Simply tip the product upside down, squeeze it directly onto your skin and blend with your Application Mitt. Just remember not to shake it before use; it's designed to create a foam when the product is squeezed out of the bottle, so if it's shaken, the product pre-foams in the bottle and liquefies upon squeezing onto the skin. If shaken, wait 5-10 minutes for the formula to settle before trying again!
how_to_use: For best results, do not shake the product prior to use. Empty space in the bottle is required to create the foam. Step 1: for an even, streak free tan, ensure your skin is clean, exfoliated and free of any moisturisers. Step 2: squeeze Bondi Sands Pure Self Tan Foaming Water directly onto skin. Use your Bondi Sands Application Mitt in long sweeping motions to blend into legs, arms and body. Use remaining residue on mitt for elbows and knees. Step 3: wait until touch dry before dressing. Conveniently requires no wash off. For best results, leave foaming water on skin for at least six hours. For the deepest tan, re-apply 30 minutes after initial application. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

name: Mini Mio Oh So Clean Foaming Wash 150ml Mini Mio Oh So Clean Foaming Wash 150ml
description: We know little ones have a talent for getting into all kinds of messes so it's important to have a trustworthy wash close to hand. Expertly formulated by dermatologists to suit the delicate and sensitive skin of babies over three months old, Mama Mio's Oh So Clean Foaming Wash is designed to gently refresh hair and skin. name: Fur All Body Wash 8 fl. oz. Fur All Body Wash 8 fl. oz.

description: Infused with essential oils centred around harmony, balance and inner strength, ilāpothecary's Calm Butterfly Soothing Balm is an all-purpose salve that is equally as comforting for your skin as it is your mood and spirit. The decadently soothing balm has an array of purposes, from helping to ease tension headaches to calming and softening skin —it can be used as a nourishing balm for little ones or during pregnancy to keep skin supple. The highly moisturising formula even boasts a divine scent that makes lavishing limbs an almost religious experience. As for the ingredients, anti-inflammatory arnica is thought to comfort tired muscles, reduce bruises and soothe mosquito bites; calming calendula helps to protect your skin from environmental stressors and restore your spirit; nerve-easing lavender induces a sense of peace and relaxation — perfect before bedtime; finally, sunflower extract impressively boosts hydration, easing the signs of irritation and promoting a soft, supple finish.

name: The Nue Co. Topical - C 0.49 oz The Nue Co. Topical - C 0.49 oz
description: The Nue Co.’s Topical - C spells the end of disappointing vitamin C products that have lost their potency by the time you come to use them. Proven to boost collagen, fight sun damage and firm skin, this powder dissolves and activates when you mix it with your existing moisturiser or face serum. Pure vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid) is combined with plant-based antioxidant ferulic acid to boost collagen production and fight sun damage. As well as this, tapioca starch derived from the roots of cassava plants, colloidal oatmeal and aloe vera unite to exfoliate, soothe and heal skin. Like a daily dose of vitamin C for your skin, Topical – C is effortlessly easy to use: just dissolve 2-3 shakes in the palm of your hand with water or your favourite serum or moisturiser and apply to your face, neck and chest. With daily use, you can expect brighter, more even skin with a visible reduction in fine lines, scarring and pigmentation.
how_to_use: Typically recommended for AM routines, but you can use it at night too Dissolve with your favourite moisturizer, serum or water and apply to your face + neck. DOSE 2-3 shakes. To avoid redness, don't use it at the same time as glycolic, salicylic acid or retinol-containing products
ingredient: L-Ascorbic Acid, Ferulic Acid, Tapioca Starch, Colloidal Oatmeal, Aloe Vera Free from fillers + bulking agents. Vegan.

Working synergistically with red and brown algae, this hard-working combination tackles uneven skin tone to promote a balanced complexion, while hyaluronic acid douses skin in hydration and strengthens its moisture barrier to reduce water loss. On the sun care end of the spectrum, the PowerBright Moisturiser SPF 50 uses advanced oleosome encapsulation technology to increase SPF performance... in layman’s terms, it uses fewer chemicals but works twice as hard — to say this moisturiser is a powerhouse is as understated as it gets.

Infused with vitamin E, shea butter oil and olive oil to keep skin nourished and moisturised, with creamy foam and florally notes, this bubble bath makes for a relaxing ritual; calming the body, mind and your vulva. Dry skin, prepare for your world to be turned upside-down. Cocoon your limbs with this ultra-nourishing, ultra-rich body lotion. Made from 96% natural ingredients, this mutli-use and multi-tasking serum is here to help balance your scalp's microbiome for healthy and happy skin and hair. Traditional shampoos and conditioners may make you wash your hair more often due to the increased sebum production caused by ingredients such as traditional surfactants and sulphates. The scalp’s microbiome plays a crucial role in the regulation of sebum when unbalanced it can lead to itchiness, dandruff and even hair loss. So, it makes sense to take care of it. Formulated with the brand's innovative pre and postbiotic complex alongside fermented rice water, artichoke extract and lactic acid, this Holy Grail hero smoothes hair and leaves it glossy. Sulfate-free, oil-free, silicone-free and dermatologically tested. Suits all hair & scalp types, even the most sensitive ones.

Starring nutrient-dense argan and sweet almond oil, along with brand’s signature V-tonic – a powerful blend of lemon, cypress, lavandin grosso, mentha arvansis, rock rose and cistus ladaniferus essential oils – this gorgeously scented mask is packed with antioxidants and essential fatty acids for a hydrated, cleansed and even toned finish.
