name: St. Tropez Self Tan Purity Gel 200ml St. Tropez Self Tan Purity Gel 200ml
description: Deliciously tropical scented, this new Self Tan Purity Bronzing Water Gel transforms from a clear gel to water, allowing you to develop a gorgeous tan completely guide colour-free for an undetectable appearance. In just three hours, this no-rinse faux glow builds to a lovely natural-looking medium, golden glow while the intelligent formula refreshes and hydrates skin for up to 72 hours – meaning your new tan will last even longer and look even more beautiful. Infused with natural skin care actives and hyaluronic acid to plump, regenerate and protect skin, this won’t streak, won’t transfer, won’t streak and has no tell-tale fake tan smell – just a lovely tropical scent during application. Vegan-friendly, this really is perfect for anyone to use and is incredibly easy-to-use with a light sheen during initial application to guide you.
how_to_use: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Moisturise dry areas including hands, elbows, knees, ankles, feet and any light hair. Step 2: For best results, apply to skin using our Tan Applicator Mitt in upward circular motions, ensuring all areas are covered. Finally, lightly glide the excess gel on your Mitt over hands and feet. The product gives a light gleam to guide your application and ensure no missed patches. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. No need to rinse off. You will see a glow after 3 hours, but before getting skin wet, allow 8 hours for your natural looking tan to fully develop. Step 4: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as required.

With the most heavenly scents — and now more eco-friendly refill pouches to top up your existing bottles — this rich formula allows you to turn hand-washing into an art form. Delectably fragranced and free from the usual suspects (no parabens, gluten or cruelty!), each of these opulent washes creates a soft, luxury lather that gently eliminates dirt and residual grime to leave paws feeling perfectly pampered. A brilliant choice for your bathroom, Coastal Cypress & Sea Fennel conjures the fresh, salty spray of the ocean – evoking cobweb-clearing seaside breezes and the soul-expanding sense of gazing over open water. With top notes of fig leaves, cardamom and bergamot above marine notes, salted cypress and cedarwood, this icy blue bottle will transport your soul to the coast.

name: AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion (Fragrance Free) AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion (Fragrance Free)

Nothing she tried had lived up to it's promises so she decided to take matters into her own hands and began to develop an exfoliating treatment and skin-smoothing body lotion to gently resurface and intensively condition, and from that AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion was born. Fragrance free formula. SUITABLE FOR KEY BENEFITS CLINICALLY PROVEN Clinically proven to significantly increase moisture levels in the skin for up to 24 hours with Alpha Hydroxy Therapy 87% agreed that the appearance of their skin had improved and felt softer and smoother. 97% of people agreed the product left their skin feeling more moisturised. 80% agreed that their skin looked healthier. 87% of people agreed the product improved the appearance of ingrown hairs. 91% of people agreed the product helped to improve the appearance of razor bumps. 93% of people agreed the product helped to improve the appearance of skin after shaving. *Tested on 77 people with rough, dry, bumpy 'chicken skin' in a 4 week independent consumer trial. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.

As part of the Pure range, this conscientious blend is bottled with ethically sourced, 100% recyclable plastic to limit the impact on our environment, plus every ingredient has a purpose and they've omitted fragrance, dye and sulphates from the formula. Gentle enough for sensitive skin, this quick-drying formula is also colourless, meaning that it won't transfer after application. Like most of the Pure range, it develops over six hours and will continue to do so for 24 hours since it's powered by dual tanning actives to build your glow.

Close eyes and spray 4 - 6 pumps of Pure Self Tanning Face Mist evenly onto face and neck, blending gently into skin with Application Mitt. For a deeper tan, re-apply as required. A pampering end-of-day indulgence, just a few tablespoons swirled through your bath water will strengthen skin, promote resilience and help to relieve stress and tension – so you can unwind as you feel all your woes wash away with the water.

Enriched with a nourishing blend of vitamin E, shea butter extract and antioxidant grape polyphenols, this non-greasy cream soothes sensitised skin without piling and smooths out even the finest of lines over time. Totally undetectable, this invisible formula absorbs quickly so you can soak up sun rays safely.

description: Elevate your bathing rituals while dispelling stress and tension with de Mamiel’s Soothe Bath Soak. Blending ancient wisdom and modern science together this will take you from stressed-out to calm and contented in as little as 15 minutes... Should you find it hard to switch off after a long, stress-filled day then allow us to recommend adding the Soothe Bath Soak to your nightly rituals. Specifically designed to ease irritability and set you on the road to relaxation, these decadent salts will swiftly leave you feeling like you’re walking on a cloud. Hailed for its relaxation-promoting properties, lavender has been infused into this bath-time blend along with warming and comforting ginger to care for your emotional wellbeing. Anxiety-lifting neroli, sweet orange and monarda intermingle with petitgrain and sandalwood to quell tension. Completing your spa-like experience is a blend of magnesium and dead sea salts that work to support melatonin production and soften your skin to aide a more restful sleep and leave your limbs silky-soft. Once you immerse your stressed-out form into a bath filled with this dreamy concoction you’ll soon feel your worries melt away...

The formula lends a pearlescent quality that gently buffs away dirt and grime to reveal silky-smooth skin. Deeply hydrating and restorative, this luxurious cleanser adds a sense of ritual to this sometimes mundane task (in the grand scheme of skin care). Expect to step out of the shower feeling replenished, revived and enveloped in the kind of head-turning scent that makes strangers stop and ask you what you’re wearing.

Characterised by its warm, woody aroma (a blend of vetiver root, petitgrain and bergamot rind) this moisturising lotion is lightweight and quickly absorbed, to soothe and protect labour-wearied hands. Sweet almond and coconut oils deliver instant relief from dryness and cracking, while potassium lactate and lactic acid soften skin and provide prolonged hydration for skin that’s feeling forgotten. This makes a perfect gift for a gardener, together with Reverence Hand Wash. Now available in the original 500ml and a grab-and-go 75ml, you'll never need to be without this softening salve.

A godsend after a long, stressful day, the magnesium and mineral-rich salts work to relax muscles, ease nervous tension and promote deeper sleep. As for spirit-lifting ingredients, amber is believed to absorb pain and negative energy as it alleviates stress and encourages self-confidence; amethyst helps soothe inflamed skin and is believed to relax the nerves and help heal the aura, allowing it to restore and rebalance; benzoin oil is a wonderfully reassuring oil that helps to calm stressed, burnt-out minds; last but not least, purifying cedarwood (sometimes known as the 'sleepy' oil) helps to stimulate the release of melatonin and deeply relax the body. name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Mousse - Dark 200ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Mousse - Dark 200ml
description: Anything but ordinary, Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Mousse is 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Mousse will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Exfoliate 24 hrs before tanning. Moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Pump product onto mitt and apply in sweeping motions. Leave hands and feet until last, sweeping lightly over. Your tan will develop in 4-6 hours, so in the meantime eat some ice cream, watch a movie, call a girlfriend, just don’t get the tan wet while it develops. Easy.

name: de Mamiel The Anchor Bath Soak de Mamiel The Anchor Bath Soak
description: The ideal antidote to overactive nervous systems, The Anchor Bath Soak is designed to dispel stresses and help the body to re-establish equilibrium when it feels a little out of balance. Just the thing to help busy bees unwind after a stressful day, this mineral-rich blend features Himalayan, Epsom and Dead Sea salts — plus powdered gemstone aventurine and magnesium flakes — to simultaneously soften skin, relax tired muscles and ease tension while calming and soothing the heart. Plus, de Mamiel’s deliciously grounding (and fan-favourite) ‘Anchor’ scent will elevate your bath time rituals and slow your racing mind.

A temporary rise in body temperature during or immediately after soaking is completely normal and can be attributed to individual stress levels.

Anti-inflammatory shea butter works to soften, soothe and heal, and the silky formula is fast-absorbing – never sticky. name: Sarah Chapman Skinesis Dynamic Defence SPF15 Anti-ageing Cream (40ml) Sarah Chapman Skinesis Dynamic Defence SPF15 Anti-ageing Cream (40ml)
description: A scientifically advanced daily moisturiser, Sarah Chapman’s Dynamic Defence SPF 15 Moisturiser is formulated with supercharged levels of performance-proven cosmeceutical actives and skin supporting botanical complexes, which work together to restore skin’s natural moisture balance and protect it from damage. Subtle hints of jasmine, hyacinth and rose essential oils, as well as mango and shea butters, bestow blissful fragrance and rich omegas to impart heavenly hydration and restore youthful radiance. Stored in an airless pump to protect light and air sensitive ingredients, it’s no wonder this carefully crafted moisturiser has attracted the attention of countless beauty awards and skin-savvy celebs – we don’t like to name drop, but Sarah Chapman has attracted some serious A-Lister fans. name: ilapothecary Magnesium Amethyst Bath Soak Refill 400g ilapothecary Magnesium Amethyst Bath Soak Refill 400g
description: Running low on the supremely relaxing {Magnesium and Amethyst Deep Relax Bath Soak}? This refill pouch saves you from having to re-buy the luxe jar — you can just top it up with this Magnesium and Amethyst Deep Relax Bath Soak Refill! A godsend after a long, stressful day, the magnesium and mineral-rich salts work to relax muscles, ease nervous tension and promote deeper sleep. As for spirit-lifting ingredients, amber is believed to absorb pain and negative energy as it alleviates stress and encourages self-confidence; amethyst helps soothe inflamed skin and is believed to relax the nerves and help heal the aura, allowing it to restore and rebalance; benzoin oil is a wonderfully reassuring oil that helps to calm stressed, burnt-out minds; last but not least, purifying cedarwood (sometimes known as the 'sleepy' oil) helps to stimulate the release of melatonin and deeply relax the body. Your duvet will be calling you as soon as you step out of the tub...
how_to_use: For a luxurious and calming bathing experience, pour a handful of the Magnesium & Amethyst Deep Relax Bath soak under hot running water and allow to disperse.
ingredient: Magnesium Chloride, Sodium Chloride, Amethyst, Styrax Benzoin, Andropogon Zizanioides (Vetiver) Oil, Cedrus Atlantic Bark (Cedarwood) Oil, Nardostachys Jatamansi Oil, Juniperus Communis (Juniper Berry) Fruit Oil, Liquid Amber Orientalis Balsam Extract Petitgrain Bigarde Oil, Rose Damascena Flower Oil, *Cinnamyl Alcohol, *Geraniol, *Limonene, *Linalool. *Naturally Occurring in Essential Oils.

name: Escentric Molecules Escentric 04 Body Wash Escentric Molecules Escentric 04 Body Wash
description: Echoing the warm floral, woody, musky allure of the beloved Escentric 04 perfume, this luxurious body wash stars Javanol, a lab-derived alternative to sandalwood, which brings characteristic sexiness without the ‘heaviness’ of the real thing. As well as this, pink grapefruit peel and lime add refreshing citrus notes, while juniper and pink pepper add irresistible spiciness. Not to mention filling your bathroom with a long-lasting, intoxicating haze of scent, this nourishing cleanser is the perfect way to intensify your Escentric Molecules fragrance. Completely free from parabens and sulphates, this is a striking addition to any bathroom shelf – layer it with either Molecule or Escentric 04 to instantly amplify your allure…
how_to_use: Use in shower or bath, then follow with Molecule or Escentric 04, to intensify the fragrance (and amplify your allure)...

name: FOREO PEACH 2 Device - Peach FOREO PEACH 2 Device - Peach
description: Ditch the hassle of regular shaving and messy waxing and experience effortless and long-lasting at-home hair removal. Utilising Intense Pulsed Light (IPL), the PEACH™ 2 Device uses up to 120 flashes per minute for quick, effective and painless removal of hairs on the face and body. Select between two modes for larger and more precise areas – no detachable heads needed. The device is self-adjusting to bend naturally with the curves on your body. With an extra-large treatment window and ultra-fast flash, you can be sure that no hair, crease or corner is missed. Pair with the evolving smart app to guide you through your routine, receive treatment reminders and customise the device’s five intensities to your skincare preference.
how_to_use: Download the FOREO app to unlock & register your PEACH™ 2 device before first use. You can do this by scanning the QR code which can be found on the back of the device packaging, or on the Quick Start Guide that comes with your device. Shave all hair from the area you wish to treat, before your treatment. Ensure there is no remaining hair above the surface of the skin. Then clean your skin and pat dry. Scan your skin via the FOREO app to set your device for optimal treatment, and select your preferences. Apply FOREO PEACH™ Cooling Gel to your first treatment area. Completely massage into skin until fully absorbed. Then plug your PEACH™ 2 device in, and adjust to your preferred intensity level using the + and - buttons. Start your treatment by placing the full treatment window of the device on your skin. For larger treatment areas use gliding mode, by holding the flash button and gliding along skin. For smaller areas, use stamp mode, by pressing and releasing the flash button. For sensitive areas, you can use the lower intensity levels. Once you’ve finished your treatment, wipe the treatment window clean with a wet, lint-free cloth.

name: Earl of East Japanese Bathing Ritual Hand Balm Earl of East Japanese Bathing Ritual Hand Balm
description: Designed to complement their bestselling hand wash, Earl of East's Japanese Bathing Ritual Hand Balm boasts a nourishing blend of essential oils and conditioning butters to cloak your hands in a silken, heavenly scented veil of hydration. Available in two therapeutic aromas, the only hard part is picking your favourite... Taking its name from the Japanese word for hot spring and emulating the very same sense of serenity that makes the onsen a cultural tradition, the Onsen scent profile has an uplifting medley of peppermint, eucalyptus and neroli that alludes to the relaxing and rejuvenating qualities of the practice. The Shinrin Yoku literally forest bath in Japanese scent is an ode to the practice of disconnecting from our fast-paced world, being in nature and absorbing the peaceful atmosphere of the woods. It has an earthy profile of cedarwood, black pepper and oakmoss that conjures the image of a forest floor after the early morning rain abates.
how_to_use: Use after washing your hands or throughout the day to restore moisture levels.
ingredient: Onsen: Aqua, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Glyceryl Stearate, Threobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Cera Alba, Glycerin, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sucrose Stearate, Olea Eurpaea Fruit Oil, Linum Usitatissimum Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Coco Glucoside, Coconut Alcohol, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin) Peel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Lavandula Angustfolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara Flower (Neroli) Oil*Benzyl Alcohol *Limonene *Linalool *Naturally Occuring In Essential Oils Shinrin Yoku: Aqua, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Glyceryl Stearate, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Cera Alba, Glycerin, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sucrose Stearate, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil, Linum Usitatissimum Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Coco Glucoside, Coconut Alcohol, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Bud Oil, Piper Nigrum (Black Pepper) Fruit Oil, Cedrus Atlantica (Cedarwood) Wood Oil, Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Wood Oil *Benzyl Alcohol *Eugenol *Naturally Occuring In Essential Oils

name: Margaret Dabbs Pure Repairing Hand Cream 75ml Margaret Dabbs Pure Repairing Hand Cream 75ml
description: Don’t let your hard-working hands go under-loved — shower them with adoration in the form of Margaret Dabbs’ ultra-hydrating Pure Repairing Hand Cream. Harnessing the powers of pentavitin — an incredible, plant-derived hero that provides instant hydration for up to 72 hours — the velvety, luxurious formula ensures powerful, deep and lasting hydration without feeling greasy. A nurturing ingredient called vitamin F forte also feeds skin with essential fatty acids to keep cell membranes healthy, while sweet almond oil softens and smooths excessively dry or stressed skin. The resulting formula protects and maintains your skin’s structure, all with a delicate (and delicious!) scent of rose and lemon in tow.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of cream over the back of your hands and gently massage into the skin. Use as many times as required to reap the benefits of the deeply hydrating formulation.

name: Mama Mio Tummy Rub Butter 120ml - Lavender and Mint Mama Mio Tummy Rub Butter 120ml - Lavender and Mint
description: Your favourite tub of joy just got even better — now available in an array of scents from the all-soothing ‘Lavender and Mint’, summer-inspired ‘Sandalwood & Cocoa’ and ‘Fragrance Free’, what’s not to love? Brimming with omega-rich ingredients to slow the appearance of stretch marks during pregnancy, Mama Mio's Tummy Rub Butter hydrates skin, boosts elasticity and helps protect even the most sensitive of bumps. The star of the show here is the brand's unique 'Omega Rich Skin Stretch Complex', which is made up of a blend of avocado, inchi and argan oils (all rich in omegas 3, 6 and 9) to help keep your skin elastic, supple and strong. For all the hydration you’ll need for the nine-month s-t-r-e-c-h, lean on its oil-rich fusion of coconut oil, sweet almond oil and shea butter. Finally, to protect your skin against potential irritation, there's the essential antioxidant vitamin E. Et voila…
how_to_use: Apply twice daily, massaging from above your boobs to below your bum, all the way around.

Handmade in the UK with only 100% natural ingredients you can bathe easy knowing you’re indulging your body in the best of the best.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Water Flosser Replacement Tips Spotlight Oral Care Water Flosser Replacement Tips
description: The ultimate investment into the health of your smile, the {Water Flosser} is an effective plaque-shifting tool that rivals the payoff of a trip to the hygienist, all from the comfort of your home. Nothing without its attachments, this Water Flosser Replacement Tips set includes a classic jet tip, an orthodontic spray tip, a periodontal pocket sprinkler and a tongue scraper, so you can keep your flossing routine on its A-game. The oral health geniuses behind Spotlight Oral Care advise that you replace the jet tip every three months, and if you've just realised how long overdue you are to do that then join the club... The Water Flosser itself (sold separately) harnesses water pressure and varying pulsations to help remove bacteria that resides between your teeth and below the gum line - areas that are notoriously difficult to reach with traditional brushing and flossing! With different tips for different oral care needs, this replacement set is here to stock up your oral care stores.
how_to_use: This replacement pack contains: 1 x Classic Jet Tip 1 x Orthodontic Spray Tip 1 x Periodontal Pocket Sprinkler 1 x Tongue Scraper

name: Best of Megababe Trio Best of Megababe Trio
description: Sit back and let this trio of problem solvers take on B.O, friction and sweat… we’d like to introduce the Best of Megababe bundle — a collection of three bugbear-busting essentials to keep you confident all year-round. Skin-soothing and talc-free, the Body Dust Top-To-Toe Powder is your secret weapon against the dreaded grey t-shirt marks that usually keep your arms firmly by your sides… you can finally wave your hands in the air like you just don’t care and without the fear of saturated clothing! Powered by natural enzymes and extracts to break down odour and absorb wetness, Megagbabe’s Rosy Pits Daily Deodorant helps to keep you smelling fresh throughout the day without clogging your pores or using harsh chemicals like aluminium. Don’t let chafing determine your summer wardrobe. the friction-busting Thigh Rescue is here to keep you comfortable from head to toe. Here to stop friction from irritating you to no end, this balm stick can be used on thighs, toes, shoulders, elbows and more to keep chafing under control.
how_to_use: Body Dust Toe-To-Toe Powder:Shake well & apply directly to skin, or sprinkle inside clothes/shoes. For use wherever body sweat is an issue! Best on concealed areas as powder is lightly visible on skin. Thigh Rescue:Swipe directly onto skin as needed throughout the day. For use on thighs, toes, shoulders, elbows — anywhere chafe is a problem! Rosy Pits Daily Deodorant: Apply daily as often as needed to clean, dry skin. Allow 2 weeks for pits to adjust from a traditional antiperspirant. The deodorant includes corn starch for moisture absorption, but as with any aluminium-free deodorant, some wetness is normal.

name: BYREDO Hand Cream Mojave Ghost 30ml BYREDO Hand Cream Mojave Ghost 30ml
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your hardworking hands while simultaneously moisturising and caring for skin, you need to discover the brand's decadent range of hand care, beginning with the Mojave Ghost Hand Cream. Housed in the brand's instantly recognisable (and incredibly lust-have) chic and simple – yet quintessentially luxe – monochrome packaging, BYREDO's Mojave Ghost Hand Cream enables you to upgrade your scenting experience while leaving skin feeling nourished and subtly perfumed throughout the day. Anti-inflammatory shea butter works to soften, soothe and heal, and the silky formula is fast-absorbing, never sticky. Celebrating the soulful beauty of the Californian desert, prepare to fall for the scent's woody composition that boasts graceful top notes of musky ambrette and fresh Jamaican nesberry; a heart note of powdery violet that unfurls to reveal sandalwood before warm chantilly musk rounds out a base of amber and cedarwood.
how_to_use: Use this hand cream whenever your hands feel dry or just after washing them to keep them looking and feeling in tip top condition.

name: Uma Absolute Anti Aging Body Balm Uma Absolute Anti Aging Body Balm
description: A welcome reprieve for rough and dry skin, the Absolute Anti Aging Body Balm cocoons your skin a lightweight, nutrient-rich veil of hydration, encouraging a toned and visibly smooth finish. The base of organic ghee (a staple in Ayurvedic practices) has nourishing, deeply hydrating properties; it is then infused with moringa and pomegranate botanicals – organically grown on the UMA Estate, of course – to deliver protective antioxidants, fatty acids, essential vitamins, minerals and phytonutrients (can we be constantly coated in all this goodness?). Grapefruit helps to encourage lymphatic drainage and circulation to promote the appearance of more toned, smooth skin, while the number one adaptogen on our everyone’s mind, ashwagandha, helps your body cope with environmental stressors (not today, free radicals!). Beyond its glorious ingredients and the incredible scent of neroli, jasmine and sandalwood, this balm has a beautifully indulgent texture; it has a delicate soufflé feel that melts effortlessly into your skin for a non-greasy, silken finish.
how_to_use: Warm a small amount of balm into hands and massage into the body using deliberate, circular strokes. Pay attention to areas that need extra healing, such as elbows, hands, and feet. Allow a few minutes for the balm to absorb before getting dressed. Use as often as desired, ideally after a shower or bath.

name: Oribe Valley of Flowers Replenishing Body Wash 300ml Oribe Valley of Flowers Replenishing Body Wash 300ml
description: The Valley of Flowers Replenishing Body Wash is a gentle body cleanser that lathers up beautifully to surround your body in a scent that is lively with fresh notes of bulgarian rose and jasmine petals that descends into warmer scents of amber and sandalwood. Much like Oribe’s famed hair care range, this body wash is impactful without being overwhelming. The formula lends a pearlescent quality that gently buffs away dirt and grime to reveal silky-smooth skin. Deeply hydrating and restorative, this luxurious cleanser adds a sense of ritual to this sometimes mundane task (in the grand scheme of skin care). Expect to step out of the shower feeling replenished, revived and enveloped in the kind of head-turning scent that makes strangers stop and ask you what you’re wearing.

ingredient: Massage into a lather. Relax. Rinse.

name: NUXE Vivifying Surgras Soap, Nuxe Bio 100g NUXE Vivifying Surgras Soap, Nuxe Bio 100g
description: Crafted to be gentle on skin and easily biodegradable, Nuxe's Organic Face and Body Invigorating Ultra-Rich Soap works into a creamy lather to purify and refresh your skin while promoting a radiant vitality. Cleansing without leaving your skin feeling tight, the moisturising, orange blossom-scented bar is unlike the soap bars of yore... Suitable for all skin types, the vegan formula effectively cleanses the face and body; it's enriched with organic camelina oil, extracted by cold pressing camelina seeds (a precious plant also known as 'gold of pleasure'), that lends the blend and abundance of omegas 3 and 6 to comfort your skin. Supremely nourishing, it's made with a botanical-origin base of coconut and organic sunflower oil to respect your skin's natural balance as it cleanses.

Delivering reparative results in the long-term and working in synergy with La Roche-Posay's calming 'Thermal Spring Water' are madeccassoside and vitamin B5 to encourage collagen production and aid in the skin's natural regeneration process. The Anthelios UVMUNE 400 Hydrating Cream SPF 50+ boasts exclusive MEXORYL400 filter technology to help defend against UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA rays. Brimming with cocoa butter and milk protein to envelop skin in a rich blend of vitamins, minerals and amino acids, this relaxing bath soak helps to boost hydration levels and moisturise dry skin. A pampering end-of-day indulgence, the crystals dissolve with ease and pepper skin with a velvety sensation that softens skin and relaxes senses. Just a few tablespoons swirled through your bath water will strengthen skin, promote resilience and help to relieve stress and tension – so you can unwind as you feel all your woes wash away with the water.

name: BYREDO Bal d'Afrique Body Cream BYREDO Bal d'Afrique Body Cream

description: A rich waterless treatment to soothe and replenish stressed skin, top-to-toe, MALIN + GOETZ gorgeous Meadowfoam Oil Balm transforms from a nourishing butter to deeply conditioning oil when massaged into face, beard and body. A does-it-all medley of 17 extracts including oils of meadowfoam, jojoba (near-identical to skins own sebum), avocado and safflower seed this helps to repair and replenish skins barrier function while strengthening delicate strands and protecting from ravages wrought by the elements. Use as a cleanser, mask, make up remover or rich moisturiser, as well as a body oil, beard conditioner or buffer twixt skin and your razor blades. The loooong list of uses continues use the excess to tame flyaway and smooth frizz, to protect your tattoos, heal your cuticles, keep your lips kissable, nourish your elbows its a godsend for globe-trotters, those who are keen to streamline their regime or who're taking a conscious approach to consumption (hear hear!). Doing the job of your skin, hair and body routine in one, good-looking tube, whats not to love? Now available in two sizes, pick from the full size (113g) or the handy travel size (30ml) so you're never without a moisture boost on-the-go.

Uses include: treatment of chapped lips, nose and ears, after-sun treatment, aftershave balm, beard conditioner, make up remover, make up primer, overnight mask, to condition rough elbows, knees, feet, to soften hands and cuticles, to protect tattoos, as a massage oil, to smooth split ends, tame flyaways and lend shine to lacklustre locks.

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Face Mist - Day 100ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Face Mist - Day 100ml

Working to wake you up via a refreshing aromatherapy blend of energising peppermint, sage, lemon and rosemary, this cocktail tricks you into thinking you’re stirring amid a tropical island. Even keeping your complexion safe from the perils of blue light, the Day Dew Face Mist feeds skin with moisture – using hyaluronic acid and glycerin (plus a proprietary medley of grapefruit, chia seed and avocado oils) to encourage plump, hydrated skin all day long. name: Margaret Dabbs London Intensive Anti-Ageing Hand Serum 30ml Margaret Dabbs London Intensive Anti-Ageing Hand Serum 30ml
description: Renowned podiatrist and Cult Beauty expert, Margaret Dabbs knows feet from both a medical and cosmetic perspective. She is the go-to podiatrist for celebrities in the UK (making it virtually impossible to wangle an appointment with her), and she designed and developed this concise collection of hand and foot products herself, having spotted a gap in the market for products to beautify our extremities. Delicately scented with geranium and mandarin, this Intensive Anti-Ageing Hand Serum is enriched hempseed oil to flood your skin with amino acids, stimulating collagen and elastin production to maintain supple, youth-prolonging, resilient skin, while clever soy isoflavones and white water lily brighten, even and give skin a better 'bounce back'. Preventing collagen from breaking down – and therefore maintaining suppleness and plumpness – lupin seed helps to reduce the depth of wrinkles and fine lines.

name: Alpha-H Clear Skin Daily Face and Body Wash 185ml Alpha-H Clear Skin Daily Face and Body Wash 185ml
description: The Alpha-H Clear Skin Daily Face and Body Wash with 2% Salicylic is an invigorating gel cleanser which deeply cleans, cools and reduces the likelihood of breakouts without stripping or dehydrating skin. Suitable for combination, oily and overactive skin of all ages, it combines a blend of botanical ingredients such as natural antibacterial thyme extract and vitamin B3, all of which work to balance sebum flow. Pore-purging salicylic acid helps to reduce inflammation without aggravating sensitive complexions deeply unclogging pores as it works to leave you with even and purified skin. name: BeYou CBD Bath Bomb - Ylang Ylang and Sandalwood 150g BeYou CBD Bath Bomb - Ylang Ylang and Sandalwood 150g
description: Take your bathing ritual up a notch with BeYou’s CBD Bath Bomb, free from THC (so no psychoactive effects) and teeming with 100% natural ingredients these are a must for any bath lovers in need of some serious de-stressing. A treat for your body and for the senses, the soothing Ylang Ylang & Sandalwood CBD Bath Bomb is heaven ‘scent’ to help you de-stress after a long day — or week. Formulated with 0% THC, you don’t need to worry about psychoactive effects, these calming bath bombs leave you feeling like you’re walking on a cloud. Handmade in the UK with only 100% natural ingredients you can bathe easy knowing you’re indulging your body in the best of the best.
how_to_use: Drop your bomb into the tub while filling it up and inhale the luxurious scents of the essential oils melting into the water.
ingredient: Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Aqua, Parfum: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Coconut Oil, Dried Avena Sativa (Dried Oats), Cannabidiol. Allergens: Coumarin.

name: Molton Brown Rose Dunes Body Lotion 300ml Molton Brown Rose Dunes Body Lotion 300ml
description: Effortlessly chic and quintessentially British, the Molton Brown Body Lotion’s are bursting with exquisite fragrance and good-to-skin ingredients to leave your limbs soft, supple and heaven-scented. Prepare to fall in love with the Rose Dunes Body Lotion, a mystical floral fragrance encapsulated in a decadent bottle, this is sure to satisfy your most self-indulgent need. Featuring top notes of saffron, cassis, violet leaf and pepper, this travels down through a rose and cinnamon heart to an earthy base of patchouli and moss. Think: shimmering hazes, floral swirls and a mirage of dusty-pink sand dunes… you’re sure to fall under the spell of this warming aroma as you massage this from top to toe.
how_to_use: Application: Morning or evening, massage into freshly cleansed skin. Routine: Apply after using Rose Dunes Bath & Shower Gel for deeper scent layering.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Fragrance/Parfum, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Stearic Acid, Sorbitan Caprylate, Isohexadecane, Palmitic Acid, Ceteareth-20, Glyceryl Stearate, Xanthan Gum, Propanediol, Polysorbate 80, Tetrasodium Edta, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Tocopherol, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Benzoic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Geraniol, Limonene.

name: Herlum Hand and Body Wash and Lotion Duo - Sandalwood and Grapefruit 50ml (Worth £22.00) Herlum Hand and Body Wash and Lotion Duo - Sandalwood and Grapefruit 50ml (Worth £22.00)
description: Herlum’s Hand & Body Wash and Lotion Duo - Sandalwood & Grapefruit makes the perfect gift for the ritualistic and scent-obsessed people in your life, or equally an indulgent pick-me-up for you, from you. Delve into the transportive powers of this limb-loving, travel-sized duo and experience a total escape for your senses. Experience all the richness that Brazil has to offer with these British-made, Brazilian-inspired formulations. Making your daily body and hand care ritual that little (read: a lot) more indulgent, the Hand & Body Wash - Sandalwood & Grapefruit promises to leave your skin feeling soft and beautifully scented. Enriched with Amazonian murumuru butter to boost your skin’s moisture, and infused with the heady aroma of fresh grapefruit and woody, spicy and creamy sandalwood, you’ll quickly be transported to the depths of the rainforest. Paired with the serum-like Lotion, your limbs will be left smooth, protected and delicately perfumed thanks to a perfectly balanced blend of cocoa and sweet almond oils and dreamy upcycled fragrance notes of chopped sandalwood and freshly sliced grapefruit.
how_to_use: Hand & Body Wash Sandalwood & Grapefruit:For hands and body, dampen skin, lather up, then rinse. After use, rinse the container before placing in the recycling bin. Hand & Body Lotion Sandalwood & Grapefruit:Dispense a pump, and mindfully massage into hands and body. Reapply as needed. After use, rinse the container before placing in the recycling bin.
ingredient: Hand & Body Wash Sandalwood & Grapefruit: Aqua (deionised water), Decyl Glucoside (coconut), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (coconut), Lauryl Glucoside (coconut), Caprylyl Capryl Glucoside (coconut), Glycerin (rapeseed oil), Parfum (fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol, Salicylic Acid, Sorbic Acid (ECOCERT natural preservative blend), Xanthan Gum (wheat), Bisabolol (candeia tree), Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter (murumuru), Citric Acid, Citral. Hand & Body Lotion Sandalwood & Grapefruit: Aqua (deionised water), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter (cocoa bean), Glyceryl Stearate SE (olive and coconut), Glyceryl Citrate/Lactate/Linoleate/Oleate (sunflower), Glycerin (rapeseed oil), Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter (murumuru), Capric Caprylic Triglyceride (coconut), Parfum (fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol (ECOCERT natural preservative), Salicylic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Xanthan Gum (wheat), Bisabolol (candeia tree), Tocopherol (vitamin E), Sodium Hydroxide, Citral. Vegan, palm oil-free, biodegradable ingredients which will not impact on water recycling systems.

name: Peter Thomas Roth FirmX Peeling Gel 100ml Peter Thomas Roth FirmX Peeling Gel 100ml
description: For results that show up instantly (literally), this multitasking exfoliator makes for an utterly satisfying experience as dead skin cells gather and rub off to reveal soft, supple skin. Powered by pineapple and pomegranate, this exfoliator is brimming with enzymatic action to peel away at old skin to uncover the shiny, new skin that is just waiting to come to the fore! While the exfoliating powers work their magic, the humectant cellulose gently massages skin and adds moisture while glycerin and hyaluronic acid hydrate and give skin a dewy, smooth finish. Imagine: all of that and you haven’t even moved on to any serums yet! Treat your pores to a weekly unclogging session from this peel and enjoy a radiant and lifted complexion that is beaming from the inside.
how_to_use: Apply a generous amount to clean, dry skin. Gently massage in a circular motion to visibly exfoliate. Rinse well with water. For extra enzymatic exfoliation, leave on for one to five minutes before rinsing. Use one to three times a week depending on skin sensitivity. For external use only.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Peg-32, Cellulose, Butylene Glycol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Water, Sorbitol, R-Bacillus Licheniformis Keratinase, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium Edta, Algin, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Isopropyl Myristate, Sodium Chloride, Calcium Chloride, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Mica, Phenoxyethanol.

name: Laura Mercier Néroli du Sud Bath and Body Oil 100ml Laura Mercier Néroli du Sud Bath and Body Oil 100ml
description: Enveloping your skin with a lightweight blend of deeply nourishing oils, a few drops of the multi-use Bath & Body Oil is all you need to revive your all-over radiance. Inviting spa-like indulgence into your bath-time routine, this antioxidant-powered oil glides over your limbs, seeping into your skin with a nourishing feel. Rich in baobab seed, jojoba seed and French plum seed oils, this moisture-locking cocktail delivers a surge of hydration that lasts up to 48 hours! Available in three luxuriating scents that are perfect for layering, this sensori-oil essential is sure to become a permanent fixture in your body care arsenal.
how_to_use: For Bath: Pour desired amount of oil onto the surface of water and gently swirl. For Body: Warm oil in your hands and massage over body. For best results, apply to damp skin. Follow with the Serum Body Cream for a complete beauty experience. Pour Aromatic Bath & Body Oil into a hot bath and discover the aromatherapy benefits of your favourite Laura Mercier scent.
ingredient: Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Arnica Montana Flower Extract (Arnica Montana), Tocopherol, Glycerin, Aqua/Water/Eau, Citric Acid, Bisabolol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol.

name: Aesop Citrus Melange Body Cleanser 100ml Aesop Citrus Melange Body Cleanser 100ml
description: This gentle body cleanser is the perfect wake up call – invigorating senses with an aromatic blend of lemon, petitgrain and grapefruit rind to jolt you into wakefulness and help you seize the day. Suitable for all skin types, this mild, low-foaming formula is brimming with a swathe of precious, purifying extracts to eliminate embedded dirt and grime, while the uplifting fragrance inspires a spirit of optimism – helping you shrug off the very last vestige of sleep so you dive from the shower revived and cocooned with a delicate veil of fresh, summery scent. Plus, the bottle looks chic in the best salles de bain.
how_to_use: Dispense into hands or onto a sea sponge. Massage onto soaked skin from neck to toe, then rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Sodium Laurylglucosides Hydroxypropylsulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Chloride, Polysorbate 60, Glyceryl Caprylate, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Oil, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Coconut Acid, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Leaf/Twig Oil, Citric Acid, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Oil, Tocopherol, Limonene, Linalool, Citral.

name: Fresh Milk Body Lotion 75ml Fresh Milk Body Lotion 75ml
description: Quickly absorbed and endlessly soothing, the Milk Body Lotion from fresh deeply nourishes your entire body for velvety-soft skin that lasts all day. The ‘freshest’ body lotion around — indulge in this thoroughly nourishing formula that leaves you feeling soothed right to the soul. An infusion of plant-based milks (whoever said they were just for your latte) condition your skin and strengthen your barrier to keep you feeling intensely comforted. You can thank centella, rice and linseed milks for that silky-soft feeling. Everyone’s favourite ingredient, niacinamide, maintains a healthy body complexion while the hydrating hero hyaluronic acid attracts and draws in essential moisture so you’re left perfectly plumped and baby-soft. Cocoon yourself in this vitamin E-rich formula to protect your skin and alleviate signs of stress… we’re feeling relaxed already.
how_to_use: Gently massage over the body daily. Use morning and night after you cleanse with Milk Body Cleanser.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Squalane, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Isostearyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol Cocoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Centella Asiatica Extract, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract , Hydrolyzed Rice Bran Protein, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Ethylcellulose, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Parfum (Fragrance), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Sorbic Acid <16354>.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Hand Wash 500ml Dr. Barbara Sturm Hand Wash 500ml
description: A bathroom essential if we’ve ever seen one — this Hand Wash is just what you’ve been waiting for. Bottled hydration for your fingers, this moisturising gel formula turns back the hands of time (literally) with a powerhouse blend filled with anti-ageing properties that gently cleanses your skin. Free from artificial fragrances and colouring, this skin-friendly cocktail is instead supercharged with aloe vera, glycerin, coconut oil, panthenol and a restorative herbal plant complex. Forming a velvety foam that works to lift away excess oils and dirt whilst simultaneously preserving your natural oils, this intensely moisturising bathroom essential leaves your skin feeling hydrated, soft and most importantly — clean!
how_to_use: Apply one or two pumps of the Hand Wash to wet hands and lather by rubbing them together. Rinse off thoroughly with lukewarm water. Towel-dry before applying Dr. Barbara Sturm‘s Super Anti-Aging Hand Cream.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Panthenol, Lactobacillus/Portulaca Oleracea Ferment Extract, Starch Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Urea, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Azadirachta Indica Seed Oil, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Carum Carvi (Caraway) Seed Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Levulinic Acid, Alcohol, Sodium Levulinate, Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium Lactate, Lactic Acid, Pantolactone, Sodium Citrate, P-Anisic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate.

name: Anthony Invigorating Rush Hair and Body Wash 355ml Anthony Invigorating Rush Hair and Body Wash 355ml
description: A deeply effective two-in-one cleanser, this head-to-toe wash gently cleans and invigorates scalp, skin and senses with extracts of balsam and crisp eucalyptus. Channelling a crisp Canadian balsam forest from the comfort of your shower cubicle, this award-winning Invigorating Rush Hair + Body Wash cleanses your hair and body as it conditions (why do two steps when you can do one?). A blend of glycerin and vitamin B5 hydrates, eucalyptus extract stimulates as birch leaf refreshes and Canadian balsam soothes. Plus, it’s infused with a uniquely refreshing, alpine wood scent that energises the mind even after you rinse it off.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair and body. Work into a lather. Rinse.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Abies Balsamea (Balsam Canada) Extract, Betula Alba Leaf Extract, Panthenol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Thuja Occidentalis Leaf Oil, Abies Sibirica Oil, Ferula Galbaniflua (Galbanum) Resin Oil, Allantoin, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Keratin Amino Acids, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Polyquaternium-44, Glycol Distearate, Laureth-4, Hexylene Glycol, Trehalose, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, DMDM Hydantoin, Coumarin, Limonene, Linalool, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1)

name: Loving Tan Tan Removing & Skin Polishing Salon Quality Glove Loving Tan Tan Removing & Skin Polishing Salon Quality Glove
description: A salon-quality exfoliating glove, the Tan Removing & Skin Polishing Glove helps to slough away your last layer of tan and reveal revitalised, smooth skin beneath — the perfect canvas for a fresh layer of bronze. What makes this glove so special? Well, it’s been intelligently designed to completely remove dead skin cells and to prepare your skin for your next application. Choose from two intensities of exfoliation depending on your skin type (or how stubbornly that old tan is clinging on!) The light exfoliation side offers a gentle buff — best for more sensitive skin types — while the heavy exfoliation side offers (as the name would suggest) a more heavy-duty experience.
how_to_use: Best results are achieved at the end of your shower once your skin has absorbed maximum moisture. Simply place your hand inside dampened glove and move glove against skin in circular motions, using pressure as needed. The pink side is for lighter exfoliation and the dark side is for stronger exfoliation.

name: ESPA Cooling Body Moisturiser 200ml ESPA Cooling Body Moisturiser 200ml
description: The perfect accompaniment for warm days and sun-soaked skin, ESPA's Cooling Body Moisturiser has a soothing, featherweight formula that imparts a wave of velveteen hydration. A deeply replenishing treatment, this light cream-gel moisturiser is formulated with a cocktail of conditioning ingredients; it calls upon aloe to calm irritation, boerhavia (a herbal plant that features prominently in practices of Ayurveda) to gently soothe and hydrate, alongside hyaluronic acid and sunflower concentrate to deliver long-lasting hydration. The finishing touch is an infusion of a cooling menthol complex that prompts an ultra-refreshing sensation on your skin.
how_to_use: Use morning and evening. Massage into skin in firm, upward, circular movements until fully absorbed.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Menthyl Pca, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Sclerotium Gum, Sorbitol, Potato Starch Modified, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Hectorite, Sodium Pca, Cetearyl Wheat Straw Glycosides, Sucrose Cocoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Fragrance* (Parfum), Linalool, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Sodium Lactate, Pelargonium Graveolens Oil, Limonene, Lactic Acid, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Citric Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Boerhavia Diffusa Root Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Geraniol, Sodium Sulfite, Phytic Acid, Citral. *100% Natural Fragrance.

name: Mini Mio Beddy Byes Bath Milk 200ml Mini Mio Beddy Byes Bath Milk 200ml
description: Before tucking your little ones in, there's no better way to settle restless moods than with a calming soak; that's where Mama Mio's Beddy Byes Bath Milk comes in. Expertly formulated by dermatologists to suit the delicate and sensitive skin of babies over three months old, the gentle bath is as nourishing as it is soothing. It's laced with the brand's 'Skin Nurturing Omega Complex': a unique blend of shea, avocado and coconut oils which is rich in omegas to nourish and moisturise your little ones' delicate skin. An infusion of 100% natural lavender fragrance then helps to coax them into a calm mood before bedtime. Here's to restful nights of sleep!
how_to_use: Pour a glug into warm running water. Rinse well after use. Mama Mio's products are specially designed and recommended for age 3 months and over.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Glycerin, Sucrose Stearate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Phenoxyethanol, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Kaolin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Xanthan Gum, Linalool, Cellulose Gum, Limonene, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Tocopherol, Citral, Citric Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil. *100% Natural Fragrance

name: Mama Mio Tummy Rub Scrub 180ml Mama Mio Tummy Rub Scrub 180ml
description: Brimming with omega-rich ingredients to slow the appearance of stretch marks during pregnancy, Mama Mio's Tummy Rub Scrub sloughs away dead skin, buffs skin and reveals healthy, nourished skin. The star of the show here is the brands unique ‘Omega Rich Skin Stretch Complex', which is made up of a blend of avocado, inchi and argan oils (all rich in omegas 3, 6 and 9) to help keep your skin elastic, supple and strong. Achieving gentle yet effective exfoliation is pumice and volcanic sand that ensures even application without scratching at skin; and to bolster those visible effects is the infusion of papaya extract which helps with enzymatic exfoliation (a type of chemical exfoliator). Added to the mix if fig extract, a powerful antioxidant that keeps skin smooth and soft. Finally, to protect your skin against potential irritation, there's the essential antioxidant vitamin E. It smells simply delightful too: you've got an invigorating blend of orange oil, bergamot, mandarin, may chang and lime to thank for that.
how_to_use: Use two-three times weekly, massaging in circular motions onto wet or dry skin. Rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Aqua/Water/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pumice, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Isoamyl Laurate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Bambusa Arundinacea (Bamboo) Stem Powder, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Plukenetia Volubilis (Inca Inchi) Seed Oil, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Tocopherol, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Lactic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Silica, Citral, Linalool, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit/Leaf Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract. *100% Natural Fragrance.

name: Mama Mio Tummy Rub Oil 200ml - Super Size (Worth £45.00) Mama Mio Tummy Rub Oil 200ml - Super Size (Worth £45.00)
description: Brimming with omega-rich ingredients to slow the appearance of stretch marks during pregnancy, just one pump of Mama Mio’s Tummy Rub Oil is enough to cover your bump, enveloping it in hydration, boosting elasticity and preventing sensitivity along the way. The star of the show here is the brands unique ‘Omega Rich Skin Stretch Complex’, which is made up of a blend of avocado, inchi and argan oils (all rich in omegas 3, 6 and 9) to help keep your skin elastic, supple and strong. For all the hydration and nourishment you’ll also find coconut oil, sweet almond oil, olive oil and rosehip oil. Finally, to protect youir skin against potential irritation, there’s the essential antioxidant vitamin E. It smells simply delightful too: you’ve got an invigorating blend of orange oil, bergamot, mandarin, may chang and lime to thank for that.
how_to_use: Apply twice daily, massaging from above your boobs to below your bum, all the way around.

name: AMELIORATE Intensive Lip Treatment 15ml AMELIORATE Intensive Lip Treatment 15ml
description: The Intensive Lip Treatment from AMELIORATE is designed to hydrate, smooth and soften lips. Ideal for dry, chapped and red lips, the cream provides instant comfort and relief. Non-greasy and fast-absorbing, the formula utilises active ingredients including ceramide-like amino acids, oat lipids and the brand’s unique LaH6 complex, to intensely moisturise lips and improve elasticity. Creating a protective shield around the delicate lip area, the treatment works to resist dehydration, while improving the overall appearance of lip tone and texture.
how_to_use: For best results apply liberally at night and allow the treatment to work while you sleep. Thereafter, gently massage all over your lips daily, re-applying as often as needed. Can be used alone as a sheer, moisturising lip cream or under any lipstick for a silky-smooth application.

name: Mio Sun-Drenched Body Wash 200ml Mio Sun-Drenched Body Wash 200ml
description: Sunny days are here to stay with this radiance-boosting body cleanser — vegan friendly and featuring 100% natural fragrance, this is a wellbeing and body care staple. Your daily shower doesn't have to be a monotonous chore, instead, you can add a ray of sunshine in the form of Mio's Sun-Drenched Body Wash. Featuring the brand's ‘Feel-Good Complex' that blends together Indian fig extract and Monk's pepper berry to impart a flood of hydration and instantly improve your sense of wellbeing. It's soft, supple skin only from here on out, with a limb-loving infusion of andiroba oil to moisturise and nourish every inch of your skin. Finished with an uplifting fragrance blend of citrus and orange blossom, this is sure to wash away every trace of the day while boosting your skin's radiance thanks to illuminating pearlescent minerals. Get ready to glow from head to toe...
how_to_use: Apply to wet skin in the shower or bath. Massage to release the creamy foam. Rinse well.

name: Mama Mio Tummy Rub Trio (Worth £72.00) Mama Mio Tummy Rub Trio (Worth £72.00)
description: Brimming with omega-rich ingredients to slow the appearance of stretch marks during pregnancy, Mama Mio's Tummy Rub Trio (worth £72) hydrates skin, boosts elasticity, helps protect even the most sensitive of bumps aaaand offers savings that’ll make you say “Mama Mio!” The star of the show here is the brand's unique 'Omega Rich Skin Stretch Complex', which is made up of a blend of avocado, inchi and argan oils (all rich in omegas 3, 6 and 9) to help keep your skin elastic, supple and strong. For all the hydration, you'll also find coconut oil, sweet almond oil and shea butter. Finally, to protect your skin against potential irritation, there's the essential antioxidant vitamin E. Whether you’d prefer the classic ‘Original’ (that smells delightful might we add thanks to orange oil, bergamot and mandarin), a ‘Lavender and Mint’ variation oozing with herbal freshness or a ‘Fragrance Free’ option, you’ve got an invigorating line-up just begging to be unravelled.
how_to_use: Apply twice daily, massaging from above your boobs to below your bum, all the way around.

name: Mio Muscle Motivator Revitalising Gel 125ml Mio Muscle Motivator Revitalising Gel 125ml
description: Treat your hard-working muscles to some much-needed TLC with Mio's replenishing, botanical-infused Muscle Motivator Revitalising Gel. Enriched with replenishing menthol and boasting a lightweight, easily-absorbed texture, this will leave you feeling as good as new like that. Cooling, soothing, and delightfully invigorating, you'll quickly feel the relief wash over tired limbs as this cool blue gel gets to work. For when you're feeling the burn, have been on your feet all day long or need a helping hand to bring life back to your hard-working body, Mio's hydrating gel is quick to come to the rescue. Brimming with a ‘Feel-Good Complex' made up of Indian fig extract and Monk's pepper berry, this instantly boosts hydration and leaves you feeling uplifted. The cooling, invigorating aroma of menthols wakes up tired souls, helped along by refreshing notes of eucalyptus and orange essential oils... this is your SOS staple for bringing an overworked body back from the brink.
how_to_use: Massage one or two scoops of Muscle Motivator into hard-working legs, achy upper back, neck and shoulders. Perfect pre or post-workouts.

name: BeYou Chafing Cream 50g BeYou Chafing Cream 50g
description: Introducing BeYou's Anti-Chafing Cream, formulated to form a water-repellent protective barrier while still allowing the skin to breathe. This innovative formula provides 360 degree protection for peace of mind - not only does it prevent skin irritation it soothes irritated skin! BeYou's proprietary blend of ingredients has both occlusive and humectant properties all while feeling light and silky smooth on the skin! So whether its thigh chafing or under-boob, we've got you covered! Made from smart, high performance ingredients designed to resist water and sweat its your perfect companion to help those who are prone to chafing. It leaves a silky smooth veil over the skin to reduce friction and ease any areas agitated by friction and rubbing. The innovative formula includes BeYou's ‘wonder ingredient’, colloidal silver, well-known for its naturally antibacterial properties, leaving you safe in the knowledge your skin is protected.
how_to_use: To help prevent or soothe chafing skin, massage a pea sized amount onto the required area, such as the inner thighs, until the cream goes clear. Reapply as desired.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, Sorbitan Olivate & Cetearyl Olivate (Coconut Based Emulsifier), Vegetable Glycerine, Argan Oil, Frankincense Essential Oil, Lavender Essential Oil, Tea Tree Essential Oil, Geranium Essential Oil, Maltodextrin (non GMO), Silver. Allergens: Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol, Citral, Citronellol.

name: BeYou Menstrual Cup - Medium BeYou Menstrual Cup - Medium
description: Joining the brand's empowering range of period pain alleviating products is BeYou's all-new Menstrual Cup. It's available in two sizes - 'Medium' and 'Large' - and is made of 100% soft medical-grade silicone, no BPA, no latex, no dye. The BeYou Menstrual Cup holds up to three tampons worth and can be worn for up to 12 hours (however we recommend changing the cup every 4-8 hours). Forget about tampons or pads, BeYou's Menstural Cup will keep you dry and comfortable during the day and night. This comfortable and leak-free design also helps you save money and reduce your waste each and every month with each cup lasting years and years.
how_to_use: Follow these steps to insert your cup: The BeYou Menstrual Cup can be left in for up to 12 hours. We recommend changing the cup every 4-8 hours. Please be aware, though rare, TSS, is a serious disease caused by toxin-producing strains of the staphylococcus aureus bacterium. In order to prevent TSS, or any other infection, ensure you follow the below cleaning hygiene advice when using your cup. Size guide: Under 25s who haven't had a child (or have had a caesarean) should try the 'medium' size. Under 25s who have had a vaginal birth should try the 'large' size. Over 25s should try the 'large' size. Cleaning your cup: Before using your cup for the time make sure to sanitise it. You can do this via one of the following methods:
ingredient: 100% soft medical-grade silicone, no BPA, no latex, no dye

name: Kora Organics Noni Glow Face Oil 30ml Kora Organics Noni Glow Face Oil 30ml
description: Kiss goodbye to your skin care bugbears with the KORA Organics Noni Glow Face Oil – a luxurious (but light!) treatment oil for face and neck that calms and brightens your skin while keeping it happily nourished, too. KORA Organics Noni Glow Face Oil houses a potent powerful blend of antioxidants (like noni fruit extract, which is great for replenishing the skin’s texture) and fatty acids (thank you, rosehip and sea buckthorn oil) that work together to soothe, hydrate and brighten dull complexions for a healthy, radiant glow. The “#1 favourite product and secret travel companion” of CEO Miranda Kerr herself, this multi-tasker can be used alone or mixed with your favourite moisturiser or concealer for an extra boost of hydration and for a gorgeously natural, healthy-looking sheen.
how_to_use: Warm a few drops in the palms of your hands and apply over the face, neck and décolletage after cleansing and before moisturising. To restore skin to its optimum beauty, use as a daily nourishing treatment.

name: Megababe Unscented Thigh Rescue 60g Megababe Unscented Thigh Rescue 60g
description: Megababe’s Thigh Rescue (although not limited to the thigh area!) is a balm-like anti-chafe stick that creates a protective barrier on the skin for a smooth glide wherever friction tends to irritate you. With none of the mess (put down the talc) and a clear application, the award-winning stick keeps you comfortable from head to toe. The easy-to-apply formula nourishes skin with a blend of natural extracts. Aloe vera soothes and cools, while grapeseed oil and ginger root extract improves the appearance of the skin’s elasticity and firmness. Finally, pomegranate seed extract hydrates and protects the outer layer of skin. Sure to be a staple in your handbag, Thigh Rescue can be applied to the armpits, bra lines, waistband, ankles and anywhere in between.
how_to_use: Swipe directly onto skin as needed throughout the day. For use on thighs, toes, shoulders, elbows - anywhere chafe is a problem. Note that product transfer to clothing isn’t common but could occur. Not recommended for use with silk and other similarly delicate fabrics.

name: Earl of East Japanese Bathing Ritual Hand Wash Earl of East Japanese Bathing Ritual Hand Wash
description: Refresh your hands (and luxuriate in a decadent scent with each breathe) with the Japanese Bathing Ritual Hand Wash from Earl of East. One of their classic releases, this decadent formula works into a fragrant lather that will have you wanting to wash your hands over and over again. Available in two therapeutic aromas, the only hard part is picking your favourite... Taking its name from the Japanese word for hot spring and emulating the very same sense of serenity that makes the onsen a cultural tradition, the Onsen scent profile has an uplifting medley of peppermint, eucalyptus and neroli that alludes to the relaxing and rejuvenating qualities of the practice. The Shinrin Yoku literally forest bath in Japanese scent is an ode to the practice of disconnecting from our fast-paced world, being in nature and absorbing the peaceful atmosphere of the woods. It has an earthy profile of cedarwood, black pepper and oakmoss that conjures the image of a forest floor after the early morning rain abates.
how_to_use: Work into a lather to cleanse your hands and luxuriate in the heavenly scent.

name: fresh Oval Soap Waterlily fresh Oval Soap Waterlily
description: A staple since its inception, fresh’s Oval Soap was actually their very first formula; earning affection since the brand’s humble beginnings, it’s now found in washrooms around the world. Infused with a sumptuous floral scent, the vegetable-based Oval Soap - ‘Waterlily’ is milled multiple times, making them super dense, luxurious, and long-lasting. Unlike the stripping soaps of yore, this nourishing formula is powered by shea butter to ensure that your skin never feels tight after rinsing. The soap is also hand-wrapped, tied with a delicate wire, and topped with a semi-precious stone, making it the perfect gift (for others or yourself!).
how_to_use: Gently massage into damp skin to cleanse.

name: Peter Thomas Roth Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydrating Body Cream 236ml Peter Thomas Roth Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydrating Body Cream 236ml
description: An impressively potent head-to-toe moisturiser, Peter Thomas Roth's Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Cream douses dry and dehydrated skin in a shower of hydration. Formulated with 5% hyaluronic acid and two hyaluronic acid-boosters (Pentavitin and ProHyal+), this clever cream attracts pure moisture from the atmosphere and locks it in for 72 hours of hydration even after cleansing. Added to the mix is shea butter, pro vitamin B5 and vitamins C and E to up the ante on hydration and protection and thus doing wonders for rough patches, crepiness, fine lines and wrinkles. Plumped-up, youthful-looking skin has never been so blissful...
how_to_use: Apply the cream onto the body twice daily with continued use.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml
description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. We’ll take a lifetime supply!
how_to_use: For daily usage and sun exposition. Shake before use. Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure. Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.

description: If you’re looking for the best of the best, you’ve come to the right place. This is the ultimate skin protector for reactive skin to keep it safe from UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA rays. This clever tinted fluid feels weightless on the skin and, even better, won’t mess up your make up with weeping eyes! In case you needed more persuasion, this high protection fluid is non-sticky, non-greasy and ultra-resistant to sand, water and sweat. Ticking all our boxes and more, this is heading straight into our holiday haul *adds to bag*.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml
description: Reactive skins rejoice! For La Roche-Posay have specifically formulated this treatment toner to help regulate oil without disrupting your skins natural balance. Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.
how_to_use: Apply toner gently with a damp cotton wool pad to the face and neck, morning and evening.

name: ilapothecary Face the Day Exfoliating Body Wash 200ml ilapothecary Face the Day Exfoliating Body Wash 200ml
description: Get your shower off to an energising start with ilāpothecary's Face the Day Exfoliating Body Wash. With a scent bright and zesty enough to halt heavy eyelids from falling shut mid-rinse, this invigorating wash cleanses and exfoliates at the same time — why clutter up your space when you can shower smart? A must for multitaskers, this energising formula will leave your skin beautifully scented and smooth, and your spirit uplifted. It's infused with the likes of lavender (a favourite for calming the body and mind as it eases inflammations and relieves sore muscles); perlite (a naturally derived mineral extracted from volcanic rock) to gently exfoliate away dead skin cells, refine pores and leave skin smooth and glowing; anti-inflammatory petitgrain to calm troubled skin and irritation as it eases mental anguish; plus, antioxidant-rich walnut to lend the blend its abundance of omega 3, magnesium and fatty acids. Your skin will feel more soft and supple than ever!
how_to_use: Ideal for your morning shower, but can be used any time, and in the bath too. Apply and gently rub over entire body.

name: Shiseido Ultimune Hand Cream 75ml Shiseido Ultimune Hand Cream 75ml
description: Now more than ever, our hands are constantly at odds with external factors that threaten to disrupt your moisture balance — from harsh weather to over-washing and alcohol-based disinfectants. Shiseido’s solution to dryness is close to hand! The Ultimune Power Infusing Hand Cream moisturises and protects the skin from external damage to promote smoother, more hydrated hands. It’s powered by the same innovative technology as the bestselling serum; Shiseido’s ‘ImuGenerationRED’ technology is a multi-purpose system that works simultaneously to boost your skin’s defences and promote blood circulation for a smoother finish. It’s also enriched with ‘Multi-Defense Shield Technology’ — a unique cocktail of adhesive and dry oils — to help to protect and reinforce the skin's barrier function.
how_to_use: Use daily, by applying a small amount to clean dry hands, gently massaging from wrists to fingertips.

name: Laboratory Perfumes Gorse Soap 150g Laboratory Perfumes Gorse Soap 150g
description: That love-hate relationship you have with soap bars ends here. Chock full of rich, skin-softening ingredients distilled into a shower shelf-worthy bar, you’ll fall head over heels for the Gorse Soap and its zesty take on life. Enriched with jojoba oil and shea butter to soften up even the most stone-faced, tough skin, this creamy, luxe formula lathers up a treat to rinse away dirt, grime and any other remains of the day. It’s also completely free of palm-oil and only packs in the best kind-to-skin ingredients like olive oil and coconut oil to relieve skin, while the sweet and fresh notes of Gorse transport you to the English countryside.
how_to_use: Lather in warm water and rinse off.

name: Mama Mio Tummy Rub Butter 120ml - Fragrance Free Mama Mio Tummy Rub Butter 120ml - Fragrance Free
description: Your favourite tub of joy just got even better — now available in an array of scents from the all-soothing ‘Lavender and Mint’, summer-inspired ‘Sandalwood & Cocoa’ and ‘Fragrance Free’, what’s not to love? Brimming with omega-rich ingredients to slow the appearance of stretch marks during pregnancy, Mama Mio's Tummy Rub Butter hydrates skin, boosts elasticity and helps protect even the most sensitive of bumps. The star of the show here is the brand's unique 'Omega Rich Skin Stretch Complex', which is made up of a blend of avocado, inchi and argan oils (all rich in omegas 3, 6 and 9) to help keep your skin elastic, supple and strong. For all the hydration you’ll need for the nine-month s-t-r-e-c-h, lean on its oil-rich fusion of coconut oil, sweet almond oil and shea butter. Finally, to protect your skin against potential irritation, there's the essential antioxidant vitamin E. Et voila…
how_to_use: Apply twice daily, massaging from above your boobs to below your bum, all the way around.

name: Uma Absolute Anti Aging Body Scrub Uma Absolute Anti Aging Body Scrub
description: Inspired by a deeply indulgent, centuries-old royal recipe, the Absolute Anti Aging Body Scrub renews dull and scaling skin with its detoxifying blend, revealing luminously soft limbs. An exfoliating blend of coconut sugar, rice powder, orange peel powder, honey and neem works to expel trapped dirt, toxins and pollution: helping to unclog pores, relieve pesky ingrown hairs and ease the look of dry, flaky skin. Epsom and Himalayan sea salts draw out impurities and encourage lymphatic drainage to ease the appearance of cellulite, while grapefruit promotes healthy detoxification for a toned and radiant effect. The fragrant cocktail of neroli, orange and geranium is the perfect finishing touch on this royally replenishing self-care ritual.

For added hydration and aromatherapy, let sit for a few minutes before rinsing off. Use 1–3 times per week for ideal results.

Blended with avocado, sunflower and French plum seed oil to replenish your skin with omega fatty acids and vitamin E for optimal barrier health you’ll be left feeling as soft as a baby. Taking inspiration from Korean skin care rituals is a relaxing dose of fermented red ginseng to calm your senses as well as your skin. Lightly scented with an aroma of bergamot, neroli, orange and a hint of patchouli and sandalwood this is the ultimate addition to your self-care evening to help you wind-down.

Available in two sizes (200ml and 160ml) and powered by potent, sea-sourced extracts, this silky formula works wonders on rough, moisture-deprived skin... It wouldn't be La Mer unless this elixir was empowered by the renewing Miracle Broth - a complex of hand-harvested sea kelp that undergoes three-four months of fermentation to channel the extract's invaluable self-regenerating properties. name: Peter Thomas Roth Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydrating Body Cream 236ml Peter Thomas Roth Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydrating Body Cream 236ml
description: An impressively potent head-to-toe moisturiser, Peter Thomas Roth's Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Cream douses dry and dehydrated skin in a shower of hydration. Formulated with 5% hyaluronic acid and two hyaluronic acid-boosters (Pentavitin and ProHyal+), this clever cream attracts pure moisture from the atmosphere and locks it in for 72 hours of hydration even after cleansing. Added to the mix is shea butter, pro vitamin B5 and vitamins C and E to up the ante on hydration and protection and thus doing wonders for rough patches, crepiness, fine lines and wrinkles. Plumped-up, youthful-looking skin has never been so blissful...

name: Tweezerman Point Tweezer - Steel Tweezerman Point Tweezer - Steel
description: Get up close and personal with even the unruliest of arches with Tweezerman’s Point Tweezer. Just as ingenious as you’d expect from the beauty tool experts, these tweezers feature finely tapered points that are hand-filed and perfectly aligned to ensure even and firm closure, allowing you to grab even the finest, tiniest hairs meticulously. Grabbing stubble, ingrown, baby-fine and facial hairs with ease, these are a must-have for super-fine finishing, guaranteeing a superbly groomed, polished result.
how_to_use: To ease tweezing, take a hot shower or use a warm washcloth to open pores. Tweeze in the direction of hair growth, pulling one hair at a time from the root to avoid breakage. Once basic shape is defined, go back over brows with a magnifying mirror using the precision pointed tips to: 1. Gently coax out any hidden ingrowns. 2. Grab especially tricky, hard-to-reach stubble and baby-fine strays that might have been missed the first time around. 3. Do a final refined cleanup between and around shaped brows. A second look can mean the difference between so-so brows and brows that wow! Be attentive to your natural shape and careful not to over tweeze. For ingrowns, cleanse skin and disinfect tip of tweezer with alcohol or peroxide.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Sun Drops SPF 30 30ml Dr. Barbara Sturm Sun Drops SPF 30 30ml
description: Formulated with SPF 30, Sun Drops — an innovative, light-textured serum — is like a parasol for your complexion. Alongside SPF 30, which shields your skin from the sun’s damaging rays, Sun Drops also contains an active complex of antioxidants, including purslane, vitamin E and beta-glucan, which provide further protection and promote the regeneration of damaged cell structures. It’s also enhanced with hyaluronic acid for its intensive moisture-boosting properties. Particularly suitable for sensitive skin, but suits all skin types, this is the protection your complexion is crying out for.
how_to_use: Use before sun exposure. Apply thoroughly to the skin, after cleansing.
