This does-it-all balm from Evereden is about to become your secret weapon in sorting all sorts of skin issues, from chafed nipples to dry patches to scars and cuts. description: Elevating your soak to a level of sanctity, ilāpothecary's Magnesium and Amethyst Deep Relax Bath Soak is laced with powerfully reparative and relaxing oils and gems that merge beautifully with warm water to instate a sense of supreme peacefulness. Now in a 100% recyclable, unique and high-end black miron glass jar, the luxe packaging has even been upgraded with a screw-on lid to enhance ease of use. A godsend after a long, stressful day, the magnesium and mineral-rich salts work to relax muscles, ease nervous tension and promote deeper sleep. As for spirit-lifting ingredients, amber is believed to absorb pain and negative energy as it alleviates stress and encourages self-confidence; amethyst helps soothe inflamed skin and is believed to relax the nerves and help heal the aura, allowing it to restore and rebalance; benzoin oil is a wonderfully reassuring oil that helps to calm stressed, burnt-out minds; last but not least, purifying cedarwood (sometimes known as the 'sleepy' oil) helps to stimulate the release of melatonin and deeply relax the body. Your duvet will be calling you as soon as you step out of the tub...

name: Tan-Luxe Super Glow Intensive Night Treatment Mask Tan-Luxe Super Glow Intensive Night Treatment Mask
description: Taking Super Glow’s hydrating, plumping, nourishing and brightening benefits and dialling them up to 100, this highly active, highly-saturated intensive night treatment mask is so concentrated, it comes in two components: a potent self-tan elixir and a nourishing skincare oil enriched with a unique tetrapeptide complex. This dynamic duo allows you to create a custom cocktail – resulting in a nourishing night mask proven to help minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles whilst delivering a super-gradual glow by morning. Tan-Luxe's Super Glow Elixir with hydrating hyaluronic acid is powered by 5 skin-plumping tetrapeptides proven to help regenerate skin and improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a more youthful appearance with regular use. The optimum level of gradual tanner compliments this super serum for the ultimate tailor-made tan. Supercharge this with the brand's Super Glow Facial Oil: a blend of grapeseed, amaranth, calendula, carrot, abyssinian oils for an antioxidant & vitamin infused boost which leaves skin brighter with a more even tone. This luxurious, lightweight oil seals in moisture, minimising trans-epidermal water loss. It’s time to wake up to rested, refreshed skin that glows.

name: L'Occitane Cherry Blossom Petal-Soft Hand Cream 75ml L'Occitane Cherry Blossom Petal-Soft Hand Cream 75ml
description: A warm embrace for your hard-working hands, the Cherry Blossom Hand Cream holds within its beautifully decorated exterior, a lightly textured formula ready to grant touchably soft skin. Created to celebrate the poetic beauty of the Provençal landscape and the cherry trees that are synonymous with it, the Cherry Blossom Collection from L’Occitane is an ode to the delicate first bloom of this enticing flower. Caring for chapped, dry hands that are crying out for a little (read: a lot) of TLC, this moisturising hand cream from L’Occitane has been carefully formulated to bring your hands the attention they deserve. Supercharged with ultra-nourishing shea butter and vitamin E, this fresh and floral-scented hand cream is a desk, bedside and bag essential.

Vegan, non-drying and bursting with fragrance while killing 99.9% of bacteria and viruses, this pocket-sized gel keeps skin clean, refreshed and nurtured. With three sumptuous scents on offer, use your hygiene practices as an excuse to enjoy Molton Brown’s famous fragrance of ‘Rhubarb & Rose’ (a sweet, fruity blend with a fresh twist, thanks to the likes of rhubarb, grapefruit, lemongrass, spearmint and vanilla).

name: Omorovicza Reviving Eye Cream (15ml) Omorovicza Reviving Eye Cream (15ml)
description: This is a highly effective, refreshing cream that puts the sparkle back into the skin around your eyes. Arnica helps reduce puffiness, vitamin K (lucerne oil) diminishes dark circles by mending broken capillaries, peptides (from hazelnuts) minimise the appearance of fine lines, while cooling cucumber extract combats stress and fatigue. Omorovicza's patented 'Hydro Mineral Transference' leaves your eye area firmer. A soothing eye cream that's good at reducing puffiness - especially during hay fever-season (or party season...!)
how_to_use: After cleansing, gently dab along eye socket using the tip of the 4th (ring) finger; no need to apply to the very tender skin nearest the eyes just around the ocular cavity (the bone ridge round your eye). Suitable for all skin types. Use the Ying Yu Jade Eye Roller with this for extra de-puffing.

name: Molton Brown Lime & Patchouli Hand Lotion Molton Brown Lime & Patchouli Hand Lotion
description: By royal appointment (no mean feat!), Molton Brown’s silky Hand Lotion conditions the hands of the finest hotels’ clientele. With timeless design that looks chic by the sink and turns hand-washing into an art form, these balmy formulas soften the gnarliest palms and leave skin gently scented and safe from the elements. Ultra-lightweight and non-greasy (yet deeply replenishing), slather your hands after cleansing to seal moisture in and envelop your senses with delicate, soul-soothing fragrance. Uplifting and invigorating, Lime & Patchouli smells fresh and incredible verdant with top notes of violet leaf, lime and eucalyptus over cumin, cardamom, cedarwood, musk and patchouli. It’s blissful! And, if you still need convincing, this formula's free from the usual suspects (no parabens, gluten or cruelty here!).
how_to_use: Wonderfully verdant notes with a zesty, citrus infusion give hands an intensely moisturising treatment and leave skin softly scented. Best for: For lovers of refreshing scents - moisturise hands after cleansing with {Lime & Patchouli Fine Liquid Hand Wash}.

name: FOREO PEACH Cooling Prep Gel 100ml FOREO PEACH Cooling Prep Gel 100ml
description: Developed specifically for use with your FOREO PEACH™ device, the Cooling Prep Gel primes skin for your IPL hair removal routine. Its gel-to-serum formula offers a soothing effect on the skin while enabling your device to effortlessly glide across the contours of your body. Not only does the gel add slip to your routine, but a cocktail of 17 plant extracts hydrates skin that may feel dry or irritated after shaving prior to treatment. Aloe vera and peppermint create a cooling sensation, while panthenol and vitamin E leave skin feeling silky to the touch. Even after you have finished using your device, the gel can be applied to alleviate the appearance of any sensitivity-induced redness.
how_to_use: Apply an even layer of gel on freshly shaved areas until it quickly absorbs, then follow with your designated FOREO device.

name: SUSANNE KAUFMANN Hypersensitive Body Lotion 250ml SUSANNE KAUFMANN Hypersensitive Body Lotion 250ml

Silky, smooth and hypoallergenic, even the most stressed-out, sensitive skin will be able to breathe easy as the Body Lotion caresses with calming albatrellus mushroom extract to comfort and strengthen your skin barrier. This fast-absorbing formula is enriched with sunflower and broccoli seed oil to dial up the moisture and protect against environmental elements, while vitamin E-rich shea butter nourishes skin, leaving it velvety-smooth - not greasy. Unscented and suited for everyone - whether you're on the sensitive skin spectrum or not - this luxe step is a must-have for healthy and happy skin.

name: Huda Beauty Kayali Vanilla | 28 Hand Cream 85g Huda Beauty Kayali Vanilla | 28 Hand Cream 85g
description: Can't get enough of Huda Beauty's bestselling vanilla fragrance? Take your obsession to the next level with the Kayali Vanilla Hand Cream: a luxuriously silky formula laced with the signature scent and enriched with nourishing ingredients. The warm and spicy aroma plays with notes of jasmine, Madagascan vanilla orchid, Brazilian tonka, musk, amber, patchouli and brown sugar. Hydrating your hands without feeling greasy or heavy, the cream is infused with safflower and sunflower oils (natural humectants that promise a silky finish), as well as ginseng and rosemary leaf extracts - both of which are celebrated for their soothing and calming qualities. Lavish it liberally over dry, overworked hands when you want a surge of moisture (and a whiff of the sumptuous scent!). With a full size 85g and travel-friendly 30g size, you can give your hands all the vanilla-scented TLC they deserve no matter where you are.

name: Avène XeraCalm A.D. Lipid-Replenishing Cream Moisturiser for Dry Itchy Skin 200ml Avène XeraCalm A.D. Lipid-Replenishing Cream Moisturiser for Dry Itchy Skin 200ml
description: Ideal for dry to very dry skin types, Avène’s Xera Calm Cream hydrates, soothes and nourishes to restore balance to the skin’s microbiome. The lipid-replenishing formula comforts skin prone to atopic eczema and itching, helping to reduce visible redness and re-establish equilibrium. The cream is enriched with I-modulia®, the first post-biotic active ingredient derived from Avène Thermal Spring Water (the brand's soothing hero ingredient). Teamed with Cer-omega (skin-like lipids), the formula minimises sensations of itchiness and moisturises dryness. Free from fragrance, the daily moisturising cream is suitable for the skin of infants, children and adults.
how_to_use: Use one to two times a day. Place the cream in the palm of your hand and spread it all over your body. For gentle application, first spread the cream in your hands and then spread it all over the body with the entire surface of your hands in wide strokes. Avoid rubbing the skin so as not to irritate it.

name: Fresh Milk Body Cleanser 260ml Fresh Milk Body Cleanser 260ml

What's more, it features some of your favourite skin care ingredients: ultra-hydrating hyaluronic acid, niacinamide to keep skin plump and protected and vitamin E to save your skin cells from damage and lend a softening effect. name: Loving Tan Bronze Shimmer Luminous Cream 120ml (Various Shades) Loving Tan Bronze Shimmer Luminous Cream 120ml (Various Shades)
description: A hard-working innovator in your beauty wardrobe, the Bronze Shimmer Luminous Cream can be worn over your tan for a luminous bronzed finish or alone to deepen your natural tone. Tanning experts, this one’s for you! Customise your perfect faux-glow with the tan-enhancing formula that brings a luminous look to every skin tone. Choose between three sun-drenched shades: ‘Medium’ for light to medium skin tones, ‘Dark’ is best suited for medium to dark tones and ‘Ultra Dark’ for deeper skin tones. Capture an immaculate glow in every light with micronised pigments that create a natural, soft-focus effect. You can layer to your hearts content to reach your desired depth of colour (say ‘when’), and create the perfect tan for every event and occasion. Easily washed off with warm soapy water, and enriched with aloe vera, coffee and pomegranate extracts, this skin-friendly formula leaves you radiant and feeling silky smooth.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Body Sun Cream SPF 30 150ml Dr. Barbara Sturm Body Sun Cream SPF 30 150ml
description: This potent trio includes Philip Kingleys iconic Elasticizer — a luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment (originally created for Audrey Hepburn!) that is richly moisturising and boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine without weighing strands down. Next, is the Bond Builder Restructuring Treatment powered by the brand's 'Advanced Bond Rebuilding Technology’ helping to reinforce hair bonds and repair broken ones from the overuse of heat and chemicals (guilty!) And finally, the set includes The Vitamin C Jelly Detoxifying Hair and Scalp Treatment — a unique powder to jelly formula infused with potent vitamin C to deeply cleanse your scalp and strands; removing impurities from dull, limp hair to reveal shiny weightless strands in five minutes!
how_to_use: Vitamin C Jelly: Before shampooing, thoroughly wet your hair and scalp. Empty one sachet into the applicator bottle and fill with 60ml of warm water (to the measured mark). Shake for 30 seconds to activate the formula, until a light jelly formS. Apply the jelly directly from the bottle to the hair and scalp and work in with your fingertips. Use all of the jelly, and ensure all hair is covered. Rinse out the bottle thoroughly and keep for your next treatment. Leave on for 5 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with shampoo and conditioner as normal, using the correct Philip Kingsley products for your hair texture. NOTE: Do not use for the first 3 washes after having hair colour treated. When should you use it? Use every 2-3 weeks to remove impurities and keep hair looking radiant.
ingredient: Elasticizer Deep-Conditioning Treatment:

name: OUAI Hand Lotion Refill 946ml OUAI Hand Lotion Refill 946ml
description: Here to give you a helping hand, the Hand Lotion from OUAI Haircare brings the decadence and luxury of a skin care routine to your hard-working hands. Cushiony and rich, this cream hydrates and softens your skin – (cue a “Wow, your hands are so soft!” with every fist bump, handshake or high five) – thanks to a nourishing blend of soothing avocado, rosehip seed and jojoba seed oils. Packed with fatty acids to strengthen and balance the skin barrier, this lightweight lotion will care for your hands with its airy, cloud-like texture and without any leftover ‘grease’ (butter fingers just won’t do). Delicately scented with citrus, apricot, rose, magnolia, blossom and musk, allow yourself to be whisked away to London’s Dean Street with every pump – sans the jet lag. Vegan, cruelty-free and completely recyclable (well, minus the pump), this Hand Lotion is sure to add some major style points to both your hand care routine and your décor. A bottle of this on your bedside and voila! You’re in an episode of At Home with Vogue…
how_to_use: Apply a small amount after cleansing (we like to use the {Hand Wash}). Massage into skin for soft, hydrated hands. Rejoice!

name: SUSANNE KAUFMANN Hypersensitive Body, Face and Scalp Wash 250ml SUSANNE KAUFMANN Hypersensitive Body, Face and Scalp Wash 250ml

Dermatologically tested, hypoallergenic and unscented, even the most stressed-out, sensitive skin will be able to breathe easy as this gentle, foaming wash cocoons your scalp, caresses your face and hugs your body with soothing, strengthening albatrellus mushroom extract. name: SUSANNE KAUFMANN Mountain Pine Bath Oil 250ml SUSANNE KAUFMANN Mountain Pine Bath Oil 250ml
description: Easing away the stress and tensions of your day has never been quite so easy or as indulgent than with Susanne Kaufmann's Mountain Pine Bath. Inspired by the Alpine region of Bregenzerwald, this pine-scented bath soak is the perfect antidote to sore, tense muscles and fatigued souls. Heralded for their immune boosting effect, pine and spruce needles have been carefully hand-picked from the forest behind the brand's very own production house in the rolling mountains of Austria. Transformed into oil form, these energising sprigs make this healing soak the perfect relaxant for the mind and body. Once you step into your aromatic bath, your senses will be soothed and your mind transported to the calming surroundings of the Austrian Alps. The only problem? You may never want to leave your bath tub!
how_to_use: Pour 30ml into a warm full bath. Relax in the warm for up to 30 minutes and let the aromatic oils soothe your body and senses. After your bath, wrap yourself up in your favourite blanket and elevate your legs a little on a few cushions for a couple of minutes. The perfect way to complete your little home spa treatment.
ingredient: Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Aqua (Water), Pentylene Glycol, Picea Abies Leaf Oil, Pinus Mugo Pumilio Twig Leaf Oil, Limonene.

name: Odacité Jasmine Whisper Body Oil Odacité Jasmine Whisper Body Oil
description: A delight to apply and heavenly to smell, Odacité's Jasmine Whisper Body Oil is crafted from a medley of nourishing oils that leave your limbs supremely soft and divinely scented... This vegan blend is suited to all skin types and possesses an intoxicating aroma of Jasmine flowers that evokes the spirit and lightness of sun-soaked, summer days. It's infused with exquisitely silky jasmine oil, alongside hemp and jojoba oils which cast a velvet veil of long-wearing hydration. Aside from the soft-to-the-touch finish, this decadent oil boasts a never-greasy, satin sheen that effortlessly catches the light.

description: Introducing their world-worshipped scents to the realm of sanitiser, Molton Brown's non-drying gel formula is crafted with 64.7% alcohol to kill 99.9% of bacteria and enveloped viruses. A bigger bottle than the {travel-friendly edition}, keep this at your desk, sink or wherever you please... A must for anyone who hates the alcohol-heavy scent of the average hand sanitiser, these jewel-toned formulas will keep hands clean and beautifully fragranced. With three sumptuous scents on offer, use your hygiene practices as an excuse to enjoy Molton Brown’s famous fragrance of ‘Rhubarb & Rose’ (a sweet, fruity blend with a fresh twist, thanks to the likes of rhubarb, grapefruit, lemongrass, spearmint and vanilla); 'Coastal Cypress and Sea Fennel' (a fresh cocktail of fig leaves, cardamom, jasmine, salted cypress and cedarwood); and 'Orange and Bergamot' (a zesty mix of bergamot, mandarin, neroli, musk, ylang-ylang and cedarwood).

Not only does this aromatic hand cream smell beyond divine boasting grapefruit, lime and guaiac notes, it also softens and protects skin with its beautiful blend of shea butter extract, jojoba esters and sweet almond oil. All it takes is just one pump to restore baby-soft texture to your delicate digits.

name: EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF10 EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF10
description: Easy to apply, rapidly absorbable and never sticky or greasy, the lightweight Sunscreen Mousse SPF10 works with the epidermis to deliver both immediate and lasting protection against UVA and UVB rays for up to six hours! Exceptionally water-resistant and without any parabens, nanoparticles or perfumes, this formula is ideal for sensitive and delicate skin. Sitting pretty under make up with its quick drying-time and invisible, matte finish, this hydrating mousse protects against premature ageing and dehydration via a medley of vitamins C and E. Added collagen and silk extracts also ward against and repair skin damage, which – since your skin is kept hydrated and protected against sunburn – allows the melanin in your skin to develop into a rich tan that lasts. A boon for heliophiles and those with active lifestyles, it actually forms an innovative protective barrier that mimics your skin’s natural defences – providing extraordinary protection without clogging pores or sitting on the surface of your skin. Budge-proof (even when rubbing skin with a towel!) and lasting twice as long as cream formulas, this marvel can also be used on scalps if you have thin hair – or even on parched hair itself to protect it from dehydrating.

description: Rich and nourishing, Omorovicza’s Body Cream helps to hydrate skin and improve its appearance, protecting it from the environmental damage encountered on a daily basis. For renewed elasticity and vitality, polypeptides strengthen dermo-proteins such as elastin and collagen, while omega 6-rich ceramides bolster skin’s barrier function. Alongside this, a luscious cocktail of natural oils bring further benefits: apricot kernel oil softens the skin, plum almond oil soothes and restores suppleness, rice germ oil provides essential nutrients and jojoba oil, shea butter and apple pectin restore much-needed moisture. Finally, Omorovicza’s signature Hydro Mineral Transference delivers minerals deep into skin to leave it looking (and feeling!) firmer and more youthful.

description: Delivering soft and supple skin, this Pomegranate Hand Cream from Weleda is formulated to deeply nourish and protect mature skin from damaging environmental aggressors. It’s formulated with light organic sesame oil – a naturally derived emollient - that works to soothe and hydrate skin as it forms a protective barrier that locks in moisture for a soft finish. Another hydrating hero, shea butter grants a veil of hydration that feels luxuriously smooth on your skin, while a blend of organic pomegranate seed oil and golden millet extract helps to fend off dryness. The results? Firm, supple and soft hands!

name: Evereden Soothing Baby Massage Oil Cotton Dew Evereden Soothing Baby Massage Oil Cotton Dew
description: Powered by five organic, nourishing oils - including over 50% cold-pressed sunflower seed oil - Evereden’s Soothing Baby Massage Oil is designed to turn your regular baby massages into a spa-worthy ritual. With a satin-finish, the oil won’t leave you or your little one feeling greasy; instead, the formula will lock in hydration while soothing any irritation your baby might be experiencing. Boasting the same hero qualities of the fragrance-free edition, this 'Cotton Dew' scented massage oil makes bath time a sensorial experience you and your little one will adore. Fruity notes of watermelon, rhubarb and peach mingle with a subtle vanilla and floral scent - without a synthetic fragrance in sight. Trust us, this scent is so good, you’ll wish you could bottle it up to wear as a fragrance yourself.

name: Uma Pure Calm Wellness Bath Oil Uma Pure Calm Wellness Bath Oil
description: A celebration of creator Shrankhla’s aunt Uma, these stunning, home-grown treatment oils are all about simplicity, integrity and equilibrium, and are virtually unparalleled in their purity and efficacy. Introducing some much-needed calmness, not to mention luxury, into your bath time, this Pure Calm Wellness Bath Oil harnesses the skin and sensory benefits of some of the world’s most powerfully healing plant extracts, granting benefits to both skin and mind. Sandalwood lends a woody aroma that stimulates positivity in and confidence, while mood-boosting jasmine and soothing vetiver and lavender oils work their rich and relaxing magic. As for your skin, jojoba and rosehip oils supply a series of antioxidants including conditioning vitamin E to soften skin, soothe irritation, moisturise and heal.
how_to_use: Pour roughly 2 tablespoons of bath oil into your bath. Can also be used as a body oil; If using as a body oil, we recommend diluting with equal part carrier oil (such as jojoba) or your body lotion.
ingredient: Essential oils of Sandalwood, Jasmine, Vetiver, Chamomile, Lavender, Clary Sage and Neroli in a base of Jojoba, Rosehip and Grapeseed oil.

name: Isle of Paradise Light Self-Tanning Oil Mist 200ml Isle of Paradise Light Self-Tanning Oil Mist 200ml
description: With peach colour correcting actives to brighten skin, Isle of Paradise’s Light Self-Tanning Oil Mist is supercharged with hydrating ingredients to nourish skin while offering a gorgeously natural-looking glow. The secret to a flawless tan? All the hydration — which is why this formula (complete with an easy to apply, ultra-fine mister) is packed out with three hydrating heroes: hyaluronic acid, glycerin, squalane plus a vitamin-rich sea kelp base. And for an adding boost of moisture, there’s a nourishing mix of oils including argan, grape seed and avocado, clinically proven to lock in moisture for up to 24 hours.
how_to_use: Exfoliate and moisturise dry areas before application. Shake well and mist until skin is totally saturated. Leave hands and feet until last- blend with a tanning or hand in sweeping motions. Thoroughly wash palms after use. Reapply as you start to fade to help glowing for longer.

name: Dermalogica Prisma Protect SPF 30 50ml Dermalogica Prisma Protect SPF 30 50ml
description: Bestowing a beautiful glow (while also protecting your complexion), the Prisma Protect SPF30 is a light-activated multitasking moisturiser that provides broad spectrum defence while preventing future signs of skin damage. With a creamy formula that sinks into skin to deliver deep hydration and a silky-smooth finish, ‘intelligent Drone Technology’ within this moisturiser is activated by visible light, releasing radiance by boosting your skin’s natural luminosity. This is assisted by a bio-ferment from sage, which helps to maintain an even skin tone and give you that effortlessly flawless complexion. There’s a double whammy of protection inside this clever tube too: broad Spectrum SPF30 provides protection from UV damage while ‘Breakthrough Antioxidant Technology’ helps protect skin against pollution. Goodbye stressed out, dehydrated skin; hello long-lasting hydration and a stronger, happier complexion.

name: BYREDO Bal d'Afrique Hand Cream BYREDO Bal d'Afrique Hand Cream
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your hardworking hands while simultaneously moisturising and caring for skin, you need to discover the brand's decadent range of hand care, beginning with the Bal d'Afrique Hand Cream. description: Bet you thought you had to wait until your vacay to revive your radiance. Like a bottle of sunshine, the Skin Firming Gradual Tanning Lotion is a perfect way to amp up your daily dose of sun-soaked glowiness. Packing a punch of skin-tightening ingredients like avocado extract, bentonite and nourishing shea butter, this smoothing formula improves elasticity and optimises your all-over tan, no sunbeds needed.

name: Fur Bath Drops 2.4 fl. oz Fur Bath Drops 2.4 fl. oz
description: A modern, clean, cruelty-free take on the classic 90s bath beads – sans the gelatinous casings! Sheathed in red seaweed – an environmentally-friendly alternative to gelatin – these natural capsules easily dissolve in water, releasing skin-feeding goodness with ease. With a softening blend of oils – including the much-lauded, signature Fur Oil! – these Bath Drops gently nourish, replenish, soften and relax. Cue: a bath that’s boosted with clary sage oil for antibacterial and astringent properties that calm post-shaving irritation while neutralising excess sebum production, jojoba oil to mirror the body’s natural moisturising properties, and a hydrating cocktail of vitamins E, D and C, thanks to a lashing of grapeseed oil. With no sticky residue and a luxurious, comforting scent, this spar-in-a-jar product is the ultimate self-care weapon.

description: Formulated with Mama Mio’s ‘Skin Nurturing Omega Complex’, this massage gel is sensitive skin-friendly and leaves baby’s skin feeling nourished, hydrated and even plumper than before. Olive oil also comes into the mix, which helps to strengthen skin and add a whiff of natural fragrance. That’s not all. In true Mama Mio fashion of putting mother and baby first, this massage gel has been formulated by dermatologists and is paediatrician-approved so you can smooth in this silky formula with ease and reassurance.

description: With an ergonomic design that is simple to use and impressively convenient, he Easy To Reach Back Applicator puts an even, all-over-tan (yes, even *that* spot on your back) into your hands. So how does it work? Well, the lengthy applicator offers an extension for your arms, so you can easily apply a layer of your favourite tanner in those hard to reach places. The sponge applicator on one end allows your favourite formulas to be smoothed across your skin without missing areas or causing streaks. Plus, it can be easily folded away for storage or travelling.

Apply the product directly to your back in sections to achieve even coverage. Tip: You can lightly dampen the foam applicator with water to avoid product wastage.

Super hydrating and restorative, this intensely nourishing formula helps skin recover from post-sun damage and extends the life of your tan. Putting back what the sun takes out, this cooling lotion restores lost moisture and refines skin texture, leaving behind a dewy finish that compliments sun-kissed complexions.

Hard workers and boasting delicate skin that often ages easily, our hands are really quite important, which is why providing them with intense levels of moisture is absolutely essential. name: Mio Solar Power Body Scrub 275ml Mio Solar Power Body Scrub 275ml
description: Soft, supple skin part of your body care goals? Then you've come to the right place. Doing exactly as it says on the tub (and then some), the Solar Power Body Scrub sloughs away dead skin cells to reveal infinitely smoother skin. Infused with golden caster sugar crystals, this physical exfoliator renews skin as its buffs out the old to usher in the new. Mio's ‘Feel-Good Complex' of indian fig extract and monk's pepper berry blend work together to replenish and maintain hydration levels, ensuring a smoother-than-smooth finish, while myrtle and olive oil protect the skin with their antioxidant properties. Andiroba oil bolsters nourishment, too, while adding buckets of moisture. Finishing with an oh-so-clean, healthy and visibly radiant shine to skin, like most Mio products, it even smells heavenly with its light, uplifting scent of citrus and orange blossom notes.

name: Milk Makeup Sunshine Skin Tint SPF 30 Refill Milk Makeup Sunshine Skin Tint SPF 30 Refill
description: Effortlessly slotting into the {Sunshine Skin Tint Broad Spectrum SPF 30's} chic roller pen, the Sunshine Skin Tint SPF 30 Refill provides weightless coverage and moisturises with natural oils for a dewy finish all with broad spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen and 66% less plastic waste. Available in 14 adaptable shades, this formula blends seamlessly for buildable-yet-breathable, natural-looking coverage. Perfect for on-the-go application (with an iconic glass rollerball that doesnt clog or get stuck), the sheer shades effortlessly melt on contact with skin, creating a natural finish whatever your skin tone. Laced with a blend of grapeseed, avocado, mandarin, jojoba, and olive-derived squalane oils, this moisturising formula creates a healthy and glowing finish you'll adore. But it doesn't stop there, broad spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen protects your skin against UVA and UVB rays, which contains non-nano zinc (i.e. it wont cause flashback) and is coral reef-safe too.
how_to_use: Once your {Sunshine Skin Tint SPF 30} is finished, remove the empty inner cartridge by unscrewing counter-clockwise until it slides out. Remove the twist cap and removable label on the new Refill Cartridge. Insert the new Refill Cartridge into the original packages outer body. Screw the new Refill Cartridge clockwise into the outer body until secure. (NOTE: Do not twist too tightly.) Press the pump button until formula is dispensed onto the glass rollerball to resume use. When inserting a new cartridge, you may need to pump the product a few extra times to get the new formula flowing. DISCLAIMER: Because Sunshine Skin Tint SPF 30 is makeup, we suggest applying it during your AM routine and then touching up with your traditional SPF sunscreen during the day if you are exposed to the sun for an extended period of time.

Featuring eight T-Sonic™ pulsation modes, the brush head promotes the appearance of supple, smooth skin with a natural-looking glow. name: SUSANNE KAUFMANN Mallow Blossom Bath 250ml SUSANNE KAUFMANN Mallow Blossom Bath 250ml

Enriched with soothing and hydrating mallow to protect against environmental stressors, moisturise your skin and soothe irritation, the Mallow Blossom Bubble Bath is in a league of its own when it comes to caring for your skin. The infusion of naturally antimicrobial lavender extract promotes a relaxing and calming effect, quelling over-active minds and helping you to switch off after a long day. If you’re struggling with stubborn body breakouts, then sit back and let the balancing and antibacterial powers of rosemary and sage reduce the appearance of ‘bacne’. That evening soak can't come soon enough…

After your bath, wrap yourself up in your favourite blanket and elevate your legs a little on a few cushions for a couple of minutes. The perfect way to complete your little home spa treatment.

name: Apothem Labs Sculpt Body Oil Apothem Labs Sculpt Body Oil
description: Recognising CBD’s abundance of nourishing qualities, the brains behind Apothem Labs knew couldn’t wait to distil the pure extract into versatile formulas to enhance your skin. Enter their Sculp Body Oil: an intensive, youth-prolonging treatment that transforms the appearance of lacklustre skin. A naturally occurring chemical found in most cannabis plants, CBD interacts with your body (our nerves naturally recognise and respond to the compound!) and is thought to have a soothing effect on the mind and body. With a belief in botanical synergy, each Apothem Labs formula aligns the properties of CBD with carefully sourced and selected plant extracts that work in harmony with one another for greater result. In this decadent blend, there’s fatty acid-rich hemp oil to nourish your skin; blue tansy (the ingredient behind the turquoise tone) to offer its reputed antioxidant and anti-inflammatory qualities; green coffee oil to protect and tone your skin; moringa oil to fend against free radicals and ginger to assist in flushing out the lymphatic system and renewing your skin. Take that time-wearied skin!

Avoid contact with eyes. Not to be used by pregnant or breastfeeding women or if on medication. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Laboratory Perfumes Gorse Cream 200ml Laboratory Perfumes Gorse Cream 200ml
description: Indulge in an at-home body massage with the luxurious Gorse Cream, a smoothing and hydrating moisturiser that sinks in seamlessly for a silky finish. As effective as it is chic, this luxe cream owes its radiance-inducing powers to a multi-vitamin complex vitamins E, B3, B5 and B6. Making swift work of dehydrated skin, this powerhouse blend strengthens and soothes the skin barrier. Not only that, a whole host of plant extractions, including bilberry, acai, pomegranate and mango help to condition skin and bestow a wealth of antioxidants to repair skin. What’s more, this moisturiser also infuses vitamin C to promote collagen synthesis and leave skin positively beaming.

name: Chantecaille CBD 300 Face and Body Cream 50ml Chantecaille CBD 300 Face and Body Cream 50ml
description: The CBD 300 Face and Body Cream harnesses the soothing properties of cannabidiol (the ever-adored CBD) to nourish and replenish ultra-thirsty, reactive complexions and limbs. Called upon for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, the nutrient-rich CBD extract encourages balance in your skin, soothing the signs of skin stress (bye bye redness, in a while dullness!). The infusion of innovative botanicals helps to amplify the benefits of CBD, providing further relief to complexions in crisis; a blend of cherimoya extract, cannabis and eggplant stem cell extracts comes to the rescue of hyper-sensitive and inflamed skin by bolstering the skin barrier and calming inflammation.

name: Verden Bath Salts - Herbanum 500g Verden Bath Salts - Herbanum 500g
description: Prepare to lay back and switch off as you slip into a hot bath enhanced with VERDEN's relaxing and reviving magnesium Bath Salts, infused with herbanum. Housed a in a chic, minimalist glass jar — a cool addition to your bathroom shelves — these vegan-friendly and cruelty-free bath salts promise to instantly elevate your bath into a full blown relaxation ritual. It's all down to that herbanum, which wraps you in a purifying, botanical essence of fresh herbs and wild grasses, conjuring up notes of rosemary, verbena and cedarwood, with an uplifting hint of peppermint. And doesn't that sound just lovely?

name: COOLA Sunless Tan Face Serum 40ml COOLA Sunless Tan Face Serum 40ml
description: Effortlessly easy to use, Coola’s streak-free, fast-drying face serum offers both age-defying and tanning benefits in one, so you can enjoy year-round, natural-looking radiance. Crafted from 70%+ organic ingredients, the luscious formula combines an antioxidant-rich blend of argan oil, vitamin C, hyaluronic acid and plant stem cell cultures to leave skin smooth, hydrated and – of course – gorgeously glowing. To enhance this radiance, a streak-free, transfer-free tanning agent is added, giving a believably bronzed finish that lasts for up to three days, infused with a natural piña colada and coconut scent to cover the tell-tale aroma of tan. Great used alone, Sunless Tan Anti-Aging Face Serum can also be added to your everyday face moisturiser for the best, buildable luminosity that adds up gradually. You’ll soon be addicted!
how_to_use: For maximum colour, dispense a small amount into palm of hand and spread evenly across face. For gradual colour, pump two to three drops into daily moisturizer and apply to skin. For best results, exfoliate skin prior to use.

description: Infused with oils thought to boost your mood and self-esteem, ilāpothecary's Beat the Blues Body Oil swaddles your skin and senses in comforting moisture. With a number attributed to each ilāpothecary signature blend, no. 27 is at the core of each of the 'Beat The Blues' blends; built around believing in yourself and listening to your intuition, it's crafted to be a self-affirming and fortifying scent. Without further ado, these are the impressive essentials oils that make the formula what it is: musky yet sweet clary sage enlivens the senses and boosts confidence while steadying and relaxing the mind; petitgrain encourages the spirit of self-acceptance, helping to ease mental anguish and promote emotional healing; rose geranium is thought to ease irritability; finally, tuberose helps to soothe tension and relieve frantic minds.

name: Fur All Body Butter 150ml Fur All Body Butter 150ml
description: Revolutionising the realms of body care, fur's latest skin-loving creation lives up to its butter-inspired origins. With 50% less water than most body butters, this unique formulation has made room for eight moisturising ingredients that soften even the roughest, driest of limbs. While practically solid at first touch, this ultra-rich body butter is quick to melt into your skin as you massage it over dry, tired limbs. A duo of deeply moisturising kokum and mango butter impart a flood of hydration and skin-loving fatty acids without clogging pores. The humectant hero - hyaluronic acid - is infused to care for your barrier, drawing in much-needed moisture to restore harmony and elasticity to even the most parched skin. Not yet convinced this will take on the challenge of cracked, compromised skin? Fur have enriched this sumptuous butter with sunflower seed wax to prevent future dehydration and sooth sore, cracked areas. As you massage this indulgent butter from head to toe, a light citrus-lavender scent cocoons your senses, banishing the stress of the day and allowing for a little self care indulgence.
how_to_use: Scoop a dollop out and massage between your palms. The warmth of your hands melts it into a softer, buttery texture you can spread all over. Due to the natural waxes and oils in this formula, small crystals may form on the surface of the butter. They are completely kind to skin and will dissipate with use.

description: A deeply effective two-in-one cleanser, this head-to-toe wash gently cleans and invigorates scalp, skin and senses with extracts of balsam and crisp eucalyptus. Channelling a crisp Canadian balsam forest from the comfort of your shower cubicle, this award-winning Invigorating Rush Hair + Body Wash cleanses your hair and body as it conditions (why do two steps when you can do one?). A blend of glycerin and vitamin B5 hydrates, eucalyptus extract stimulates as birch leaf refreshes and Canadian balsam soothes. Plus, it’s infused with a uniquely refreshing, alpine wood scent that energises the mind even after you rinse it off.

Containing powerful natural actives to help firm, smooth, and nourish skin so it feels replenished, this rich formula is mixed with a nurturing blend of brightening bio retinol, plumping sea amber, toning pumpkin seed, and powerful larch polysaccharides to help protect the skin’s natural moisture barrier for supple radiance. And, if that wasn’t enough, it’s enhanced rosehip and argan oil to comfort and moisturise. Oh, and the captivating fragrance? That stems the blend of essential oils – mandarin, patchouli, and rose geranium revive and restore the senses whilst offering an elevated aromatherapy experience. Fresh and uplifting, Lily & Magnolia Blossom conjures a summertime stroll through the lush British woodland with sparkling top notes of white tea, green mandarin and magnolia, while peony and freesia are balanced by smooth, mellow base notes of sandalwood, musk and ylang ylang –perfect for putting a ‘spring’ in your step and dispelling the cold weather blues.

Unwilling to compromise in her pursuit of SPF perfection, Oskia's founder – Georgie Cleeve – has finally nailed a formula that meets her meticulous standards. A 100% mineral, marine-friendly, broad-spectrum daily defence against sun and aggressors, this featherweight formula cools when applied and is brimming with encapsulated glacier water, snow algae, antioxidant astaxanthin and a cocktail of prebiotics, provitamins and vitamins to supplement barrier function and boost skin's resistance to harmful pollutants. Calming and balancing, soothing and strengthening, this shields from UVA and UVB, while hyaluronic acid plumps and maintains moisture levels, and MSM helps to reduce the appearance of lines. Safeguarding valuable collagen, this invisible formula never feels greasy, leaves no chalky cast and is great under make up. Discover the sunscreen your beauty regime has been waiting for...

name: Omorovicza Firming Neck Cream (50ml) Omorovicza Firming Neck Cream (50ml)
description: Much thinner than elsewhere on your body, the skin of your neck is especially vulnerable – susceptible to fine lines and creases, its lack of oil glands leads to decreased elasticity, and early signs of sagging… all of which can now be minimised with Omorovicza’s Firming Neck Cream. With white truffle enzymes to strengthen and improve skin tone, alongside leontopodic adic (derived from edelweiss flowers) to gently resurface and soften the look of wrinkles and sun speckles. Polysaccharides and proteins then exhibit a ‘lifting’ effect, while two weights of hyaluronic acid work to plump and re-densify delicate skin.

description: The ultimate investment into the health of your smile, the {Water Flosser} is an effective plaque-shifting tool that rivals the payoff of a trip to the hygienist, all from the comfort of your home. Nothing without its jet tip, keep your flossing routine on its A-game with these three classic replacement tips. The oral health geniuses behind Spotlight Oral Care advise that you replace the jet tip every three months, and if you've just realised how long overdue you are to do that then join the club... The Water Flosser itself (sold separately) harnesses water pressure and varying pulsations to help remove bacteria that resides between your teeth and below the gum line - areas that are notoriously difficult to reach with traditional brushing and flossing! Delivering a targeted stream of water, these jet tips should be replaced regularly to effectively floss.
how_to_use: This replacement pack contains: 3 x Water Flosser Classic Jet Tips

name: Saltee Face Daily Protection Formula SPF 50 Saltee Face Daily Protection Formula SPF 50
description: Encouraging you to treat sunscreen as a daily necessity rather than a holiday-only purchase, the Face Daily Protection Formula SPF 50 is a skin care and sun care hybrid that protects against UVA, UVB and infra-red rays. A lightweight daily moisturiser, this formula is suitable for even the sensitive-skinned – lending a perfectly-primed, glowy finish that looks beautiful with or without make up. Vitamin E-rich avocado oil revitalises and replenishes; Nordic pine bark combats the look of hyperpigmentation, neroli oil boosts skin cell regeneration; panthenol attracts and retains water while reducing redness; and ocean-derived venuceane counters photo damage while protecting you from the hottest of sunny days. And – as if that wasn’t enough – this formula is completely oxybenzone-free, making the Face Daily Protection Formula SPF 50 that little bit safer for ocean life.
how_to_use: Apply a generous dab of Saltee to your face 15 minutes before sun exposure. Once absorbed (this takes no time at all) you are sun ready for the day ahead. Re-apply approximately every two hours or touch up after a swim. Repeat every day – we mean it!
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Octocrylene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Caprylic Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Citrus Aurantium Amora (Neroli), Flower Water, Panthenol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Oryza Sativa Starch, Thermus Thermophillus Ferment, Butylene Glycol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Pinus Sylvesttris (Pine) Bark Extract, Betula Alba (Birch) Juice, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorophensin, Caprylyl Glycol, VP/Eicosine Copolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloydimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopherol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizinate, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid.

name: BeautyBio GLOpro Cryo Eye + Face & Body Roller BeautyBio GLOpro Cryo Eye + Face & Body Roller
description: The new must-have attachments for your go-to {GloPRO Microneedling Regeneration Tool}, these two professional-grade, stainless steel Cryo GloPRO® attachments harness the natural power of ice-cold temps to instantly de-puff, tighten pores and detoxify skin for a clearer, sculpted, more radiant appearance. Introducing BeautyBio's all-new GLOpro Cryo Eye + Face & Body Roller heads. Perfect for using around the eye area, for targetted apllication as well as across your face and body, these innovative heads are crafted from 100% stainless steel for even, sustained delivery of cold therapy designed to instantly sculpt and contour both face and body. After placing your attachment heads in the fridge or freezer, they help increase micro-circulation, collagen production and flush out toxins and effectively constrict pores for a tighter appearance and naturally help extract impurities while slowing oil production. But it doesn't stop there, the skin's tightening response releases muscle tension to help reduce the appearance of mechanical wrinkling and relieve muscles and joints of minor discomforts and helps pull skin care topicals deeper into the skin.
how_to_use: Cleanse face, pat dry, then apply your favorite serum or facial oil. Remove Cryo Attachment Heads from fridge or freezer and allow them to sit for 5 minutes. Attach Cryo Heads to GloPRO®. (Use the narrow roller for under the eyes and more targeted areas. Use the wide roller for larger areas of the face and body). Using roller, start at the centre of the face and roll outwards with long strokes towards the lymphatic drainage points near your ears and down towards your heart. Replicate the outward motion on the forehead and chin areas to rejuvenate skin, tighten pores and enhance skincare absorption. Roll gently over muscles and joints to provide soothing relief. For AM and PM use.

name: Isle of Paradise Hyglo Body 150ml Isle of Paradise Hyglo Body 150ml
description: Hailed as an everything serum, Isle of Paradise’s Hyglo Haluronic Self-Tan Serum Body is the plumping, hydrating and glow-giving hero your beauty routine has been missing. Starring water-retaining hyaluronic acid – it can hold up to 1000 times its own weight in water – this top-to-toe serum delivers intense and long-lasting hydration so skin appears beautifully dewy and subtly ‘volumised’. With quick and cumulative benefits, this formula is suitable for daily use – lending a whisper of buildable colour while IoP’s signature complex of avocado, coconut and chia seed oils help to boost elasticity, nourish and fortify skin to recover its ‘spring’. Lightweight and never tacky, apply every day for a healthy, post-holiday glow. Available in 100ml and 150ml, this must-have caters to the holiday of your dreams.
how_to_use: Apply once a day to keep skin plump and luminous.

name: Molton Brown Neon Amber Body Lotion 300ml Molton Brown Neon Amber Body Lotion 300ml
description: Introducing Molton Brown's Neon Amber Body Lotion which will not only hydrate skin after bathing, but the lightweight lotion will leave it's telltale ambery-vanilla notes of bright mandarin oil, creamy tonka absolute and warm ambroxan lingering on skin long after use. Housed in Molton Brown's understated yet effortlessly chic bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of Body Lotion is jam-packed with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous good-to-skin ingredients that leave limbs soft, supple and hydrated while each of the quintessentially Molton Brown fragrances lingers on skin all day long. Yet to discover your firm favourite? Prepare to fall head over heels for the Neon Amber Body Lotion. A concoction of mandarin oil, pink peppercorn, tonka and cedarwood, this scent is equal measures warm and familiar as well as dark and mysterious – it's bound to result in compliments and guests asking where they can pick up a bottle!
how_to_use: Massage sparingly or lavishly across skin to create an immersive ritual; intensely hydrating and enveloping skin in exhilarating fragrance.

name: Molton Brown Delicious Rhubarb and Rose Hand Lotion (300ml) Molton Brown Delicious Rhubarb and Rose Hand Lotion (300ml)
description: By royal appointment (no mean feat!), Molton Brown’s silky Hand Lotion conditions the hands of the finest hotels’ clientele. With timeless design that looks chic by the sink and turns hand-washing into an art form, these balmy formulas soften the gnarliest palms and leave skin gently scented and safe from the elements. Ultra-lightweight and non-greasy (yet deeply replenishing), slather your hands after cleansing to seal moisture in and envelop your senses with delicate, soul-soothing fragrance. Fruity and fizzy, Delicious Rhubarb & Rose evokes comforting crumbles and delicate petals with sparkling notes of sharp grapefruit and lemongrass which effervesce above rhubarb leaf, spearmint and rose and a sensuous base of vanilla, spun sugar and musk. A delectable feast for the senses and treat for the beauty gourmand. And, if you still need convincing, this formula's free from the usual suspects (no parabens, gluten or cruelty here!).
how_to_use: A citrus-infused array of sweet notes leave hands delicately scented and luxuriously moisturised. Best for: Enliven your daily hand care ritual with this moisturising lotion for instantly hydrated skin.

name: Margaret Dabbs London Intensive Hydrating Hand Lotion 75ml Margaret Dabbs London Intensive Hydrating Hand Lotion 75ml
description: Enriched with skin-conditioning emu oil, as well as replenishing hempseed oil, kelp extract and white water lily extract, Margaret Dabbs’ Intensive Hydrating Hand Lotion has a lightweight, silky texture and is readily absorbed to keep hands happy. Trusted for millennia by Australia’s indigenous peoples, emu oil’s antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, healing and softening properties – not to mention its impressive fatty acid content – make this the ultimate foil for the gnarliest palms. A deeply replenishing formula, this nourishing cream works to boost moisture levels and help to support your skin’s strength and resilience – tackling crêpey-ness, lessening scars and protecting your mitts from the elements. Delicately scented with a spirit-lifting blend of fresh geranium and mandarin, keep this within easy reach for a pampering treat when your hands feel forgotten.

name: EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF20 EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF20
description: Easy to apply, rapidly absorbable and never sticky or greasy, the lightweight Sunscreen Mousse SPF20 works with the epidermis to deliver both immediate and lasting protection against UVA and UVB rays for up to six hours! Exceptionally water-resistant and without any parabens, nanoparticles or perfumes, this formula is ideal for sensitive and delicate skin. Sitting pretty under make up with its quick drying-time and invisible, matte finish, this hydrating mousse protects against premature ageing and dehydration via a medley of vitamins C and E. Added collagen and silk extracts also ward against and repair skin damage, which – since your skin is kept hydrated and protected against sunburn – allows the melanin in your skin to develop into a rich tan that lasts. A boon for heliophiles and those with active lifestyles, it actually forms an innovative protective barrier that mimics your skin’s natural defences – providing extraordinary protection without clogging pores or sitting on the surface of your skin. Budge-proof (even when rubbing skin with a towel!) and lasting twice as long as cream formulas, this marvel can also be used on scalps if you have thin hair – or even on parched hair itself to protect it from dehydrating.
ingredient: Aqua, Butane, Octocrylene, Propylene Glycol, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Isobutane, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, PVP, Triethanolamine, Propane, Polysorbate 20, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Citric Acid.

name: BYREDO Suede Rinse Free Hand Cleanser 450ml BYREDO Suede Rinse Free Hand Cleanser 450ml
description: Housed in a chic monochrome tube, BYREDO's Suede Rinse-Free Hand Wash is the aristocracy of hand sanitisers with an alcohol concentration of 30%. This product is not intended to be anti-bacterial and cannot prevent the spread of infectious diseases, bacteria or viruses but leaves your hands feeling clean and delicately scented — no sink required. More sensorial and endlessly more appealing than the average hand sanitiser, regular use of this rinse-free wash won't dry your hands either. It comes in a lightweight tube and the gel smells divinely of pear, bergamot and fresh aldehydes. Suede gently unfurls with nuances of lily of the valley and violet before settling on a bed of soft musks, smooth velvet plum, and sweet, crisp amber: making this a real pleasure to use.
how_to_use: Carry in your bag and use on dry hands whenever they need refreshing or you've come into contact with germs.

name: Uma Oils Pure Bliss Wellness Oil 30ml Uma Oils Pure Bliss Wellness Oil 30ml
ESPA Positivity Pulse Point Oil 9ml ESPA Positivity Pulse Point Oil 9ml
description: Inspire confidence and enthusiasm on-the-go with ESPA's Positivity Pulse Point Oil, a uplifting pick-me-up blended with a host of mood-boosting essential oils. The perfect size to carry wherever you go, ESPA's Positivity Pulse Point Oil is here to take you from down in the dumps to head in the clouds with positivity. It's a portable “pick-me-up” allowing you to carry wellness with you throughout the day and lighten your senses with this fragrant oil that inspires self-confidence and optimism. The harmonious blend of essential oils includes the spirit-lifting aromatic of jasmine, gardenia and rose geranium to provide a burst of happiness, whilst the vibrancy of bergamot and sweet orange serve as a fragrant reminder to count your blessings.

name: Bed of Nails Acupressure Strap Bed of Nails Acupressure Strap
description: With 100% recycled plastic spikes arranged to work in a similar way to acupuncture needles, the Acupressure Strap by Bed of Nails is a convenient way target tension, stress and pain in the body. Simply wrap the strap around problematic areas (it's especially good for arms, legs and heads) to reap its benefits - it helps to ease tension, release endorphins (the body's own 'happiness' drug) and stimulate oxytocin to help you stay calm and relaxed. On top of this, the clever strap - combining Eastern wisdom with Scandi modernity - can is great if you struggle with sleeplessness, to rebalance you after a long-haul flight, to soothe aches and help take the 'ouch' out of menstrual cramps. Available in 'Botanic Green', 'Island Pink' and 'Jet Black', simply pick the shade that matches your aesthetic and prepare to feel pressure and tension ebb away.
how_to_use: With 100% recycled plastic spikes arranged to work in a similar way to acupuncture needles, the Acupressure Strap by Bed of Nails is a convenient way target tension, stress and pain in the body. Simply wrap the strap around problematic areas (it's especially good for arms, legs and heads) to reap its benefits - it helps to ease tension, release endorphins (the body's own 'happiness' drug) and stimulate oxytocin to help you stay calm and relaxed. On top of this, the clever strap - combining Eastern wisdom with Scandi modernity - can is great if you struggle with sleeplessness, to rebalance you after a long-haul flight, to soothe aches and help take the 'ouch' out of menstrual cramps. name: Milk Makeup Sunshine Skin Tint Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Milk Makeup Sunshine Skin Tint Broad Spectrum SPF 30
description: Housed in a chic roller pen, Milk Makeup's Sunshine Skin Tint Broad Spectrum SPF 30 provides weightless light coverage, moisturises with natural oils for a dewy finish, and protects with coral reef-safe broad spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen. Available in 14 shades, Milk Makeup's Sunshine Skin Tint Broad Spectrum SPF 30 blends seamlessly for buildable-yet-breathable, natural-looking light coverage. Perfect for on-the-go, simply click the release button for a seamless flow of product onto the iconic glass rollerball that doesnt clog or get stuck. The sheer shades effortlessly melt on contact with skin, creating a natural finish - whatever your skin tone. Laced with a blend of grapeseed, avocado, mandarin, jojoba, and olive-derived squalane oils, this moisturising formula creates a healthy and glowing finish you'll adore. But it doesn't stop there, broad spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen protects your skin against UVA and UVB rays, which contains non-nano zinc (i.e. it wont cause flashback) and is coral reef-safe too.
how_to_use: Pump click pen until product is dispensed onto glass rollerball.Pump 1 time, roll directly onto skin, and blend for light coverage. For more coverage, let it set then pump again, roll, and blend.Blend with fingertips, sponge, or a brush.Good for normal to dry skin types. DISCLAIMER: Because Sunshine Skin Tint SPF 30 is makeup, we suggest applying it during your AM routine and then touching up with your traditional SPF sunscreen during the day if you are exposed to the sun for an extended period of time.

name: Therapie Cocoon Bath Oil Therapie Cocoon Bath Oil
description: An exquisitely scented oil, Therapie's Cocoon Bath Oil has an uplifting formula of serene, relaxing and optimistic scents; this deeply nurturing oil was created as a mood-lifting tonic bringing a cosseting sense of comfort, courage and reassurance - a must in turbulent times. World-renowned aromatherapist Michelle Roques-O’Neil’s bath and body range is formulated with treatment-grade aromatherapy ingredients and designed to equip us to cope with life’s day-to-day struggles. An all-year-round must-have, just add to a steaming bathtub or massage over still-damp skin to lift your mood and relax your mind. It's infused with uplifting ylang ylang to encourage feelings of contentment, geranium is thought to boost your mood and foster effective mental function, while tangerine has a tonic effect that can help to balance your mind and body. Finally, the frankincense infusion is there to induce a sense of peace and ease fretful, overactive thoughts. Think: weekly pick-me-up!
how_to_use: Soak in a steaming bath laced with a capful of this oil, or massage a small amount over still-damp skin post bathing.

name: Omorovicza Complexion Perfector SPF20 Lotion 50ml (Various Shades) Omorovicza Complexion Perfector SPF20 Lotion 50ml (Various Shades)
description: A flawless formula that does it all, Omoroviczas Complexion Perfector SPF 20 is the ultimate multi-tasker: its a moisturiser, foundation, sunscreen, concealer and age-defying cream in one. Leaving a flawlessly even finish, the sheer formula hydrates skin and protects it from damaging UVA/B rays, in three versatile shades Light, Medium and Dark. While correcting your skin tone, it also blurs fine lines and wrinkles and plumps skin, leaving it looking vibrant and luminous not to mention protecting skin from the suns damaging UVA/B rays with SPF 20. It stars hyaluronic acid microspheres which release hyaluronic acid sequentially over time for enduring hydration; collagen-boosting, free radical-neutralising vitamin C; energising, revitalising white lupin; and, like Omoroviczas entire cult range, the brands proprietary Healing Concentrate, which delivers minerals deep into the skin to leave your complexion looking firm, supple and youthful. A skin care dream come true.
how_to_use: Apply the BB cream evenly to the face following the application of an Omorovicza serum and/or moisturiser. Skin types: Sensitive, Dry, Oily, Combination/Normal

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Anti-Shine Sun Protection Invisible SPF50+ Face Mist 75ml La Roche-Posay Anthelios Anti-Shine Sun Protection Invisible SPF50+ Face Mist 75ml
description: You don't need to choose between picture-perfect make up and sun-protected skin any longer with the Anthelios Anti-Shine Face Mist SPF 50. The first of its kind in the Anthelios line, this moisturising but mattifying mist delivers a double anti-shine action with an ultra-dry finish and sits flawlessly on top of make up throughout the day. Freshly fragranced for the ultimate holiday mode pick-me-up, La Roche-Posay's high protection mist makes SPF top-ups a dream and not just a necessity. Sensitive oily and blemish-prone skin can thank NASA (yes, you heard us right) for the oil-absorbing benefits this SPF mist brings. 'Airlicium' is used by the famous aeronautic experts and has been put to work in this formulation to form a supple and resistant film over the skin while smoothing texture and allowing it to really breathe. If that wasn't enough for you it absorbs three times its weight in oil! Protected and mattified skin is just a mist away thanks to La Roche-Posay. We're just saying if it's good enough for astronauts...
how_to_use: Apply 30 minutes before exposure and reapply frequently and generously every two hours to maintain protection especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling. Shake well before use. Avoid exposure to the sun during the hottest hours of the day.

name: Ultra Violette Preen Screen SPF 50+ Reapplication Mist 75ml Ultra Violette Preen Screen SPF 50+ Reapplication Mist 75ml
description: Looking for a top-up SPF that doesn’t pill over make up? You’ve found it. The new Preen Screen™ SPF50 Reapplication Mist makes sun protection effortless — and your skin radiant. This lightweight formula future-proofs your skin against sun damage, while providing a lit-from-within glow. Infused with a cocktail of nourishing ingredients, it’s packed with moisturising vitamin E to combat free-radical damage and strengthen the skin barrier, as well as niacinamide to balance oil production and minimise pores. Vitamin C is also key for its brightening and youth-enhancing properties, while bisabolol and aloe vera leaf extract work to soothe and calm any irritation and redness. As good as sunscreen gets? We think so.
how_to_use: For everyday use. Shake well and spray directly to the face as the final step in your skin care regime — and over the top of make up or skin care, including SPF. Close eyes, hold 20cm from face, exhale and apply evenly in the shape of an ‘x’ or ‘t’. Allow to dry slightly before opening eyes. Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. Avoid prolonged high-risk sun exposure. Wear a hat, protective clothing and sunglasses when exposed to the sun. Re-apply frequently.

name: Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Clarifying AHA BHA Body Wash 385ml Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Clarifying AHA BHA Body Wash 385ml
description: Wishing a bom dia to your skin from head to toe, the Bom Dia Clarifying AHA & BHA Body Wash works to gently (and we mean gently) exfoliate away dead skin cells and pore-clogging foes to reveal enviably soft textures. Non-stripping and free from drying sulfates, this fruit-powered fusion of alpha hydroxy acids and salicylic acids help to purify and buff your skin to perfection. Boasting a gel-like consistency that's enriched with banana and mango extracts and a coconut-derived cleansing system, this deliciously scented in-shower essential promotes new cell turnover, wards off congestion, ingrown hairs and even strawberry skin! name: Biossance Squalane and Caffeine Toning Body Cream - Unscented 200ml Biossance Squalane and Caffeine Toning Body Cream - Unscented 200ml
description: Extending the nourishing properties of skin care ingredients to your entire body, Biossance’s Squalane + Caffeine Toning Body Cream floods thirsty limbs with lasting hydration while encouraging a more smooth and firm finish. Designed to mimic squalene — a natural molecule present in our skin that diminishes over time — the squalane in this moisturising formula comes from 100% plant-based, renewable sugarcane and enhances elasticity as well as protecting your skin. The cream is also infused with niacinamide to support your moisture barrier and improve your skin’s texture. An infusion of caffeine derived from green coffee beans then helps to promote smoother, firmer skin. The rich yet weightless formula absorbs in a flash, nourishing your skin and restoring elasticity in the process.

name: NAYDAYA Victory Oil NAYDAYA Victory Oil
description: Formulated with plenty of soothing, collagen-boosting ingredients, the Vagina Victory Oil is designed to nourish and treat intimate skin that may need some extra relief as a result of hormonal or environmental changes. This nourishing formula is filled with rejuvenating oils and butter that your skin will drink up. Pomegranate is renowned for being a powerful elixir that, thanks to omega-5-rich fatty acids protects dry, thinning skin and restores elasticity to vaginal tissue. Vitamin E helps improve skin's smoothness, builds natural collagen and locks moisture into the skin. Finally, there's mango butter, an effective natural emollient, and coconut oil, a hydration hero that helps to rebuild your skin's naturally protective moisture barrier. Victory is yours!
how_to_use: General Use for hormonal changes: Apply 3-4 drops of oil or as needed to fingertips, gently massage into intimate areas including perineal, inner and outer labia. For best results use daily, or twice per day to improve elasticity, and reduce dryness. Pregnancy Use: To use as a prenatal massage oil; apply 3-4 drops daily from 34 weeks of pregnancy. Post Pregnancy Use: As above, apply 3-4 drops daily, (we recommend waiting until stitches are healed, and wounds are closed)

name: Sun Bum Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion Sun Bum Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion
description: For everyday living, the Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion is a staple – protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while nourishing and delicately scenting skin. The OG formula that the sunseekers at Sun Bum actually use every single day, this is enriched with vitamin E. A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. Also water resistant for 80 minutes (that’s a heck of a lot of surf time), the Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion is brimming with the Sun Bum Original Scent, which – as word on the street has it – smells like summer, bottled.
how_to_use: Dispense in hand and apply to body. We recommend working from head to toe so you don't accidentally miss a limb. If you need help reaching your back, ask a friend— that's what they're there for. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure and allow it to absorb. Reapply at least every two hours. Apply more frequently after swimming/sweating, or after an aggressive towel dry. Always offer to share.

description: Ever at the forefront when it comes to sun protection, Shiseido have revolutionised the sun care game with Expert Sun Protector Face & Body Lotion SPF 50. Providing powerful protection with abundant skin care benefits, this forward-thinking formula creates a light, impenetrable veil with three advanced technologies to block the ageing impact of the sun and air pollution while preserving precious moisture for a plumped and dewy finish. Uniting proprietary HeatForce and WetForce tech that make the veil work harder when the weather’s hot or skin’s exposed to sea or sweat (think: ‘turbo’ mode), this syncs with your environment to ward against aggressors. Meanwhile, Profense CEL, NatureSurge Complex and the moisturising formula combine to both pre-empt and lessen lines, delay development of dark spots and deflect the ageing impact of free radicals. Incredibly light and invisible, this lays down a 360˚ veil of protection (like flexible webbing), which makes a great primer for make up, won’t suffocate skin and smells just like a holiday. Plus, its high water-resistance means less harm to precious marine life – next-to-no lotion is washed off in water, so skin and the earth remain safe.

name: Aesop Deodorant 50ml Aesop Deodorant 50ml
description: Humans do not produce BO, it's the bacteria that live in our armpits that generate that characteristically horrid smell. The zinc ricinoleate in this natural deodorant kills them to prevent any unwanted whiffs. The formula also contains lemongrass, tea tree, coriander, witch hazel, clove, thyme and vetiver root, which are naturally anti-microbial. Aesop Deodorant contains no aluminium and has a fresh, green vetiver smell that works for both men and women.

For the sleepyheads among us, these capsules boost energy levels through adrenal strength - helping to control stress levels and nourish depleted adrenal glands, which are responsible for your 'energy' hormones. By utilising adaptogens to monitor the release of stress hormones from said glands, your energy levels are boosted, fatigue levels are reduced, productivity is increased and tension is diminished. L-tyrosine (an amino acid) is used to create proteins that enhance physical and mental performance, especially when under stress! With a combo of calming and rejuvenating root extracts, (think ginger, rhodiola rosea and more) plus energy-enhancing vitamins C, B5 and B6, kiss goodbye to days ruled by a sleepy haze.

Finish with the Intensive Treatment Foot Oil to maximise the foot-smoothing and softening process, then slick on some polish and dare to don your most barely-there toe posts. description: The beauty tool experts, Tweezerman are famous for providing ultimate plucking power with their award-winning tweezers – and this on-the-go mini-sized collection ensures you can always keep your brow hairs in check. Fitting any tiny bag without sacrificing unparalleled precision, Tweezerman’s Micro Mini tweezers feature the same ingeniously angled tips as their full-size forebears, despite being clutch-compatible. Perfectly aligned to ensure they close evenly and firmly, these allow you to pluck meticulously – offering clean, smooth, strong removal even if hairs are fine or short. Made from stainless steel, they’re durable and easy to clean, plus they come in an adorable pink pouch.
how_to_use: To ease tweezing, take a hot shower or use a warm washcloth to enlarge pores. Always tweeze in the direction of hair growth to avoid breakage. For expert results, never yank or tug on brow hairs - always use the Slant's precision tip to isolate, lift and then grab the hair from the root. Effortlessly pull using one smooth motion in the direction of hair growth. This not only helps avoid breaking the hair, it's gentler on your skin. When you smoothly glide each entire hair out, broken stubble and "black dots" won't be left behind, and instead you create a flawless, expertly shaped, clean look. Advanced handling lets you use the very point of the Slant for finer or trickier hairs. Clean tweezer tips after each use. Do not sanitise the coloured body of the tweezer, as the enamel may wear off. Tweezerman's famous Sharpening Service is available with this item.
ingredient: Stainless steel

This is pro skin care for those who're planning to grow older gracefully, proud of the skin that they live in.

name: Bondi Sands Self Tanning Foam 200ml - Light/Medium Bondi Sands Self Tanning Foam 200ml - Light/Medium
description: Experience a sun-kissed Australian tan every time with Bondi Sands Self Tanning Foam. Perfect for those with light to medium complexions – or first time tanners! – this versatile self tanner can be left on for a minimum of one hour, all the way up to six hours to help you customise your perfect faux glow. A Bondi Sands cult classic, the brand's Self Tanning Foam is a must-have for new and veteran tanners alike. Thanks to the customisable formula, you can leave this natural-looking formula on skin from one to six hours to achieve your perfect finish. Enriched with aloe vera and laced with a sumptuous coconut aroma, this lightweight self-tanning foam will leave your skin glowing like you've spent the day (or week!) on Bondi Beach itself.
how_to_use: Use the Bondi Sands Exfoliation Mitt to ensure your skin is clean and free from any moisturisers. Pump foam directly onto your Application Mitt before using long, sweeping motions to smooth over legs, arms and body. Use remaining tan for face, elbows, and knees. Skin may be washed after one hour. For a longer lasting, darker tan leave for up to 6 hours before showering with warm water. Gently pat skin dry. For the deepest tan re-apply Bondi Sands Self-Tanning Foam 30 minutes after initial application.

name: MOA - Magic Organic Apothecary Dreamy Mineral Soak MOA - Magic Organic Apothecary Dreamy Mineral Soak
description: Turn your bathroom into a temple of blissful, nourishing relaxation with Moas Dreamy Mineral Soak, an irresistible concoction of lavender, pine and cardamom on a combined base of both Himalayan and sea salt. For thousands of years, the healing and therapeutic qualities of salt baths have been praised and this brings that age-old wisdom to your bathroom. Mineral-rich Himalayan pink salt and sea salt cleanse and purify the skin while helping to kick start sluggish circulation and reduce the appearance of cellulite. The calming scent and aromatic properties of lavender essential oil promotes relaxation, while warm and spicy cardamom oil offers relief from emotional stress. Antiseptic lemon peel gently brightens the dead skin and pine oil helps to combat problematic, oily skin and blemishes. A salt bath restores hydration, so it wont leave your skin wrinkly!

name: Omorovicza Mineral UV Shield SPF 30 100ml Omorovicza Mineral UV Shield SPF 30 100ml
description: Omorovicza’s innovative Mineral UV Shield SPF 30 offers full, broad-spectrum protection while feeling feather-light on the skin. Silica spheres encapsulate titanium dioxide, to glide effortlessly over the surface of your complexion – blurring fine lines and blemishes with a velvety, soft-focus finish, whilst creating a physical barrier between your complexion and the DNA-damaging effects of UV rays. A perfect make up primer, just apply to clean skin before make up – and reapply every two hours to guarantee optimal sun protection. High molecular weight sodium hyaluronate then creates a barrier against attack from more aggressive pollutants, while encouraging moisture retention so skin feels plump and dewy. Vitamin C provides antioxidant protection, inhibits tyrosinase (responsible for melanin production and in turn, age spots) and helps to maintain elastin and collagen levels, while apple fruit extract reduces glycation of proteins (when sugars damage protein chains, contributing to collagen degradation and skin sagging) and soothes inflammation, so skin becomes stronger and more luminous and more resilient. Omorovicza has combined Hungary’s 2,000 year-old skin wisdom – harnessing the powerful rejuvenating properties of the country’s unique thermal waters and mineral-rich muds – with cutting-edge scientific innovation in a Nobel Prize-winning laboratory.

Combine this delightful effect with the practicality of no tears, tugs or roughness, and the Baby Calendula Shampoo & Body Wash is your new best friend. Like a gentle whisper of silk on your baby’s skin, the Baby Calendula Shampoo & Body Wash provides a comfortable and effective bath time for a happy mum, dad and baby. In fact, you’ll have to fight the urge not to use it yourself! Though you can if you want to...

name: Susanne Kaufmann Mineral Body Lotion Susanne Kaufmann Mineral Body Lotion
description: A must-have for achey muscles and tired limbs, Susanne Kaufmann's Mineral Body Lotion is brimming with mineral salts to help detoxify deep muscles, increase cell energy, and activate lymphatic flow while other actives help to soothe inflammation - it's a must for those who love an intense workout. Susanne Kaufmann's Mineral Body Lotion contains a potent trinity of ingredients: active botanicals, natural oils and mineral salts target the deep fascia, a dense connective tissue that supports and protects our muscles. The fascial network is jointly responsible for our upright posture, strong connective tissue, and functioning lymph system. Seven mineral salts detoxify deep muscles, increase cell energy, and activate lymphatic flow. When selecting active botanicals, the focus is on increasing cell metabolism, eliminating high acid concentrations, and soothing inflammation. Valuable oils and active ingredient astaxanthin have a double-acting effect. They stimulate the skin's own synthesis of collagen and ensure strong connective tissue in the long term.
how_to_use: Gently massage over the whole body after showering or bathing. For best results, use daily. Combine this product with our Alkali Salt Deacidifying to double the pH neutralising effects on your body and skin. The Mineral Body Lotion is ideal after intensive exercise.

A gorgeously tropical addition to your body care routine, this nourishing formula has a soft coconut and vanilla scent to help de-stress your mind by transporting it to a sun-soaked beach (yes, please!). It's packed with sunflower oil to moisturise, arnica extract and coconut water to relieve inflammation and irritation (exceptionally relaxing after a long day on your feet) and antioxidant-rich sea kelp to soften skin. Trust us, this nourishing formula is *almost* as good as holiday...
