name: Drunk Elephant Kamili Cream Body Cleanser 240ml Drunk Elephant Kamili Cream Body Cleanser 240ml
description: Bid bye-bye to that wretched bar of soap in your shower and replace it with this creamy, moisturising Kamili Cream Body Cleanser made from a blend of passionfruit and amino acids to leave skin feeling soft, clean and coddled. Mmmm. Introducing Drunk Elephant's all-new and utterly must-have hair and body range, created by the brand's CEO, Tiffany because "Skin is skin - and whether we call it the scalp or the eye area or the legs, it can only function at its healthiest when it’s treated with smart, nourishing, skin-compatible ingredients. All skin deserves to be respected with ingredients it can get along with." Infused with luxe, fatty acid-rich marula, sweet almond, sacha inchi seed and maracuja oils, plus a multi-amino acid blend, Kamili calms while rinsing dirt and other substances away - without stripping or disrupting the delicate skin barrier. Kamili has a pH level of 5.0 and is appropriate for all skin, even the most sensitive.

description: Joining the folds of one of the industry's coolest fragrance brands, its Thé Matcha 26, a scent inspired by Japanese culture and the homely familiarity and routine associated with drinking traditional matcha. A 'skin scent' (meaning a 'close' scent, designed to reflect your naturally clean, soft scent, detected only in the most intimate situations), Thé Matcha 26 Liquid Balm is designed to be comforting and grounding. Matcha tea accord is infused with creamy fig, grounded by soft vetiver and textural cedar woods, and uplifted by enticing bitter orange. The perfect fragrance for a quiet Sunday spent reading, cooking and enjoying the relaxing solitude of your favourite home comforts, this fragrance is guaranteed to become an understated staple in your scent wardrobe.

Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.

description: Great for all skin types and tones, Pai Skincare’s The Impossible Glow, Hyaluronic Acid & Sea Kelp Bronzing Drops are perfect for granting a beautifully luminous look (sans the sun damage). Brimming with dew-boosting hyaluronic acid – a natural moisture magnet that acts like you’re ‘fluffing the stuffing’ (if skin cells were cushions) – these drops can be mixed into serum or cream for a gradual glow, or used straight from the bottle to instantly grant an ethereal gleam. Laced with light-scattering pigments to help you look lit-from-within, lemon-derived vitamin C works to brighten while scavenging damaging radicals, while sea kelp delivers long-lasting hydration for skin that looks visibly smooth, firm and radiant.

name: DeoDoc Organic Cotton Liners DeoDoc Organic Cotton Liners
description: First they tackled age-old myths about using medically-backed vagina-friendly products to clean around your vulva, now they're tackling synthetic and plastic liners that can make your time of the month all the more uncomfortable. Without further ado, let us introduce you to DeoDoc's 100% Organic Cotton Liners... Made with breathable cotton to help prevent humidity, irritation and unpleasant odours, these hypoallergenic, unscented liners are gentle on even sensitive skin while providing unparalleled absorbency and freshness when compared to synthetic liners. Since they are compostable, vegan and 100% biodegradable, these cotton liners are as good for the environment as they are the vulva. Designed for a light flow, these soft, ultra-thin liners feel comfortable throughout the day!

description: Beauty sleep is no myth and, as VOTARY co-founder Arabella Preston points out, your skin is only ever as good as your last night’s sleep. The missing part of your bedtime routine, VOTARY’s Pillow Spray captures the scent of a country garden at dusk with its blend of lavender, chamomile and rose oils. Lightly mist your pillow and bed linen from a distance of 30cm and allow the veil of therapeutic oils to disperse and cast a calming charm on your sleep. Allowing VOTARY’s Intense range of night time skin care product to work even harder, this is a must-have add to your collection if you struggle with getting soundly off to sleep.

name: Smile Makers Silky (S)wipes Smile Makers Silky (S)wipes
description: Made specifically for the vulva (not vagina!), the vegan and biodegradable Silky Swipes contain 12 wipes set to refresh this area without disturbing its delicate ecosystem. ph-balanced and brimming with soothing ingredients, this 100% vegan formula uses prebiotics to care for the vulva's flora. Not only does it refresh, but it also infuses organic aloe vera and vitamin E to moisturise and nourish the skin; plus, an extract of chamomilla flower soothes. Small enough to keep on your bedside table or in your bag, these silky wipes are idea for pre- and post-sex or whenever you're on the go and need a little refresh. They're also made with soft biodegradable bamboo, so you can wipe without worry!
how_to_use: The vulva has its own microflora and microclimate from the rest of female intimate anatomy. The vulva is often mistakenly referred to as 'vagina,' even by big companies who claim to be experts on intimate wellness. This lack of understanding of the female anatomy impacts how they formulate intimate wellness products. To fix this, and with a decade of creating high-quality products for very precise use on intimate parts, Smile Makers has developed intimate wipes specifically for the vulva. Tip #1: use a wipe to refresh the vulva, the external part of the genitalia, before sex. Tip #2: use post-sex for an easy clean up. Tip #3: on the go, when you want to clean up and need a quick and/or eco-friendly way to do it. Tip #4: never use it internally in the vagina. The vagina is a self-cleaning organ with a delicate pH balance. Disrupting it can cause yeast infections.
ingredient: Extracts Of Chamomilla Flower, Organic Aloe Vera, Vitamin E. Hypoallergenic Certified, Gynaecologically Approved, ph Balanced for the vulva, Cruelty-Free, Vegan, and Organic. Free from: Soap, Sls/Sles, Alcohol, Parabens, Triclosan, Silicone, Glycerine, Triclocarban, 1,4-Dioxane And Palm Oil.

name: REGENERATE Hypersensitivity Toothpaste 75ml REGENERATE Hypersensitivity Toothpaste 75ml
description: A breakthrough medical toothpaste that stops sensitivity pain by acting on the early stages of enamel damage, the Regenerate Hypersensitivity Toothpaste restores enamel mineral content and encourages enamel hardness and health. Using a revolutionary patented ‘NR5+ intensive care formula’ (which combines calcium silicate and sodium phosphate to form a crystal structure that’s identical to hydroxyapatite — a key mineral found in dental enamel), this toothpaste wraps each tooth in a fresh supply of enamel. This activates a cycle of regeneration, which rescues exposed and hypersensitive areas. Cue: smiles all round, brandishing happy, healthy teeth that don’t cause unnecessary grief.
how_to_use: Use REGENERATE Hypersensitivity Toothpaste twice daily, in place of your regular toothpaste and not more than 3 times. After brushing at night, apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste onto your fingertip and gently massage onto teeth's sensitive areas for 30 seconds. REGENERATE Hypersensitivity toothpaste starts working from the first day. For oral use only. Keep out of the reach and sight of children. For adult use only. Sensitive teeth may indicate an underlying problem that may need prompt care by a dentist if problems persist or worsen.
ingredient: Glycerin, Calcium Silicate, PEG-8, Hydrated Silica, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Peg-60, Sodium Monofluorophosphate, Aroma, Sodium Saccharin, Polyacrylic Acid, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, Limonene, CI 77891. Contains: Sodium Monofluorophosphate (1450 ppm fluoride) and Limonene

name: Isle of Paradise Express Mousse 200ml Isle of Paradise Express Mousse 200ml
description: Daydreaming about your last tropical getaway? Bring the sun to you with the Express Yourself Express Self-Tanning Mousse, a quick-drying and fast-developing formula that adorns your skin with enviable radiance and 24 hour hydration… in record timing! Infused with natural tanning actives and a skin-loving medley of hyaluronic acid, glycerin and vitamin C, this dew-delivering blend deepens your vacation-worthy tan becoming touch-dry in seconds. Free from pesky stains, streaks or smells, this cruelty-free and vegan radiance-renewer instantly colour-corrects yellow or reddish tones for an even finish.
how_to_use: Exfoliate 24 hours before tanning. Moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles, and elbows prior to application. Pump product onto mitt and apply in sweeping motions. Leave hands and feet until last, sweeping lightly over. Wash off after 30 mins, or leave on longer for a deeper tan. Your tan will then continue to develop for 4-6 hours.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Teeth Whitening System Spotlight Oral Care Teeth Whitening System
description: Uniting two weeks’ worth of Teeth Whitening Strips with a bonus Toothpaste for Whitening Teeth (100ml), the Teeth Whitening System is key to a dazzling smile *get your sunglasses*. Developed to brighten without sensitivity, the 14-day course of teeth-whitening strips harnesses hydrogen peroxide to gently but thoroughly minimise staining – just apply for one hour a day to reveal a bright, sparkling beam. The Toothpaste for Whitening Teeth then pairs sodium fluoride with stain-removing hydrogen peroxide to polish your teeth and eliminate cavity-causing bacteria. Harnessing the latest developments in oral care to strengthen teeth and cherish gums, this minty fresh paste is contained in completely recyclable packaging – minimising the detrimental contribution of dental care products to landfill (and leaving your conscience as clean as your teeth).
how_to_use: Tear open the foil packets to find a top white strip and a bottom white strip Dry the teeth Place the shorter whitening strip on the lower teeth first and then the longer strip onto the top teeth Leave the strips in place for one hour After, remove the strips and rinse away any residual gel Repeat every day for two weeks for your dazzling smile Use in conjunction with the Toothpaste for Whitening Teeth for maximum results

name: Margaret Dabbs London Foot Hygiene Cream 100g Margaret Dabbs London Foot Hygiene Cream 100g
description: Unsightly, less-than pleasantly scented feet are not only embarrassing, but also incredibly limiting (and occasionally painful). Nobody likes being the owner of offensive extremities, but fortunately Margaret Dabbs has run to the rescue with her Foot Hygiene Cream a nourishing, antimicrobial lotion which dissolves dead skin and prevents odour-causing bacteria from multiplying, so your feet stay fresh, healthy and exposac-worthy. With skin-conditioning Emu oil a key ingredient throughout Margaret Dabbs London's famed feet range, beloved by body care connoisseurs because of its intensively hydrating, skin-soothing properties alongside salicylic acid (to chemically exfoliate) and Tea Tree oil to stop both fungal and bacterial infections in their tracks, this inhibits (and reverses) all the primary foot failings, so you can go ahead and show your toes with confidence.
how_to_use: Warm a small amount of cream in your hands and apply all over the feet and nails before you go to bed at night. Use every day for two weeks and as necessary thereafter to combat any further flare-ups. Use the spatula provided to remove product from jar and wash hands after use.

name: Fur Shave Cream 5 fl. oz Fur Shave Cream 5 fl. oz
description: Ingrown hairs, bumps and irritation the bane of your beauty rituals? Say no more! Fur's all-new Shave Cream is here to protect your skin and deliver a satin-smooth shave every time, everywhere. Made to be used on your pubic area, underarms, chest, legs and face (you name it!), this conditioning formula has a whipped, featherlight texture and boasts a satin-soft finish. It's infused with moisturising, olive-derived squalane that forms a buffer between the blade and your skin, as well as antioxidant-rich aloe that contributes the silky texture and smooth shave. It's also saturated with coconut-derived cleansing agents that give the cream its gentle, spreadable texture that enables a seamless glide plus, anti-inflammatory marshmallow root extract to soothe and hydrate your skin. Still on the fence? Take a peek at the results; in a clinical trial, 100% agreed that Shave Cream fights against bumps and irritation; 100% agreed that it leaves skin soft and moisturised and 95% agreed that it prevents razor burn. We LOVE those odds...

name: Philip Kingsley No Scent No Colour Gentle Conditioner 200ml Philip Kingsley No Scent No Colour Gentle Conditioner 200ml
description: Coaxing tangles into submission with a medley of impressive ingredients, Philip Kingsley's No Scent No Colour Gentle Conditioner has a hydrating, nourishing formula that dramatically boosts manageability without irritating delicate scalps. Originally inspired by Philip’s wife’s battle with breast cancer, this carefully crafted formula was designed to be gentle enough for her when she was undergoing chemotherapy. From there it's been welcomed with open arms by the growing number of people with allergic and reactive skin types that decide to forgo fragrance and strong surfactants. Ideal for sensitive, delicate or easily irritated scalps and an array of textures - from coarse and fine to medium and naturally coiled curls - this softening conditioner is powered by hydrolyzed elastin to improve the strength and flexibility of your hair, as well as encouraging moisture retention and fending against breakage. What's more, amino silicone is employed to detangle pesky knots, and control frizz and flyaways to reveal shiny, smooth strands.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work the conditioner into your hair, particularly your mid-lengths and ends. Rinse well and follow up with the appropriate Philip Kingsley Scalp Toner (sold separately).

description: Housed in Molton Brown's understated yet effortlessly chic bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of Bath & Shower Gel is bursting with exquisite fragrance and sumptuously good-to-skin ingredients that leave limbs soft, supple and cleansed while each of the quintessentially Molton Brown fragrances lingers on skin all day long. name: NAILS.INC Tootsie Tamer NAILS.INC Tootsie Tamer
description: This crisp white and rose gold Tootsie Tamer is a professional-grade foot file perfect for keeping the soles of your feet soft, smooth from the comfort of your own home. Forget ugly, egg-shaped foot files, NAILS.INC's beautifully-designed crisp white and rose gold Tootsie Tamer is a clever, ergonomically-designed tool that helps you to effortlessly exfoliate and smooth dry and rough soles in need of a little TLC. Perfect for DIY pedicures at home, the tapered design allows you to file hard to reach areas with ease before treating yourself to a foot soak and pedicure. Who knew a foot file could look so cute?
how_to_use: Prior to use, remove the protective cover and use only on clean, dry and moisture-free skin. Apply gentle pressure and move the Tootsie Tamer back and forth across hard skin areas. Work slowly and check intermittently for desired results. Add slightly more pressure to thicker skin. Stop immediately if you feel pain or the skin becomes irritated. Wash with soapy water after every use.

name: Frédéric Malle Carnal Flower Body Wash Frédéric Malle Carnal Flower Body Wash
description: Lather up in a tub laced with Frédéric Malle's Carnal Flower Body Wash - an opulent wash that creates the most lavish lather while subtly cloaking your skin with its signature scent. Perfect for layering under your favourite fragrance to increase the intensity (and extend its longevity). As intoxicating as its name suggests, Frédéric Malle’s Carnal Flower blooms from delicate beginnings to a dark, seductive heart. Shy to begin with, this multi-faceted fragrance is an ode to awakening – evolving from the bashful notes of water fruits (melon) and citrus leaves which lend a verdant freshness, to the heady thrum of tuberose that gives this scent its sensuous appeal. An emblem of forbidden pleasure, this tantalising flower has a depth and mystery that is forbidden to young women in some cultures – believed to have the power to intoxicate the senses. With coconut to add a subtle lightness, and camphora to quieten the ‘noise’ of these opulent blooms, the muse for the fragrance was Frédéric’s aunt (the famous French actress Candice Bergen), who played in the film Carnal Knowledge alongside Jack Nicholson. Voluptuous and decadent, this scent is ruby velvet, black satin and the thrill of an illicit tryst…
how_to_use: Apply to damp skin and massage to refresh and leave skin lightly scented.

name: de Mamiel Altitude Bath Soak de Mamiel Altitude Bath Soak
description: Hand-filled and bursting with decadently fragrant crystals to nourish and hydrate your skin, these décor-adorning, navy-blue pots boast the epitome of bath time luxury: the Altitude Bath Soak. An ideal remedy for stressful times, use for an instant moment of calm among the tension of daily life. Helping to balance, energise and fortify your mind and body, the salts are all-natural, vegan and powered by the magic of aromatherapy and oils. Think of them as a good night’s sleep in a jar – featuring innovative, radiation-absorbing Shungite crystal powder to neutralise electro-magnetic energy build-up from smart devices and screens. Fuelled with a beautiful blend of Himalayan, Dead Sea and Epsom salts – plus an aromatic cocktail of stimulating essential oils like peppermint, lavender, patchouli, pine leaf and eucalyptus – breathe this in and feel the world (and its stresses) merrily float away…
how_to_use: Pour 1-2 capfuls under running water to allow the salts to dissolve and, for maximum benefits, relax in the water for at least 10-15 minutes.
ingredient: Sodium Chloride (Himalayan salt and Dead Sea salt), Magnesium Sulfate (epsom salts), Magnesium chloride, Sodium Bicarbonate, Powdered Shungite, Cocos nucifera (coconut) Oil, Lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower oil*, Eucalyptus radiata (eucalyptus) leaf oil*, Agonis fragrans (fragonia) leaf oil, Mentha piperita (peppermint) leaf oil*, Pinus sylvestris (pine) leaf oil*, Backhousia citriodora (lemon myrtle) leaf oil, Pogostemon cablin (patchouli) leaf oil*, Limonene, Geraniol, Linalol, Citronellol, Eugenol, Citral *Certified organic Natural essential oil constituents Hand blended Stored in violet glass to preserve the vitality of the precious ingredients.

name: Herbivore Botanicals Coco Rose Soft Glow Body Oil 4 fl oz. Herbivore Botanicals Coco Rose Soft Glow Body Oil 4 fl oz.
description: With a delicate and subtle rose aroma to lure you into a sense of tranquillity, Herbivore's Coco Rose Soft Glow Body Oil is overflowing with virgin coconut oil, vegan squalane, and Moroccan rose; the silken elixir makes quick work of quenching limbs that look dry and rough, instead promoting a silky-smooth finish and soft, diffused glow. Suitable for all skin types, this lightweight oil has a rosé pink hue that diffuses when massaged into your skin to reveal a translucent, glowing effect. One of the titular ingredients, coconut MCT oil (an impressive source of essential fatty acids) effectively moisturises skin as it casts a luminous sheen. Non-comedogenic vegan squalane then relieves dry skin by sealing in essential hydration for a lasting soft-to-the-touch finish. Finally, Moroccan rose lends the blend its delicate and subtle scent that makes each use a thing of luxury.
how_to_use: Massage into clean skin. This oil is formulated to work best as a body product, not recommended for facial use. It is recommended to use SPF during the day, after use of this product, to help prevent sun damage.
ingredient: Squalane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Ubiquinone, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Citronellol, Geraniol, Eugenol, d-Limonene.

name: Kora Organics Gradual Self-Tanning Lotion 175ml Kora Organics Gradual Self-Tanning Lotion 175ml
description: More glow, less chemicals. It almost sounds too good to be true! The KORA Organics Gradual Self-Tanning Lotion isn’t sticky, is easy to apply and dries quickly – all without sulphates, artificial fragrances and silicones – so that you can step into your favourite faux glow with confidence. The KORA Organics’ Gradual Self-Tanning Lotion is jam-packed with DHA (dihydroxyacetone), a naturally-derived ingredient found in sugar that becomes brown over time to build a natural and healthy-looking tan. Clever, right? Glow aside, this moisturiser boasts powerful antioxidants such as noni fruit extract, rosehip oil (which is also anti-inflammatory!) and sea buckthorn. The fatty acids in these multi-tasking hero ingredients also help to diminish the appearance of damaged skin and premature ageing, too. Energised with rose quartz and with a positive word of affirmation on the back of the packaging, this bottle of joy will keep you feeling happy, confident and mindful each day. Glow get ‘em!
how_to_use: For best results, exfoliate regularly with KORA Organics Body Exfoliator before application. Apply to clean, dry skin in an upward circular motion ensuring to cover all areas for an even application. Wash hands after application. Allow to dry before getting dressed and 4-8 hours before getting wet. Use daily to build colour towards desired shade. To maintain gradual tan, moisturise with KORA Organics Enriched Body Lotion.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin*, Dihydroxyacetone, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate, Cetearyl Olivate, Morinda Citrifolia (Noni) Fruit Extract *, Sorbitan Olivate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Xanthan Gum, Lavandula Hybrida (Lavandin) Oil *, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea, Green Tea) Leaf Extract*, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil*, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil *, Tocopherol, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil *, Passiflora Incarnata (Passionflower) Flower Extract*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract*, Trehalose, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil *, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil *, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool**, Farnesol**, Benzyl Benzoate**, Benzyl Salicylate**, Geraniol**. *Ingredient from Organic Farming. **From essential oils.

name: Frank Body Perky Sculpting Body Hydrator Full Size Frank Body Perky Sculpting Body Hydrator Full Size
description: Give your best ass-et the attention it deserves with frank body's Perky Sculpting Body Hydrator. Crafted to smooth and hydrate, this fast-absorbing formula not only quenches thirsty skin but also sculpts and firms your to promote a peachy-plump look. Held in a reusable coffee cup (just rinse when you're all out of product!) and scented like vanilla frosting *drools*, this nourishing formula is laced with a shot of caffeine to firm, tighten and perk up your skin; super berry acai then lends the blend an abundance of antioxidants and vitamins (think: A, B, C & E) to replenish dry, damaged skin; leaving your skin feeling like the finest silk lingerie, shea butter hydrates and nourishes without feeling greasy; finally, longan seed extract works to sculpt your skin and fend against free radicals!
how_to_use: Use a two-finger scoop daily. After showering, towel dry and stay naked. Scoop out your desired amount of Perky Sculpting Body Hydrator. Massage in circular motions all over your body, starting with your booty. Wait for it to absorb into your skin, then put your pants on.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Lauryl Laurate, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Fragrance (Parfum), Caprylyl Glycol, Caffeine, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Extract, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Nephelium Longana Seed Extract, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid. Total Naturally Derived 93%

name: DeoDoc Shaving Foam Fresh Coconut 100ml DeoDoc Shaving Foam Fresh Coconut 100ml
description: Whether you choose to go au naturel or prefer a super-groomed intimate area, having the right tools for the job is necessary to care for your skin — it can save a lot of time, effort and ingrown hairs too. Good thing DeoDoc’s Shaving Intimate Foam is on hand to assist with the task in your choice of the sweet yet tropical blend of creamy coconut in ‘Fresh Coconut’ or the fragrance-free formula for the truly delicate-skinned amongst us. Formulated specifically to nourish and protect even the most sensitive skin, the gentle formula lathers up to help your razor glide more easily against the skin. That means no painful nicks, cuts or razor burn; it also helps you to achieve a more precise and quick shave, should you choose to groom. The foam is infused with beta vulgaris (beet) root extract, which imparts powerful antioxidants that your skin will lap up to leave it feeling nourished and smooth.
how_to_use: Apply the Shaving Foam to the area that you're shaving. Shake well before use!

name: Marvis Travel Aquatic Mint Toothpaste Marvis Travel Aquatic Mint Toothpaste
description: Put aside your drugstore toothpaste Marvis has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As youd expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape. Unlike your bog-standard formula however, there are flavours such as Cinnamon Mint, Ginger Mint, and Liquorice Mint, alongside classics like Aquatic Mint all encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf. Perfectly sized for on-the-go, these travel-ready products are also perfect for popping into your suitcase (or for sampling your way through the exciting flavours on offer)! Marvi-lous, or what?!
how_to_use: Use morning and evening to brush your teeth.
ingredient: Glycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Limonene.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Baby & Kids Face Cream Dr. Barbara Sturm Baby & Kids Face Cream
description: Swaddling the plump and delicate skin of your little one with a richly soothing formula, the Baby & Kids Face Cream forms a protective barrier against the elements. Crafted with the finest natural ingredients and true to the brand’s ethos of innovation without the use of aggressive ingredients, this skin-comforting concoction is nurturing, healing and safe. The nourishing cream is formulated with almond blossom and calendula to impart a calming, cocoon-like veil, protecting sensitive skin from red-cheeked cold or harsh weather. Chamomile helps to comfort irritation, while moisture-replenishing panthenol, jojoba and sweet almond smooth and moisturise to maintain their baby-soft skin.
how_to_use: Apply to your baby's face and hands, careful to avoid the eye area.

name: Emma Hardie Moringa Luxury Hand and Nail Treatment 50ml Emma Hardie Moringa Luxury Hand and Nail Treatment 50ml
description: Exposed to everything (from grimy phones to dirty nappies and all sorts in-between) our hands undergo serious stress on a daily basis. This means they can often show signs of premature ageing (think: fine lines and hyperpigmentation), which is why you'll find a hard-working hand cream in every respectable skin care fanatic's handbag. This is where the Moringa Luxury Hand and Nail Treatment comes in; it's a do-it-all treatment that cocktails together a nourishing selection of plant oils to hydrate and form a protective barrier over skin. With thanks to vitamins and minerals that parched hands lap right up, it even soothes skin and strengthens the skin barrier - with SPF 30 to boot! (You didn't think SPF was solely for the face... did you?)
how_to_use: Take a hazelnut-sized piece of the hand cream and massage into skin and nails. Reapply throughout the day after hand-washing to avoid dryness.

name: Mario Badescu Coconut Body Butter 113g Mario Badescu Coconut Body Butter 113g
description: Rescuing even the driest skin from the brink, Mario Badescu’s Coconut Body Butter unites a host of skin-loving heroes that work harmoniously together to soften, smoothen and hydrate every inch of your body. Enriched by moisture-magnetic shea and mango butter, and a fruity fusion of apricot, argan, meadow seed foam and rosehip oils, this all-nourishing and non-greasy conditioning cream delivers long lasting hydration to parched skin. Gently and effectively improving the tone and texture of your skin and leaving a natural hint of the sweetest smelling coconut lingering on your skin, this buttery blend melts like a dream to reveal dolphin-smooth skin from head-to-toe. Result!
how_to_use: Apply generously all over body after bathing or as needed for a moisturising boost of hydration. Not for facial use. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

name: Margaret Dabbs London Intensive Treatment Foot Oil 100ml Margaret Dabbs London Intensive Treatment Foot Oil 100ml
description: The most luxurious and effective treatment for dry feet out there. Intensive Treatment Foot Oil contains a high concentration of Emu Oil, which has been used in Australia for thousands of years for its moisture locking capabilities and for the treatment of wounds, burns and bruises. Anti-inflammatory and deeply soothing, Emu Oil is a popular natural remedy for arthritis and eczema, working wonders on dehydrated feet with cracking and broken nails. It also contains soothing Lemon Myrtle which smells divine.
how_to_use: Spray oil onto a cotton wool ball and apply to the skin of the feet, or simply into the palm of the hand and experience the added luxury of replenished hands as well! Use daily for seriously dry skin or twice weekly as a treatment product (also good for knees and elbows). Emu Oil is non pore clogging and has same irritant value as water
ingredient: Isopropyl Myristate, Emu Oil, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Backhousia Citriodora (Citral, Linalool). Feet Saviors

name: Escentric Molecules Escentric 05 Body Wash Escentric Molecules Escentric 05 Body Wash
description: Echoing the warm cosy, cashmere allure of the beloved Escentric 05 perfume, this luxurious body wash marries musk and woody qualities – having both dry and creamy traits that make you long to nuzzle into it. Add the tang of pine and the resinous characteristics of amber into the mix and you get an idea of this molecule’s power to captivate. It’s as perfect for pairing with actual cashmere as jeans and a t-shirt. Not to mention filling your bathroom with a long-lasting, intoxicating haze of scent, this nourishing cleanser is the perfect way to intensify your Escentric Molecules fragrance. Completely free from parabens and sulphates, this is a striking addition to any bathroom shelf – layer it with either Molecule or Escentric 05 to instantly amplify your allure…
how_to_use: Use in shower or bath, then follow with Molecule or Molecule 05, to intensify the fragrance (and amplify your allure)...

name: Herlum Hand and Body Lotion Sandalwood and Grapefruit 500ml Herlum Hand and Body Lotion Sandalwood and Grapefruit 500ml
description: With a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula, this Hand & Body Lotion delivers deep and long-lasting hydration without leaving skin sticky or greasy. In fact, you’ll be glowing from head to toe… The impressive hydration is down to a few key, sustainably sourced ingredients. First, there’s a mix of nourishing and strengthening vitamin E, sweet almond and cacao oils. Then, there’s murumuru butter, known for its lauric and oleic acid properties and ability to lock in moisture. There’s also a delicious rainforest-inspired scent, stemming from upcycled flowers and uniting woody and spicy notes of freshly sliced grapefruit and creamy sandalwood. Let it gently fragrance your skin with an aroma that lingers all day long.
how_to_use: Dispense a pump, and mindfully massage into hands and body. After use, rinse the container before placing in the recycling bin.

name: Frank Body Coconut Coffee Scrub 200g Frank Body Coconut Coffee Scrub 200g
description: Gorgeously glowing skin is only a shower away Meet frank bodys Coconut Coffee Scrub, a bearer of soft, hydrated, radiant skin that smells oh-so fine. Using natural, vegan and cruelty-free ingredients, the scrub utilises roasted coffee grinds and jojoba beads to gently exfoliate away dead and dull skin cells, while promoting collagen production and blood flow. Coconut oil takes the reigns on the hydration front, providing a surge of moisture to thirsty skin that lasts long beyond the bathroom and lets not forget its anti-bacterial properties, which will soothe irritation often associated with dry and patchy skin. The scrubs glow-giving powers come largely from grapeseed oil an oil full of fatty acids and vitamins C, D and E to help fade scarring and marks while tightening and protecting from environmental aggressors. Just when you thought it couldnt get any better, the scrub is free from all sorts of nasties including parabens, sulphates and PEGs
how_to_use: In the shower, massage the scrub in circular motions over wet skin for a few minutes, focusing on dry areas, scars, stretch marks, breakouts or cellulite. Wait three minutes to benefit from the scrubs moisturising properties. Rinse off and pat dry.
ingredient: Coffea Robusta Seed Powder, Water (Aqua), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, Sucrose, Olus (Vegetable) Oil, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Parfum, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Coumarin.

name: Margaret Dabbs London Discovery Kit for Feet Margaret Dabbs London Discovery Kit for Feet
how_to_use: Hydrating Foot Soak 45ml: Pump a small amount of Foot Soak into a bowl of warm water and soak the feet for 5-10 minutes. Use daily for tired, over dry skin or weekly as a luxury treatment. Exfoliating Foot Mousse 30ml: Apply a small amount onto hands and rub over wet feet paying attention to heels and any areas of callus. Use lukewarm water to rinse the feet and wash away the mousse. Intensive Hydrating Foot Lotion 45ml: Apply a small amount of lotion all over the feet. Use daily. Intensive Treatment Foot Oil 30ml: Spray all over the feet and gently massage into the skin and nails.

name: Medik8 Advanced Day Eye Protect 15ml Medik8 Advanced Day Eye Protect 15ml
description: A 360Ëš cream to protect and replenish a famously delicate area, Medik8s Advanced Day Eye Protect deflects the harmful impact of the sun and daily stressors while improving circulation to revitalise your eyes. With broad spectrum SPF 30, alongside a pollution shield, anti-infrared, anti-blue light and anti-A.G.E. technologies, this creates a force field between skin and the perils of modern existence. A.G.E.s an acronym for advanced glycation end-products are the product of sugar that binds with the proteins (elastin and collagen) that keep the skin supple and lead to lines, sagging and lost elasticity. Carnosine helps to prevent the skin-ageing effects of these sugars, while cocoa seed extract protects from free radicals, caffeine constricts tiny blood vessels (helping to lessen the look of dark circles) and hesperidin found naturally in citrus fruits fortifies fragile capillary walls for a brighter appearance. Great under make up, consider this potion the perfect defence against everything life tries to throw at you.
how_to_use: After cleansing in the morning, apply an amount of Advanced Day Eye Protect around the eye area, avoiding eyelids. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.

name: Hello Sunday The One For Your Lips – Fragrance Free Lip Balm SPF50 Hello Sunday The One For Your Lips – Fragrance Free Lip Balm SPF50
description: Does anyone else have flashbacks of summer days as a child, running around with smeared, white sunblock all around your mouth? It wasn't a pretty picture... but lip protection doesn't have to look like that. That's where Hello Sunday's The One For Your Lips - Fragrance Free Lip Balm SPF 50 comes in; this totally transparent balm boasts an impressive SPF of 50 (!) to keep the delicate skin on your lips plush and protected. Packed full of skin-loving ingredients, the Hello Sunday sunscreens bridge the gap between sun protection and skin care, in the way they condition and enhance your complexion. Take this lip balm – it's made with hyaluronic acid (the beauty industry's favourite hydrating ingredient) as well as squalane and shea butter to grant a supremely soft finish. As if all that wasn't reason enough to adore this skin-shielding salve, it's now fragrance free for those of us sensitive to scent.
how_to_use: Apply to lips throughout the day as needed. Sunscreen best practice: apply 30 minutes before going outside and reapply every two hours as well as immediately after swimming or sweating.

name: Susanne Kaufmann Calming Pillow Spray 75ml Susanne Kaufmann Calming Pillow Spray 75ml
description: A soporific mist for those who find the ‘Land of Nod’ elusive, Susanne Kaufmann’s Pillow Spray Calming creates the perfect, snooze-inducing ambience to help you drift off with your head in a cloud of olfactory bliss! With soothing oils of lavender and stress-dispelling orange, a quick spritz creates a smooth route to the realm of reparative restfulness – supporting respiration as it quietens an overactive mind to help you put the day to bed and get your share of precious Zzzs.
how_to_use: Mist directly onto your pillow/bedlinen or use as a soothing room spray.

name: DeoDoc Shaving Kit Fresh Coconut DeoDoc Shaving Kit Fresh Coconut
description: Introducing the Shaving Kit, a beginner's guide to DeoDoc's range of Holy Grail heroes, it contains the brand's Pre-Shave Oil, Shaving Foam, After Shave Balm, Regular Tampon, Intimate Deowipe, Intimate Lubricant Drops and Organic Cotton Liner. Available in two scents, 'Fresh Coconut' and 'Fragrance Free', the Shaving Kit is perfect for discovering this range of helpful heroes, gifting to a loved one or stocking up on your go-tos with ease. Helping to streamline your ritual, this edit helps to upgrade your shaving routine to avoid the likes of razor burn and itchy ingrown hairs to making your sex life and time-of-the-month more enjoyable and comfortable too. We'll be adding this to our baskets, stat!

name: Weleda Baby Calendula Body Lotion 200ml Weleda Baby Calendula Body Lotion 200ml
description: Formulated with few but fantastically effective ingredients, the Baby Calendula Body Lotion is simple, mild and softening. Massage your little one with organic, caring and comforting almond and sesame oils for a boost of natural hydration, while calendula and chamomile extracts work to soothe angry skin. Enriched with lipids that are completely compatible with the skin’s natural lipid barrier, the Baby Calendula Body Lotion supports newly developing skin, allowing it to do its job and protect your baby! Beeswax is added to create a hydrating protective shield, locking in moisture for super-soft, velvety skin texture. Naturally antibacterial, beeswax also works to fight against skin issues like dryness and eczema - combine this with the calming properties of calendula, and your little one is happily relieved of tear-jerking irritation. Natural, light and bee-utiful, use the Baby Calendula Body Lotion as a duvet of skin-softening goodness.
how_to_use: Apply on baby’s whole body and spread gently.

description: Firm in the belief that your skin deserves the utmost care, ESPA crafted an assortment of body washes - each with their own bewitching scent - to gently yet effectively refresh your skin. With a delicately fresh, floral aroma, clear some space on your shower shelf for this Bergamot & Jasmine Bath and Shower Gel... This soap-free formula is brimming with a decadent medley of pure essential oils - from jasmine and bergamot to orange and ginger - that gives the cleansing lather its enchanting aroma. Perfect for all skin types, especially those that are prone to bouts of rough and dry patches, this everyday wash is carefully formulated to cleanse your skin without stripping essential moisture. Instead, it helps to condition and soften your skin - we're obsessed!
how_to_use: FOR BEST RESULTS: Use daily in the shower or add to running water for a luxurious foaming bath. Massage into damp skin to create a rich lather and rinse off.

name: Murad Clarifying Body Spray 130ml Murad Clarifying Body Spray 130ml
description: An ingenious antibacterial mist to help battle your breakouts in hard-to-reach areas, this cocktail of pore-purifying ingredients combats congestion to tackle clogged pores and prevent those unwelcome eruptions. With a 360˚ nozzle that works upside down, Murad’s Clarifying Body Spray is great for those bothered by ‘bacne’ who’re eager to calm inflammation, accelerate healing and mitigate flareups. Granting ready access to your back, bottom, shoulders, shins… you name it, this brilliant spritz is ideal for dissolving the dead cells and debris that lead to blocked pores. Starring salicylic acid (from willow bark extract), alongside cooling menthol, this quickly calms redness and helps to prevent lumps and bumps (it’s ideal between waxes to ward against ingrown hairs) – helping your skin become strokably smooth and limb-baringly clear, top-to-toe. It’s a confidence boost in a bottle!
how_to_use: Cleanse the skin thoroughly before applying the product. Cover the entire affected area with a thin layer one to three times daily. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two or three times daily if needed. If dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.
ingredient: Aqua, Alcohol Denat., Butylene Glycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Salicylic Acid, Niacinamide, Allantoin, Glycerin,Nymphaea Coerulea Flower Extract, Panthenol, Glycolic Acid, Menthol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Oil

name: Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Glow Pad - Intense Glow (Pack of 20) Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Glow Pad - Intense Glow (Pack of 20)
description: Dr Dennis Gross Skincare’s Alpha Beta Glow Pads offer tanning enhanced with exfoliating and anti-ageing benefits. Delivered in perfectly-dosed towelettes for convenient, mess-free application, you simply apply the pre-soaked pad in circular motions to bestow a natural-looking, even glow that will develop within 3-4 hours. Available in ‘Gradual Glow’, for a buildable golden glow, and ‘Intense Glow’ for a rich, deeper bronze, you can select the shade that suits you. The ‘Alpha Beta’ formula contains a potent blend of acids to exfoliate and correct common signs of ageing – including hyaluronic acid for time-released hydration, glycolic acid to reduce visible lines and wrinkles and lactic acid, a naturally-occurring alpha-hydroxy acid that helps to speed up cell renewal. Completing the powerful concoction, willow bark extract then helps to keep pores clear while ‘dissolving’ dulling dead cells, creating a super-smooth base for the ultimate, streak-free tan.
how_to_use: Apply to face, neck and décolleté in circular motions, blending evenly. Wash hands immediately after use. Use the product daily to achieve desired color, then space applications to maintain your ideal glow. For best results, use after the Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Peel.

Pick from ‘Rose’, a sheer pink tint that gives lips a healthy glow; ‘Rhubarb’, a sheer fruity tint that deepens your natural lip colour; ‘Perfect Nude’, a sheer universal nude and ‘Red Apple’, a sheer vivid red that brightens your natural lip colour. A multi-award-winning balm that also boasts a broad spectrum SPF 30 to protect lips from the sun’s damaging rays, this protects as it enhances their colour and hydrates.

name: ilapothecary Beat the Blues Bath and Shower Oil 200ml ilapothecary Beat the Blues Bath and Shower Oil 200ml
description: Soak in a sense of peace with ilāpothecary Beat the Blues Shower & Bath Oil. Infused with oils thought to boost your mood and self-esteem, this fragrant wash leaves limbs refreshed, soft and beautifully scented. With a number attributed to each ilāpothecary signature blend, no. 27 is at the core of each of the ‘Beat The Blues’ blends; built around believing in yourself and listening to your intuition, it’s crafted to be a self-affirming and fortifying scent. Without further ado, these are the impressive essentials oils that make the formula what it is: musky yet sweet clary sage enlivens the senses and boosts confidence while steadying and relaxing the mind; petitgrain encourages the spirit of self-acceptance, helping to ease mental anguish and promote emotional healing; rose geranium helps us to recognise and connect with our emotions; finally, tuberose helps to soothe tension and relieve frantic minds.
how_to_use: Ideal for your morning bath or shower, can be used any time. A little goes a long way, gently massage into the body, and wash as normal. Also, enjoy a few pumps in the bath for an uplifting & balancing experience. Continue your day with the beat the blues pulse point and the beat the blues room spray, for the ultimate transformative experience.

name: Gallinée Prebiotic Cleansing Bar 100g Gallinée Prebiotic Cleansing Bar 100g
description: Made from 75% natural ingredients and perfect for your face and body, Gallinée's Cleansing Bar is brimming with the brand's scientifically-formulated complex of prebiotics alongside lactic acid that nourishes and protects your skin’s good bacteria while removing the bad. Post-cleanse it will leave your skin looking soothed, radiant, while throughly cleansed and nourished. Suitable for sensitive skin and skin prone to eczema, Gallinée's Cleansing Bar is formulated at pH 5.8, respecting your skin’s natural pH levels. Non-stripping and ultra-gentle, this dermatological bar can be used on face and body. It leaves skin soft, soothed and fresh. It's formulated with the brand's complex of prebiotics (a mix of ultra-gentle fibres and sugars that feed your skin’s good bacteria and help support the skin’s barrier, with an antibacterial action against bad bacteria) and lactic acid (the gentlest of AHAs, lactic acid helps the skin to stay at its optimal pH level and has hydrating and softening properties. Gallinée uses a slow-release form to suit even sensitive skin). But it doesn't stop there, this solid bar soap (without soap!) is free from soap, colourants, parabens, mineral oils, silicones, microbeads, phenoxyethanol or methylisothiazolinone too! Gallinée's founder, Marie, also rates this as her favourite product saying: “I love it the most because it was so hard to make. But it was worth the pain, it’s literally the best soap (without soap) that you’ll ever use. I use it to wash my face, body and …downstairs garden. Plastic-free and much more sustainable than shower gel, that goes without saying.”
how_to_use: Ideal for face and body. Massage into damp skin and rinse.

Completely sulphate-free, its enhanced with a potent concoction of mighty oils and extracts to refresh, nourish and smooth skin. Atlantic kelp extract is a rich source of calcium that boosts energy production and hydrates skin, covering it in a protective barrier to lock in moisture all day long, while magnesium plankton extract offers anti-inflammatory properties and reduces stress damage. Also infused with a bend of energising, anti-fatigue essential oils, this body wash awakens sluggish skin and senses to set you up for the day perfectly.

name: Solgar Prenatal Nutrients Solgar Prenatal Nutrients
description: Formulated to feed your body with a wealth of nutrients and vitamins, Solgar’s Prenatal Nutrients are made with the delicate needs of pregnant and lactating women in mind. Brimming with a whopping 20 pregnancy-supportive nutrients, each tablet includes potent antioxidants, calcium, iron, vitamin B and 400mcg of folic acid. Vegan, kosher and halal, these supplements meet the greater nutritional requirements of pregnancy, working to promote normal weight gain in growing babies. Folic acid encourages healthy maternal tissue growth during maternity; calcium and vitamin D contribute to healthy bone development; iron maintains energy levels and reduces tiredness; and folate reduces your risk of birthing a child with brain or spinal issues.
how_to_use: Just two tablets a day with food will provide a balanced combination of nutrients.

name: Pai Skincare British Summer Time Sensitive Sunscreen 40ml Pai Skincare British Summer Time Sensitive Sunscreen 40ml
description: Whether the sun has its hat on or not, wearing your sunscreen is a daily essential – and Pai’s British Summer Time will protect your precious complexion from all kinds of damaging rays (including those from your computer/phone screen!). With Sun Protection Factor 30, the mineral sunscreen delivers broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection, not to mention blue light and infra-red protection. This incredible formula is 99% natural, using zinc oxide to protect from light rays which means it’s 100% safe and non-toxic to marine life. Suitable for sensitive skin types (even eczema-prone skin!), it has been carefully crafted from good-for-skin mineral and plant ingredients to protect and repair your complexion. Better yet? It’s non-greasy and make up blends seamlessly over the top. Stay safe, folks!

name: Frank Body Shimmer Scrub 220g Frank Body Shimmer Scrub 220g
description: Sugar, salt and all thing’s Cult – that’s what frank body’s Shimmer Scrub is made of. Crafted using 100 % natural, vegan and cruelty-free ingredients, it’s perfect in more ways than one – exfoliating, moisturising and imparting a glorious glow. A sparkle of genius, it’s packed with teeny tiny gold and silver particles which cling to skin even after showering, transforming you into a party-ready human disco ball (THE dream). Roasted coffee grinds, sugar and salt are excellent exfoliators, buffing away dry and flaking skin for an incredibly soft finish. Replenishing moisture, grapeseed oil and vitamin E amp up your skin’s hydration levels, simultaneously allowing the shimmer particles to stick to you. Ideal for festivals, parties or day-to-day awesomeness, this scrub is sure to keep you on your twinkle toes…

Delectably fragranced and free from the usual suspects (no parabens, gluten or cruelty!), each of these opulent washes creates a soft, luxury lather that gently eliminates dirt and residual grime to leave paws feeling perfectly pampered. name: Anthony No Sweat Body Defense 90ml Anthony No Sweat Body Defense 90ml
description: Long gone are the days of nightmarish chafing and feeling sticky with sweat, Anthony’s No Sweat Body Defense is a full-body (and we mean full-body…) essential for keeping you fresh and dry. It goes on like a silky cream before working into a smooth powder-like finish. Tapioca starch forms a soft, defensive barrier to prevent chafing and discomfort, while aloe vera works to refresh and cool your skin. It has macadamia nut oil extract for impressive glide, glycerine to nourish and vitamin E works to soothe and rejuvenate your skin. description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. name: Gallinée Prebiotic Cleansing Bar 100g Gallinée Prebiotic Cleansing Bar 100g
description: Made from 75% natural ingredients and perfect for your face and body, Gallinée's Cleansing Bar is brimming with the brand's scientifically-formulated complex of prebiotics alongside lactic acid that nourishes and protects your skin’s good bacteria while removing the bad. Post-cleanse it will leave your skin looking soothed, radiant, while throughly cleansed and nourished. Suitable for sensitive skin and skin prone to eczema, Gallinée's Cleansing Bar is formulated at pH 5.8, respecting your skin’s natural pH levels. Non-stripping and ultra-gentle, this dermatological bar can be used on face and body. It leaves skin soft, soothed and fresh. It's formulated with the brand's complex of prebiotics (a mix of ultra-gentle fibres and sugars that feed your skin’s good bacteria and help support the skin’s barrier, with an antibacterial action against bad bacteria) and lactic acid (the gentlest of AHAs, lactic acid helps the skin to stay at its optimal pH level and has hydrating and softening properties. Gallinée uses a slow-release form to suit even sensitive skin). But it doesn't stop there, this solid bar soap (without soap!) is free from soap, colourants, parabens, mineral oils, silicones, microbeads, phenoxyethanol or methylisothiazolinone too! Gallinée's founder, Marie, also rates this as her favourite product saying: “I love it the most because it was so hard to make. But it was worth the pain, it’s literally the best soap (without soap) that you’ll ever use. I use it to wash my face, body and …downstairs garden. Plastic-free and much more sustainable than shower gel, that goes without saying.”
how_to_use: Ideal for face and body. Massage into damp skin and rinse.

name: Pai Skincare British Summer Time Sensitive Sunscreen 40ml Pai Skincare British Summer Time Sensitive Sunscreen 40ml
description: Whether the sun has its hat on or not, wearing your sunscreen is a daily essential – and Pai’s British Summer Time will protect your precious complexion from all kinds of damaging rays (including those from your computer/phone screen!). This incredible formula is 99% natural, using zinc oxide to protect from light rays which means it’s 100% safe and non-toxic to marine life. Suitable for sensitive skin types (even eczema-prone skin!), it has been carefully crafted from good-for-skin mineral and plant ingredients to protect and repair your complexion. Better yet? It’s non-greasy and make up blends seamlessly over the top. Stay safe, folks!

name: Lancaster Sun Perfect SPF50 High Protection Illuminating Cream 50ml Lancaster Sun Perfect SPF50 High Protection Illuminating Cream 50ml
description: With good sun care comes great skin care, because – with our busier lives and access to advanced technology – there’s just no excuse for the two elements to be separate anymore. Enter: the Perfect - Illuminating Cream SPF50 High Protection – an all-in-one, incredibly protective cream that streamlines your routine by protecting, brightening and reducing the appearance of dark spots and fine lines. Did you know that the sun spectrum includes more than just UVA and UVB rays? That’s where Lancaster’s Full Light Technology comes in – it works to protect you from UVA, UVB, visible light and infrared rays. Housed in an ultra-hydrating and lightweight formula that’s specifically designed for those who want instant glow while helping to prevent the signs of stress on skin (who doesn’t?), this non-sticky cream uses a unique combination of soy and black pepper berry to diminish the appearance of fine lines while the brand’s Brightening Complex reduces the appearance of dark spots. Ginger extracts help skin to protect itself from further hyperpigmentation, and light reflectors instantly reflect light to illuminate lacklustre skin.
how_to_use: Apply Skin Perfect Illuminating Cream SPF50 all over face and decolleté before sun exposure.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Interdental Bamboo Brushes Spotlight Oral Care Interdental Bamboo Brushes
description: Available in four sizes your dentist can advise which is best for you Spotlight Oral Care's Interdental Bamboo Brushes are designed to clean those hard-to-reach areas between your teeth where a regular toothbrush cannot reach. More intensive and thorough than your average string of floss, these vegan-friendly, naturally antimicrobial brushes efficiently remove plaque and help prevent the development of gum disease and cavities.Made with a 100% sustainable bamboo handle, they're ergonomically designed in a range of sizes to suit every tooth size and shape. Suitable for sensitive teeth and gums, simply choose between the four sizes to upgrade your oral care routine; use them daily with your regular brushing routine for healthier teeth and gums and fresher breath!
how_to_use: Interdental brushes are suitable for everyone. Your dentist will advise you on a suitable size/sizes to use. Use every day along with a regular brushing for healthier teeth and gums and fresher breath.

name: EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF30 Kids EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF30 Kids
description: Easy to apply, rapidly absorbable and never sticky or greasy, the lightweight Sunscreen Mousse SPF30 Kids works with the epidermis to deliver both immediate and lasting protection against UVA and UVB rays for up to six hours. (That’s a lot of worry-free adventure time for your little ones!) Exceptionally water-resistant and free of parabens, nanoparticles and perfumes, this formula is ideal for sensitive and delicate young skin. With a quick drying-time and invisible, matte finish, this hydrating mousse actually forms an innovative protective barrier that mimics skin’s natural defences – providing extraordinary protection without clogging pores or sitting on the surface of your skin. Gentle, hypoallergenic, suitable for use from just six months old and totally smudge-proof (even when up against towel rub-downs post swim!) the Sunscreen Mousse SPF30 Kids lasts twice as long as cream formulas and helps to prevent future skin damage. Now you just need a holiday to go with it…
how_to_use: For children younger than 16 years, EVY Technology always recommends SPF 30 or higher. Even children with darker skin should be protected with high UVA protection, because children’s skin is thinner. Reapplication: Thanks to the patented skincare technology, EVY is absorbed into the entire epidermis, rather than sitting on the skin's surface. This results in a much longer-lasting protection. However, in line with regulations, EVY do advise you to reapply frequently, especially as it's easy to miss a spot during the first time around. Recycling: Simply break off the plastic top for plastic recycling and place the aluminium bottle in the metal recycling bin.

It’s packed with a nourishing concoction of rose butter, rose flower essential wax and rosehip oil to smooth and regenerate the skin - ideal if guilty of often neglecting your hard-working hands. Boasting the same gorgeous fragrance as the original Baume de Rose, it smells like heaven itself – so much so, you’ll find yourself longing to slather it on.

name: Frank Body Clean Deodorant Cucumber and Green Tea 75g Frank Body Clean Deodorant Cucumber and Green Tea 75g
description: With a gentle ‘Cucumber and Green Tea’ fragrance that won’t interfere with your body’s natural chemistry, the Clean Deodorant is the ‘natural’ deodorant for people that are a little bit sceptical of natural deodorants. By removing aluminium from the equation, frank body has created an effective roll-on formula designed to prevent odour while taking your underarms back to basics. Sweating is a (very normal!) function, intended to help keep your body temperature in check. Without aluminium, armpits are able to ‘breathe’ as they’re supposed to, which in turn helps to regulate and slow down sweat production. So, the first week or two after making the switch might feel a little sweatier than normal, but trust us, stick with it and soon enough you can expect soothed pits and last-all-day freshness.
how_to_use: Roll on to clean underarms in circular motions.

name: Baxter of California Exfoliating Body Bar Travel Size Baxter of California Exfoliating Body Bar Travel Size
description: Established in 1965, Baxter of California is a curated collection of men’s grooming products that melds simplicity with efficacy through their edit of natural ingredient empowered formulas. Ultra-cleansing and rapidly refining, the Exfoliating Body Bar helps to smooth rough and uneven texture. Formulated with ultra-fine particles of jojoba meal and crushed olive seed, the bar lifts away rough patches and encourages the natural renewal of skin cells for seriously smooth skin. Easily lathered and never drying, this cleansing bar hydrates and refreshes as it buffs away uneven texture. What’s more, the blend of cedarwood and oakmoss leaves behind a subtle musk that seals the deal… Pick from two sizes, the full size (198g) or a mini (28g) that's perfect for travelling with your go-to or discovering a firm favourite before investing in a full size.

description: Housed in Molton Brown's famously understated (yet effortlessly chic!) bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of Fiery Pink Pepper Bath & Shower Gel is bursting with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous, good-to-skin ingredients that leave limbs soft, supple and cleansed. name: Frank Body A-Beauty Scrub 200g Frank Body A-Beauty Scrub 200g
description: A must-have for banishing pigmentation, scarring or lingering sun damage, this brand new A-Beauty Scrub which is exclusive to Cult Beauty is laced with native Australian ingredients such as vitamin C-rich Kakadu plum, finger lime, eucalyptus and macadamia oil to visibly brighten skin, fade scars and fade hyperpigmentation. Boasting record-numbers of vitamin C, Kakadu plum is an overachieving hero that brightens skin as it fights signs of ageing, blemishes and sun damage. Finger lime is a powerful exfoliator that also brightens, fades scars and pigmentation as well as moisturising. Eucalyptus is a natural antiseptic, antifungal, anti-inflammatory and antibacterial hero that battles breakouts with ease and finally, macadamia oil is jam-packed with vitamins A, E and D to hydrate and nourish skin so post-shower you’ll feel soft, supple and refreshed. Simply massage in circular motions onto damp skin – especially in areas of concern and then after 3 minutes wash off and see the results! They’re amazing and with continued use they’ll only get better and better.

name: Herbivore Coconut Milk Bath Soak 454g Herbivore Coconut Milk Bath Soak 454g
description: Let’s set the scene: you’ve had a busy day, you’ve filled an invitingly hot bath, you sprinkle Herbivore’s Coconut Milk Bath Soak into the water and are greeted by a delicious coconut scent… *Satisfied sigh*. Adding a relaxing, skin-softening boost to your tub, this gorgeous bath soak contains hydrating coconut milk powder and aromatic coconut pulp CO2 to leave you feeling (and smelling) oh-so good and silky-smooth. A treat to behold, the formula comes in a gorgeous minimalist tub (in both large (454g) and small (226g) sizes) that will be well-deserved of top spot on your skin care shelf – and just watch as the compliments come rolling in. As with all Herbivore’s formulas, the ingredients are vegan, cruelty-free and synthetic-free (you won’t find any parabens over here!), plus the packaging is recyclable and reusable. What’s not to love?
how_to_use: Add the desired amount to bathtub under running water and disperse throughout the bath with your fingers. It is best to add this right before or when you are in the bath since the oils will vaporize when they make contact with the water. Inhale deeply and enjoy. Keep water out of the jar at all times and shake thoroughly if any clumping occurs.
ingredient: Sodium Bicarbonate, Dehydrated Vegan Coconut Milk, Coconut Pulp CO2, Vanilla Planifolia Absolute

name: Herbivore Amethyst Crushed Amethyst Exfoliating Body Polish 200ml Herbivore Amethyst Crushed Amethyst Exfoliating Body Polish 200ml
description: Reveal silky smooth skin with Herbivore's Amethyst Body Polish. This lilac-hued fine scrub with the delectable aroma or jasmine and coconut gently exfoliates and moisturises. Thought to absorb negative energy and balance your mood, when massaged in skin this Amethyst Body Polish boasts a formula flecked with crushed amethyst gemstone combined with magnesium-rich salt, ultra-hydrating organic virgin coconut oil and night-blooming jasmine sambac to lavish your body with luxe moisture. Inspired by the healing metaphysical properties of its namesake gemstone, Amethyst Body Scrub, becomes a healing component of your bathing ritual, bringing harmonising benefits to increase your inner and outer beauty.
how_to_use: Massage a handful of the body scrub all over the skin. Let sit for 1-2 minutes for complete hydration then rinse off. Immediately after bathing, apply 2-3 pumps of body oil all over the skin. Please note: may make bathtub/shower floor slippery. To keep the Body Polish fresh, store in a dry place when not in use.

Smoother, more even skin with continued use.

description: A multi-sensual oil that wins over our eyes, nose and skin in one effortless pump, this luxurious oil is enriched with plenty of hard-working botanical oils: camellia seed oil provides plenty of omega fatty acids, absorbing easily into the skin to impart a radiant glow; grapeseed oil is supercharged with antioxidants to condition and protect skin, leaving it silky soft; jasmine sambac oil, from which the product gets its name, bolsters moisture and elasticity levels while contributing a gorgeous scent. Blended together, these natural oils create a beautiful floral fragrance bound to get curious noses wagging and kick-start demands to reveal your secret… A treat for the eyes, as well as the nose and skin, the formula comes in a gorgeous minimalist bottle (in both full (236ml) and travel (59ml) sizes) that will be well-deserved of top spot on your skin care shelf – and just watch as the compliments come rolling in. As with all Herbivore’s formulas, the ingredients are vegan, cruelty-free and synthetic-free (you won’t find any parabens over here!), plus the packaging is recyclable and reusable.

The bar also features geranium oil to balance both dry and oily complexions, which blends beautifully with blood orange oil to create a delicious citrus-meets-floral scent. Cruelty-free, vegan and with minimal packaging, this clever bar is an eco-warrior’s dream without skimping on high quality ingredients – you won’t find any synthetics, fillers or nasty chemicals here, just good-for-skin natural botanicals and do-gooders.

name: Marvis Toothpaste and Tube Stand Set - Whitening Marvis Toothpaste and Tube Stand Set - Whitening
description: Wrapping up their cult-classic Whitening Toothpaste with an accompanying tube stand (your sink-side will have never looked so chic), Marvis' Whitening Toothpaste Set is perfect for anyone looking to brighten their smile. Put aside your drugstore toothpaste – Marvis has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As you’d expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), this Whitening Toothpaste cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape, all while gently lifting stains and preventing discolouration. All encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf, this is guaranteed to put a smile on your face (if only to show off your pearly whites…).

name: MALIN + GOETZ Vitamin b5 Hand Treatment Bergamot MALIN + GOETZ Vitamin b5 Hand Treatment Bergamot
description: An intensely replenishing cream to repair and protect from the elements, MALIN + GOETZ’s Vitamin B5 Hand Treatment soothes any stresses, eliminates dryness and helps to maintain moisture levels. And now, the formula comes in a handy (geddit?) travel size — and a delicious new ‘Bergamot’ scent. Boasting a buffet of rich and reparative extracts to offer hydration without any residue, this decadent formula’s brimming with honey and vitamin B5, alongside a medley of swiftly absorbed fatty acids to fortify delicate skin and deflect the effects of aggressors. Starring vitamin B5 and shea to nourish and moisturise, alongside sodium pca and glycerin to ward against water loss and honey to heal, this luxe treatment is ideal for softening cuticles, strengthening soft, brittle nails and conditioning even the gnarliest palms.

name: Regenerate Enamel Serum Refill 32ml Regenerate Enamel Serum Refill 32ml
description: When your enamel is under siege (whether that be from the likes of acidic fruits or sugary soft drinks) and your {Regenerate Advanced Enamel Serum Kit} is running low on serum, look no further than the Regenerate Advanced Enamel Serum Refill. Uniting two NR-5™ REGENERATE™ Advanced Enamel Serums to replenish your stash, this duo reverses the early enamel erosion process. Working to restore and regenerate tooth enamel mineral, it uses revolutionary patented ‘NR-5 Technology’, which combines calcium silicate and sodium phosphate to form a crystal structure that’s identical to hydroxyapatite — a key mineral found in dental enamel. When combined with your activator gel, the serum unleashes a concentrated boost to increase enamel hardness and improve teeth health for smiles all round.
how_to_use: Use as part of the {Regenerate Advanced Enamel Serum Kit}. Pick up your mouth tray. Apply one single thin layer of the NR-5™ REGENERATE™ Advanced Enamel Serum in the mouth tray. Add one single layer of Activator Gel into the mouth tray on top of the NR-5™ Advanced Enamel Serum. Use the mixing stick contained in the mouth tray holder and accurately mix the two ingredients. Begin the application in the dental arch of the upper jaw and insert the mouth tray. Hold the tray for 3 minutes. Once the application is over, remove the mouth tray and gently rinse your mouth with water to remove product residue. REGENERATE™ Advanced Enamel Serum should be used once a month, for three consecutive days, preferably before bedtime as part of a regime. For best results, use it in combination with the daily Advanced Toothpaste.
ingredient: NR-5 Serum: Glycerin, Calcium Silicate, PEG-8, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Aqua, PEG-60, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Monofluorophosphate, Aroma, Hydrated Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Sodium Saccharin, Polyacrylic Acid, Tin Oxide, Limonene, CI 77891. Activator Gel: Aqua, Glycerin, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Fluoride, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, CI 42090. Activator Gel contains: Sodium Fluoride (1450 ppm F)

name: Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Head Replacements - Rose Gold Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Head Replacements - Rose Gold
description: The ultimate investment into the health of your smile, the Rose Gold Sonic Toothbrush is professionally designed with both efficacy and comfort in mind, working to counter plaque and discolouration for an uber-clean look and feel. Nothing without its brush head, keep your brushing routine on its A-game with these three Sonic Head Replacements in Rose Gold. The oral health geniuses behind Spotlight Oral Care advise that you replace your brush head every three months, and if you've just realised how long overdue you are to do that then join the club... Equal parts gentle and effective in maintaining and promoting oral health, the efficient toothbrush employs high-frequency brush movements to ensure that both toothpaste and oxygen are delivered to hard-to-reach nooks and crannies; that's where the brush heads come in! Replace them regularly so that the firm but gentle bristles can get to work effectively cleaning your teeth.
how_to_use: This replacement pack contains: 3 x Spotlight Rose Gold Sonic Toothbrush Replacement Heads

name: Baxter of California Aluminium and Alcohol Free Deodorant 75g Baxter of California Aluminium and Alcohol Free Deodorant 75g
description: Established in 1965, Baxter of California is a curated collection of men’s grooming products that melds simplicity with efficacy through their edit of natural ingredient empowered formulas. Delivering lasting fresh coverage, the Aluminium & Alcohol Free Deodorant is soft on skin and tough on sweat. Calling upon tea tree and witch hazel extracts to disinfect, this solid gel formula effectively battles the bacteria that causes odorous perspiration. A blend of comfrey, yarrow and chamomile botanical extracts deliver soothing hydration to your skin for irritation-free freshness that leaves a subtle, herbal musk. The solid gel formula has a clear finish that absorbs quickly without staining or discolouring your fit. Pick from two sizes, the full size (75g) or a mini (35g) that's perfect for travelling with your go-to or discovering a firm favourite before investing in a full size.

name: Anthony Shower Sheets (12 Wipes) Anthony Shower Sheets (12 Wipes)
description: A staple in any wilderness survival kit (or, you know, a freshening touch on long-haul flights from hell), these cleansing sheets are the closest thing to a shower you can find in a nifty packette. Suitable for the whole body, these wipes come pre-moistened to instantly cleanse and refresh skin in desperate need of a wash. They call upon peppermint oil as a natural antiseptic to refresh your skin, while aloe and jojoba seed oil hydrate and nourish and glycolic acid exfoliates. Lifting dirt, sweat and unwelcome odours in one fell scrub, these convenient and effective sheets can be slipped into your backpack on camping trips, for post-gym wipe-downs or even to help you feel clean when you’re cruising at 36,000 feet.

name: Megababe Dust Puff Body Powder Puff Megababe Dust Puff Body Powder Puff
description: Anyone who struggles with sweat will have talced themselves to oblivion in their time. While effective, the cleaning up process can make it more laborious than anything else. That’s where Megababe’s Dust Puff Body Powder Puff comes in... Made with a cloud-soft polar fleece, this oversized puff makes it easy to powder your hardest-to-reach spots in a flash. Best of all, the FSC-certified cardboard case does double duty as storage and a built-in application hack — sprinkle powder in the bottom and your puff is always ready to go!

name: de Mamiel Pregnancy Facial Oil de Mamiel Pregnancy Facial Oil
description: A calming, soothing nectar of rare oils to heal and restore balance in hormonally charged or sensitive skins. Specifically blended to be safe for use during pregnancy after the first trimester. Has your skin become super sensitive since becoming pregnant? de Mamiel's fast-absorbing, silky healing oil is specially formulated to bring the bloom back to tender skin in flux. Laced with deeply nourishing yet light oils including the likes of argan, sunflower seed and rosehip soothe and renew skin thanks to their high content of fatty acids and anti-inflammatory properties. Meanwhile, the subtle blend of essential oils (think: chamomile flower, rose geranium, patchouli, benzoin and frankincense) help to calm and centre your mind without upsetting senses which are heightened during this hormonal shift. But it doesn't stop there, each of these oils also having skin-healing and balancing properties making them perfect for any kind of reactive skin that's stressed out.
how_to_use: Morning and night, after cleansing, place 4 drops into your palms and press together to warm. Cup your hands, cover your nose and mouth and breathe in deeply for a count of three before exhaling for a count of five. Now, more than ever, it is important to breathe – enjoy these moments when you can connect with yourself through your skin and to the new life within. Massage gently upwards and outwards until absorbed.

Hand blended, all-natural, stored in violet glass to preserve the vitality of the precious ingredients.

name: Tweezerman Facial Razor Replacement Blades Tweezerman Facial Razor Replacement Blades
description: Providing superior performance, the sleek Facial Razor from Tweezerman ensures easy facial hair removal without damaging your precious skin, so make sure you’re keeping your blades sharp and effective with this set of three replacement blades. Incredibly sharp to ensure swift and close shaving, the Facial Razor simply glides along your complexion — gently exfoliating dulling, dead skin cells as it does so — to leave fuzz-free, glowing skin in its wake. Ergonomically designed for easy handling, the Facial Razor is easy to wield, clean, and store — with each replacement blade fitting into the provided safety cap. Utterly sanitary, the blades are forged with stainless steel, which you can simply rinse with warm water or swipe with an alcohol wipe after use.
how_to_use: Start with clean and moisturised skin OR use while washing your face, with your face wash still on the skin. Tool care tips: Clean with alcohol to prevent infection and bacteria build-up before and after each use. Place the cap back on the razor after use and store in a dry place. Handle razor with care, blade is sharp. This item cannot be sanitised in barbicide or an autoclave. For optimal performance, replace razor blades every 2–3 months or as needed.

name: Margaret Dabbs London Firming Leg Serum Margaret Dabbs London Firming Leg Serum
description: Margaret Dabbs’ Firming Leg Serum is an innovative cooling formula that helps to boost circulation, alleviate venous decongestion, brighten and tighten legs in one fell swoop. Crammed with actives, it contains the patented Legance, which helps to reduce water retention and refine adipose tissue for leaner legs with reduced volume and circumference – all after just one application! The clever formula also helps to firm lumpiness and sagging, as well as reducing the appearance of cellulite for a slimmer-looking, toned finish. The serum also contains Abyssinian and argan oils, as well as the brand’s signature V-tonic – a powerful blend of lemon, cypress, lavandin grosso, mentha arvansis, rock rose and cistus ladaniferus essential oils – which are packed with youth-prolonging antioxidants and essential fatty acids to promote circulation and nourish your skin.
