Triggering regeneration to leave the skin looking refreshed and refined, each does-it-all cloth has phenomenal brightening, scar-fading, firming and fine line-diminishing benefits. The addition of vitamin E then protects and replenishes skin while the medley of menthol with aloe and ginseng helps soothe irritation and give sluggish cells’ a long-overdue jump-start.

name: Sun Bum Cool Down After Sun Spray Sun Bum Cool Down After Sun Spray
description: Like a crisp glass of icy cold rosé for hot summer skin, Sun Bum's Cool Down After Sun Lotion is brimming with vitamin E to repair and replenish without leaving limbs feeling greasy. You know that holiday feeling? You've lounged by the pool for the last seven hours and now you've come in for a shower – you're clean, smelling fuuuuhresh, your hair's wrapped in a towel and you're ready to change into one of the ten shoulder-baring 'essentials' you crammed in your suitcase? This after sun spritz is just that in a can – a cooling, conditioning cocktail of aloe and vitamin E that encourages skin to 'chill out' at the end of a day in the rays. Bursting with free radical-scavenging antioxidants, as well as being vegan, hypoallergenic and completely free from gluten, parabens and cruelty, this helps to reduce any redness and leave your limbs feeling cocooned in a nourishing, non-greasy veil.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Replacement Heads Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Replacement Heads
description: The ultimate investment into the health of your smile, the {Sonic Toothbrush} is professionally designed with both efficacy and comfort in mind, working to counter plaque and discolouration for an uber-clean look and feel. Nothing without its brush head, keep your brushing routine on its A-game with these three Sonic Replacement Heads. The oral health geniuses behind Spotlight Oral Care advise that you replace your brush head every three months, and if you've just realised how long overdue you are to do that then join the club... Equal parts gentle and effective in maintaining and promoting oral health, the efficient toothbrush employs high-frequency brush movements to ensure that both toothpaste and oxygen are delivered to hard-to-reach nooks and crannies; that's where the brush heads come in! Replace them regularly so that the firm but gentle bristles can get to work effectively cleaning your teeth.
how_to_use: This replacement pack contains: 3 x Spotlight Sonic Brush Replacement Heads

name: PATRICK TA Major Glow Body Oil PATRICK TA Major Glow Body Oil
description: Absolutely glow-rious, Patrick Tas Major Glow Body Oil illuminates skin with a dewy, pearlescent veil whether you apply it to your daccolletac, arms, legs or all-over for a captivating glow. Enriched with nourishing olive oil and squalane, the formula delivers a hefty moisture boost with a non-greasy reflective finish. Stabilised vitamin C works on a deeper level to boost radiance, stimulate collagen production and protect against environmental aggressors. Adding to the allure is the divine signature scent a fragrance swirled with jasmine, saffron and ambergris. There are three shades to choose between, all of which have a transparent base but with different coloured pearl reflects: A Dream has champagne reflects, warm rose A Vision has pink pearls, and deep bronze A Moment has gold pearls.
how_to_use: Spray the oil onto skin at the end of your regime for an extra glow. Focus on areas where you would like to give a radiance boost for example, daccolletac, arms and legs.
ingredient: Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isohexadecan, Silica, Tocopheryl Acetate, Squalane, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Mica, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Tin Oxide. name: Escentric Molecules Escentric 03 Body Wash Escentric Molecules Escentric 03 Body Wash
description: Echoing the vibrant, green bouquet of beloved perfume Escentric 03, this luxurious body wash combines fresh, green and 'zingy' notes that linger on the skin. Not to mention fill your bathroom with a long-lasting, intoxicating haze. Cleansing, nourishing and the perfect way to intensify your favourite Escentric Molecules fragrance, it's also completely free from parabens and sulphates, and a striking addition to every fragrance wardrobe. Layer with either Molecule or Escentric 03, to instantly amplify your allure…

name: Sarah Chapman Skinesis Overnight Body Treatment (120ml) Sarah Chapman Skinesis Overnight Body Treatment (120ml)
description: An overnight therapy infused with a cornucopia of skin-loving ingredients, Sarah Chapman's Skinesis Overnight Body Treatment is here to plump, firm and strengthen your skin. Supremely sensorial - its cashmere-like texture and rose, frangipani and jasmine scent makes it a joy to apply - this body treatment is infused with nourishing yet lightweight plant oils (think: argan, camellia flower, baobab, coconut and more). As if that wasn't enough, collagen-boosting peptides and skin-plumping, performance-proven complexes make for supple and luminous skin. Here's what Sarah herself has to say about it: 'My Overnight Facial is renowned for its instant results, divine texture and heavenly scent, inspiring me to create this unique night-time body treatment. With its irresistibly silky cashmere texture and innovative skin care technologies, this rapidly absorbing, dry serum-oil brings the incredible results of my skin care into body care."
how_to_use: Massage 4-6 pumps over the body every night. Avoid contact with eyes. If discomfort occurs, rinse with warm water. For external use only.

name: Gallinée Mouth and Microbiome Food Supplements Gallinée Mouth and Microbiome Food Supplements
description: A suckable supplement offering targeted tooth-and-mouth care on-the-go, Gallinée’s Mouth & Microbiome Supplement is both a solid mouthwash and a magic mint – refreshing your breath between meals as it bolsters the ‘good guys’ that ward against cavity-causing bacteria. With live bacteria, vitamin D3 and vitamin B8 alongside xylitol (shown to selectively seek and destroy bad bacteria), these vegan and cruelty-free tablets are made without gluten, lactose or sugar to promote healthy teeth and gums – making them perfect for popping instead of your usual breath mint. Supporting an optimal oral environment, these help to eliminate odour, while extracts of mint and verbena will leave your mouth feeling incredibly clean with a freshly brushed zing.
how_to_use: Simply take one to two tablets during the day and allow to dissolve slowly in your mouth as you would with a mint. For maximum effect, avoid brushing your teeth for 30 minutes after or before sucking the tablet, and food and drinks for 10 minutes after.
ingredient: Bulking Agent (isomalt), Gelling Agent (acacia and xanthan gum 50/50), Sweetener (xylitol), Anti-caking Agent (stearic acid), Mint Flavour, Bacteria (Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011), Verbena Flavour, Cholecalciferol (vitamin D3), Biotin (vitamin B8).

name: Escentric Molecules Escentric 02 Body Wash Escentric Molecules Escentric 02 Body Wash
description: Echoing the earthy, musky allure of beloved perfume Escentric 02, this luxurious body wash combines Ambroxan – the synthetic version of precious perfume ingredient ambergris – with grassy vetiver, and muscone (a cruelty-free alternative to musk) that lingers on the skin. Not to mention fill your bathroom with a long-lasting, intoxicating haze of scent. Cleansing, nourishing and the perfect way to intensify your favourite Escentric Molecules fragrance, this long-awaited addition to the EM story is completely free from parabens and sulphates, and a striking addition to every fragrance wardrobe. Layer with either Molecule or Escentric 02, to instantly amplify your allure…

name: Embryolisse Cicalisse SOS Restorative Cream 40ml Embryolisse Cicalisse SOS Restorative Cream 40ml
description: Rushing straight to the rescue of stressed-out complexions, Embryolisse’s Cicalisse SOS Restorative Cream helps to bolster the skin’s repair processes – soothing irritation and reducing any redness. Powered by 3% acexamic acid – shown to accelerate skin’s rehabilitative processes – alongside sodium hyaluronate to bolster moisture reservoirs and keep skin plumped and dewy, this calming and comforting cream brings relief to inflamed or reactive complexions. A thirst-quenching drink for dry, compromised skin (it’s perfect for taking the sting out of sunburn), this tube is a cabinet must-have, quickly counteracting any itchiness or dryness, while helping to heal superficial abrasions, scrapes, stings, scabs or post-wax ouches.
how_to_use: Apply morning and evening to clean, dry skin. This can be applied to face, body and lips.

name: DoDow DoDow - Sleep Aid Device DoDow DoDow - Sleep Aid Device
description: A must-have for insomniacs or those who suffer with stress-related sleep issues, Dodow is a discreet and simple to use gizmo that helps you to utilise relaxation therapy, meditation and yoga methods with little-to-no effort. Simply turn on Dodow, select your time setting (pick from an 8 minute cycle or a 20 minute cycle) and get comfy laid in bed on your back. Breath in time with the growing and shrinking light that emits onto the ceiling in a calming and soothing blue light. Dodow will reduce your breathing from 11 per minute down to 6 per minute to help you drift off worry and distraction free. Dodow aims to work quickly, effectively and naturally to counteract the effects of stress that are detrimental to sleep. It is also extremely effective from those suffering from circadian cycle sleep disorders or jet lag.

name: Marvis Rambas Wonders of the World Toothpaste 75ml Marvis Rambas Wonders of the World Toothpaste 75ml
description: Put aside your drugstore toothpaste – Marvis’ has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As you’d expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape. Unlike your bog-standard formula however, this concoction will transport you to the sunny, palm-laced sands and fruit-laden tropical islands with its blend of teeth-whitening pineapple, sweet peach, mango and mint. It’s not just the flavour that makes this a stand-out product – encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube with leafy detailing, it’ll look ever-so sophisticated and modern on your bathroom shelf. Marvi-lous, or what?!
how_to_use: Use morning and evening to brush your teeth.
ingredient: Glycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Limonene, Linalool

name: frank body Cacao Coffee Scrub frank body Cacao Coffee Scrub
description: As if we needed another reason to love chocolate, frank bodys Cacao Coffee Scrub comes along and sweeps us off our (very soft, smooth and hydrated) feet. A concoction of natural, vegan and cruelty-free ingredients, it not only smells delish, it treats dry, dull and scarred skin too. Roasted coffee grinds make up the exfoliating base, gently removing dead skin cells while improving blood flow and stimulating collagen production. The irresistible chocolatey scent comes from organic cacao extract, which is packed with antioxidants to nourish, protect and grant a radiant glow. Specially formulated to hydrate skin as well as exfoliate, the scrub contains cold pressed macadamia and sweet almond oils to replenish moisture and gently fade scarring or marks. To say were obsessed is an understatement!
how_to_use: In the shower, massage the scrub in circular motions over wet skin for a few minutes, focusing on dry areas, scars, stretch marks, breakouts or cellulite. Rinse off and pat dry.

name: ZitSticka SILKSHAKE Probiotic-Rich Body Wash ZitSticka SILKSHAKE Probiotic-Rich Body Wash
description: Carefully formulated to optimise your skin’s microbiome — helping good bacteria thrive while targeting the blemish-bringing bad guys — ZITSTICKA’s SILKSHADE Probiotic-Rich Body Wash is here to supercharge (in a gentle way!) your shower routine. Going above and beyond the average body wash, this cleansing cocktail of pre, post and probiotics balances and optimises your skin's microbiome to leave it better equipped to fend against breakouts. The endlessly luxurious lather is infused with hydrating glycerin (it’s not stripping in the slightest), antioxidant-rich coconut extract, tea tree to diminish the visibility of zits and a medley of omega fatty acids to support your skin barrier, calm irritation and reduce breakouts.

description: Yet to luxuriate in ESPA's sublime range of body oils? Presented in a signature ESPA box, this Body Oil Collection stars six sized-to-try vials of their therapeutic, skin-conditioning formulas — making it the ultimate gift for yourself or a lucky loved one... Crafted with the very best of nature’s purest and most effective essential oils, these oils boast varying, mood-lifting qualities: Detoxifying is made with cypress and juniper berry to purify and uplift; Resistance harnesses eucalyptus and tea tree; Restorative has a comforting blend of rose geranium and lavender; Soothing melds myrrh and sandalwood to promote a restful state of mind; Energising has a cocktail of peppermint and eucalyptus to recharge and stimulate, while Fitness has an invigorating profile of clove bud, lavender and eucalyptus. These bespoke blends are specially created by their aromatherapists to reinstate feelings of calm and balance while leaving your skin intensely nourished, soft and supple.

description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. We’ll take a lifetime supply!
how_to_use: For daily usage and sun exposition. Shake before use. Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure. Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.

Ticking all our boxes and more, this is heading straight into our holiday haul *adds to bag*.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml
description: Reactive skins rejoice! For La Roche-Posay have specifically formulated this treatment toner to help regulate oil without disrupting your skins natural balance. Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.
how_to_use: Apply toner gently with a damp cotton wool pad to the face and neck, morning and evening.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Toothbrush Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Toothbrush
description: Providing a deep clean that reaches even the most inaccessible parts of your mouth, this Sonic Toothbrush from Spotlight Oral Care boasts three settings - 'Sensitive', 'Clean' and 'White' - so you can target plaque and discolouration as you please. Equal parts gentle and effective in maintaining and promoting oral health, this efficient tool employs high-frequency brush movements to ensure that both toothpaste and oxygen are delivered to hard-to-reach nooks and crannies. It has clever 2-minute timer to ensure that you hit your brushing quota every time as well as an impressively long-lasting battery, so you won't need to fret if you forget to hook it up to the charger one night. As for the settings, you can choose between 'Sensitive' (31,000 reps/min) for gentle care, 'Clean' (41,000 reps/min) for your standard scrub and 'White' (48,000 reps/min) for intense surface stain removal. Get ready to brush up!
how_to_use: Pick a setting that suits your needs. Place the brush on the area of the teeth where it meets the gum. Start on the top right on the outside of the teeth, near the cheek and work your way around to the top left side. Repeat for the inside of the teeth (near the roof of your mouth). Brush the biting surfaces of your teeth. Repeat for the lower teeth. Brushing should take 2 mins. Please note: The Sonic Toothbrushis supplied with a British standard plug.

name: MOLTON BROWN Heavenly Gingerlily Bath & Shower Gel MOLTON BROWN Heavenly Gingerlily Bath & Shower Gel
description: Housed in Molton Brown's understated yet effortlessly chic bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of Bath & Shower Gel is bursting with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous good-to-skin ingredients that leave limbs soft, supple and cleansed while each of the quintessentially Molton Brown fragrances lingers on skin all day long. Yet to discover your firm favourite? Prepare to fall head over heels for the Heavenly Gingerlily Bath & Shower Gel. A concoction of fragrant lily, warming ginger and cardamon, this heavenly scent is bound to result in compliments and guests asking where they can pick up a bottle!
how_to_use: Pour underneath flowing water to create an immersive ritual; deeply cleansing and enveloping skin in exhilarating fragrance.

name: Bondi Sands Aero Self Tanning Foam - Ultra Dark 225ml Bondi Sands Aero Self Tanning Foam - Ultra Dark 225ml
description: Introducing Bondi Sands Aero Self Tanning Foam Ultra Dark, a must-have for those looking for the brand's deepest, bronzed glow, this weightless formula is as light as air and touch dry in seconds. Achieve a deep bronzed, Australian tan every single time with Bondi Sands Aero family‚ Aero Self Tanning Foam Ultra Dark. With a weightless, quick dry formula, Aero Ultra Dark is as light as air and touch dry in seconds, absorbing quickly into skin for your most controlled and comfortable self tanning experience yet! The Bondi Sands Aero formula contains dual-action tanning actives to achieve a deep and long-lasting colour that you'll adore. Enriched with vitamin E and jojoba, Aero Ultra Dark intensely hydrates and nourishes, resulting in prolonged tan longevity.

description: Perfect for use on the body, this The GloPRO BODY MicroTip Attachment Head features 1680 tiny 0.5mm microneedles to stimulate the skin’s natural healing response, enhancing cellular turnover to lift, firm and smooth skin on the arms, legs, torso and bum. description: Reducing product wastage by delivering the perfect amount of nail, cuticle and hand care in one teeny, tiny, portable shell, the NailKale Superfood Nail Oil Capsules house a cocktail of powerhouse ingredients in a non-sticky serum that hydrates, heals and helps hands in need. Here's to a soothing shower companion and the silky, soft skin it delivers! *clinks glasses*

name: Elvie Pelvic Floor Trainer Elvie Pelvic Floor Trainer
description: There's a reason why experts and health authorities across the world recommend Elvie to women with pelvic floor problems - it's a hi-tech, comfortable and results-driven device that ensures women make the most of their pelvic floor exercises. Plenty of factors can weaken the pelvic floor muscles, including pregnancy, childbirth, ageing and high-impact sport, to the point that 1 in 3 women experience issues with them - and up to 80% of expectant mums. Designed to strengthen these muscles, the trainer can help to improve bladder control and sex, as well as preparing for childbirth and speeding up postnatal recovery. How does it work? The bulb of the tracker features force and motion sensors to measure the movement of your muscles as they contract and release. This is inserted into the vagina with the tail remaining outside and facing forwards (a little like a tampon), then via Bluetooth it connects to an app on your phone that will guide you through a series of five-minute workouts - from target hitting to strength exercises. There are four different levels to try - Training, Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced - all of which have been carefully designed with the help of physiotherapists and experts. The app also allows you to track your progress, set yourself targets and schedule reminders - plus it's fun, so it'll help you to stay motivated! Incredibly discreet, the device comes in a sleek carry case that doubles up as a charger so you can pop it in your on-the-go bag for use anytime, anywhere. 100% waterproof, the trainer is made with medical grade silicone making it incredibly durable and safe.
how_to_use: Elvie Trainer is easy to insert: place the bulb inside like a tampon with the tail remaining outside, facing forward. Be sure to fully insert the bulb, but don't push it too high up. You can use water-based lubricant if you wish. We recommend you use the trainer either standing or lying, legs apart. If you find Elvie Trainer is slipping out or moving about inside, please try using Elvie Trainer with the optional cover. We recommend all women use Elvie Trainer both with and without at first to decide which provides the most comfortable fit for them. Also try changing position - if Elvie Trainer is slipping out, you might want to try lying for a workout, and see if you notice a difference. As with all exercise we encourage women to set realistic goals, so we recommend using Elvie Trainer three times a week as a minimum. However, if you want to use Elvie Trainer even more then that's even better! Made from a very hygienic and durable material, it can be cleaned using warm soapy water. During normal use it will only need charging about once a month and can be stored in the portable carry case between uses. You can use Elvie during pregnancy as long as you are not experiencing from any complications. Every pregnancy is unique so if you are unsure please consult your qualified medical professional before use. You can use Elvie Trainer after your qualified medical professional has advised that you are ready to resume to normal activities at your postpartum checkup, this is usually around 6 weeks after giving birth. Elvie Trainer is safe to use if you have a coil or IUD fitted.
ingredient: Medical Grade Silicone

name: ZitSticka Fizz Fountain Multi-exfoliant Body Scrub 180ml ZitSticka Fizz Fountain Multi-exfoliant Body Scrub 180ml
description: Extend the same level of care to your limbs as you do to your face with ZITSTICKA’s FIZZ FOUNTAIN Multi-Exfoliant Body Scrub: an exfoliating polish that shifts dead skin cells, unclogs pores and leaves skin feeling silky soft. Powered by a cocktail of physical and chemicals exfoliants, the supercharged scrub refines and smooths as it combats pesky body blemishes. Salicylic acid targets deep within your pores, clearing breakout-inducing dirt, while lactic and glycolic acid dissolve dulling dead skin cells. Pumice grains work on the surface to physically (yet gently!) refine the texture of your skin. The final flourish is an infusion of niacinamide that works to counteract redness and irritation, leaving you ready and raring to show some skin.
how_to_use: Using a circular motion, massage FIZZ FOUNTAIN™ onto your body, concentrating on rough or textured areas. Rinse when done. Use 1-3 times per week. Avoid open cuts or wounds. For best results, use in tandem with SILKSHAKE™ body wash.
ingredient: Aqua, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Pumice, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Propanediol, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Oil, Salicylic Acid, Quartz, Sodium Gluconate, Tocopheryl Acetate.

Packed with ceramides to keep skin looking strong, smooth, supple and hydrated while protecting against moisture loss, this über-lightweight and restorative mineral sunscreen also boasts antioxidants and vitamin E – ensuring your complexion is kept safe from the sun and other environmental aggressors. As much as we love the sun (and the ice creams, shorts and holidays that come with it), it can cause premature damage to the skin – think: fine lines and hyperpigmentation. description: Easy to apply, rapidly absorbable and never sticky or greasy, the lightweight Sunscreen Mousse SPF30 Kids works with the epidermis to deliver both immediate and lasting protection against UVA and UVB rays for up to six hours. (That’s a lot of worry-free adventure time for your little ones!) Exceptionally water-resistant and free of parabens, nanoparticles and perfumes, this formula is ideal for sensitive and delicate young skin. With a quick drying-time and invisible, matte finish, this hydrating mousse actually forms an innovative protective barrier that mimics skin’s natural defences – providing extraordinary protection without clogging pores or sitting on the surface of your skin. Gentle, hypoallergenic, suitable for use from just six months old and totally smudge-proof (even when up against towel rub-downs post swim!) the Sunscreen Mousse SPF30 Kids lasts twice as long as cream formulas and helps to prevent future skin damage. Now you just need a holiday to go with it…
how_to_use: For children younger than 16 years, EVY Technology always recommends SPF 30 or higher. Even children with darker skin should be protected with high UVA protection, because children’s skin is thinner. Reapplication: Thanks to the patented skincare technology, EVY is absorbed into the entire epidermis, rather than sitting on the skin's surface. This results in a much longer-lasting protection. However, in line with regulations, EVY do advise you to reapply frequently, especially as it's easy to miss a spot during the first time around. Recycling: Simply break off the plastic top for plastic recycling and place the aluminium bottle in the metal recycling bin.
ingredient: Aqua, Butane, Propylene Glycol, Octocrylene, Palmitic Acid, Isobutane, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, PVP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Stearic Acid, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, PVP, Triethanolamine, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Propane, Tocopherol.

name: Frank Body Clean Deodorant Cucumber and Green Tea 75g Frank Body Clean Deodorant Cucumber and Green Tea 75g
description: With a gentle ‘Cucumber and Green Tea’ fragrance that won’t interfere with your body’s natural chemistry, the Clean Deodorant is the ‘natural’ deodorant for people that are a little bit sceptical of natural deodorants. By removing aluminium from the equation, frank body has created an effective roll-on formula designed to prevent odour while taking your underarms back to basics. Sweating is a (very normal!) function, intended to help keep your body temperature in check. Without aluminium, armpits are able to ‘breathe’ as they’re supposed to, which in turn helps to regulate and slow down sweat production. So, the first week or two after making the switch might feel a little sweatier than normal, but trust us, stick with it and soon enough you can expect soothed pits and last-all-day freshness.
how_to_use: Roll on to clean underarms in circular motions.
ingredient: Propylene Glycol, Sodium Stearate, Triethyl Citrate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-5 Oleate, Coco-Glucoside, Water (Aqua), Fragrance (Parfum), Stearic Acid, Tocopherol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil.

name: Baxter of California Exfoliating Body Bar Travel Size Baxter of California Exfoliating Body Bar Travel Size
description: Established in 1965, Baxter of California is a curated collection of men’s grooming products that melds simplicity with efficacy through their edit of natural ingredient empowered formulas. Ultra-cleansing and rapidly refining, the Exfoliating Body Bar helps to smooth rough and uneven texture. Formulated with ultra-fine particles of jojoba meal and crushed olive seed, the bar lifts away rough patches and encourages the natural renewal of skin cells for seriously smooth skin. Easily lathered and never drying, this cleansing bar hydrates and refreshes as it buffs away uneven texture. What’s more, the blend of cedarwood and oakmoss leaves behind a subtle musk that seals the deal… Pick from two sizes, the full size (198g) or a mini (28g) that's perfect for travelling with your go-to or discovering a firm favourite before investing in a full size.
how_to_use: In the shower, moisten bar soap. Massage onto wet skin in circular motions to create rich lather. For use on the body only, avoid your face.
ingredient: Sodium Palm Kernelate, Aqua / Water, Sodium Palmate, Potassium Palm Kernelate, Palm Kernel Acid, Pumice, Parfum / Fragrance, Potassium Palmate, Coconut Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Powder / Jojoba Seed Powder, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Palm Acid, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Olea Europaea Seed Powder / Olive Seed Powder, Limonene, Eugenol, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Linalool, Ci 61570 / Green 5, Ci 10316 / Ext. Yellow.

name: Coola Environmental Repair Radical Recovery After Sun Lotion Coola Environmental Repair Radical Recovery After Sun Lotion
description: An ultra-convenient and sunny delight from the creators of clinically-tested, broad spectrum natural and organic based sunscreens, the Radical Recovery Moisturizing Lotion is a must-have after a day spent lounging under the sun's warm rays. Jam-packed with powerful antioxidants and nourishing, soothing ingredients like sunflower oil, calming aloe vera, anti-inflammatory lavender oil and refreshing rosemary extract, this vegan and reef-friendly formula ensures skin heals and repairs—taking it back to its tip-top condition, no matter the weather.
how_to_use: Apply liberally and frequently after sun exposure.
ingredient: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Glucoside, Saccharomyces/Agave Americana Leaf Ferment Filtrate**, Cetyl Palmitate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Oil*, Citrus Sinensis (Sweet Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Reticulata (Mandarin Red) Peel Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Cedrus Atlantica (Cedar) Wood Oil, Xanthan Gum, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol. *Ingredients from Organic Farming **Made using Organic Ingredients

name: Molton Brown Fiery Pink Pepper Bath and Shower Gel 500ml Molton Brown Fiery Pink Pepper Bath and Shower Gel 500ml
description: Housed in Molton Brown's famously understated (yet effortlessly chic!) bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of Fiery Pink Pepper Bath & Shower Gel is bursting with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous, good-to-skin ingredients that leave limbs soft, supple and cleansed. With a fragrance that will linger on skin all day long, this sell-out cleanser (in a new, bigger size!) is sure to evoke “oohs” and “aahs” with every use. In fact, prepare to fall head over heels for the spicy concoction of ginger, patchouli, vanilla and grapefruit – a unique, heavenly blend that acts as a welcome escape as you lather and rinse the day’s dirt away, and is bound to result in endless compliments…
how_to_use: Pour underneath flowing water to create an immersive ritual – deeply cleansing and enveloping skin in exhilarating fragrance. Once you’ve used every delightful drop, be sure to recycle the bottle! Unfortunately the cap and pump are not currently recyclable.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Laureth-4, Fragrance / Parfum, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Lauryl Alcohol, Myristyl Alcohol, Peg-18 Glyceryl Oleate/Cocoate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hydroxycitronellal, Citral, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Phytate, Tocopherol, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Sorbic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Red 33 / C.I. 17200, Yellow 6 / C.I. 15985, Blue 1 / C.I. 42090, Red 4 / C.I. 14700.

name: Anthony Shower Sheets (12 Wipes) Anthony Shower Sheets (12 Wipes)
description: A staple in any wilderness survival kit (or, you know, a freshening touch on long-haul flights from hell), these cleansing sheets are the closest thing to a shower you can find in a nifty packette. Suitable for the whole body, these wipes come pre-moistened to instantly cleanse and refresh skin in desperate need of a wash. They call upon peppermint oil as a natural antiseptic to refresh your skin, while aloe and jojoba seed oil hydrate and nourish and glycolic acid exfoliates. Lifting dirt, sweat and unwelcome odours in one fell scrub, these convenient and effective sheets can be slipped into your backpack on camping trips, for post-gym wipe-downs or even to help you feel clean when you’re cruising at 36,000 feet.
how_to_use: Tear open, and remove the moist wipe. Unfold oversized shower sheet and wipe directly over the areas that you would like to cleanse, refresh and deodorize. Individually wrapped for freshness and portability. Avoid contact with eyes.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Gluconolactone, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Glycolic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum (Fragrance), Calcium Gluconate, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol

name: Embryolisse Rich Cream Milk for the Body 6.76 fl. oz Embryolisse Rich Cream Milk for the Body 6.76 fl. oz
description: A dual-action formula that works to nourish parched pores while simultaneously repairing the driest of skin, the Rich-Cream Milk For The Body is formulated with shea butter, beeswax and sandalwood and barley oil to alleviate discomfort and leave the skin feeling smooth, soothed and toned.
how_to_use: Apply Embryolisse Laboratories Rich Cream Milk to the body, paying particular attention to the driest areas.
ingredient: Aqua. Octyl Cocoate. Cyclopentasiloxane. Paraffinum Liquidum. Glycerin. Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone. Santalum Album, Phellodendron Amurense, Hordeum Distichon. Butyrospermum Parkii. Cera Alba. Tocopheryl Acetate. Microcristallin Wax. Allantoin. Sodium Chloride. Chlorphenesin. Methylisothiazolinone. Parfum. 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol.

name: Megababe Dust Puff Body Powder Puff Megababe Dust Puff Body Powder Puff
description: Anyone who struggles with sweat will have talced themselves to oblivion in their time. While effective, the cleaning up process can make it more laborious than anything else. That’s where Megababe’s Dust Puff Body Powder Puff comes in... Made with a cloud-soft polar fleece, this oversized puff makes it easy to powder your hardest-to-reach spots in a flash. Best of all, the FSC-certified cardboard case does double duty as storage and a built-in application hack — sprinkle powder in the bottom and your puff is always ready to go!
how_to_use: Sprinkle powder directly on puff, tap to remove excess and gently apply to skin. To clean, hand wash and lay flat to dry.

name: Sun Bum Cool Down After Sun Spray Sun Bum Cool Down After Sun Spray
description: Like a crisp glass of icy cold rosé for hot summer skin, Sun Bum's Cool Down After Sun Lotion is brimming with vitamin E to repair and replenish without leaving limbs feeling greasy. You know that holiday feeling? You've lounged by the pool for the last seven hours and now you've come in for a shower – you're clean, smelling fuuuuhresh, your hair's wrapped in a towel and you're ready to change into one of the ten shoulder-baring 'essentials' you crammed in your suitcase? This after sun spritz is just that in a can – a cooling, conditioning cocktail of aloe and vitamin E that encourages skin to 'chill out' at the end of a day in the rays. Bursting with free radical-scavenging antioxidants, as well as being vegan, hypoallergenic and completely free from gluten, parabens and cruelty, this helps to reduce any redness and leave your limbs feeling cocooned in a nourishing, non-greasy veil.
how_to_use: Apply generously to all areas of the skin. Gently massage into any affected areas. For best results, apply right after sun burn occurs or before sun exposure. Reapply as frequently as you like.
ingredient: Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Matricaria Chamomilla (Chamomile / German Chamomile) Flower Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Mineral Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate.

name: Clé de Peau Beauté Exclusive UV Protective Cream SPF 50 50ml Clé de Peau Beauté Exclusive UV Protective Cream SPF 50 50ml
description: Offering SPF 50+ PA++++ defence against the sun's UVA and UVB rays, this anti-pollution sunscreen seamlessly blends into skin and works with their 'Intuitive Skin Theory' to protect against environmental stress, while delivering a high dose of hydration. Luxuriously creamy yet lightweight, this fast-absorbing cream feels soft on skin and helps protect against skin stressors like UV rays, dryness, and air pollution. Asian ginseng extract and antioxidant ginkgo biloba leaf extract are infused to give the appearance of healthy-looking skin while flooding skin with moisture. The secret ingredient? The exclusive Cellular IC Normalizer that works to encourage radiance and support a healthy, balanced complexion. Leaving a subtle, fresh scent inspired by natural rose and fruity notes of grapefruit and peach, this velvety-smooth cream is the perfect first step in your foundation routine as it settles with a dewy finish.
how_to_use: Smooth cream over skin, using an appropriate amount for thorough even coverage. When applying to face, use as the final step of your morning skincare regimen. For effective removal of sunscreen from skin, wash off using a rich lathering cleanser.
ingredient: Water(Aqua/Eau), Polysilicone-15, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Octocrylene, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Dimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Behenyl Alcohol, Dipropylene Glycol, Polybutylene Glycol/Ppg-9/1 Copolymer, Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Triethanolamine, Benzophenone-3, Trehalose, Beheneth-20, Phenoxyethanol, Stearyl Alcohol, Silica, Fragrance (Parfum), Alcohol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carbomer, Sodium Metaphosphate, Polyquaternium-51, Limonene, Trisodium Edta, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Linalool, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Saxifraga Sarmentosa Extract, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Mica, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Thymus Serpillum Extract, Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract, Talc, Hydrolyzed Silk, 2-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Uncaria Gambir Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Garcinia Mangostana Bark Extract(Garcinia Mangostana), Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract, Tocopherol, Theanine, Hydrolyzed Conchiolin Protein.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Replacement Heads Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Replacement Heads
description: The ultimate investment into the health of your smile, the {Sonic Toothbrush} is professionally designed with both efficacy and comfort in mind, working to counter plaque and discolouration for an uber-clean look and feel. Nothing without its brush head, keep your brushing routine on its A-game with these three Sonic Replacement Heads. The oral health geniuses behind Spotlight Oral Care advise that you replace your brush head every three months, and if you've just realised how long overdue you are to do that then join the club... Equal parts gentle and effective in maintaining and promoting oral health, the efficient toothbrush employs high-frequency brush movements to ensure that both toothpaste and oxygen are delivered to hard-to-reach nooks and crannies; that's where the brush heads come in! Replace them regularly so that the firm but gentle bristles can get to work effectively cleaning your teeth.
how_to_use: This replacement pack contains: 3 x Spotlight Sonic Brush Replacement Heads

name: Silk'n ToothWave Refill Extra Soft 2 Pack - White (Various Sizes) Silk'n ToothWave Refill Extra Soft 2 Pack - White (Various Sizes)
description: Stock up on the ToothWave Refill Extra Soft 2 Pack and enjoy the fresh, intense - and yet gentle - clean of the ToothWave toothbrush for longer. With an extra soft finish, these two refill heads are designed to go easy on your teeth and gums, making them perfect for anyone with any sensitivity. Powered by mild radio frequency waves, the ToothWave promises to remove plaque from the surface of your teeth, while also reducing tartar, discolouration, stains, gum inflammation and gum bleeding. Oh and did we mention it makes your smile whiter too? That's all down to 'DentalRF™ Technology', which sends mild radio frequency waves consisting of charged molecules to the surface of each of your teeth and molars. These molecules destabilise the strong bonds that attach impurities (like tartar, stains or plaque) to the tooth surface, seriously reducing them in the process. The soft bristles are easy on gums to avoid inflammation or irritation (while still being effective) and you can pick from one of three vibration speeds for a really bespoke clean.

name: PATRICK TA Major Glow Body Oil PATRICK TA Major Glow Body Oil
description: Absolutely glow-rious, Patrick Tas Major Glow Body Oil illuminates skin with a dewy, pearlescent veil whether you apply it to your daccolletac, arms, legs or all-over for a captivating glow. Enriched with nourishing olive oil and squalane, the formula delivers a hefty moisture boost with a non-greasy reflective finish. Stabilised vitamin C works on a deeper level to boost radiance, stimulate collagen production and protect against environmental aggressors. Adding to the allure is the divine signature scent a fragrance swirled with jasmine, saffron and ambergris. There are three shades to choose between, all of which have a transparent base but with different coloured pearl reflects: A Dream has champagne reflects, warm rose A Vision has pink pearls, and deep bronze A Moment has gold pearls.
how_to_use: Spray the oil onto skin at the end of your regime for an extra glow. Focus on areas where you would like to give a radiance boost for example, daccolletac, arms and legs.
ingredient: Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isohexadecan, Silica, Tocopheryl Acetate, Squalane, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Mica, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Tin Oxide. May Contain +/-: Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491/77492 (Iron Oxides).

name: Escentric Molecules Escentric 03 Body Wash Escentric Molecules Escentric 03 Body Wash
description: Echoing the vibrant, green bouquet of beloved perfume Escentric 03, this luxurious body wash combines fresh, green and 'zingy' notes that linger on the skin. Not to mention fill your bathroom with a long-lasting, intoxicating haze. Cleansing, nourishing and the perfect way to intensify your favourite Escentric Molecules fragrance, it's also completely free from parabens and sulphates, and a striking addition to every fragrance wardrobe. Layer with either Molecule or Escentric 03, to instantly amplify your allure…

name: Sarah Chapman Skinesis Overnight Body Treatment (120ml) Sarah Chapman Skinesis Overnight Body Treatment (120ml)
description: An overnight therapy infused with a cornucopia of skin-loving ingredients, Sarah Chapman's Skinesis Overnight Body Treatment is here to plump, firm and strengthen your skin. Supremely sensorial - its cashmere-like texture and rose, frangipani and jasmine scent makes it a joy to apply - this body treatment is infused with nourishing yet lightweight plant oils (think: argan, camellia flower, baobab, coconut and more). As if that wasn't enough, collagen-boosting peptides and skin-plumping, performance-proven complexes make for supple and luminous skin. Here's what Sarah herself has to say about it: 'My Overnight Facial is renowned for its instant results, divine texture and heavenly scent, inspiring me to create this unique night-time body treatment. With its irresistibly silky cashmere texture and innovative skin care technologies, this rapidly absorbing, dry serum-oil brings the incredible results of my skin care into body care."
how_to_use: Massage 4-6 pumps over the body every night. Avoid contact with eyes. If discomfort occurs, rinse with warm water. For external use only.
ingredient: Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Sorbitan Laurate, C18-36 Acid Glycol Ester, C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Lactic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Lupinus Albus Seed Extract, Parfum (Fragrance), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Geranylgeranylisopropanol, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Teprenone, Paullinia Cupana Seed Extract, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Eugenol, Farnesol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal.

name: Gallinée Mouth and Microbiome Food Supplements Gallinée Mouth and Microbiome Food Supplements
description: A suckable supplement offering targeted tooth-and-mouth care on-the-go, Gallinée’s Mouth & Microbiome Supplement is both a solid mouthwash and a magic mint – refreshing your breath between meals as it bolsters the ‘good guys’ that ward against cavity-causing bacteria. With live bacteria, vitamin D3 and vitamin B8 alongside xylitol (shown to selectively seek and destroy bad bacteria), these vegan and cruelty-free tablets are made without gluten, lactose or sugar to promote healthy teeth and gums – making them perfect for popping instead of your usual breath mint. Supporting an optimal oral environment, these help to eliminate odour, while extracts of mint and verbena will leave your mouth feeling incredibly clean with a freshly brushed zing.
how_to_use: Simply take one to two tablets during the day and allow to dissolve slowly in your mouth as you would with a mint. For maximum effect, avoid brushing your teeth for 30 minutes after or before sucking the tablet, and food and drinks for 10 minutes after.
ingredient: Bulking Agent (isomalt), Gelling Agent (acacia and xanthan gum 50/50), Sweetener (xylitol), Anti-caking Agent (stearic acid), Mint Flavour, Bacteria (Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011), Verbena Flavour, Cholecalciferol (vitamin D3), Biotin (vitamin B8).

name: Escentric Molecules Escentric 02 Body Wash Escentric Molecules Escentric 02 Body Wash
description: Echoing the earthy, musky allure of beloved perfume Escentric 02, this luxurious body wash combines Ambroxan – the synthetic version of precious perfume ingredient ambergris – with grassy vetiver, and muscone (a cruelty-free alternative to musk) that lingers on the skin. Not to mention fill your bathroom with a long-lasting, intoxicating haze of scent. Cleansing, nourishing and the perfect way to intensify your favourite Escentric Molecules fragrance, this long-awaited addition to the EM story is completely free from parabens and sulphates, and a striking addition to every fragrance wardrobe. Layer with either Molecule or Escentric 02, to instantly amplify your allure…

name: DeoDoc Soothing Heat Patches DeoDoc Soothing Heat Patches
description: Cramps getting you down? These specially formulated Soothing Heat Patches from DeoDoc are designed to offer comfort exactly where you need it. With three in each pack, these thin, stick-on patches target any discomfort from menstruation and more via gentle heat. Think of them as a kind of on-the-go hot water bottle, developed alongside a team of gynaecologists. Comfortable to wear and easy to attach to your underwear or clothes, within just minutes of you applying a patch they begin to heat up, activated by oxygen in the air. The best part? They offer heat for up to eight hours, meaning all-day-long relief, no matter where you are.
how_to_use: Remove patch from its individual package. Peel off protective film that covers the adhesive. Attach patch to clothing (full cloth underwear, pants, leggings, etc.) and avoid direct contact with skin. Leave on for up to 8 hours. Do not use on lace, mesh or transparent materials, underwear, etc.). Heat is immediately activated when each individual package is opened. The patch is activated by oxygen in the air even if the protective film has not been removed.
ingredient: Iron Powder, Activated Carbon, Aqua (Water), Vermiculit, Salt.

name: ESPA Body Oil Collection ESPA Body Oil Collection
description: Yet to luxuriate in ESPA's sublime range of body oils? Presented in a signature ESPA box, this Body Oil Collection stars six sized-to-try vials of their therapeutic, skin-conditioning formulas — making it the ultimate gift for yourself or a lucky loved one... Crafted with the very best of nature’s purest and most effective essential oils, these oils boast varying, mood-lifting qualities: Detoxifying is made with cypress and juniper berry to purify and uplift; Resistance harnesses eucalyptus and tea tree; Restorative has a comforting blend of rose geranium and lavender; Soothing melds myrrh and sandalwood to promote a restful state of mind; Energising has a cocktail of peppermint and eucalyptus to recharge and stimulate, while Fitness has an invigorating profile of clove bud, lavender and eucalyptus. These bespoke blends are specially created by their aromatherapists to reinstate feelings of calm and balance while leaving your skin intensely nourished, soft and supple.
how_to_use: After your bath or shower, massage the oil of choice into your skin in firm, upward movements towards the heart until fully absorbed.

Detoxifying: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Oil, Limonene, Eucalyptus Citriodora Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Melaleuca Viridiflora Leaf Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citronellol, Linalool, Citral, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Juniperus Communis Fruit Oil, Beta-Carotene, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate. name: Molton Brown Milk Musk Bath and Shower Gel 300ml Molton Brown Milk Musk Bath and Shower Gel 300ml
description: Curating an olfactory offering that is at once comforting and enticing, Molton Brown’s Milk Musk Bath & Shower Gel has a serene scent profile of pear, musk and cedarwood. Housed in Molton Brown's understated yet effortlessly chic bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of Bath & Shower Gel is bursting with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous good-to-skin ingredients that leave limbs soft, supple and cleansed while each of the quintessentially Molton Brown fragrances lingers on skin all day long. Yet to discover your firm favourite? Prepare to fall head over heels for the Delicious Milk Musk Bath & Shower Gel. This cossetting blend has fresh top notes of pear and peach that sink into a heart of soft musk, ambroxan, vanilla and milk. As for the base notes, the earthy white cedarwood melds with tonka bean for a warming scent.
how_to_use: Pour underneath flowing water to create an immersive ritual; deeply cleansing and enveloping skin in exhilarating fragrance.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Kids' Toothpaste 100ml Spotlight Oral Care Kids' Toothpaste 100ml
description: Elevating oral care (about time!) with mindful formulas and thoughtful packaging, Spotlight Oral Care provides 360Ëš tooth and gum care, while brightening (and whitening!) your smile to boost your oral health and beauty. Specifically for little ones (ages 2 7), Spotlight Oral Cares Toothpaste for Children is playfully housed, has a mild minty taste and is powered by fluoride to strengthen enamel and shield from decay to protect against cavities (no fillings needed). Harnessing the latest developments in oral care to strengthen teeth and cherish gums, this fresh-flavoured paste is contained in completely recyclable packaging minimising the detrimental contribution of dental care products to landfill (and leaving your conscience as clean as your teeth).
how_to_use: Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste to your toothbrush. Brush top and bottom teeth and spit out. Repeat twice daily. Supervise childrens brushing and rinsing to minimise swallowing. Suitable for children aged 2-7.
ingredient: Sorbitol, Aqua, Hydrated Silica, Pentasodium Triphosphate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Monofluorophosphate, Sodium Saccharin, CI 77891.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Water Flosser Spotlight Oral Care Water Flosser
description: An effective plaque-shifting tool that rivals the payoff of a trip to the hygienist, all in the comfort of your home, Spotlight Oral Care's Water Flosser harnesseswater pressure and varying pulsations to help remove bacteria that resides between your teeth and below the gum line - areas that are notoriously difficult to reach with traditional brushing and flossing! It acts as a more gentle alternative to floss that's less likely to cause gum inflammation or bleeding plus, it actually helps to stimulate gums and improve circulation.Shown to be five times more effective at removing plaque between teeth versus manual floss, water flossers are an effective way to boost your oral health. Beyond removing daily debris, it's also suited to cleaning around dental bridges, braces, implants and crowns too!
how_to_use: Fill the water tank with lukewarm water and close the seal shut. Place the tip inside your mouth, lean over the sink and turn the unit on. Aim the tip at the gumline and work your way from your back teeth towards your front teeth, spraying water along the gumline. Floss both front and back of each tooth, pausing briefly between each tooth. Partially close your mouth to minimise water splashing, letting the water flow out of your mouth into the sink. Please note: The Sonic Toothbrushis supplied with a British standard plug.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Dental Floss for Gum Health Spotlight Oral Care Dental Floss for Gum Health
description: Giving your gums the attention they deserve, Spotlight Oral Care's Dental Floss for Gum Health helps to dislodge daily debris, fend against dental decay and counter bleeding, inflamed gums. Made from recycled ocean plastic and powered by chloroheixidine (an active ingredient that's clinically proven to tackle gum bleeding), this floss effectively cleans plaque, debris and residual food that threatens to mar your smile. In the process, it also helps to improve gum and overall oral health. If that wasn't enough, this daily essential is the perfect foil for unpleasant breath and tender, inflamed gums that trouble your day-to-day life.
how_to_use: Unwind approx 15inches of floss. Wind most of the floss around both of your middle fingers, leaving only about 1 to 2 inches of floss for your teeth. Hold the floss taut with your thumbs and index fingers. Slide the floss gently between the gum and the tooth. The floss should be held firmly against the tooth and rub along the surface of the tooth with a gentle up and down movement and into a C shape under the gum. Follow this process for the remaining teeth.
ingredient: Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Hydrogenated Rosinate, VP/VA Copolymer, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, Aroma, Limonene, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharine, Sucralose, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Linalool

name: Megababe No More Sweat Duo Megababe No More Sweat Duo
description: Skin-soothing and talc-free, these are your secret weapons against the dreaded grey t-shirt marks that usually keep your arms firmly by your sides… you can finally wave your hands in the air like you just don’t care and without the fear of saturated clothing! Absorbing moisture in an instant, this body powder can be used from top-to-toe to keep sweat from saturating your shoes and seeping into your favourite item of clothing. Lightly scented with lavender and a skin-soothing infusion of aloe and chamomile you can shake away sweat stains and get back to enjoying your hot gal summer uninterrupted. Even better? The Dust Puff’s FSC-certified cardboard case doubles up as your cute cloud-covered puff store and built-in application hack… sprinkle your powder in the bottom and your puff is ready to go whenever you need!
how_to_use: Body Dust Toe-To-Toe Powder:Shake well & apply directly to skin, or sprinkle inside clothes/shoes. For use wherever body sweat is an issue! Best on concealed areas as powder is lightly visible on skin. Dust Puff: Sprinkle powder directly on puff, tap to remove excess and gently apply to skin. To clean, hand wash and lay flat to dry.
ingredient: Body Dust Toe-To-Toe Powder: Zea Mays (Corn Starch),*Sodium Bicarbonate, Maranta Arundinacea (Arrowroot) Powder,*Kaolin Clay, Lavendula Hybrida (Lavandin) Oil,*Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Tocopherol, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Oil. *Certified Organic.

name: Resorè Body Towel Resorè Body Towel
description: Suitable for all skin types, Resoracs Body Towel is an hypoallergenic, antibacterial towel that's designed to protect your skins health and diminish transference of damaging bad guys. Made from the softest, most advanced (and sustainably sourced) plant-based cellulose fibres, each hydrophilic (water-loving!) towel leaves skin hydrated, rejuvenated and supported while the active ingredients Silverbac and Lyocell combine to tackle germs and mouldy odours while inhibiting the spread and incubation of 99.9% of bacteria. The Lyocell and Rayon Bamboo make the texture hypoallergenic gently removing oil, bacteria and sebum without ruffling skins feathers while the soft, fluffy texture is a pleasure to experience; pampering your delicate skin (and lessening the pressure on your bulging laundry basket). What's more, this ingenious, generously-sized towel is phenomenally absorbent, helping to accelerate hair-drying time. And, the botanical fibres respect precious lengths, working to wick away water without unnecessary friction, resulting in healthier hair. Choose from classic white or 'Toasted Almond' (a pale buff shade).
how_to_use: Use wet:gently massaging your skin post cleanse to remove additional oil, grit, and anything else stubbornly sticking around. While this is going on, the Body Towel will be limiting the reapplication of bacteria, so your skin stays clean. Use dry:after cleansing, gently patting your body down. Youll be drying your skin whilst stimulating blood flow, helping to trigger skin cell rejuvenation. Youll also be breaking down any pore-clogging bacteria, dirt, and sebum that could trigger acne, inflammation, and irritation, which is much better than spreading it.
ingredient: Silverbac„,Lyocell„, Rayon Bamboo, Aegean Turkish Cotton (tested for harmful substances). 76cm x 142cm @700GSM

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Aloe Vera Gel Dr. Barbara Sturm Aloe Vera Gel
description: Boasting a conditioning base of 90% pure, organic aloe vera juice that's infused with purslane and panthenol, Dr. Barbara Sturm's Aloe Vera Gel is impressively soothing; designed to gradually bid arrivederci to irritation, it's a must for anyone whose skin needs some TLC after shaving, epilation or sunbathing. With an impressive 90% concentration of aloe leaf juice to support skin regeneration, ease irritation and soothe your skin, this cooling gel is bound to earn pride of place in your post-shower regime. Finally, it wouldn’t be a Dr. Barbara Sturm formula without purslane extract – the key ‘super plant’ active used across the range – helping to calm inflammation and protect sensitive cell membranes against free radical attack, plus panthenol (a.k.a. provitamin B5) to deeply soothe your skin.
how_to_use: Apply a thin layer to the face or body after cleansing or showering and massage in gently. Reapply as often as required.

name: Bondi Sands 1 Hour Express Self Tanning Foam 200ml Bondi Sands 1 Hour Express Self Tanning Foam 200ml
description: Perfect for those wanting to achieve a flawless yet long-lasting tan at a moments notice, this head-to-toe self-tanning foam marries convenience and efficacy in one sleek bottle. For a glow that could easily have come from a day lounging in the sun on Bondi beach, this quick-drying formula applies onto limbs seamlessly, starting off your tanning routine on the right foot. Thanks to the handy pump, application is always easy, even and never messy. It’s also non-comedogenic, meaning this non-streak formula won’t clog up your pores. Instead, expect a flawless, radiant glow in just one hour.

Use remaining residue on mitt to apply to face, elbows and knees. Rinse skin after one hour for a long-lasting dark tan. For the darkest tan leave foam on skin for 2-3 hours. Shower with warm water and gently pat skin dry.

name: Regenerate Advanced Enamel Serum Kit (2 x 16ml) Regenerate Advanced Enamel Serum Kit (2 x 16ml)
description: When your enamel is under siege (whether that be from the likes of acidic fruits or sugary soft drinks), equip yourself with the Regenerate Advanced Enamel Serum Kit. Combining the NR-5™ REGENERATE™ Advanced Enamel Serum with one Activator Gel plus two custom-fit mouth trays and a mixing stick, this set reverses the early enamel erosion process. Working to restore and regenerate tooth enamel mineral, the serum uses revolutionary patented ‘NR-5 Technology’, which combines calcium silicate and sodium phosphate to form a crystal structure that’s identical to hydroxyapatite — a key mineral found in dental enamel. When combined with the activator gel, the serum unleashes a concentrated boost to increase enamel hardness and improve teeth health for smiles all round.
how_to_use: Pick up the mouth tray. Apply one single thin layer of the NR-5™ REGENERATE™ Advanced Enamel Serum in the mouth tray. Add one single layer of Activator Gel into the mouth tray on top of the NR-5™ Advanced Enamel Serum. Use the mixing stick contained in the mouth tray holder and accurately mix the two ingredients. Begin the application in the dental arch of the upper jaw and insert the mouth tray. Hold the tray for 3 minutes. Once the application is over, remove the mouth tray and gently rinse your mouth with water to remove product residue. REGENERATE™ Advanced Enamel Serum should be used once a month, for three consecutive days, preferably before bedtime as part of a regime. For best results, use it in combination with the daily Advanced Toothpaste.
ingredient: NR-5 Serum: Glycerin, Calcium Silicate, PEG-8, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Aqua, PEG-60, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Monofluorophosphate, Aroma, Hydrated Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Sodium Saccharin, Polyacrylic Acid, Tin Oxide, Limonene, CI 77891. name: Pacifica Coconut Cream Body Scrub Pacifica Coconut Cream Body Scrub

There’s also a host of naturally derived ingredients that will leave your skin silky-smooth: papaya acid, which contains a gently exfoliating enzyme that rids skin of dead skin cells to reveal radiance; hydrating rose hip and sunflower oils which hydrate and maintain your natural moisture barrier; and coconut water which helps to soothe skin and prevent irritation. name: AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion 200ml AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion 200ml
description: Born out of one woman's frustration, AMELIORATE's creator Annette was desperate to transform her 'chicken skin' arms that appeared rough, red and bumpy. Nothing she tried had lived up to it's promises so she decided decided to take matters into her own hands and began to develop an exfoliating treatment and skin-smoothing body lotion to gently resurface and intensively condition, and from that AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion was born. SUITABLE FOR KEY BENEFITS CLINICALLY PROVEN Clinically proven to significantly increase moisture levels in the skin for up to 24 hours with Alpha Hydroxy Therapy 87% agreed that the appearance of their skin had improved and felt softer and smoother. 97% of people agreed the product left their skin feeling more moisturised. 80% agreed that their skin looked healthier. 87% of people agreed the product improved the appearance of ingrown hairs. 91% of people agreed the product helped to improve the appearance of razor bumps. 93% of people agreed the product helped to improve the appearance of skin after shaving. *Tested on 77 people with rough, dry, bumpy 'chicken skin' in a 4 week independent consumer trial. If the product gets into eyes, rinse well with warm water immediately. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.

description: Say hello to this beautifully-scented exfoliating scrub, that gently removes any unwanted dead skin. The Exfoliating Foot Scrub allows you to scrub your feet to perfection, with active ingredients that'll have your tootsies feeling irresistibly soft and sandal-ready in no time at all. Feel the effects of Ground Tea Tree Leaf and Pumice as they work to remove the dead, dulling layers of skin, leaving your feet silky and soft instead of hard and flakey, all while the star ingredient – Emu Oil – plumps up and energises tired, weary trotters. After using them all day, it's easy to neglect this little – but integral – part of your body, which is why we love the Exfoliating Foot Scrub as an extra-special, evening self-care treat.
how_to_use: Using the spatula supplied, apply a small amount onto hands and rub over wet feet paying attention to the heel and any areas of callus. Use lukewarm water to rinse the feet and wash away the scrub. Use once or twice a week.

Feet Saviors NOTE: As the packaging is currently being updated, you may receive different packaging to that shown in the image. The formula is the same.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Supermodel Body Charlotte Tilbury Supermodel Body

The perfect partner to low necklines, high hemlines or backless gowns, this nourishing lotion is enriched with soothing aloe vera, conditioning allantoin and firming 'FermiProtect' - a wild shitake mushroom extract. There's also caffeine to de-puff, menthol to cool and a metal massager to revive aching muscles.

name: Dermalogica Prisma Protect SPF 30 12ml Dermalogica Prisma Protect SPF 30 12ml
description: Bestowing a beautiful glow (while also protecting your complexion), the Prisma Protect SPF30 is a light-activated multitasking moisturiser that provides broad spectrum defence while preventing future signs of skin damage. With a creamy formula that sinks into skin to deliver deep hydration and a silky-smooth finish, ‘intelligent Drone Technology’ within this moisturiser is activated by visible light, releasing radiance by boosting your skin’s natural luminosity. This is assisted by a bio-ferment from sage, which helps to maintain an even skin tone and give you that effortlessly flawless complexion. There’s a double whammy of protection inside this clever tube too: broad Spectrum SPF30 provides protection from UV damage while ‘Breakthrough Antioxidant Technology’ helps protect skin against pollution. Goodbye stressed out, dehydrated skin; hello long-lasting hydration and a stronger, happier complexion.

Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.

description: Ideal for blemish-prone, oily skin types, this cleansing bar is crafted with activated bamboo charcoal to draw daily dirt build-up and impurities from deep within your pores. The bar also features tea tree oil and white clay to help clarify congested complexions. Cruelty-free, vegan and with minimal packaging, this clever bar is an eco-warrior’s dream without skimping on high quality ingredients – you won’t find any synthetics, fillers or nasty chemicals like parabens, silicones or sulphates here, just good-for-skin natural botanicals and do-gooders.

name: Marvis Toothpaste and Tube Stand Set - Whitening Marvis Toothpaste and Tube Stand Set - Whitening
description: Wrapping up their cult-classic Whitening Toothpaste with an accompanying tube stand (your sink-side will have never looked so chic), Marvis' Whitening Toothpaste Set is perfect for anyone looking to brighten their smile. Put aside your drugstore toothpaste – Marvis has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As you’d expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), this Whitening Toothpaste cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape, all while gently lifting stains and preventing discolouration. All encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf, this is guaranteed to put a smile on your face (if only to show off your pearly whites…).

name: MALIN + GOETZ Vitamin b5 Hand Treatment Bergamot MALIN + GOETZ Vitamin b5 Hand Treatment Bergamot
description: An intensely replenishing cream to repair and protect from the elements, MALIN + GOETZ’s Vitamin B5 Hand Treatment soothes any stresses, eliminates dryness and helps to maintain moisture levels. And now, the formula comes in a handy (geddit?) travel size — and a delicious new ‘Bergamot’ scent. Boasting a buffet of rich and reparative extracts to offer hydration without any residue, this decadent formula’s brimming with honey and vitamin B5, alongside a medley of swiftly absorbed fatty acids to fortify delicate skin and deflect the effects of aggressors. Starring vitamin B5 and shea to nourish and moisturise, alongside sodium pca and glycerin to ward against water loss and honey to heal, this luxe treatment is ideal for softening cuticles, strengthening soft, brittle nails and conditioning even the gnarliest palms.

name: Regenerate Enamel Serum Refill 32ml Regenerate Enamel Serum Refill 32ml
description: When your enamel is under siege (whether that be from the likes of acidic fruits or sugary soft drinks) and your {Regenerate Advanced Enamel Serum Kit} is running low on serum, look no further than the Regenerate Advanced Enamel Serum Refill. Uniting two NR-5™ REGENERATE™ Advanced Enamel Serums to replenish your stash, this duo reverses the early enamel erosion process. Working to restore and regenerate tooth enamel mineral, it uses revolutionary patented ‘NR-5 Technology’, which combines calcium silicate and sodium phosphate to form a crystal structure that’s identical to hydroxyapatite — a key mineral found in dental enamel. When combined with your activator gel, the serum unleashes a concentrated boost to increase enamel hardness and improve teeth health for smiles all round.
how_to_use: Use as part of the {Regenerate Advanced Enamel Serum Kit}. Pick up your mouth tray. Apply one single thin layer of the NR-5™ REGENERATE™ Advanced Enamel Serum in the mouth tray. Add one single layer of Activator Gel into the mouth tray on top of the NR-5™ Advanced Enamel Serum. Use the mixing stick contained in the mouth tray holder and accurately mix the two ingredients. Begin the application in the dental arch of the upper jaw and insert the mouth tray. Hold the tray for 3 minutes. Once the application is over, remove the mouth tray and gently rinse your mouth with water to remove product residue. REGENERATE™ Advanced Enamel Serum should be used once a month, for three consecutive days, preferably before bedtime as part of a regime. For best results, use it in combination with the daily Advanced Toothpaste.
ingredient: NR-5 Serum: Glycerin, Calcium Silicate, PEG-8, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Aqua, PEG-60, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Monofluorophosphate, Aroma, Hydrated Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Sodium Saccharin, Polyacrylic Acid, Tin Oxide, Limonene, CI 77891. Dermalogica Body Hydrating Cream 295ml Dermalogica Body Hydrating Cream 295ml

name: Solgar Ultimate Calm Supplement Tablets - Pack of 30 Solgar Ultimate Calm Supplement Tablets - Pack of 30
description: The pressures of modern life can make it hard to maintain a sense of serenity — scratch that, feeling calm in the slightest can be a luxury at times. Designed to promote relaxation, mental wellbeing and a positive mood, Ultimate Calm is a helping hand on days that you feel under pressure or overwhelmed. The calming capsules harness botanical extracts traditionally used in ancient wellness rituals, such as positivity-supporting saffron and ashawagandha: an Ayurvedic adaptogen that promotes mindfulness and calm.

name: Dermalogica Conditioning Body Wash 295ml Dermalogica Conditioning Body Wash 295ml
description: Gently cleansing but no less effective, the Conditioning Body Wash adds a touch of luxury to your daily shower ritual for a sense-awakening experience. Inspired by the essential oils used in Turkish Hammams, Dermalogica has combined luxurious relaxation with nourishing cleansing surfactants to keep you perfectly cleansed and, most importantly, de-stressed. name: Solgar Magnesium Citrate Tablets - Pack of 60 Solgar Magnesium Citrate Tablets - Pack of 60
description: Hailed as essential by industry experts, magnesium has a 360˚ effect on wellbeing – used by every organ (not to mention bones and muscles) to support their vital functions and ensure they're running smoothly... Abundant in leafy greens, nuts and seeds, a lot of us struggle to maintain a diet that's rich in magnesium, which is where Solgar's Magnesium Citrate Tablets come into their own. name: Elemis Mayfair No.9 Hand and Body Lotion 300ml Elemis Mayfair No.9 Hand and Body Lotion 300ml
description: Luxury meets sustainability in Elemis’ latest arrival. Not just kind to your skin, but also kind to our precious environment, the Mayfair No.9 Hand & Body Lotion is brimming with nourishing sustainably sourced ingredients, and housed within refillable packaging so you can top up time after time. Leave your skin feeling silky smooth to the touch with this indulgent cream. Scented with the British Mayfair No.9 fragrance, which took its inspiration from the much-loved Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm, this transforms your daily body care regime into a ritual. Sustainably sourced shea butter and borage oil melt into your skin for a comforting dose of hydration. Soft, supple skin is just around the corner too thanks to UK-grown blackcurrant seed oil, rich in omega fatty acids, starflower and echium that leave your skin feeling endlessly nourished. Our favourite part? Once you’ve finished your first bottle, you can top up your 100% PCR bottle with the refill pouches (sold separately). name: NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 30ml NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 30ml
description: A best-smelling must-have, Nuxe's Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil for Face, Body and Hair is a buffet of goodness for compromised skin - cherishing dry, scaly patches (and strengthening over-styled lengths!) with a medley of plant-derived oils. Completely non-greasy and quickly absorbed, this leaves a light lustre and works to replenish and comfort the scaliest limbs... A holiday hero (slather this all over post-sun skin), the blend of camellia, hazelnut, sweet almond, St. John's wort, macadamia and borage has impressive healing properties - working to elasticise and fortify while boosting moisture levels to promote a healthy glow. Rake through the ends of your hair to create a chic 'piecey-ness', smooth over shoulders or streak down the length of your shins to bestow an au naturel highlight. A multi-tasking wonder, there's a reason no routine should be without it.
how_to_use: Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® in the palm of your hand and add a drop of your usual moisturiser. Mix and apply to your skin using smoothing movements. Your face will be perfectly moisturised, and your skin softer and more supple. Apply to your shoulders, neckline, hands, or other areas that need attention. There is nothing quite like the unique quality of Huile Prodigieuse® to enhance the skin's texture in a single step. · In the palm of your hand, mix a drop of Huile Prodigieuse® with your foundation before applying: it will glide smoothly over your skin. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® on a natural bristle hairbrush for naturally controlled and radiantly shiny hair. Exposure to the sun leaves your skin feeling dehydrated and in need of special care and attention. There is nothing better than Huile Prodigieuse® to nourish and repair it. Ideal as a massage oil, Huile Prodigieuse® glides smoothly over your skin, infusing it with its divine fragrance. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® directly on your hair (from a distance of around 20 cm) and massage into your hair and scalp. Then wrap your head in a warm towel and leave for 15 to 20 minutes to allow Huile Prodigieuse® to penetrate before shampooing. Add a few drops of Huile Prodigieuse® to your bath water and drift away on its joyful and fragrant waves. A daily massage with Huile Prodigieuse® is ideal for alleviating stretch marks.
