name: Spotlight Oral Care Dental Floss for Decay Spotlight Oral Care Dental Floss for Decay
description: Battle plaque and decay with Spotlight Oral Care's Dental Floss for Decay from Spotlight Oral Care: an everyday staple that works to dislodge daily debris, fend against dental decay and remineralise enamel. Made from recycled ocean plastic and powered by fluoride - an active ingredient that dentists swear by for its clinically-proven ability to remineralise enamel - this floss effectively targets plaque, debris and residual food that threatens to mar your smile and cause decay. In the process, it helps to improve gum and overall oral health by delivering fluoride to where it is needed most! When used daily, it's effective at improving gum health, reducing inflammation and improving overall oral health.
how_to_use: Unwind approx 15inches of floss. Wind most of the floss around both of your middle fingers, leaving only about 1 to 2 inches of floss for your teeth. Hold the floss taut with your thumbs and index fingers. Slide the floss gently between the gum and the tooth. The floss should be held firmly against the tooth and rub along the surface of the tooth with a gentle up and down movement and into a C shape under the gum. Follow this process for the remaining teeth.

name: PIXI Glow Mist 80ml Glyolic Acid PIXI Glow Mist 80ml Glyolic Acid

name: Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Toothbrush - Graphite Grey Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Toothbrush - Graphite Grey
description: Providing a deep clean that reaches even the most inaccessible parts of your mouth, this Graphite Grey Sonic Toothbrush from Spotlight Oral Care boasts three settings - 'Sensitive', 'Clean' and 'White' - so you can target plaque and discolouration as you please. Equal parts gentle and effective in maintaining and promoting oral health, this efficient tool employs high-frequency brush movements to ensure that both toothpaste and oxygen are delivered to hard-to-reach nooks and crannies. It has a clever 2-minute timer to ensure that you hit your brushing quota every time as well as an impressively long-lasting battery, so you won't need to fret if you forget to hook it up to the charger one night. As for the settings, you can choose between 'Sensitive' (31,000 reps/min) for gentle care, 'Clean' (41,000 reps/min) for your standard scrub and 'White' (48,000 reps/min) for intense surface stain removal. Get ready to brush up!
how_to_use: Pick a setting that suits your needs. Place the brush on the area of the teeth where it meets the gum. Start on the top right on the outside of the teeth, near the cheek and work your way around to the top left side. Repeat for the inside of the teeth (near the roof of your mouth). Brush the biting surfaces of your teeth. Repeat for the lower teeth. Brushing should take 2 mins. 3 heads included Protective travel case included Type G electrical plug (British three-pin plug)

name: Spotlight Oral Care Exclusive Sonic Toothbrush - Rose Gold Spotlight Oral Care Exclusive Sonic Toothbrush - Rose Gold

name: Marvis - Travel Jasmine Mint Toothpaste 25ml Marvis - Travel Jasmine Mint Toothpaste 25ml
description: Put aside your drugstore toothpaste – Marvis’ has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As you’d expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape. Unlike your bog-standard formula however, there are flavours such as ‘Cinnamon Mint’, ‘Ginger Mint’, ‘Jasmine Mint’ and ‘Liquorice Mint’, alongside classics like ‘Whitening Mint’, ‘Aquatic Mint’ and ‘Classic Strong Mint’ all encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf. Perfectly sized for on-the-go, these travel-ready products are also perfect for popping into your suitcase, or for sampling your way through the exciting flavours on offer. Marvi-lous, or what?!
how_to_use: Use morning and evening to brush your teeth.
ingredient: Aquatic: Glycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Hydroxycitronellal, Farnesol, Benzyl Alcohol Cinnamon: Glycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Cinnamal, Limonene, Eugenol, Benzyl Alcohol Classic Mint: Glycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Limonene, Eugenol, Benzyl Alcohol Ginger: Glycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Limonene, Eugenol, Benzyl Alcohol Jasmine: Glycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol Liquorice: Glycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Anise Alcohol, Cinnamal, Eugenol, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol Whitening: Glycerin, Hydrated Silica, Aqua, Tetrapotassium Pyrophosphate, Aroma, Xylitol, Titanium Dioxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Limonene, Eugenol, Benzyl Alcohol

name: Elemis Frangipani Monoi Body Cream 200ml Elemis Frangipani Monoi Body Cream 200ml
description: With the exotic and seductive scent of frangipani flowers, this Frangipani Monoi Body Cream from Elemis is bound to transform your bathroom into a tropical paradise – enveloping you with a heady haze of reassuring warmth as it wraps your limbs in its exotic scent. Based on the Polynesian tradition of using monoi to soothe and nourish skin, scalp and strands, this luxurious body cream leaves your skin supple, soft and perfectly hydrated. It's crafted from a beautiful blend of Tahitian monoi oil, tiare flowers soaked in coprah oil and frangipani flowers to leave your skin clean and silky soft. Tip: If you are planning to part with it, don't even think about unscrewing the cap… you'll be hooked from the first inhalation (don't say we didn't warn you).
how_to_use: Body Cream: Use daily, AM and PM. Warm into the palms of hands and massage all over the body.
ingredient: Body Cream: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glyceryl Stearate, Propylene Glycol, Octyldodecanol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-12, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isopropyl Palmitate, Phenoxyethanol, Ceteareth-20, Carbomer, Fragrance (Parfum), Triethanolamine, Chlorphenesin, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Sodium Polyacrylate, Disodium EDTA, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut/Coprah) Oil, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Linalool, Caramel, Amyl Cinnamal,Hydroxycitronellal, Tocopherol, Plumeria Alba (Frangipani) Flower Extract, Plumeria Rubra (Frangipani) Flower Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Gardenia Tahitensis (Tiare) Flower Extract, Limonene.

description: Put aside your drugstore toothpaste – Marvis has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As you’d expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), this Whitening Toothpaste cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape, all while gently lifting stains and preventing discolouration. All encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf, this is guaranteed to put a smile on your face (if only to show off your pearly whites…). Perfectly sized for on-the-go, this travel-ready formula is also perfect for popping into your suitcase come vacay season. Marvi-lous, or what?!

name: Omorovicza Rose Lifting Serum (30ml) Omorovicza Rose Lifting Serum (30ml)
description: Beautifully light and swiftly absorbed, this hydrating serum is the ultimate treat for your skin. Rose Lifting Serum is fragranced with the rose flower water and contains Omorovicza's famed Hungarian thermal water alongside a cocktail of luxurious ingredients like sea mayweed (which helps relax the facial muscles) and ruby crystals (which blur fine lines and add radiance). Wheat polysaccharide also help minimise fine lines and wrinkles to leave your skin visibly smoother. The result is subtly lifted, firmed skin with a youthful, radiant glow.
how_to_use: Apply a tiny amount evenly to your face and neck after cleansing, in preparation for the appropriate Omorovicza mosituriser.

name: The Ordinary Mineral UV Filters SPF 30 with Antioxidants The Ordinary Mineral UV Filters SPF 30 with Antioxidants
description: An innovative take on sunscreen that does so much more than guard your complexion against the harmful, ageing effects of the sun (though it does that very well indeed) The Ordinary’s Mineral UV Filters SPF 30 with Antioxidants offers unrivalled protection. Avoiding the use of nanoparticles (these are small enough to penetrate your skin and get inside your body), The Ordinary has formulated this sunscreen with ultra-refined zinc oxide and titanium dioxide, suspended within non-comedogenic (non-pore-blocking) silicones. This allows the formula to remain extremely lightweight and prevent it from over-burdening your skin. An advanced antioxidant complex scavenges and neutralises free radicals, minimizes the intensity of UV radiation penetrating the skin, while a bio-sugar complex provides both short and long-term hydration and also naturally increases skin’s own capacity to hold water. Finally, Tasmanian pepperberry helps to calm stressed skin for a soothed finish.
how_to_use: Apply to face liberally and evenly 15 to 20 minutes before UV exposure. If continued UV exposure is expected, to maintain protection, reapply at least every 2 hours or after material water exposure, towel-drying, swimming or extensive perspiration. Suitable for all skin tones. For children under 6 months of age, consult a doctor prior to use. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cyclopentasiloxane, Zinc Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Hexyl Laurate, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Astaxanthin, Disodium Uridine Phosphate, Ethyl Ferulate, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract, Haematococcus Pluvialis Extract, Picea Mariana Bark Extract, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Sodium PCA, PCA, Sodium Lactate, Glucose, Maltose, Fructose, Trehalose, Urea, Allantoin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Linoleic Acid, Oleic Acid, Phytosteryl Canola Glycerides, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Isochrysis Galbana Extract, Lysolecithin, Lecithin, Triolein, Pentylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Polyglyceryl-5 Trioleate, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Tocopherol, Alumina, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin

name: Aesop Geranium Leaf Body Cleanser 500ml Aesop Geranium Leaf Body Cleanser 500ml
description: This gentle, lightly foaming cleanser offers an aromatic boost of wild geranium to kick-start your morning or refresh you after a long day. Use a small amount on a sponge in the shower, add a teaspoonful to your bath for a luxurious bubble bath or use it as a hand wash — there are so many options! Enhanced with geranium leaf extract to cleanse and deodorise (and make your shower smell amazing) without drying out your skin, this soul-soothing cocktail comes in a plastic bottle to protect your toes from any ouches should you drop the bottle while showering. Plus, a screw cap has replaced the traditional pump to save on plastic or serve as a refill for the {Geranium Leaf Body Cleanser}.
how_to_use: Use daily all over your body, making sure you rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Coco-Betaine, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Extract, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Polysorbate 20, Citric Acid, Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol

name: Aesop Reverence Aromatique Hand Wash 500ml Aesop Reverence Aromatique Hand Wash 500ml
description: Coming in two heaven-scent incarnations, the Aromatique Hand Wash with Screw Cap cleanses and softens without drying. Brilliant for those who have sensitive skin or like to wash their hands a lot, each vegan gel boasts microscopic pumice grains to gently polish and replenish your hard-working hands. ‘Reverence’ features a clean, earthy perfume — a fresh, herbal blend of vetiver root, bergamot and petitgrain — while ‘Resurrection’ harnesses the antibacterial properties of mandarin and rosemary extracts to cleanse, and lavender to assist in soothing and hydrating. No matter which scent you settle on, each will leave your bathroom or kitchen smelling divine. Like that’s not enough, smugly show off your new hand wash to every guest, knowing that the new screw cap has replaced the old Aesop pump to save on plastic and help the environment.
how_to_use: Dispense a single pump into damp hands and massage well for a thorough cleanse and exfoliation, or lather lightly, then rinse. Follow with an application of Reverence Hand Balm.

name: Kitsch Exfoliating Body Dry Brush Kitsch Exfoliating Body Dry Brush
description: Upscale your body care routine with the wonderfully soft Dry Body Brush and exfoliate away dead skin cells to reveal a radiant than ever complexion. Gently buffing away rough textures to promote an all-over glow, these vegan, cruelty-free fibres encourage a relaxing lymphatic drainage massage whilst also stimulating healthy blood circulation beneath your skin. Combining an easy-to-use natural cotton handle with a hygienic bamboo base, this eco-friendly pre-shower exfoliating tool is sure to be a glow-to staple in your regime.
how_to_use: Use on dry skin before bathing, do not wet brush. Starting at your feet, gently brush upwards in small strokes or circular motions, moving towards your heart. Repeat along your arms, and enjoy refreshed skin!
ingredient: Vegan bristles; natural cotton handle.

name: Emma Hardie Protect and Prime Moisturiser SPF 30 50ml Emma Hardie Protect and Prime Moisturiser SPF 30 50ml
description: In 1996 Emma Hardie introduced her unique Natural Lift and Sculpting facial, which set the beauty industry a-buzz with praise for its miraculous ability to firm, plump and enhance skin’s resilience. Emma’s passion stemmed from her own experience – and she was inspired to create Emma Hardie Skincare – a capsule collection of multi-purpose products, developed for use with prescribed application techniques so the woman at home could indulge in an everyday facial. Moringa seed is at the heart of Emma’s range – a renowned tissue-strengthener and potent source of skin-essential vitamins, minerals and antioxidant-rich phytonutrients which help to rehabilitate dulled skin and quickly recover its youthful vitality.

name: AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion - Rose 200ml AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion - Rose 200ml
description: Our best-selling Transforming Body Lotion in a delicate rose fragrance designs to refresh and uplift your bodycare regime whilst providing intense moisturisation. Born out of one woman's frustration, AMELIORATE's creator Annette was desperate to transform her 'chicken skin' arms that appeared rough, red and bumpy. Nothing she tried had lived up to it's promises so she decided decided to take matters into her own hands and began to develop an exfoliating treatment and skin-smoothing body lotion to gently resurface and intensively condition, and from that AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion was born. SUITABLE FOR KEY BENEFITS PROVEN RESULTS CLINICALLY PROVEN Clinically proven to significantly increase moisture levels in the skin for up to 24 hours with Alpha Hydroxy Therapy. USER TRIAL RESULTS* 87% agreed that the appearance of their skin had improved and felt softer and smoother. 97% of people agreed the product left their skin feeling more moisturised. 80% agreed that their skin looked healthier. 87% of people agreed the product improved the appearance of ingrown hairs. 91% of people agreed the product helped to improve the appearance of razor bumps. 93% of people agreed the product helped to improve the appearance of skin after shaving. *Tested on 77 people with rough, dry, bumpy 'chicken skin' in a 4 week independent consumer trial. FRAGRANCE Delicate rose fragrance designs to refresh and uplift your bodycare regime whilst providing intense moisturisation. AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion Rose is cruelty free, silicone free, PEGs free, dermatologically tested and clinically proven. Suitable for children age 3+ and pregnancy safe. Product packaging may vary.
how_to_use: Apply twice daily for 4 weeks. Thereafter apply daily to maintain the skin's optimum condition. WARNINGS: If irritation occurs discontinue use immediately. Avoid contact with eyes. If the product gets into eyes, rinse well with warm water immediately. SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Ammonium Lactate*, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Dimethicone, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance (Parfum), Potassium Sorbate, Pentylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Disodium EDTA, Lactic Acid, Serine, Sodium Lactate, Sorbitol, Urea, Linalool, Citronellol, Sodium Chloride, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Limonene, Coumarin, Juniperus Mexicana (Cedarwood) Oil, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Allantoin, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Geraniol. *From Lactic Acid. ACTIVE INGREDIENTS Ameliorate's unique LaH6 Skin Hydration Complex: Other active ingredients: Hydrating Sweet Almond Oil softens and protects the skin, enhancing its natural moisture barrier.

ingredient: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Germ Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Hellianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Prunus Domestica Seed Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Salvia Officinale (Sage) Oil, Tocopherol, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Oil, Citronellol, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol, Citral.

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water Refill Pouch Medium 200ml Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water Refill Pouch Medium 200ml
description: Now available in an eco-friendly refillable pouch, Isle of Paradise's Self-Tanning Water Refill Pouch means no more unnecessary wastage but more sunless, sunkissed glow! Made with 81% less packaging than buying a brand new bottle, this earth-friendly design is a no-brainer! Incredibly effective and easy-to-use, this removes any possibility of fake tan faux pas. Simply spritz the entire body and face with your chosen shade of water until skin is saturated in product and within 4 – 6 hours your skin will radiate a dewy, sun-kissed glow. Anything but ordinary, all Isle of Paradise products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each pouch is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Water will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Unscrew the lid of your {Self Tanning Water} and then unscrew the lid of your Refill Pouch and pour delicately into the empty bottle. Screw the lids tightly.

name: Isle of Paradise HYGLO Hyaluronic Self-Tan Serum for Body 100ml Isle of Paradise HYGLO Hyaluronic Self-Tan Serum for Body 100ml
description: Hailed as an everything serum, Isle of Paradise’s Hyglo Haluronic Self-Tan Serum Body is the plumping, hydrating and glow-giving hero your beauty routine has been missing. Starring water-retaining hyaluronic acid – it can hold up to 1000 times its own weight in water – this top-to-toe serum delivers intense and long-lasting hydration so skin appears beautifully dewy and subtly ‘volumised’. With quick and cumulative benefits, this formula is suitable for daily use – lending a whisper of buildable colour while IoP’s signature complex of avocado, coconut and chia seed oils help to boost elasticity, nourish and fortify skin to recover its ‘spring’. Lightweight and never tacky, apply every day for a healthy, post-holiday glow.
how_to_use: Apply once a day to keep skin plump and luminous.

description: Anything but ordinary, Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Mousse is 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. Perfect for those wanting their deepest and darkest tan yet, Isle of Paradise's Express Ultra Dark Self-Tanning Mousse is formulated with the brand's HyperViolet complex, which hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich and dark tan as well as ultra-hydrating Agave extract for a tan that’s both fast drying, and super-hydrating. Simply leave on for one to four hours to reach your desired tan.

name: NUXE Tanning Sun Oil High Protection SPF50 face and body 150 ml NUXE Tanning Sun Oil High Protection SPF50 face and body 150 ml
description: Designed for face and body, this fast-absorbing product delivers low protection to enhance your natural tan, while leaving your skin with the most beautiful satin finish. Formulated with Nuxe's patented filtering complex - this SPF50 contains three sunscreens and two esters, which have been rigorously selected for their proven effectiveness on all UV rays (think: short UVB + UVA + long UVA.) A botanical blend of rice and rosemary extracts is also used to offer cellular protection and ensure your skin maintains a more youthful-looking appearance. This clean formula has been tested on algae and corals to ensure its non-toxic for marine life, and has a non-greasy texture that absorbs instantly and leaves a satin finish that enhances your tan. As for the scent? Nuxe has bottled the dreamy spirit of summer with tantalising notes of sweet orange, tiare flower and vanilla.
how_to_use: Apply product generously before sun exposure. Spray the product into your hands before applying to your face, avoiding the eye area. On the body, you can spray it directly before spreading it carefully. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying your skin. Note: Applying an insufficient amount of product will significantly reduce the level of sun protection. Excessive exposure to the sun is dangerous and sun care products do not provide 100% protection. Avoid exposure to the sun in the middle of the day.

name: Molton Brown Neon Amber Bath and Shower Gel 300ml Molton Brown Neon Amber Bath and Shower Gel 300ml
description: Part of Molton Brown's exquisite range of Bath & Shower Gels, the brand's Neon Amber Bath & Shower Gel features the same iconic gel formula with notes of bright mandarin oil, creamy tonka absolute and warm ambroxan. Housed in Molton Brown's understated yet effortlessly chic bottles with embossed lids, each bottle of Bath & Shower Gel is bursting with exquisite fragrance and sumptuous good-to-skin ingredients that leave limbs soft, supple and cleansed while each of the quintessentially Molton Brown fragrances lingers on skin all day long. Yet to discover your firm favourite? Prepare to fall head over heels for the Neon Amber Bath & Shower Gel. A concoction of mandarin oil, pink peppercorn, tonka and cedarwood, this scent is equal measures warm and familiar as well as dark and mysterious – it's bound to result in compliments and guests asking where they can pick up a bottle!

name: Molton Brown Orange & Bergamot Hand Lotion Molton Brown Orange & Bergamot Hand Lotion
description: The silky Orange & Bergamot Hand Lotion comes in a limited-edition, illustrated bottle to celebrate 50 years of MOLTON BROWN. Balmy and non-greasy, this formula softens the gnarliest of knuckles and leaves palms gently scented and safe from the elements. Ultra-lightweight yet deeply replenishing, slather your hands after cleansing to seal in moisture and envelop your senses with its delicate, soul-soothing fragrance. Transporting you straight to the heart of Seville with its lush citrus groves, dappled sunshine and azure blue skies, this offers itself up as a holiday in Spain – no flight required. The citrusy ‘zing’ of Sevillian orange, bergamot and mandarin hover above a warm heart of neroli, cardamom and galbanum, which thrums above the base of musk, ylang-ylang and cedarwood. And, if you still need convincing, this formula's free from all the usual villainous suspects (you won’t find any parabens, gluten or cruelty here!).
how_to_use: Lather onto hands post-cleanse or whenever they feel dry for an instantly enlivening shot of moisture.

name: St. Tropez Self Tan Extra Dark Mousse 200ml St. Tropez Self Tan Extra Dark Mousse 200ml
description: Allowing absolutely everyone to get their perfect tan, experience St.Tropez’s deepest, darkest tan yet with their Self Tan Extra Dark Bronzing Mousse. Simply leave on for either 4 or 8 hours depending on your personal preference. After four hours you’ll achieve St.Tropez’s iconic deep tan and after eight hours you’ll get an intense but natural-looking, extra dark tan that lasts for days. Perfect as part of your daily routine or pre-holiday for an undetectable transformation, this is a must-try for those yet to find their perfect faux glow.
how_to_use: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturise any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles and feet. Step 2: For best results, apply using our Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Rinse off after 4 hours for our iconic dark tan or after 8 hours for an intense but natural-looking, extra dark tan. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as desired.

name: St.Tropez Self Tan Watermelon Mousse 200ml St.Tropez Self Tan Watermelon Mousse 200ml
description: Part of the brand new ‘Watermelon Infusion’ range, this Self Tan Classic Watermelon Infusion Bronzing Mousse is an update on the iconic classic that imparts a long-lasting tan (it can hold up to 10 days!) that is not only more long-lasting, but the infusion of vitamin E and watermelon extract helps to deeply moisturise and guarantee and even fade. Quick-drying, streak-free and non-sticky as well as ensuring no transfer, this easy-to-use Self Tan Classic Watermelon Infusion Bronzing Mousse also uses a vegan-friendly formula and 100% natural tanning actives so absolutely anyone can use this for a goddess-worthy glow.
how_to_use: Golden Rules for the Perfect Sunless Tan: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Moisturise dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles, feet and any light hair. Step 2: For best results, apply using our tan applicator mitt in upward circular motions to the skin, ensuring all areas are covered and lightly glide excess tan over the hands and feet. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Allow 4-8 hours before getting wet to allow your tan to fully develop. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as required.

description: Get the smooth, even skin you’ve always dreamed of from top to toe with Omorovicza’s Gold Sugar Scrub. name: NUXE Tanning Sun Oil High Protection SPF50 face and body 150 ml NUXE Tanning Sun Oil High Protection SPF50 face and body 150 ml
description: Designed for face and body, this fast-absorbing product delivers low protection to enhance your natural tan, while leaving your skin with the most beautiful satin finish. Formulated with Nuxe's patented filtering complex - this SPF50 contains three sunscreens and two esters, which have been rigorously selected for their proven effectiveness on all UV rays (think: short UVB + UVA + long UVA.) A botanical blend of rice and rosemary extracts is also used to offer cellular protection and ensure your skin maintains a more youthful-looking appearance. This clean formula has been tested on algae and corals to ensure its non-toxic for marine life, and has a non-greasy texture that absorbs instantly and leaves a satin finish that enhances your tan. As for the scent? Nuxe has bottled the dreamy spirit of summer with tantalising notes of sweet orange, tiare flower and vanilla.
how_to_use: Apply product generously before sun exposure. Spray the product into your hands before applying to your face, avoiding the eye area. On the body, you can spray it directly before spreading it carefully. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying your skin. Note: Applying an insufficient amount of product will significantly reduce the level of sun protection. Excessive exposure to the sun is dangerous and sun care products do not provide 100% protection. Avoid exposure to the sun in the middle of the day.

name: Frank Body Express-O Scrub 150g Frank Body Express-O Scrub 150g
description: Fuss-free, fast and fabulous, frank body’s Express-o Coffee Scrub is the perfect exfoliator for busy bees, rushed mornings and on-the-go. For use on wet or dry skin, this formula uses natural, cruelty-free and vegan ingredients to leave your bod feeling oh-so smooth and hydrated instantly, while fading scars and stretch marks over time. How does it work? We’re glad you asked! The scrub is formulated with roasted coffee grinds and raw sugar to gently buff away dead and dulling skin cells, revealing fresh one beneath. Massaging the grinds into your skin has the added benefit of stimulating blood flow and promoting collagen production – think: firmer, brighter and softer skin in one easy step. A multi-talented charmer, the scrub also battles breakouts thanks to cinnamon – an anti-bacterial spice that helps to reduce blemishes and inflammation. Of course, you can’t have ultra-soft skin without hydration – sweet almond and macadamia oils combine to deliver vitamins A, E and D to your skin, which moisturise and protect against free radicals. Then there’s the divine caramelly coffee scent… Need we say more?
how_to_use: In the shower, massage the scrub in circular motions over wet skin for a couple of minutes, focusing on dry areas, scars, stretch marks, breakouts, patchy tan or cellulite. Rinse off and pat dry.

The ‘Alpha Beta’ formula contains a potent blend of acids to exfoliate and smooth your limbs, including glycolic acid to reduce visible lines and wrinkles and lactic acid, a naturally occurring alpha-hydroxy acid that helps to speed up cell renewal. The formula is also built around encapsulated DHA that provides a time-released, seamlessly even tan and capislow that helps to minimise hair texture, length and growth.

name: ZitSticka MEGASHADE Breakout-proof SPF Serum ZitSticka MEGASHADE Breakout-proof SPF Serum
description: Combining the broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection of an SPF with the skin-nourishing benefits of a serum, the MEGASHADE Breakout-proof SPF 50 Sunscreen Serum is the new staple of your morning skincare routine. An effective two-in-one formula that leaves a luminous glow and zero white cast, let's just say this formula is something of an overachiever. For ultimate protection, the sunscreen-serum uses a mineral-chemical filter hybrid. Non-irritating zinc oxide (3%) creates a physical barrier between UV rays and your skin, while chemical filters absorb UV rays and turn them into heat, neutralising free radicals long before they can do harm to your skin. To beat blemishes, this non-comedogenic formula is packed with niacinamide to sooth breakouts and tea tree to boot spot-causing bacteria from your face. Rounding out the mega formula are a host of reliable hydrators to nourish and plump skin; think colloidal oatmeal, ceramides and hyaluronic acid. Yep, this dew-giving serum is guaranteed to make the rest of your shelfie look oh-so-lazy.
how_to_use: Apply one full dropper to skin as your last skincare step, or prior to applying makeup. Reapply every two hours. Use daily, irrespective of weather.

name: Frank Body Original Coffee Scrub 200g Frank Body Original Coffee Scrub 200g
description: Take your coffee addiction to new heights with frank body’s Original Coffee Scrub. Featuring only natural, vegan and good-for-you ingredients, it leaves your skin feeling silllky smooth to the touch and gradually reduces scars and stretchmarks (hurrah!). The formula contains two natural exfoliators; Robusta coffee grinds, which also stimulate blood flow and encourage collagen production, and sea salt to combat flakiness and, thanks to its anti-bacterial properties, tackle spots. To replenish moisture after all that exfoliation, cold pressed sweet almond oil packs a hydrating punch that lasts long after you’ve rinsed it off, and vitamin E helps to fade scars and marks. name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Body Brush Medium Dr. Barbara Sturm Body Brush Medium
description: Also available in {Soft}, these luxe and easy-to-store Body Brushes from Dr. Barbara Sturm are bound to encourage a healthy body - regardless of your personal needs or preferences. If your skin isn't sensitive to pressure, the Body Brush Medium is a gentle but powerful option with a higher density than the Body Brush Soft. Perfect for dry brushing on dry skin, simply work in a clockwise direction - lightly brushing up and towards your heart to improve skin texture, tone and tightness as well as aiding blood circulation and metabolism while diminishing the look of cellulite and dispelling toxins. This can be used everywhere from your feet, legs and arms to your bum and stomach. It’s important to brush from the extremities - ie. your hands and feet - up towards the heart. On the stomach, work from the bottom right side of the abdomen/hip up to the ribs, horizontally across to the left and then down to the left hip and horizontally across to the right rib. Trust us, after experiencing this mindful task alongside its inevitable glow-giving results, you'll wonder why you didn't start sooner...
how_to_use: Basically, you start at the extremities (furthest away from the heart) and massage towards the body centre (to the heart). Brush lightly with slow and even strokes towards the heart. Start with the front and back of the right foot and work your way towards the lower thigh. Brush from the lower leg to the thigh and then brush on to the right buttock. Then swipe the left side (from the foot to the lower leg and to thigh and buttock) in the same way. Copy this approach for the arms: brush starting with the right hand to the forearm, then from the lower to the upper arm. Then stroke from the left hand up to the left upper arm. When it comes to the stomach, it is important to follow the course of the colon to rule out any blockage. For this, you start on the bottom right side of the abdomen and brush upwards in small strokes until you approach the ribs. From there, brush horizontally to the left and continue down from there. It is important to brush clockwise. We recommend dry brushing 2-3 times per week.

name: Limited Edition Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Lunar New Year Refillable SPF Magic Cream 50ml Limited Edition Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Lunar New Year Refillable SPF Magic Cream 50ml
description: This uber-cult moisturising cream is all you need to bring dulled, dehydrated skin back from the brink, plus this limited edition packaging to celebrate Lunar New Year can still be refilled time and time again. Based on Charlotte's hand-made 'backstage' formula - originally created to prep models' complexions before the shows - this is the skin prep secret to runway read skin that you'll want to keep all to yourself. This rich, fast-acting formula delivers a serious hit of hydration thanks to its hyaluronic acid booster: sodium hyaluronate to attract and retain much-needed moisture, alongside a patented bionymph peptide complex which helps turn back the clock (in mere moments). Powerfully firming and line-lessening, this moisturiser also contains broad-spectrum sun filters to deflect both skin-burning and ageing rays, while extracts of frangipani, aloe vera, damask rose and vitamin A combine to stimulate regeneration, combat inflammation, soothe redness and leave skin looking enviably even-toned and luminous. Psst, you can now even replenish the full-sized (50ml) formula with the sustainably minded Charlotte's Magic Cream Refill!
how_to_use: Try Charlottes Pro-Collagen Wonder Workout: A 5-minute work-out for your face that stimulates micro-circulation, decongests puffy skin, relaxes facial muscles and delivers my patented anti-age ingredients deeper into the skin to boost collagen. Lift your complexion, sculpt and define your facial framework and get glowing, youthful skin in an instant. 1. Complexion Lift & Boost Collagen. Apply cream to the tips of the middle 3 fingertips of each hand. Blend into your cheeks starting from the lower cheek, near the mouth, in a sweeping motion up & out. Repeat this motion, moving up the face to simulate blood flow, and penetrate collagen-boosting ingredients deeper into the skin. To blend in the excess and de-congest puffed up cheeks, tap your cheeks with your fingertips in a pitter-patter motion, starting from the top of the cheek bone and working down. 2. Define Facial Framework: Cheekbones. Place your forefingers under your cheekbones, starting from the nose. Push upwards, into your bone structure, and outwards, smoothing your fingers along your cheekbones, finishing at your ear. Repeat three times. 3. Define Facial Framework: Jawline. Using your thumb and forefinger gently pinch your jawline, 2 seconds per pinch, moving along the line from your chin outwards. This drains puffy skin and sharpens contours. Finish by running your thumb and forefinger along your jaw again, in a sweeping motion, to smooth out skin. 4. Smooth Wrinkles & Relax Furrows. Apply cream to the tips of the middle 3 fingertips of each hand. Starting from the middle of the forehead, massage the cream into the skin in 3 circular motions, moving outwards towards the temples. This relaxes the muscles and smoothes over wrinkles. Pat in any excess cream with your ring finger to stimulate micro-circulation. 5. And Relax... Apply a light pressure on your temples for 5 seconds to finish the massage.

We recommend seeing your hygienist every 3 months throughout pregnancy to maintain oral health.

name: NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Florale Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 30ml NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Florale Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 30ml
description: A firm fixture of French bathroom cabinet's, Nuxe's exquisite Huile Prodigieuse Florale is a luxurious, bloom-scented spin on the best-smelling dry oil - designed to replenish your skin and envelop your senses with heavenly fragrance. A holiday hero (slather this all over post-sun skin), the blend of camellia, hazelnut, sweet almond, St. John's wort, macadamia and borage has impressive healing properties - working to elasticise and fortify while boosting moisture levels to promote a healthy glow. how_to_use: Spray some Huile Prodigieuse in the palm of your hand and add a drop of your usual moisturiser. Mix and apply to your skin using smoothing movements. Apply to your shoulders, neckline, hands, or other areas that need attention. In the palm of your hand, mix a drop of Huile Prodigieuse with your foundation before applying: it will glide smoothly over your skin. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse on a natural bristle hairbrush for naturally controlled and radiantly shiny hair. Ideal as a massage oil, Huile Prodigieuse glides smoothly over your skin, infusing it with its divine fragrance. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse directly on your hair (from a distance of around 20 cm) and massage into your hair and scalp. Then wrap your head in a warm towel and leave for 15 to 20 minutes to allow Huile Prodigieuse to penetrate before shampooing. Add a few drops of Huile Prodigieuse to your bath water and drift away on its joyful and fragrant waves. A daily massage with Huile Prodigieuse is ideal for alleviating stretch marks.

name: AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion 50ml AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion 50ml
description: Born out of one woman’s frustration, AMELIORATE’s creator Annette was desperate to transform her ‘chicken skin’ arms. Having suffered from Keratosis Pilaris from an early age – a remarkably common condition which causes skin to appear rough, red and bumpy due to an excess production of keratin (an essential part of skin’s uppermost layers) – which results in the development of little ‘plugs’ or goose bumps, Annette decided to take matters into her own hands. Nothing she tried had lived up to its promises, which is why she set about developing an exfoliating treatment and skin-smoothing body lotion, to gently resurface and intensively condition. Together, they’re a valuable therapy for sufferers of KP, as well as those who’re plagued with dry skin conditions – so liberate your limbs and bare your skin with confidence.

description: Designed to meet the oral care needs of expectant and breastfeeding mothers — it's safe for mum and baby — the Pregnancy Toothpaste protects against and strengthens enamel as it helps to maintain gum and teeth health. Created by mothers-slash-dentists Dr. Lisa and Dr. Vanessa, this toothpaste aids in cavity protection and strengthens your enamel which is especially essential if you suffer from morning sickness. What with fluctuating appetites (cravings mean snacking and snacking is a recipe for more decay), it's more important than ever for your toothpaste to feature active ingredients; that's why this formula harnesses fluoride to strengthen the tooth enamel and prevent future cavities plus hydroxyapatite to help remineralise decay. Held in a 100% recyclable sugarcane tube, it's as good for your teeth as it is the planet!
how_to_use: Dr. Lisa & Dr. Vanessa's Tips for Oral Care during Pregnancy 2. Use a Sonic Toothbrush throughout pregnancy and breastfeeding to ensure teeth and gums receive the best clean possible. 3. If you experience morning sickness, wait at least 1 hour before brushing your teeth to prevent enamel erosion. 4. We recommend seeing your hygienist every 3 months throughout pregnancy to maintain oral health.

name: ESPA Modern Alchemy The Purifying Polish 180ml ESPA Modern Alchemy The Purifying Polish 180ml
description: A decadent addition to your bath and body rituals, the Modern Alchemy Purifying Polish takes its inspiration from the soothing, ancient rituals of ayurvedic healing, Chinese medicine and shamanic practices. Sending you on a sensual, holistic journey of self-care, the formula rejuvenates the skin, body, mind and soul with a creamy, exfoliating texture that works as a deeply cleansing polish to purify, renew and glow-bestow. Enveloping skin in a hydrating, soothing shroud of grounding ylang ylang, ginger and vetiver, the formula gently sloughs away dead skin cells and impurities without stripping skin of its much-needed moisture. With hardworking volcanic lava spheres from naturally occurring volcanic rock, the Polish effectively exfoliates, while naturally soothing and brightening nutgrass and opuntia cactus ensure that skin is boosted with vitamins, minerals and water-retaining polysaccharides with antioxidant-rich flavonoids to protect and repair skin from external aggressors.

Smooth the balm onto dry skin using fluid, circular movements – travelling slowly and with intention across your body, while breathing in the nurturing aroma before washing away under a shower of warm water. name: Mama Mio Mama Marks Cream 125ml Mama Mio Mama Marks Cream 125ml
description: Noticing new stretchmarks in places you can’t imagine? Enter: Mama Mio’s Mama Marks Cream. Bursting with a uniquely blended powerhouse of peptides, fresh fruity enzymes and skin-softening oils, this creamy dream is a clinically proven solution that helps to fade even the stubbornest of stretchmarks. Pssst… this is your cue to put a stop to the old wives’ tales and kitchen remedies. Uniting a skin-strengthening omega-rich complex of avocado, inchi and argan oils to boost your skin’s elasticity; algae extract rich in silica; waterlily extract to help improve the appearance of your skin tone and moisture-magnetic vitamin E this nourishing cocktail bids your your textured skin adieu! Exciting your senses with an incredibly sweet and 100% natural blend of orange, bergamot, may chang, mandarin and lime, we’d understand if you became as obsessed with this hydrating cream as much as we are…
how_to_use: Apply a thin layer over each stretchmark twice a day, use for 12 weeks to see maximum benefits. If irritation occurs stop using immediately. Not for facial use.

name: Pai Skincare Dinner Out Copaiba and Kaolin Blemish Mask 75ml Pai Skincare Dinner Out Copaiba and Kaolin Blemish Mask 75ml
description: Pai Skincare’s miraculous Dinner Out is the perfect, gentle deep cleanse for sensitive complexions prone to blemishes and congestion. Ultra-gentle fruit acids derived from pink pomelo (a grapefruit-like citrus fruit) work to dissolve the ‘glue’ between dead skin cells to reveal the even radiance beneath, while organic, wild-harvested copaiba – a potent Amazonian active – helps to keep blemish-prone skin in great condition. Cooling and creamy, silky kaolin clay helps to rebalance combination skin types by drawing out impurities, without creating dryness or tightness. The natural antibacterial properties of the formula help to clear skin and heal existing blemishes, decongesting, clarifying and brightening in just 10 minutes. Polish it off with the muslin cloth enclosed and you’ll be amazed by the soft, smooth, radiant results beneath.
how_to_use: Apply a generous layer to clean, dry skin. Leave for 8-10 minutes, then rinse with the enclosed muslin cloth and warm water. Use 1-2 times a week or as an occasional skin pick-me-up.

Contains Nut Oil. *Organic Ingredient Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product. Suitable for Vegans. Not tested on animals. Contains nut oil. Pai Skincare’s commitment to product purity means they never use artificial fragrances, alcohol (denat.), parabens (including japanese honeysuckle), phenoxyethanol, propylene glycol, formaldehyde (including sodium hydroxymethylglycinate), sodium lauryl sulfate or other skin irritants.

name: Marvis Concentrated Mouthwash Spearmint 120ml Marvis Concentrated Mouthwash Spearmint 120ml
description: At last! A good-looking bottle to stand on your sink! Marvis’ Concentrate Mint Mouth Wash is a concentrated formula that floods your mouth with a minty (and antibacterial!) cocktail of natural extracts to limit the risk of decay and leave breath super fresh. Diluted with water, this alcohol-free blend helps to leave your mouth tingling – caring for teeth, gums and tongue while restoring your confidence; your breath will smell ‘zingily’ minty (and truly alluring). Simply dilute one part mouthwash in four parts water, swill liberally and get ready to carpe the diem!
how_to_use: Dilute one part mouthwash in four parts water and rinse for 30 seconds. Do not swallow and avoid eating or drinking anything for half an hour after use – this will allow enough time for the ingredients to completely clean the mouth, Recommended twice daily.
ingredient: Aqua (Water/Eau), Glycerin, Poloxamer 407, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma (Flavor), Propolis Extract, Sodium Saccharin, Xylitol, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Limonene, CI 42090(FD&C Blue no. 1), CL19140 (FD&C Yellow No.5).

name: Loving Tan Loving Tan Deluxe Tan Remover 200ml Loving Tan Loving Tan Deluxe Tan Remover 200ml
description: Ready for your next tan top-up? Look no further than Loving Tan's Deluxe Tan Remover which delicately sloughs away any remnants of your last fake tan while priming skin for your next top-up. A fan favourite that not only sloughs away tell-tale tiger bread tan scales, it also helps to prep and prime skin for yet another flawless faux glow. This gentle formulation is bursting with paw paw extract to clear impurities and unclog pores, raspberry extract to protect skin from moisture loss and bitter cherry extract rich in vitamin C to condition. Together, these luscious ingredients expertly lift away all built-up tan leaving your skin feeling silky smooth.
how_to_use: Before showering, apply gel liberally paying particular attention to any built-up tan. Allow gel to set for 10 minutes before showering. Using circular motions, use your Tan Removing and Skin Polishing Glove to polish away any dead skin cells and unwanted tan.
